h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0001^ea^ ^a^P2.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena pa.n.dukalohitakaa bhikkhuu attanaa bha.n.danakaarakaa kalahakaarakaa vivaadakaarakaa bhassakaarakaa sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa, yepi ca~n~ne bhikkhuu bha.n.danakaarakaa kalahakaarakaa vivaadakaarakaa bhassakaarakaa sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa te upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- ``maa kho tumhe, aayasmanto, eso ajesi. balavaabalava.m pa.timantetha. tumhe tena pa.n.ditataraa ca byattataraa ca bahussutataraa ca alamattataraa ca {alamatthataraa ca (syaa0 ka0)}. maa cassa bhaayittha. mayampi tumhaaka.m pakkhaa bhavissaamaa''ti. tena anuppannaani ceva bha.n.danaani uppajjanti ^a^V0.0002^ea^ uppannaani ca bha.n.danaani bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama pa.n.dukalohitakaa bhikkhuu attanaa bha.n.danakaarakaa kalahakaarakaa vivaadakaarakaa bhassakaarakaa sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa, yepi ca~n~ne bhikkhuu bha.n.danakaarakaa ^a^T1.0002^ea^ kalahakaarakaa vivaadakaarakaa bhassakaarakaa sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa te upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vakkhanti -- `maa kho tumhe, aayasmanto, eso ajesi. balavaabalava.m ^a^M0.0002^ea^ pa.timantetha. tumhe tena pa.n.ditataraa ca byattataraa ca bahussutataraa ca alamattataraa ca. maa cassa bhaayittha. mayampi tumhaaka.m pakkhaa bhavissaamaa'ti. tena anuppannaani ceva bha.n.danaani uppajjanti uppannaani ca bha.n.danaani bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattantii''ti.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, pa.n.dukalohitakaa bhikkhuu attanaa ^a^P2.0002^ea^ bha.n.danakaarakaa kalahakaarakaa vivaadakaarakaa bhassakaarakaa sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa, yepi ca~n~ne bhikkhuu bha.n.danakaarakaa kalahakaarakaa vivaadakaarakaa bhassakaarakaa sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa te upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- `maa kho tumhe, aayasmanto, eso ajesi. balavaabalava.m pa.timantetha. tumhe tena pa.n.ditataraa ca byattataraa ca bahussutataraa ca alamattataraa ca. maa cassa bhaayittha. mayampi tumhaaka.m pakkhaa bhavissaamaa'ti. tena anuppannaani ceva bha.n.danaani uppajjanti, uppannaani ca bha.n.danaani bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattantii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi ^a^T1.0003^ea^ buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m moghapurisaana.m ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa attanaa bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa, yepi ca~n~ne bhikkhuu bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa te upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vakkhanti -- `maa kho tumhe, aayasmanto, eso ajesi. balavaabalava.m pa.timantetha. tumhe tena pa.n.ditataraa ca byattataraa ca bahussutataraa ca alamattataraa ca. maa cassa bhaayittha. mayampi tumhaaka.m pakkhaa bhavissaamaa'ti? tena anuppannaani ceva bha.n.danaani uppajjanti, uppannaani ca bha.n.danaani bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattanti. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya. atha khveta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana~nceva appasaadaaya pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathattaayaa''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa te {pa.n.dukalohitake (syaa0)} bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa dubbharataaya dupposataaya mahicchataaya ^a^V0.0003^ea^ asantu.t.thitaaya {asantu.t.thataaya (syaa0), asantu.t.thiyaa (sii0)} sa"nga.nikaaya kosajjassa ^a^M0.0003^ea^ ava.n.na.m bhaasitvaa anekapariyaayena subharataaya suposataaya appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa {viriyaarambhassa (sii0), viiriyaarabbhassa (ka0)} va.n.na.m bhaasitvaa bhikkhuuna.m tadanucchavika.m tadanulomika.m ^a^T1.0004^ea^ dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tajjaniiyakamma.m karotu. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, kaatabba.m. pa.thama.m pa.n.dukalohitakaa bhikkhuu codetabbaa, codetvaa saaretabbaa, saaretvaa aapatti.m {aapatti (sii0 syaa0)} aaropetabbaa, aapatti.m aaropetvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ime pa.n.dukalohitakaa bhikkhuu attanaa bha.n.danakaarakaa kalahakaarakaa vivaadakaarakaa bhassakaarakaa sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa, yepi ca~n~ne bhikkhuu bha.n.danakaarakaa kalahakaarakaa vivaadakaarakaa bhassakaarakaa sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa te upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- `maa ^a^T1.0005^ea^ kho tumhe, aayasmanto, eso ajesi. balavaabalava.m pa.timantetha. tumhe tena pa.n.ditataraa ca byattataraa ca bahussutataraa ca alamattataraa ca. maa cassa bhaayittha. mayampi tumhaaka.m pakkhaa bhavissaamaa'ti. tena anuppannaani ceva bha.n.danaani uppajjanti, uppannaani ca bha.n.danaani bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattanti. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tajjaniiyakamma.m kareyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ime pa.n.dukalohitakaa bhikkhuu attanaa bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa, yepi ca~n~ne bhikkhuu bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa te upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- `maa kho tumhe, aayasmanto, eso ajesi. balavaabalava.m pa.timantetha. tumhe tena pa.n.ditataraa ca byattataraa ca bahussutataraa ca alamattataraa ca. maa cassa bhaayittha. mayampi tumhaaka.m pakkhaa bhavissaamaa'ti. tena anuppannaani ceva bha.n.danaani uppajjanti, uppannaani ca bha.n.danaani bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattanti. sa"ngho pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^M0.0004^ea^ tajjaniiyakamma.m karoti. yassaayasmato khamati pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tajjaniiyassa kammassa kara.na.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ime pa.n.dukalohitakaa bhikkhuu attanaa bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa, yepi ca~n~ne bhikkhuu bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa te upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- `maa kho tumhe ^a^V0.0004^ea^, aayasmanto, eso ajesi. balavaabalava.m pa.timantetha. tumhe tena pa.n.ditataraa ca byattataraa ca bahussutataraa ca alamattataraa ca. maa cassa bhaayittha. mayampi tumhaaka.m pakkhaa bhavissaamaa'ti. tena anuppannaani ceva bha.n.danaani uppajjanti, uppannaani ca bha.n.danaani bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattanti. sa"ngho pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tajjaniiyakamma.m karoti. yassaayasmato khamati pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tajjaniiyassa kammassa kara.na.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho ^a^T1.0006^ea^. ime pa.n.dukalohitakaa bhikkhuu attanaa bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa, yepi ca~n~ne bhikkhuu bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarakaa te upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- `maa kho tumhe, aayasmanto, eso ajesi. balavaabalava.m pa.timantetha. tumhe tena pa.n.ditataraa ca byattataraa ca bahussutataraa ca alamattataraa ca. maa cassa bhaayittha. mayampi tumhaaka.m pakkhaa bhavissaamaa'ti. tena anuppannaani ceva bha.n.danaani uppajjanti, uppannaani ca bha.n.danaani bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattanti. sa"ngho pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tajjaniiyakamma.m karoti. yassaayasmato khamati pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tajjaniiyassa kammassa kara.na.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``kata.m sa"nghena pa.n.dukalohitakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tajjaniiyakamma.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^P2.0003^ea^ ^a^M0.0005^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m tajjaniiyakamma.m adhammakamma~nca {adhammakamma~nceva (syaa0)} hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca. asammukhaa kata.m hoti, appa.tipucchaa kata.m hoti, appa.ti~n~naaya kata.m hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tajjaniiyakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tajjaniiyakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca. anaapattiyaa kata.m ^a^T1.0007^ea^ hoti, adesanaagaaminiyaa aapattiyaa kata.m hoti, desitaaya aapattiyaa kata.m hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tajjaniiyakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca.

[03]``aparehipi ^a^V0.0005^ea^, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tajjaniiyakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca. acodetvaa kata.m hoti, asaaretvaa kata.m hoti, aapatti.m anaaropetvaa kata.m hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tajjaniiyakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tajjaniiyakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca. asammukhaa kata.m hoti, adhammena kata.m hoti, vaggena kata.m hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tajjaniiyakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca.

[06] adhammakammadvaadasaka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[06] dhammakammadvaadasaka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ {pari0 323} ``tiihi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno, aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho, tajjaniiyakamma.m kareyya. bha.n.danakaarako hoti kalahakaarako vivaadakaarako bhassakaarako sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarako; baalo hoti abyatto aapattibahulo anapadaano; gihisa.msa.t.tho viharati ananulomikehi ^a^V0.0009^ea^ gihisa.msaggehi -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno ^a^T1.0013^ea^, aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho, tajjaniiyakamma.m kareyya.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno, aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho, tajjaniiyakamma.m kareyya. adhisiile siilavipanno hoti, ajjhaacaare aacaaravipanno hoti, atidi.t.thiyaa di.t.thivipanno hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno, aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho, tajjaniiyakamma.m kareyya.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``pabbaajaniiyakammakatena ^a^T1.0052^ea^ ^a^M0.0034^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa -- na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo, na bhikkhunovaadakasammuti saaditabbaa, sammatenapi bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbaa. yaaya aapattiyaa sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakamma.m kata.m hoti saa aapatti na aapajjitabbaa, a~n~naa vaa taadisikaa ^a^V0.0032^ea^, tato vaa paapi.t.thataraa; kamma.m na garahitabba.m, kammikaa na garahitabbaa. na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposatho .thapetabbo, na pavaara.naa .thapetabbaa, na savacaniiya.m kaatabba.m, na anuvaado pa.t.thapetabbo, na okaaso kaaretabbo, na codetabbo, na saaretabbo, na bhikkhuuhi sampayojetabba''nti.
[06] pabbaajaniiyakamme a.t.thaarasavatta.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ atha kho saariputtamoggallaanappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho kii.taagiri.m gantvaa assajipunabbasukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m kii.taagirismaa pabbaajaniiyakamma.m akaasi -- na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhuuhi kii.taagirismi.m vatthabbanti. te sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakataa na sammaa vattanti, na loma.m paatenti, na netthaara.m vattanti; na bhikkhuu khamaapenti, akkosanti, paribhaasanti; chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa mohagaamitaa bhayagaamitaa paapenti; pakkamantipi, vibbhamantipi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakataa na sammaa vattissanti, na loma.m paatessanti, na ^a^T1.0053^ea^ netthaara.m vattissanti; na bhikkhuu khamaapessanti, akkosissanti, paribhaasissanti; chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa mohagaamitaa bhayagaamitaa paapessanti; pakkamissantipi, vibbhamissantipii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakataa na sammaa vattanti, na loma.m paatenti, na netthaara.m vattanti; na bhikkhuu khamaapenti, akkosanti, paribhaasanti; chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa mohagaamitaa bhayagaamitaa paapenti; pakkamantipi, vibbhamantipii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m ^a^M0.0035^ea^...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakataa na sammaa vattissanti, na loma.m paatessanti, na netthaara.m vattissanti; na bhikkhuu khamaapessanti, akkosissanti, paribhaasissanti; chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa mohagaamitaa bhayagaamitaa paapessanti; pakkamissantipi, vibbhamissantipi. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho pabbaajaniiyakamma.m pa.tippassambhetu.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V0.0033^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno ^a^P2.0015^ea^ pabbaajaniiyakamma.m nappa.tippassambhetabba.m. upasampaadeti, nissaya.m deti, saama.nera.m ^a^T1.0054^ea^ upa.t.thaapeti, bhikkhunovaadakasammuti.m saadiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno pabbaajaniiyakamma.m nappa.tippassambhetabba.m.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakato sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, pabbaajaniiyassa kammassa pa.tippassaddhi.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno pabbaajaniiyakamma.m pa.tippassambheyya. esaa ~natti.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0057^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa sudhammo macchikaasa.n.de cittassa gahapatino aavaasiko hoti, navakammiko dhuvabhattiko. yadaa citto gahapati sa"ngha.m vaa ga.na.m vaa puggala.m vaa nimantetukaamo hoti tadaa na aayasmanta.m sudhamma.m anapaloketvaa sa"ngha.m vaa ga.na.m vaa puggala.m vaa nimanteti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu, aayasmaa ca saariputto, aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano, aayasmaa ca mahaakaccaano, aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko ^a^P2.0016^ea^, aayasmaa ca mahaakappino, aayasmaa ca mahaacundo, aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca revato, aayasmaa ca upaali, aayasmaa ca aanando, aayasmaa ca raahulo, kaasiisu caarika.m caramaanaa yena macchikaasa.n.do tadavasaru.m.

[03]assosi kho citto gahapati theraa kira bhikkhuu macchikaasa.n.da.m anuppattaati. atha kho citto gahapati yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami ^a^M0.0038^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho citta.m gahapati.m aayasmaa saariputto dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi.

[03]atha kho citto gahapati aayasmataa saariputtena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito there bhikkhuu etadavoca ^a^T1.0058^ea^ -- ``adhivaasentu me, bhante, theraa svaatanaaya aagantukabhatta''nti. adhivaasesu.m kho theraa bhikkhuu {adhivaasesu.m kho te theraa bhikkhuu (syaa0)} tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03]atha ^a^V0.0036^ea^ kho citto gahapati theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yenaayasmaa sudhammo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m sudhamma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m sudhamma.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, ayyo sudhammo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m therehii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa sudhammo `pubbe khvaaya.m citto gahapati yadaa sa"ngha.m vaa ga.na.m vaa puggala.m vaa nimantetukaamo na ma.m anapaloketvaa sa"ngha.m vaa ga.na.m vaa puggala.m vaa nimanteti; sodaani ma.m anapaloketvaa there bhikkhuu nimantesi; du.t.thodaanaaya.m citto gahapati anapekkho virattaruupo mayii'ti citta.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, gahapati, naadhivaasemii''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m sudhamma.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, ayyo sudhammo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m therehii''ti. ``ala.m, gahapati, naadhivaasemii''ti. atha kho citto gahapati `ki.m me karissati ayyo sudhammo ^a^T1.0059^ea^ adhivaasento vaa anadhivaasento vaa'ti aayasmanta.m sudhamma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ atha kho citto gahapati tassaa rattiyaa accayena theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapesi. atha kho aayasmaa sudhammo `ya.mnuunaaha.m cittassa gahapatino theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tiyatta.m ^a^P2.0017^ea^ passeyya'nti pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena cittassa gahapatino nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho citto gahapati yenaayasmaa sudhammo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M0.0039^ea^ aayasmanta.m sudhamma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho citta.m gahapati.m aayasmaa sudhammo etadavoca -- ``pahuuta.m kho te ida.m, gahapati, khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyatta.m; ekaa ca kho idha natthi yadida.m tilasa"ngu.likaa''ti. ``bahumhi vata, bhante, ratane buddhavacane {bhante buddhavacane (syaa0)} vijjamaane ayyena sudhammena yadeva ki~nci bhaasita.m yadida.m tilasa"ngu.likaati. bhuutapubba.m, bhante, dakkhi.naapathakaa vaa.nijaa puratthima.m janapada.m agama.msu vaa.nijjaaya. te tato kukku.ti.m aanesu.m. atha kho saa, bhante, kukku.tii kaakena saddhi.m sa.mvaasa.m kappesi. saa potaka.m janesi. yadaa kho so, bhante, kukku.tapotako ^a^T1.0060^ea^ kaakavassa.m vassitukaamo hoti, kaakakukku.tiiti vassati; yadaa kukku.tivassa.m vassitukaamo hoti, kukku.tikaakaati vassati. evameva kho, bhante, bahumhi ratane buddhavacane vijjamaane ayyena sudhammena yadeva ki~nci bhaasita.m yadida.m tilasa.mgu.likaa''ti. ``akkosasi ma.m tva.m, gahapati, paribhaasasi ma.m tva.m, gahapati. eso te, gahapati, aavaaso, pakkamissaamii''ti. ``naaha.m, bhante, ayya.m sudhamma.m akkosaami, paribhaasaami ^a^V0.0037^ea^ {na paribhaasaami (sii0 syaa0)}. vasatu, bhante, ayyo sudhammo macchikaasa.n.de. rama.niiya.m ambaa.takavana.m. aha.m ayyassa sudhammassa ussukka.m karissaami, ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... ^a^T1.0061^ea^ tatiyampi kho aayasmaa sudhammo citta.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``akkosasi ma.m tva.m, gahapati, paribhaasasi ma.m tva.m, gahapati. eso te, gahapati, aavaaso, pakkamissaamii''ti. ``kaha.m, bhante, ayyo sudhammo gamissatii''ti? ``saavatthi.m kho aha.m, gahapati, gamissaami bhagavanta.m dassanaayaa''ti. ``tena hi, bhante, ya~nca attanaa bha.nita.m, ya~nca mayaa bha.nita.m ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocehi. anacchariya.m kho paneta.m, bhante, ya.m ayyo sudhammo punadeva macchikaasa.n.da.m paccaagaccheyyaa''ti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa sudhammo senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena saavatthi tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena saavatthi jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa sudhammo ya~nca attanaa bha.nita.m ^a^P2.0018^ea^ ya~nca cittena gahapatinaa bha.nita.m ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi.

[03]``kata.m sa"nghena sudhammassa bhikkhuno pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m -- citto te gahapati khamaapetabboti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno, aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho, pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m ^a^V0.0040^ea^ kareyya. gihiina.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, gihiina.m anatthaaya parisakkati, gihiina.m anaavaasaaya {avaasaaya (sii0)} parisakkati, gihii akkosati paribhaasati, gihii gihiihi ^a^P2.0019^ea^ bhedeti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno, aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho, pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m kareyya.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ``aapattiyaa ^a^V0.0059^ea^ appa.tikamme ukkhepaniiyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa -- na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo, na bhikkhunovaadakasammuti saaditabbaa, sammatenapi bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbaa. yaaya aapattiyaa sa"nghena, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakamma.m kata.m hoti saa aapatti na aapajjitabbaa, a~n~naa vaa taadisikaa, tato vaa paapi.t.thataraa; kamma.m na garahitabba.m, kammikaa na garahitabbaa. na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivaadana.m, paccu.t.thaana.m, a~njalikamma.m, saamiicikamma.m, aasanaabhihaaro, seyyaabhihaaro, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m, paadakathalika.m, pattaciivarappa.tiggaha.na.m, nahaane pi.t.thiparikamma.m saaditabba.m. na pakatatto bhikkhu siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msetabbo ^a^T1.0100^ea^, na aacaaravipattiyaa anuddha.msetabbo, na di.t.thivipattiyaa anuddha.msetabbo, na aajiivavipattiyaa anuddha.msetabbo, na bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi bhedetabbo. na gihiddhajo dhaaretabbo, na titthiyaddhajo dhaaretabbo, na titthiyaa sevitabbaa; bhikkhuu sevitabbaa, bhikkhusikkhaaya sikkhitabba.m. na pakatattena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m ekacchanne aavaase vatthabba.m, na ekacchanne anaavaase vatthabba.m, na ekacchanne aavaase vaa ^a^M0.0064^ea^ anaavaase vaa vatthabba.m, pakatatta.m bhikkhu.m disvaa aasanaa vu.t.thaatabba.m, na pakatatto bhikkhu aasaadetabbo anto vaa bahi vaa. na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposatho .thapetabbo, na pavaara.naa .thapetabbaa, na savacaniiya.m kaatabba.m, na anuvaado pa.t.thapetabbo, na okaaso kaaretabbo, na codetabbo, na saaretabbo, na bhikkhuuhi sampayojetabba''nti.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ atha kho sa"ngho channassa bhikkhuno, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakamma.m akaasi -- asambhoga.m sa"nghena. so sa"nghena, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakammakato tamhaa aavaasaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m agamaasi. tattha bhikkhuu neva abhivaadesu.m, na paccu.t.thesu.m, na a~njalikamma.m na saamiicikamma.m aka.msu, na sakkari.msu, na garu.m kari.msu, na maanesu.m, na puujesu.m. so bhikkhuuhi asakkariyamaano agarukariyamaano amaaniyamaano apuujiyamaano asakkaarapakato tamhaapi aavaasaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m ^a^T1.0101^ea^ agamaasi. tatthapi bhikkhuu neva abhivaadesu.m, na paccu.t.thesu.m, na a~njalikamma.m na saamiicikamma.m aka.msu, na sakkari.msu, na garu.m kari.msu, na maanesu.m, na puujesu.m. so bhikkhuuhi asakkariyamaano agarukariyamaano amaaniyamaano ^a^V0.0060^ea^ apuujiyamaano asakkaarapakato tamhaapi aavaasaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m agamaasi. tatthapi bhikkhuu neva abhivaadesu.m, na paccu.t.thesu.m, na a~njalikamma.m na saamiicikamma.m aka.msu, na sakkari.msu, na garu.m kari.msu, na maanesu.m, na puujesu.m. so bhikkhuuhi asakkariyamaano agarukariyamaano amaaniyamaano apuujiyamaano asakkaarapakato punadeva kosambi.m paccaaga~nchi. so sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeti -- ``aha.m, aavuso, sa"nghena, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakammakato sammaa vattaami, loma.m paatemi, netthaara.m vattaami. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0.... ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho channassa bhikkhuno, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakamma.m pa.tippassambhetu.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m channo bhikkhu sa"nghena, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakammakato sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme ukkhepaniiyassa kammassa pa.tippassaddhi.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho channassa bhikkhuno ^a^T1.0106^ea^, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakamma.m pa.tippassambheyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``dutiyampi ^a^M0.0068^ea^ etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m channo bhikkhu sa"nghena, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakammakato sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyassa kammassa pa.tippassaddhi.m yaacati. sa"ngho channassa bhikkhuno, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyakamma.m pa.tippassambheti. yassaayasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhepaniiyassa kammassa pa.tippassaddhi, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu paaci0 417; ma0 ni0 234 aadayo} tena ^a^T1.0107^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ari.t.thassa naama bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa {gandhabaadhipubbassa (ka0)} evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti. assosu.m kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu ari.t.thassa naama kira bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tenupasa"nkami.msu. upasa"nkamitvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira te, aavuso ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti? ``eva.mbyaa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme ^a^M0.0069^ea^ antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti.

[03]``maavuso ^a^V0.0064^ea^ ari.t.tha, eva.m avaca. maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi. na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m ^a^T1.0108^ea^ {abbhaacikkhana.m (ka0)}. na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso ari.t.tha, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa. ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa {bahuupaayaasaa (sii0 syaa0)}, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa, bahudukkhaa bahuupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. ma.msapesuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...pe0... ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...pe0... a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... yaacitakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa ^a^P2.0026^ea^ bhagavataa... asisuunuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... sattisuuluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa, bahudukkhaa bahuupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo''ti.

[03]evampi kho ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tehi bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano tatheva ta.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- ``eva.mbyaa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti. yato ca kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha ^a^T1.0109^ea^ kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira te, ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti? ``eva.mbyaa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti.

[03]``kassa ^a^M0.0070^ea^ nu kho naama tva.m, moghapurisa, mayaa eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaasi? nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa? ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. ma.msapesuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...pe0... ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...pe0... yaacitakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... asisuunuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa ^a^V0.0065^ea^ mayaa... sattisuuluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. atha ca pana tva.m, moghapurisa, attanaa duggahitena {duggahitena di.t.thigatena (syaa0)} amhe ceva abbhaacikkhasi, attaana~nca kha.nasi ^a^T1.0110^ea^, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavasi. ta~nhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho ari.t.thassa bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa, paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa appa.tinissagge, ukkhepaniiyakamma.m karotu -- asambhoga.m sa"nghena. eva~nca pana bhikkhave kaatabba.m -- pa.thama.m ari.t.tho bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvaa saaretabbo, saaretvaa aapatti.m aaropetabbo, aapatti.m aaropetvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ari.t.thassa bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m ^a^P2.0027^ea^ uppanna.m -- tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaati. so ta.m di.t.thi.m na pa.tinissajjati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ari.t.thassa bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa, paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa appa.tinissagge, ukkhepaniiyakamma.m kareyya -- asambhoga.m sa"nghena. esaa ~natti.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0128^ea^ ^a^P2.0031^ea^ ^a^M0.0082^ea^ ^a^V0.0077^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena paarivaasikaa bhikkhuu saadiyanti pakatattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhivaadana.m, paccu.t.thaana.m, a~njalikamma.m, saamiicikamma.m, aasanaabhihaara.m, seyyaabhihaara.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m, paadakathalika.m, pattaciivarapa.tiggaha.na.m, nahaane pi.t.thiparikamma.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama paarivaasikaa bhikkhuu saadiyissanti pakatattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhivaadana.m, paccu.t.thaana.m, a~njalikamma.m, saamiicikamma.m, aasanaabhihaara.m, seyyaabhihaara.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m, paadakathalika.m, pattaciivarapa.tiggaha.na.m, nahaane pi.t.thiparikamma''nti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, paarivaasikaa bhikkhuu saadiyanti pakatattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhivaadana.m, paccu.t.thaana.m, a~njalikamma.m, saamiicikamma.m, aasanaabhihaara.m, seyyaabhihaara.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m, paadakathalika.m, pattaciivarapa.tiggaha.na.m, nahaane pi.t.thiparikamma''nti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m...pe0... katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, paarivaasikaa bhikkhuu saadiyissanti pakatattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhivaadana.m, paccu.t.thaana.m, a~njalikamma.m, saamiicikamma.m, aasanaabhihaara.m, seyyaabhihaara.m, paadodaka.m ^a^T1.0129^ea^ paadapii.tha.m, paadakathalika.m, pattaciivarapa.tiggaha.na.m, nahaane pi.t.thiparikamma.m. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, paarivaasikena bhikkhunaa saaditabba.m pakatattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhivaadana.m, paccu.t.thaana.m, a~njalikamma.m ^a^V0.0078^ea^, saamiicikamma.m, aasanaabhihaaro, seyyaabhihaaro, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m, paadakathalika.m, pattaciivarapa.tiggaha.na.m, nahaane pi.t.thiparikamma.m. yo saadiyeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03]``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paarivaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m mithu yathaavu.d.dha.m abhivaadana.m, paccu.t.thaana.m, a~njalikamma.m, saamiicikamma.m, aasanaabhihaara.m, seyyaabhihaara.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m, paadakathalika.m, pattaciivarapa.tiggaha.na.m, nahaane pi.t.thiparikamma.m.

[03]``anujaanaami ^a^M0.0083^ea^, bhikkhave, paarivaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa~nca yathaavu.d.dha.m -- uposatha.m, pavaara.na.m, vassikasaa.tika.m, o.nojana.m, bhatta.m. tena hi, bhikkhave, paarivaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa paarivaasikehi bhikkhuuhi vattitabba.m ^a^P2.0032^ea^.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajjati dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo ^a^V0.0133^ea^; eka.m aapatti.m jaanaati, eka.m aapatti.m na jaanaati. so sa"ngha.m ya.m aapatti.m jaanaati tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. so parivasanto ^a^T1.0229^ea^ itarampi aapatti.m jaanaati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eka.m aapatti.m jaani.m, eka.m aapatti.m na jaani.m. soha.m sa"ngha.m ya.m aapatti.m jaani.m tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaaci.m. tassa me sa"ngho tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m adaasi. soha.m parivasanto itarampi aapatti.m jaanaami. ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"ngha.m itarissaapi ^a^P2.0055^ea^ aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaaceyya'nti. so sa"ngha.m itarissaapi aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho itarissaapi aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tadupaadaaya dve maasaa parivasitabbaa.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajjati dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eka.m aapatti.m sarati, eka.m aapatti.m nassarati. so sa"ngha.m ya.m aapatti.m sarati tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya ^a^M0.0142^ea^ dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. so parivasanto itarampi aapatti.m sarati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eka.m aapatti.m sari.m, eka.m aapatti.m nassari.m. soha.m sa"ngha.m ya.m aapatti.m sari.m, tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m ^a^T1.0230^ea^ yaaci.m. tassa me sa"ngho tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m adaasi. soha.m parivasanto itarampi aapatti.m saraami. ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"ngha.m itarissaapi aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaaceyya'nti. so sa"ngha.m itarissaapi aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho itarissaapi aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tadupaadaaya dve maasaa parivasitabbaa.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajjati dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; ekaaya aapattiyaa nibbematiko, ekaaya aapattiyaa vematiko. so sa"ngha.m yaaya aapattiyaa nibbematiko tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. so parivasanto itarissaapi aapattiyaa nibbematiko hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho dve sa"nghaadisesaa ^a^V0.0134^ea^ aapattiyo aapajji.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; ekaaya aapattiyaa nibbematiko, ekaaya aapattiyaa vematiko. soha.m sa"ngha.m yaaya aapattiyaa nibbematiko tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaaci.m. tassa me sa"ngho tassaa aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m adaasi. soha.m parivasanto itarissaapi aapattiyaa nibbematiko. ya.mnuunaaha.m ^a^T1.0231^ea^ sa"ngha.m itarissaapi aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaaceyya'nti. so sa"ngha.m itarissaapi aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho itarissaapi aapattiyaa dvemaasappa.ticchannaaya dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tadupaadaaya dve maasaa parivasitabbaa.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^M0.0143^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajjati dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; ekaa aapatti jaanappa.ticchannaa, ekaa aapatti ajaanappa.ticchannaa. so sa"ngha.m taasa.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho taasa.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. tassa parivasantassa a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. so eva.m vadeti -- `ki.m aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aapanno? kissaaya.m bhikkhu parivasatii'ti? te eva.m vadenti -- `aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; ekaa aapatti jaanappa.ticchannaa, ekaa aapatti ajaanappa.ticchannaa. so sa"ngha.m taasa.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho taasa.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m adaasi. taayo aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aapanno, taasaaya.m bhikkhu parivasatii'ti. so eva.m vadeti -- `yaaya.m, aavuso ^a^T1.0232^ea^, aapatti jaanappa.ticchannaa, dhammika.m tassaa aapattiyaa parivaasadaana.m; dhammattaa ruhati. yaa ca khvaaya.m, aavuso, aapatti ajaanappa.ticchannaa, adhammika.m tassaa aapattiyaa parivaasadaana.m; adhammattaa na ruhati. ekissaa, aavuso, aapattiyaa bhikkhu maanattaaraho'''ti.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajjati dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eka.m maasa.m sarati, eka.m maasa.m nassarati. so sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m ya.m maasa.m sarati ta.m maasa.m parivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m ya.m maasa.m sarati ta.m maasa.m parivaasa.m deti. so parivasanto itarampi maasa.m sarati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eka.m maasa.m sari.m, eka.m maasa.m nassari.m. soha.m sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m ya.m maasa.m sari.m ta.m maasa.m parivaasa.m yaaci.m. tassa me sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m ya.m maasa.m sari.m ta.m maasa.m parivaasa.m adaasi. soha.m parivasanto itarampi maasa.m saraami. ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m itarampi maasa.m parivaasa.m yaaceyya'nti. so sa"ngha.m dvinna.m ^a^T1.0242^ea^ aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m itarampi maasa.m parivaasa.m yaacati. tassa ^a^V0.0140^ea^ sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m itarampi maasa.m parivaasa.m deti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa purima.m upaadaaya dve maasaa parivasitabbaa.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajjati dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eko maaso jaanappa.ticchanno, eko maaso ajaanappa.ticchanno. so sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. tassa parivasantassa a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. so eva.m vadeti -- `ki.m aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aapanno? kissaaya.m bhikkhu parivasatii'ti? te eva.m vadenti -- `aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo. eko maaso jaanappa.ticchanno, eko maaso ajaanappa.ticchanno. so sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaaci. tassa sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m adaasi. taayo aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aapanno taasaaya.m bhikkhu parivasatii'ti. so eva.m vadeti -- `yvaaya.m, aavuso, maaso jaanappa.ticchanno dhammika.m tassa maasassa parivaasadaana.m; dhammattaa ruhati. yo ca ^a^V0.0141^ea^ khvaaya.m, aavuso, maaso ajaanappa.ticchanno adhammika.m tassa maasassa parivaasadaana.m; adhammattaa na ruhati. ekassa, aavuso ^a^T1.0244^ea^, maasassa bhikkhu maanattaaraho'ti.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajjati dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eko maaso saramaanappa.ticchanno, eko maaso assaramaanappa.ticchanno. so sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. tassa parivasantassa a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo ^a^M0.0151^ea^. so eva.m vadeti -- `ki.m aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aapanno? kissaaya.m bhikkhu parivasatii'ti? te eva.m vadenti -- `aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eko maaso saramaanappa.ticchanno, eko maaso assaramaanappa.ticchanno. so sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaaci. tassa sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m adaasi. taayo aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aapanno taasaaya.m bhikkhu parivasatii'ti. so eva.m vadeti -- `yvaaya.m, aavuso, maaso saramaanappa.ticchanno dhammika.m tassa maasassa parivaasadaana.m; dhammattaa ruhati. yo ca khvaaya.m, aavuso, maaso assaramaanappa.ticchanno adhammika.m tassa maasassa parivaasadaana.m; adhammattaa na ruhati. ekassa, aavuso, maasassa bhikkhu maanattaaraho'ti.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^T1.0245^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajjati dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eko maaso nibbematikappa.ticchanno, eko maaso vematikappa.ticchanno. so sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaacati. tassa sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m deti. tassa parivasantassa a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. so eva.m vadeti -- `ki.m aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aapanno? kissaaya.m bhikkhu parivasatii'ti? te eva.m vadenti -- `aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu dve sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji dvemaasappa.ticchannaayo; eko maaso nibbematikappa.ticchanno, eko maaso vematikappa.ticchanno. so sa"ngha.m dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m yaaci. tassa sa"ngho dvinna.m aapattiina.m dvemaasappa.ticchannaana.m dvemaasaparivaasa.m adaasi. taayo aya.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aapanno taasaaya.m bhikkhu parivasatii'ti ^a^V0.0142^ea^. so eva.m vadeti -- `yvaaya.m, aavuso, maaso nibbematikappa.ticchanno dhammika.m tassa maasassa parivaasadaana.m; dhammattaa ruhati. yo ca khvaaya.m, aavuso, maaso vematikappa.ticchanno adhammika.m tassa maasassa parivaasadaana.m; adhammattaa na ruhati. ekassa, aavuso, maasassa bhikkhu maanattaaraho''ti.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0152^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu sambahulaa sa"nghaadisesaa ^a^T1.0246^ea^ aapattiyo aapanno hoti. so aapattipariyanta.m na jaanaati; rattipariyanta.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m nassarati, rattipariyanta.m nassarati; aapattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko. so bhikkhuuna.m aarocesi -- ``aha.m, aavuso, sambahulaa sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji.m; aapattipariyanta.m ^a^P2.0059^ea^ na jaanaami, rattipariyanta.m na jaanaami; aapattipariyanta.m nassaraami, rattipariyanta.m nassaraami; aapattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho tassa bhikkhuno taasa.m aapattiina.m suddhantaparivaasa.m detu. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbo --

[03]``tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m, bhante, sambahulaa sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji.m. aapattipariyanta.m na jaanaami, rattipariyanta.m na jaanaami; aapattipariyanta.m nassaraami, rattipariyanta.m nassaraami; aapattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko. soha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m taasa.m aapattiina.m suddhantaparivaasa.m yaacaamii'ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbo. tatiyampi yaacitabbo. byattena ^a^T1.0247^ea^ bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu sambahulaa sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji. aapattipariyanta.m na jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m nassarati, rattipariyanta.m nassarati; aapattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko. so sa"ngha.m taasa.m aapattiina.m suddhantaparivaasa.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno taasa.m aapattiina.m suddhantaparivaasa.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu sambahulaa sa"nghaadisesaa aapattiyo aapajji. aapattipariyanta.m na jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m nassarati ^a^V0.0143^ea^, rattipariyanta.m nassarati; aapattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko. so sa"ngha.m taasa.m ^a^M0.0153^ea^ aapattiina.m suddhantaparivaasa.m yaacati. sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno taasa.m aapattiina.m suddhantaparivaasa.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno taasa.m aapattiina.m suddhantaparivaasassa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0....
[03]``dinno sa"nghena itthannaamassa bhikkhuno taasa.m aapattiina.m suddhantaparivaaso. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m kho, bhikkhave, suddhantaparivaaso daatabbo; eva.m ^a^T1.0248^ea^ parivaaso daatabbo. katha~nca, bhikkhave, suddhantaparivaaso daatabbo? aapattipariyanta.m na jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m nassarati, rattipariyanta.m nassarati; aapattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko -- suddhantaparivaaso daatabbo.

[03]``aapattipariyanta.m jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m sarati, rattipariyanta.m nassarati; aapattipariyante nibbematiko, rattipariyante vematiko -- suddhantaparivaaso daatabbo.

[03]``aapattipariyanta.m ekacca.m jaanaati, ekacca.m na jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m ekacca.m sarati, ekacca.m nassarati, rattipariyanta.m nassarati; aapattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko, rattipariyante vematiko -- suddhantaparivaaso daatabbo.

[03]``aapattipariyanta.m na jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m ekacca.m jaanaati, ekacca.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m nassarati, rattipariyanta.m ekacca.m sarati, ekacca.m nassarati; aapattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko -- suddhantaparivaaso daatabbo.

[03]``aapattipariyanta.m jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m ekacca.m jaanaati, ekacca.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m ^a^V0.0144^ea^ sarati, rattipariyanta.m ekacca.m sarati, ekacca.m nassarati; aapattipariyante nibbematiko, rattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko -- suddhantaparivaaso ^a^P2.0060^ea^ daatabbo.

[03]``aapattipariyanta.m ekacca.m jaanaati, ekacca.m na jaanaati; rattipariyanta.m ^a^T1.0249^ea^ ekacca.m jaanaati, ekacca.m na jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m ekacca.m sarati, ekacca.m nassarati ^a^M0.0154^ea^; rattipariyanta.m ekacca.m sarati, ekacca.m nassarati; aapattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko; rattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko -- suddhantaparivaaso daatabbo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, suddhantaparivaaso daatabbo.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, parivaaso daatabbo? aapattipariyanta.m jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m sarati, rattipariyanta.m sarati; aapattipariyante nibbematiko, rattipariyante nibbematiko -- parivaaso daatabbo.
[03]``aapattipariyanta.m na jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m nassarati, rattipariyanta.m sarati, aapattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante nibbematiko -- parivaaso daatabbo.

[03]``aapattipariyanta.m ekacca.m jaanaati, ekacca.m na jaanaati, rattipariyanta.m jaanaati; aapattipariyanta.m ekacca.m sarati, ekacca.m nassarati, rattipariyanta.m sarati; aapattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko, rattipariyante nibbematiko -- parivaaso daatabbo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, parivaaso daatabbo.
[06] parivaaso ni.t.thito.
[03] 160^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu parivasanto vibbhami. so puna paccaagantvaa bhikkhuu upasampada.m yaaci. bhagavato ^a^T1.0250^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]``idha ^a^V0.0145^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto vibbhamati. vibbhantakassa, bhikkhave, parivaaso na ruhati. so ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purima.m parivaasadaana.m. yo parivaaso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.

[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto saama.nero hoti. saama.nerassa, bhikkhave, parivaaso na ruhati. so ce puna upasampajjati, tassa ^a^M0.0155^ea^ tadeva purima.m parivaasadaana.m. yo parivaaso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.

[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto ummattako hoti. ummattakassa, bhikkhave, parivaaso na ruhati. so ce puna anummattako hoti, tassa tadeva purima.m parivaasadaana.m. yo parivaaso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.

[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto khittacitto hoti. khittacittassa, bhikkhave, parivaaso na ^a^P2.0061^ea^ ruhati. so ce puna akhittacitto hoti, tassa tadeva purima.m parivaasadaana.m. yo parivaaso dinno sudinno, yo purivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.

[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto vedanaa.t.to hoti. vedanaa.t.tassa ^a^T1.0251^ea^, bhikkhave, parivaaso na ruhati. so ce puna avedanaa.t.to hoti, tassa tadeva purima.m parivaasadaana.m. yo parivaaso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.

[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, aapattiyaa adassane, ukkhipiyyati {ukkhipiyati (syaa0), ukkhipiiyati (ka0)}. ukkhittakassa, bhikkhave, parivaaso na ruhati. so ce puna osaariyyati {osaariyati (syaa0), osaariiyati (ka0)}, tassa tadeva purima.m parivaasadaana.m. yo parivaaso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.

[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme, ukkhipiyyati. ukkhittakassa, bhikkhave, parivaaso na ruhati. so ce puna osaariyyati, tassa tadeva purima.m parivaasadaana.m. yo parivaaso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.

[03]``idha ^a^V0.0146^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa, appa.tinissagge, ukkhipiyyati. ukkhittakassa, bhikkhave, parivaaso na ruhati. so ce puna osaariyyati, tassa tadeva purima.m parivaasadaana.m. yo parivaaso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.

[03]``dhammavaadii sa"ngho adhammavaadi.m sa"ngha.m sa~n~naapeti nijjhaapeti pekkheti anupekkheti dasseti anudasseti -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana.m, ima.m ga.nhaahi, ima.m rocehiiti. eva~nceta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, dhammena vuupasammati sammukhaavinayenaa''ti.
[06] sukkapakkhanavaka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu paaraa0 380 aadayo} tena ^a^T1.0304^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmataa dabbena mallaputtena jaatiyaa sattavassena arahatta.m sacchikata.m hoti ^a^V0.0177^ea^. ya.m ki~nci saavakena pattabba.m sabba.m tena anuppatta.m hoti. natthi cassa ki~nci uttari {uttari.m (sii0)} kara.niiya.m, katassa vaa paticayo. atha kho aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``mayaa kho jaatiyaa sattavassena arahatta.m sacchikata.m. ya.m ki~nci saavakena pattabba.m sabba.m mayaa anuppatta.m. natthi ca me ki~nci uttarikara.niiya.m, katassa vaa paticayo. ki.m nu kho aha.m sa"nghassa veyyaavacca.m kareyya''nti?

[03]atha ^a^M0.0192^ea^ kho aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"nghassa senaasana~nca ^a^P2.0075^ea^ pa~n~napeyya.m bhattaani ca uddiseyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `mayaa kho jaatiyaa sattavassena arahatta.m sacchikata.m. ya.m ki~nci saavakena pattabba.m, sabba.m mayaa anuppatta.m. natthi ca me ki~nci uttarikara.niiya.m, katassa vaa paticayo. ki.m nu kho aha.m sa"nghassa veyyaavacca.m kareyya'nti ^a^T1.0305^ea^? tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~napeyya.m bhattaani ca uddiseyya'nti. icchaamaha.m, bhante, sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~naapetu.m bhattaani ca uddisitu''nti. ``saadhu saadhu, dabba. tena hi tva.m, dabba, sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~napehi bhattaani ca uddisaahii''ti {uddisaati (paaraa0 380)}. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho dabba.m mallaputta.m senaasanapa~n~naapaka~nca bhattuddesaka~nca sammannatu. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m dabbo mallaputto yaacitabbo {dabbo yaacitabbo (syaa0 ka0)}. yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m senaasanapa~n~naapaka~nca bhattuddesaka~nca sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m senaasanapa~n~naapaka~nca bhattuddesaka~nca sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa senaasanapa~n~naapakassa ca bhattuddesakassa ca sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato ^a^V0.0178^ea^ sa"nghena aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto senaasanapa~n~naapako ca bhattuddesako ca. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti ^a^T1.0306^ea^.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ sammato ^a^M0.0193^ea^ ca panaayasmaa dabbo mallaputto sabhaagaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti. ye te bhikkhuu suttantikaa tesa.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- te a~n~nama~n~na.m suttanta.m sa"ngaayissantiiti. ye te bhikkhuu vinayadharaa tesa.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- te a~n~nama~n~na.m vinaya.m vinicchinissantiiti. ye te bhikkhuu dhammakathikaa tesa.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- te a~n~nama~n~na.m dhamma.m saakacchissantiiti. ye te bhikkhuu jhaayino tesa.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- te a~n~nama~n~na.m na byaabaadhissantiiti ^a^P2.0076^ea^. ye te bhikkhuu tiracchaanakathikaa kaayada.lhibahulaa {kaayada.d.dhibahulaa (sii0)} viharanti tesampi ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- imaayapime aayasmanto ratiyaa acchissantiiti. yepi te bhikkhuu vikaale aagacchanti tesampi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa teneva aalokena senaasana.m pa~n~napeti; apisu bhikkhuu sa~ncicca vikaale aagacchanti -- maya.m aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m passissaamaati.

[03]te aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso dabba, senaasana.m pa~n~napehii''ti. te aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto eva.m vadeti -- ``kattha aayasmantaa icchanti kattha pa~n~napemii''ti? te sa~ncicca duure apadisanti -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso dabba, gijjhakuu.te pabbate senaasana.m ^a^T1.0307^ea^ pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, corapapaate senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, isigilipasse kaa.lasilaaya.m senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, vebhaarapasse sattapa.n.niguhaaya.m senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, siitavane sappaso.n.dikapabbhaare senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, gotamakakandaraaya.m {goma.takandaraaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, tindukakandaraaya.m senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, tapodakandaraaya.m {kapotakandaraaya.m (ka0)} senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, tapodaaraame senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, jiivakambavane senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, maddakucchimhi migadaaye senaasana.m pa~n~napehii''ti.

[03]tesa.m ^a^M0.0194^ea^ aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa a"nguliyaa jalamaanaaya purato purato gacchati. tepi teneva aalokena aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gacchanti. tesa.m aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto eva.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- aya.m ma~nco, ida.m pii.tha.m ^a^V0.0179^ea^, aya.m bhisi, ida.m bibbohana.m {bimbohana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, ida.m vacca.t.thaana.m, ida.m passaava.t.thaana.m, ida.m paaniiya.m, ida.m paribhojaniiya.m, aya.m kattarada.n.do, ida.m sa"nghassa katikasa.n.thaana.m, ima.m kaala.m pavisitabba.m ^a^T1.0308^ea^, ima.m kaala.m nikkhamitabbanti. tesa.m aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto eva.m senaasana.m pa~n~napetvaa punadeva ve.luvana.m paccaagacchati.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhuumajakaa {mettiyabhummajakaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} bhikkhuu navakaa ceva honti appapu~n~naa ca. yaani sa"nghassa laamakaani senaasanaani taani tesa.m paapu.nanti laamakaani ca bhattaani. tena kho pana samayena raajagahe manussaa icchanti ^a^P2.0077^ea^ theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhisa"nkhaarika.m pi.n.dapaata.m daatu.m -- sappimpi, telampi, uttaribha"ngampi. mettiyabhuumajakaana.m pana bhikkhuuna.m paakatika.m denti -- yathaarandha.m {yathaaraddha.m (syaa0)} ka.naajaka.m bila"ngadutiya.m. te pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkantaa there bhikkhuu pucchanti -- ``tumhaaka.m, aavuso, bhattagge ki.m ahosi, tumhaaka.m ki.m ahosii''ti {ki.m naahosi (syaa0 ka.m0)}? ekacce theraa eva.m vadanti -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso, sappi ahosi, tela.m ahosi, uttaribha"nga.m ahosii''ti. mettiyabhuumajakaa pana bhikkhuu eva.m vadanti -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso, na ki~nci ahosi -- paakatika.m yathaarandha.m ka.naajaka.m bila"ngadutiya''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati sa"nghassa catukkabhatta.m deti niccabhatta.m. so bhattagge saputtadaaro upati.t.thitvaa parivisati -- a~n~ne odanena pucchanti, a~n~ne suupena pucchanti, a~n~ne telena pucchanti, a~n~ne uttaribha"ngena pucchanti. tena kho pana samayena kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino bhatta.m svaatanaaya mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m uddi.t.tha.m hoti. atha ^a^T1.0309^ea^ kho kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati aaraama.m agamaasi kenacideva kara.niiyena. so yenaayasmaa dabbo mallaputto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^M0.0195^ea^ nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho kalyaa.nabhattika.m gahapati.m aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati aayasmataa dabbena mallaputtena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m etadavoca -- ``kassa, bhante, amhaaka.m ghare svaatanaaya bhatta.m uddi.t.tha''nti? ``mettiyabhuumajakaana.m kho, gahapati, bhikkhuuna.m tumhaaka.m ghare svaatanaaya bhatta.m uddi.t.tha''nti. atha kho kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati anattamano ahosi. katha~nhi naama paapabhikkhuu amhaaka.m ghare bhu~njissantiiti ghara.m gantvaa daasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``ye, je, sve bhattikaa aagacchanti te ko.t.thake aasana.m pa~n~napetvaa ka.naajakena bila"ngadutiyena ^a^V0.0180^ea^ parivisaa''ti. ``eva.m ayyaa''ti kho saa daasii kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino paccassosi.

[03]atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu -- hiyyo kho, aavuso, amhaaka.m kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino bhatta.m uddi.t.tha.m; sve amhe kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati saputtadaaro upati.t.thitvaa parivisissati; a~n~ne odanena pucchissanti, a~n~ne suupena pucchissanti, a~n~ne ^a^P2.0078^ea^ telena pucchissanti, a~n~ne uttaribha"ngena pucchissantiiti. te teneva somanassena ^a^T1.0310^ea^ na cittaruupa.m rattiyaa supi.msu. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasaa kho saa daasii mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante; disvaana ko.t.thake aasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``nisiidatha, bhante''ti. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho na taava bhatta.m siddha.m bhavissati yathaa maya.m ko.t.thake nisiidaapiyaamaa''ti {nisiidaapeyyaamaati (ka0)}. atha kho saa daasii ka.naajakena {kaa.naajakena (syaa0 ka.m0)} bila"ngadutiyena upaga~nchi -- bhu~njatha, bhanteti. ``maya.m kho, bhagini, niccabhattikaa''ti. ``jaanaami ayyaa niccabhattikaati. api caaha.m hiyyova gahapatinaa aa.nattaa -- `ye, je, sve bhattikaa aagacchanti, te ko.t.thake aasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa ka.naajakena bila"ngadutiyena parivisaa'ti. bhu~njatha, bhante''ti. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu -- hiyyo kho, aavuso, kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati aaraama.m agamaasi dabbassa mallaputtassa ^a^M0.0196^ea^ santike. nissa.msaya.m kho maya.m dabbena mallaputtena gahapatino antare paribhinnaati {santike paribhinnaati (syaa0 ka.m0)}. te teneva domanassena na cittaruupa.m bhu~nji.msu. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkantaa aaraama.m gantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tisaametvaa bahaaraamako.t.thake sa"nghaa.tipallatthikaaya nisiidi.msu tu.nhiibhuutaa ma"nkubhuutaa pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa pajjhaayantaa ^a^T1.0311^ea^ appa.tibhaanaa.

[03]atha kho mettiyaa bhikkhunii yena mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``vandaami ayyaa''ti. eva.m vutte mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu naalapi.msu. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho mettiyaa bhikkhunii mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``vandaami ayyaa''ti. tatiyampi kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu naalapi.msu. ``kyaaha.m ayyaana.m aparajjhaami? kissa ma.m ayyaa naalapantii''ti? ``tathaa hi pana tva.m, bhagini, amhe dabbena mallaputtena vihe.thiyamaane ajjhupekkhasii''ti? ``kyaaha.m, ayyaa, karomii''ti? ``sace kho tva.m, bhagini, iccheyyaasi, ajjeva bhagavaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m ^a^V0.0181^ea^ mallaputta.m naasaapeyyaa''ti. ``kyaaha.m, ayyaa, karomi? ki.m mayaa sakkaa kaatu''nti? ``ehi tva.m, bhagini, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m eva.m vadehi -- `ida.m ^a^P2.0079^ea^, bhante, nacchanna.m nappatiruupa.m, yaaya.m, bhante, disaa abhayaa aniitikaa anupaddavaa saaya.m disaa sabhayaa saiitikaa saupaddavaa; yato nivaata.m tato savaata.m {tato pavaata.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}; udaka.m ma~n~ne aaditta.m; ayyenamhi dabbena mallaputtena duusitaa'''ti. ``eva.m ayyaa''ti kho mettiyaa bhikkhunii mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa {pa.tissu.nitvaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho mettiyaa {saa mettiyaa (syaa0 ka0)} bhikkhunii bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^T1.0312^ea^ -- ``ida.m, bhante, nacchanna.m nappatiruupa.m, yaaya.m, bhante, disaa abhayaa aniitikaa anupaddavaa saaya.m disaa sabhayaa saiitikaa saupaddavaa; yato nivaata.m tato savaata.m; udaka.m ma~n~ne aaditta.m; ayyenamhi dabbena mallaputtena duusitaa''ti.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sarasi tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa ^a^M0.0197^ea^ yathaaya.m bhikkhunii aahaa''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m etadavoca -- ``sarasi tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa yathaaya.m bhikkhunii aahaa''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m etadavoca -- ``sarasi tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa yathaaya.m bhikkhunii aahaa''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. ``na kho, dabba, dabbaa eva.m nibbe.thenti. sace tayaa kata.m katanti vadehi. sace akata.m akatanti vadehii''ti. ``yatoha.m, bhante, jaato naabhijaanaami supinantenapi methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitaa, pageva jaagaro''ti. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, mettiya.m bhikkhuni.m naasetha. ime ca bhikkhuu anuyu~njathaa''ti. ida.m vatvaa bhagavaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu mettiya.m bhikkhuni.m naasesu.m. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``maavuso, mettiya.m bhikkhuni.m naasetha, na saa ki~nci aparajjhati; amhehi saa ussaahitaa kupitehi anattamanehi caavanaadhippaayehii''ti. ``ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso, aayasmanta.m dabba.m ^a^T1.0313^ea^ mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msethaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msessantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0182^ea^ ...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msentii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03]``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinaya.m detu. eva~nca ^a^P2.0080^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, daatabbo -- ``tena, bhikkhave, dabbena mallaputtena sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa, eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa, vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa, ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa, a~njali.m paggahetvaa, evamassa vacaniiyo -- `ime ma.m, bhante, mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msenti. soha.m, bhante, sativepullappatto sa"ngha.m sativinaya.m yaacaamii'ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbo. tatiyampi yaacitabbo -- `ime ma.m, bhante mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msenti. soha.m ^a^M0.0198^ea^ {soha.m bhante (ka0)} sativepullappatto tatiyampi, bhante, sa"ngha.m sativinaya.m yaacaamii'ti. ``byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ su.naatu ^a^T1.0314^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. ime mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msenti. aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto sativepullappatto sa"ngha.m sativinaya.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinaya.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ime mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msenti. aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto sativepullappatto sa"ngha.m sativinaya.m yaacati. sa"ngho aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinaya.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayassa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``dasayime ^a^P2.0085^ea^ ^a^M0.0205^ea^, bhikkhave, adhammikaa salaakaggaahaa, dasa dhammikaa {dasa dhammikaa salaakaggaahaa (ka0)}. katame dasa adhammikaa salaakaggaahaa? oramattaka~nca adhikara.na.m hoti, na ca gatigata.m hoti, na ca saritasaarita.m hoti, jaanaati adhammavaadii bahutaraati, appeva naama adhammavaadii bahutaraa assuuti, jaanaati sa"ngho bhijjissatiiti, appeva naama sa"ngho bhijjeyyaati, adhammena ga.nhanti, vaggaa ga.nhanti, na ca yathaadi.t.thiyaa ga.nhanti -- ime dasa adhammikaa salaakaggaahaa.

[03]``katame dasa dhammikaa salaakaggaahaa? na ca oramattaka.m adhikara.na.m hoti, gatigata~nca hoti, saritasaarita~nca hoti, jaanaati dhammavaadii bahutaraati, appeva naama dhammavaadii bahutaraa assuuti, jaanaati sa"ngho na bhijjissatiiti, appeva naama sa"ngho na bhijjeyyaati, dhammena ga.nhanti, samaggaa ga.nhanti, yathaadi.t.thiyaa ca ga.nhanti -- ime dasa dhammikaa salaakaggaahaa''ti.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena upavaa.lo bhikkhu sa"nghamajjhe aapattiyaa ^a^T1.0326^ea^ anuyu~njiyamaano avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanaati, pa.tijaanitvaa avajaanaati, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, sampajaanamusaa bhaasati. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama upavaa.lo bhikkhu sa"nghamajjhe aapattiyaa anuyu~njiyamaano avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanissati, pa.tijaanitvaa avajaanissati, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarissati, sampajaanamusaa bhaasissatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho upavaa.lassa bhikkhuno tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m karotu. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, kaatabba.m. pa.thama.m ^a^V0.0190^ea^ upavaa.lo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvaa saaretabbo, saaretvaa aapatti.m aaropetabbo, aapatti.m aaropetvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m upavaa.lo bhikkhu sa"nghamajjhe aapattiyaa anuyu~njiyamaano avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanaati, pa.tijaanitvaa avajaanaati, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, sampajaanamusaa `bhaasati. yadi ^a^M0.0206^ea^ sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho upavaa.lassa bhikkhuno tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m kareyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m upavaa.lo bhikkhu sa"nghamajjhe aapattiyaa anuyu~njiyamaano avajaanitvaa pa.tijaanaati, pa.tijaanitvaa ^a^T1.0327^ea^ avajaanaati, a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, sampajaanamusaa bhaasati. sa"ngho upavaa.lassa bhikkhuno tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m karoti. yassaayasmato khamati upavaa.lassa bhikkhuno tassapaapiyasikaakammassa kara.na.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0....
[03]``kata.m sa"nghena upavaa.lassa bhikkhuno tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^P2.0086^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammikaani tassapaapiyasikaakammassa kara.naani. asuci ca hoti, alajjii ca, saanuvaado ca, tassa sa"ngho tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m karoti dhammena, samaggena -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammikaani tassapaapiyasikaakammassa kara.naani.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca. asammukhaa kata.m hoti, appa.tipucchaakata.m hoti, appa.ti~n~naaya kata.m hoti...pe0... adhammena kata.m hoti, vaggena kata.m hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m adhammakamma~nca hoti, avinayakamma~nca, duvuupasanta~nca.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^V0.0191^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m dhammakamma~nca hoti, vinayakamma~nca, suvuupasanta~nca. sammukhaa kata.m hoti, pa.tipucchaakata.m hoti, pa.ti~n~naaya kata.m hoti...pe0... ^a^T1.0328^ea^ dhammena kata.m hoti, samaggena kata.m hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m dhammakamma~nca hoti, vinayakamma~nca, suvuupasanta~nca.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^M0.0207^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m kareyya. bha.n.danakaarako hoti kalahakaarako vivaadakaarako bhassakaarako sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarako; baalo hoti abyatto aapattibahulo anapadaano; gihisa.msa.t.tho viharati ananulomikehi gihisa.msaggehi -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m kareyya.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaano ^a^T1.0329^ea^ sa"ngho tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m kareyya. adhisiile siilavipanno hoti, ajjhaacaare aacaaravipanno hoti, atidi.t.thiyaa di.t.thivipanno hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave...pe0....

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave...pe0... buddhassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiiha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m kareyya.

[03]``ti.n.na.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m kareyya. eko bha.n.danakaarako hoti...pe0... sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarako; eko baalo hoti abyatto aapattibahulo anapadaano; eko gihisa.msa.t.tho viharati ananulomikehi gihisa.msaggehi -- imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m bhikkhuuna.m aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m kareyya.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``tassapaapiyasikaakammakatena ^a^M0.0208^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa --

[03]na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo, na bhikkhunovaadakasammuti saaditabbaa, sammatenapi bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbaa...pe0... na bhikkhuuhi sampayojetabba''nti. atha kho sa"ngho upavaa.lassa bhikkhuno tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m akaasi.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m hoti bhaasitaparikkanta.m. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``amhaaka.m kho bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m bhaasitaparikkanta.m. sace maya.m imaahi aapattiihi a~n~nama~n~na.m kaaressaama, siyaapi ta.m adhikara.na.m kakkha.lattaaya vaa.lattaaya {kakkha.lataaya vaa.lataaya (syaa0 ka.m0)} bhedaaya sa.mvatteyya. katha.m nu kho ^a^P2.0087^ea^ amhehi pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m hoti bhaasitaparikkanta.m ^a^T1.0331^ea^. tatra ce bhikkhuuna.m {tatra ce bhikkhave bhikkhuuna.m (syaa0)} eva.m hoti -- `amhaaka.m kho bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m bhaasitaparikkanta.m; sace maya.m imaahi aapattiihi a~n~nama~n~na.m kaaressaama, siyaapi ta.m adhikara.na.m kakkha.lattaaya vaa.lattaaya bhedaaya sa.mvatteyyaa'ti, anujaanaami, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m adhikara.na.m ti.navatthaarakena vuupasametu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, vuupasametabba.m. sabbeheva ekajjha.m sannipatitabba.m, sannipatitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu ^a^V0.0193^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. amhaaka.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m bhaasitaparikkanta.m. sace maya.m imaahi aapattiihi a~n~nama~n~na.m kaaressaama, siyaapi ta.m ^a^M0.0209^ea^ adhikara.na.m kakkha.lattaaya vaa.lattaaya bhedaaya sa.mvatteyya. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ima.m adhikara.na.m ti.navatthaarakena vuupasameyya, .thapetvaa thullavajja.m, .thapetvaa gihippa.tisa.myutta''nti. ``ekatopakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sako pakkho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.nantu me aayasmantaa. amhaaka.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m bhaasitaparikkanta.m. sace maya.m imaahi aapattiihi a~n~nama~n~na.m kaaressaama, siyaapi ta.m adhikara.na.m kakkha.lattaaya ^a^T1.0332^ea^ vaa.lattaaya bhedaaya sa.mvatteyya. yadaayasmantaana.m pattakalla.m, aha.m yaa ceva aayasmantaana.m aapatti, yaa ca attano aapatti, aayasmantaana~nceva atthaaya, attano ca atthaaya, sa"nghamajjhe ti.navatthaarakena deseyya.m, .thapetvaa thullavajja.m, .thapetvaa gihippa.tisa.myutta''nti.
