[03] 215^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena (bhikkhuupi bhikkhuuhi vivadanti,) {( ) natthi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} bhikkhuupi bhikkhuniihi vivadanti, bhikkhuniyopi bhikkhuuhi vivadanti, channopi bhikkhu bhikkhuniina.m anupakhajja bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m vivadati, bhikkhuniina.m pakkha.m gaaheti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama channo bhikkhu bhikkhuniina.m anupakhajja bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m vivadissati, bhikkhuniina.m pakkha.m gaahessatiiti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --
[03] {pari0 275} ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, adhikara.naani -- vivaadaadhikara.na.m, anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m, kiccaadhikara.na.m {kiccaadhikara.na~nca (ka0)}.

[03]``tattha katama.m vivaadaadhikara.na.m {pari0 314}? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu {bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m (ka0)} vivadanti -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa, vinayoti vaa avinayoti vaa, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati vaa abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati vaa, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati vaa anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati vaa, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati vaa appa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati vaa, aapattiiti vaa anaapattiiti vaa ^a^M0.0212^ea^, lahukaa aapattiiti vaa garukaa aapattiiti vaa, saavasesaa aapattiiti vaa anavasesaa aapattiiti vaa, du.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa? ya.m tattha ^a^T1.0336^ea^ bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho ^a^V0.0196^ea^ vivaado naanaavaado a~n~nathaavaado vipaccataaya vohaaro medhaga.m -- ida.m vuccati vivaadaadhikara.na.m.

[03]``tattha katama.m anuvaadaadhikara.na.m? {pari0 315} idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m anuvadanti siilavipattiyaa vaa aacaaravipattiyaa vaa di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. yo tattha anuvaado anuvadanaa anullapanaa anubha.nanaa anusampava"nkataa abbhussahanataa anubalappadaana.m -- ida.m vuccati anuvaadaadhikara.na.m.
[03]``tattha katama.m aapattaadhikara.na.m? pa~ncapi aapattikkhandhaa aapattaadhikara.na.m, sattapi aapattikkhandhaa aapattaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m vuccati aapattaadhikara.na.m ^a^P2.0089^ea^.

[03]``tattha katama.m kiccaadhikara.na.m? {pari0 317} yaa sa"nghassa kiccayataa, kara.niiyataa, apalokanakamma.m, ~nattikamma.m, ~nattidutiyakamma.m, ~natticatutthakamma.m -- ida.m vuccati kiccaadhikara.na.m.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``vivaadaadhikara.nassa ki.m muula.m? cha vivaadamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m. tii.nipi akusalamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m, tii.nipi kusalamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m. {pari0 272; a0 ni0 2.35-36; ma0 ni0 3.44} katamaani cha vivaadamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii, so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati appatisso ^a^T1.0337^ea^, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi...pe0... sa"nghepi...pe0... sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii, so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti. yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa~nce tumhe, bhikkhave, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa~nce tumhe, bhikkhave, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa ^a^M0.0213^ea^ aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti.

[03] {pari0272} ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii...pe0... issukii hoti maccharii ^a^V0.0197^ea^, sa.tho hoti maayaavii, paapiccho hoti micchaadi.t.thii, sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii ^a^T1.0338^ea^ duppa.tinissaggii, so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi...pe0... sa"nghepi...pe0... sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii, so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti. yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa~nce tumhe, bhikkhave, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa~nce tumhe, bhikkhave, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti. imaani cha vivaadamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m.

[03]``katamaani tii.ni akusalamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu luddhacittaa vivadanti, du.t.thacittaa vivadanti, muu.lhacittaa vivadanti -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa, vinayoti vaa avinayoti vaa, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati vaa abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati ^a^T1.0339^ea^ vaa, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati vaa anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati vaa, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati vaa appa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati vaa, aapattiiti vaa anaapattiiti vaa, lahukaa aapattiiti vaa garukaa aapattiiti vaa, saavasesaa aapattiiti vaa anavasesaa aapattiiti vaa, du.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa. imaani tii.ni akusalamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m.

[03]``katamaani ^a^M0.0214^ea^ tii.ni kusalamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu aluddhacittaa vivadanti, adu.t.thacittaa vivadanti, amuu.lhacittaa vivadanti ^a^P2.0090^ea^ -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa...pe0... du.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa. imaani tii.ni kusalamuulaani vivaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ {pari0 272} ``anuvaadaadhikara.nassa ki.m muula.m? cha anuvaadamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m. tii.nipi akusalamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m, tii.nipi kusalamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa ^a^V0.0198^ea^ muula.m, kaayopi anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m, vaacaapi anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m. ``katamaani cha anuvaadamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii, so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati ^a^T1.0340^ea^ appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi...pe0... sa"nghepi...pe0... sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii, so sa"nghe anuvaada.m janeti. yo hoti anuvaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa~nce tumhe, bhikkhave, anuvaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa~nce tumhe, bhikkhave, anuvaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii...pe0... issukii hoti maccharii, sa.tho hoti maayaavii, paapiccho hoti micchaadi.t.thii, sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii, so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattharipi agaaravo ^a^T1.0341^ea^ viharati appatisso ^a^M0.0215^ea^, dhammepi...pe0... sa"nghepi...pe0... sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii, so sa"nghe anuvaada.m janeti. yo hoti anuvaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa~nce tumhe, bhikkhave, anuvaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa~nce tumhe, bhikkhave, anuvaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa aayatti.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti. imaani cha anuvaadamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m.

[03]``katamaani ^a^V0.0199^ea^ tii.ni akusalamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m luddhacittaa anuvadanti, du.t.thacittaa anuvadanti, muu.lhacittaa anuvadanti -- siilavipattiyaa vaa, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa, aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. imaani tii.ni akusalamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m.

[03]``katamaani tii.ni kusalamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aluddhacittaa anuvadanti, adu.t.thacittaa anuvadanti, amuu.lhacittaa anuvadanti -- siilavipattiyaa vaa, aacaravipattiyaa ^a^T1.0342^ea^ vaa, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa, aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. imaani tii.ni kusalamuulaani anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m.

[03]``katamo kaayo {katamo ca kaayo (syaa0 ka.m0)} anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m? idhekacco dubba.n.no hoti, duddassiko, oko.timako, bahvaabaadho, kaa.no vaa, ku.nii vaa, kha~njo vaa, pakkhahato vaa, yena na.m anuvadanti. aya.m kaayo anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m.
[03]``katamaa vaacaa anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m? idhekacco dubbaco hoti, mammano, e.lagalavaaco, yaaya na.m anuvadanti. aya.m vaacaa anuvaadaadhikara.nassa muula.m.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``aapattaadhikara.nassa ki.m muula.m? cha aapattisamu.t.thaanaa aapattaadhikara.nassa muula.m. atthaapatti kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato, na ^a^M0.0216^ea^ cittato. atthaapatti vaacato samu.t.thaati, na kaayato, na cittato. atthaapatti kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato. atthaapatti kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato. atthaapatti vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato. atthaapatti kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati. ime cha aapattisamu.t.thaanaa aapattaadhikara.nassa muula.m.
[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``kiccaadhikara.nassa ki.m muula.m? kiccaadhikara.nassa eka.m muula.m -- sa"ngho.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``vivaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^T1.0343^ea^ ^a^P2.0091^ea^ kusala.m, akusala.m, abyaakata.m. vivaadaadhikara.na.m siyaa kusala.m, siyaa akusala.m, siyaa abyaakata.m. tattha katama.m vivaadaadhikara.na.m kusala.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu kusalacittaa vivadanti -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa...pe0... du.t.thullaa aapattiiti ^a^V0.0200^ea^ vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa. ya.m tattha bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado naanaavaado a~n~nathaavaado vipaccataaya vohaaro medhaga.m -- ida.m vuccati vivaadaadhikara.na.m kusala.m.

[03]``tattha katama.m vivaadaadhikara.na.m akusala.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu akusalacittaa vivadanti -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa...pe0... du.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa. ya.m tattha bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado naanaavaado a~n~nathaavaado vipaccataaya vohaaro medhaga.m -- ida.m vuccati vivaadaadhikara.na.m akusala.m.

[03]``tattha katama.m vivaadaadhikara.na.m abyaakata.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu abyaakatacittaa vivadanti -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa...pe0... du.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa. ya.m tattha bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado naanaavaado a~n~nathaavaado vipaccataaya vohaaro medhaga.m -- ida.m vuccati vivaadaadhikara.na.m abyaakata.m.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``anuvaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^T1.0344^ea^ kusala.m, akusala.m, abyaakata.m. anuvaadaadhikara.na.m siyaa kusala.m, siyaa akusala.m, siyaa abyaakata.m. tattha katama.m anuvaadaadhikara.na.m kusala.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m kusalacittaa anuvadanti -- siilavipattiyaa vaa, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa, aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. yo tattha anuvaado anuvadanaa anullapanaa anubha.nanaa ^a^M0.0217^ea^ anusampava"nkataa abbhussahanataa anubalappadaana.m -- ida.m vuccati anuvaadaadhikara.na.m kusala.m.

[03]``tattha katama.m anuvaadaadhikara.na.m akusala.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m akusalacittaa anuvadanti -- siilavipattiyaa vaa, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa, aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. yo tattha anuvaado anuvadanaa anullapanaa anubha.nanaa anusampava"nkataa abbhussahanataa anubalappadaana.m -- ida.m vuccati anuvaadaadhikara.na.m akusala.m.

[03]``tattha katama.m anuvaadaadhikara.na.m abyaakata.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m abyaakatacittaa anuvadanti -- siilavipattiyaa vaa, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa, aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. yo tattha anuvaado anuvadanaa anullapanaa anubha.nanaa anusampava"nkataa abbhussahanataa anubalappadaana.m -- ida.m vuccati anuvaadaadhikara.na.m abyaakata.m.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ``aapattaadhikara.na.m ^a^V0.0201^ea^ kusala.m {ida.m pada.m kesuci natthi}, akusala.m, abyaakata.m? aapattaadhikara.na.m siyaa akusala.m, siyaa abyaakata.m; natthi aapattaadhikara.na.m kusala.m. tattha ^a^T1.0345^ea^ katama.m aapattaadhikara.na.m akusala.m? ya.m jaananto sa~njaananto cecca abhivitaritvaa viitikkamo -- ida.m vuccati aapattaadhikara.na.m akusala.m.
[03]``tattha katama.m aapattaadhikara.na.m abyaakata.m? ya.m ajaananto asa~njaananto acecca anabhivitaritvaa viitikkamo -- ida.m vuccati aapattaadhikara.na.m abyaakata.m.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ``kiccaadhikara.na.m kusala.m, akusala.m, abyaakata.m? kiccaadhikara.na.m siyaa kusala.m, siyaa akusala.m, siyaa abyaakata.m. tattha katama.m kiccaadhikara.na.m kusala.m? ya.m sa"ngho kusalacitto kamma.m karoti -- apalokanakamma.m, ~nattikamma.m, ~nattidutiyakamma.m, ~natticatutthakamma.m -- ida.m vuccati kiccaadhikara.na.m kusala.m.

[03]``tattha katama.m kiccaadhikara.na.m ^a^P2.0092^ea^ akusala.m? ya.m sa"ngho akusalacitto kamma.m karoti -- apalokanakamma.m, ~nattikamma.m, ~nattidutiyakamma.m, ~natticatutthakamma.m -- ida.m vuccati kiccaadhikara.na.m akusala.m.

[03]``tattha ^a^M0.0218^ea^ katama.m kiccaadhikara.na.m abyaakata.m? ya.m sa"ngho abyaakatacitto kamma.m karoti -- apalokanakamma.m, ~nattikamma.m, ~nattidutiyakamma.m, ~natticatutthakamma.m -- ida.m vuccati kiccaadhikara.na.m abyaakata.m.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ {pari0 355} ``vivaado vivaadaadhikara.na.m, vivaado no adhikara.na.m, adhikara.na.m no vivaado, adhikara.na~nceva vivaado ca. siyaa vivaado vivaadaadhikara.na.m, siyaa vivaado no adhikara.na.m, siyaa adhikara.na.m no ^a^T1.0346^ea^ vivaado, siyaa adhikara.na~nceva vivaado ca.

[03]``tattha katamo vivaado vivaadaadhikara.na.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu vivadanti -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa...pe0... du.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa. ya.m tattha bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado naanaavaado a~n~nathaavaado vipaccataaya vohaaro medhaga.m -- aya.m vivaado vivaadaadhikara.na.m.

[03]``tattha ^a^V0.0202^ea^ katamo vivaado no adhikara.na.m? maataapi puttena vivadati, puttopi maataraa vivadati, pitaapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitaraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaataraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaginiyaa vivadati, bhaginiipi bhaataraa vivadati, sahaayopi sahaayena vivadati -- aya.m vivaado no adhikara.na.m.
[03]``tattha katama.m adhikara.na.m no vivaado? anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m, kiccaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m adhikara.na.m no vivaado.
[03]``tattha katama.m adhikara.na~nceva vivaado ca? vivaadaadhikara.na.m adhikara.na~nceva vivaado ca.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ {pari0 356} ``anuvaado anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, anuvaado no adhikara.na.m, adhikara.na.m no anuvaado, adhikara.na~nceva anuvaado ca. siyaa anuvaado anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, siyaa anuvaado no adhikara.na.m, siyaa adhikara.na.m no anuvaado, siyaa adhikara.na~nceva anuvaado ca.

[03]``tattha katamo anuvaado anuvaadaadhikara.na.m? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m anuvadanti -- siilavipattiyaa vaa, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa ^a^T1.0347^ea^, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa, aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. yo tattha anuvaado anuvadanaa anullapanaa anubha.nanaa ^a^M0.0219^ea^ anusampava"nkataa abbhussahanataa anubalappadaana.m -- aya.m anuvaado anuvaadaadhikara.na.m.

[03]``tattha katamo anuvaado no adhikara.na.m? maataapi putta.m anuvadati, puttopi maatara.m anuvadati, pitaapi putta.m anuvadati, puttopi pitara.m anuvadati, bhaataapi bhaatara.m anuvadati, bhaataapi bhagini.m anuvadati, bhaginiipi bhaatara.m anuvadati, sahaayopi sahaaya.m anuvadati -- aya.m anuvaado no adhikara.na.m.
[03]``tattha katama.m adhikara.na.m no anuvaado? aapattaadhikara.na.m, kiccaadhikara.na.m, vivaadaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m adhikara.na.m no anuvaado.
[03]``tattha ^a^V0.0203^ea^ katama.m adhikara.na~nceva anuvaado ca? anuvaadaadhikara.na.m adhikara.na~nceva anuvaado ca.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ {pari0 357} ``aapatti aapattaadhikara.na.m, aapatti no adhikara.na.m, adhikara.na.m no aapatti, adhikara.na~nceva aapatti ca. siyaa aapatti aapattaadhikara.na.m, siyaa aapatti no adhikara.na.m, siyaa adhikara.na.m no aapatti, siyaa adhikara.na~nceva aapatti ca. ``tattha katama.m ^a^P2.0093^ea^ aapatti aapattaadhikara.na.m? pa~ncapi aapattikkhandhaa aapattaadhikara.na.m, sattapi aapattikkhandhaa aapattaadhikara.na.m -- aya.m aapatti aapattaadhikara.na.m.
[03]``tattha katama.m aapatti no adhikara.na.m? sotaapatti samaapatti -- aya.m aapatti no adhikara.na.m ^a^T1.0348^ea^.
[03]``tattha katama.m adhikara.na.m no aapatti? kiccaadhikara.na.m, vivaadaadhikara.na.m, anuvaadaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m adhikara.na.m no aapatti.
[03]``tattha katama.m adhikara.na~nceva aapatti ca? aapattaadhikara.na.m adhikara.na~nceva aapatti ca.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ {pari0 358} ``kicca.m kiccaadhikara.na.m, kicca.m no adhikara.na.m, adhikara.na.m no kicca.m, adhikara.na~nceva kicca~nca. siyaa kicca.m kiccaadhikara.na.m, siyaa kicca.m no adhikara.na.m, siyaa adhikara.na.m no kicca.m, siyaa adhikara.na~nceva kicca~nca.

[03]``tattha ^a^M0.0220^ea^ katama.m kicca.m kiccaadhikara.na.m? yaa sa"nghassa kiccayataa, kara.niiyataa, apalokanakamma.m, ~nattikamma.m, ~nattidutiyakamma.m, ~natticatutthakamma.m -- ida.m kicca.m kiccaadhikara.na.m.
[03]``tattha katama.m kicca.m no adhikara.na.m? aacariyakicca.m, upajjhaayakicca.m, samaanupajjhaayakicca.m, samaanaacariyakicca.m -- ida.m kicca.m no adhikara.na.m.
[03]``tattha katama.m adhikara.na.m no kicca.m? vivaadaadhikara.na.m, anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m adhikara.na.m no kicca.m.
[03]``tattha ^a^V0.0204^ea^ katama.m adhikara.na~nceva kicca~nca? kiccaadhikara.na.m adhikara.na~nceva kicca~nca.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ {pari0 292-293, 307 aadayo} ``vivaadaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi sammati? vivaadaadhikara.na.m dviihi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca, yebhuyyasikaaya ca. siyaa vivaadaadhikara.na.m eka.m samatha.m anaagamma yebhuyyasika.m, ekena samathena sameyya -- sammukhaavinayenaati? siyaatissa vacaniiya.m. yathaa katha.m viya? idha ^a^T1.0349^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu vivadanti -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa, vinayoti vaa avinayoti vaa, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati vaa abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati vaa, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati vaa anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati vaa, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati vaa apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati vaa, aapattiiti vaa anaapattiiti vaa, lahukaa aapattiiti vaa garukaa aapattiiti vaa, saavasesaa aapattiiti vaa anavasesaa aapattiiti vaa, du.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa.

[03]``te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m vuupasanta.m. kena vuupasanta.m? sammukhaavinayena. ki~nca tattha sammukhaavinayasmi.m? sa"nghasammukhataa, dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa. kaa ca tattha sa"nghasammukhataa? yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti -- aya.m tattha sa"nghasammukhataa. kaa ca ^a^M0.0221^ea^ tattha dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa ^a^P2.0094^ea^? yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusaasanena ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasammati -- aya.m tattha dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa. kaa ca tattha puggalasammukhataa? yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikaa sammukhiibhuutaa honti -- aya.m tattha puggalasammukhataa. eva.m vuupasanta.m ce, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m kaarako ^a^T1.0350^ea^ ukko.teti, ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m; chandadaayako khiiyati, khiiyanaka.m paacittiya.m.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu na sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m tasmi.m aavaase vuupasametu.m, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi, yasmi.m aavaase sambahulaa {bahutaraa (sii0 syaa0)} bhikkhuu, so aavaaso gantabbo. te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ta.m aavaasa.m gacchantaa antaraamagge sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m vuupasanta.m. kena vuupasanta.m? sammukhaavinayena ^a^V0.0205^ea^. ki~nca tattha sammukhaavinayasmi.m? sa"nghasammukhataa, dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa. kaa ca tattha sa"nghasammukhataa? yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti -- aya.m tattha sa"nghasammukhataa. kaa ca tattha dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa? yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusaasanena ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasammati -- aya.m tattha dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa. kaa ca tattha puggalasammukhataa? yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikaa sammukhiibhuutaa honti -- aya.m tattha puggalasammukhataa. eva.m vuupasanta.m ce, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m kaarako ukko.teti, ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m; chandadaayako khiiyati, khiiyanaka.m paacittiya.m.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``te ^a^T1.0351^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ta.m aavaasa.m aagacchantaa antaraamagge na sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi, ta.m aavaasa.m gantvaa aavaasikaa bhikkhuu evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `ida.m kho, aavuso, adhikara.na.m eva.m jaata.m, eva.m samuppanna.m; saadhaayasmantaa ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamentu dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena, yathayida.m adhikara.na.m suvuupasanta.m assaa'ti.

[03]``sace ^a^M0.0222^ea^, bhikkhave, aavaasikaa bhikkhuu vu.d.dhataraa honti, aagantukaa bhikkhuu navakataraa, tehi, bhikkhave, aavaasikehi bhikkhuuhi aagantukaa bhikkhuu evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `i"ngha tumhe, aayasmanto, muhutta.m ekamanta.m hotha, yaava maya.m mantemaa'ti. sace pana, bhikkhave, aavaasikaa bhikkhuu navakataraa honti, aagantukaa bhikkhuu vu.d.dhataraa, tehi, bhikkhave, aavaasikehi bhikkhuuhi aagantukaa bhikkhuu evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `tena hi tumhe, aayasmanto, muhutta.m idheva taava hotha, yaava maya.m mantemaa'ti.

[03]``sace pana, bhikkhave, aavaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m mantayamaanaana.m eva.m hoti -- `na maya.m sakkoma ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanenaa'ti, na ta.m adhikara.na.m aavaasikehi bhikkhuuhi sampa.ticchitabba.m. sace pana, bhikkhave, aavaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m mantayamaanaana.m eva.m hoti -- `sakkoma maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanenaa'ti, tehi, bhikkhave, aavaasikehi ^a^T1.0352^ea^ bhikkhuuhi aagantukaa bhikkhuu evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `sace tumhe, aayasmanto, amhaaka.m ^a^P2.0095^ea^ ima.m adhikara.na.m yathaajaata.m yathaasamuppanna.m aarocessatha, yathaa ca maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamessaama dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena tathaa suvuupasanta.m ^a^V0.0206^ea^ bhavissati. eva.m maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m sampa.ticchissaama. no ce tumhe, aayasmanto, amhaaka.m ima.m adhikara.na.m yathaajaata.m yathaasamuppanna.m aarocessatha, yathaa ca maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamessaama dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena tathaa na suvuupasanta.m bhavissati, na maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m sampa.ticchissaamaa'ti. eva.m supariggahita.m kho, bhikkhave, katvaa aavaasikehi bhikkhuuhi ta.m adhikara.na.m sampa.ticchitabba.m.

[03]``tehi, bhikkhave, aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi aavaasikaa bhikkhuu evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `yathaajaata.m yathaasamuppanna.m maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m aayasmantaana.m aarocessaama. sace aayasmantaa sakkonti ettakena vaa ettakena vaa antarena ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena tathaa suvuupasanta.m bhavissati. eva.m maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m aayasmantaana.m niyyaadessaama. no ce aayasmantaa sakkonti ettakena vaa ettakena vaa antarena ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena tathaa na suvuupasanta.m bhavissati, na maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m aayasmantaana.m niyyaadessaama ^a^M0.0223^ea^. mayameva ^a^T1.0353^ea^ imassa adhikara.nassa saamino bhavissaamaa'ti. eva.m supariggahita.m kho, bhikkhave, katvaa aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi ta.m adhikara.na.m aavaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m niyyaadetabba.m.

[03]``te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m vuupasanta.m. kena vuupasanta.m? sammukhaavinayena. ki~nca tattha sammukhaavinayasmi.m? sa"nghasammukhataa, dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa...pe0... eva.m vuupasanta.m ce, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m kaarako ukko.teti, ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m; chandadaayako khiiyati, khiiyanaka.m paacittiya.m.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ ``tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi tasmi.m adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane anantaani {anaggaani (sii0)} ceva bhassaani jaayanti, na cekassa {na cetassa (ka0)} bhaasitassa attho vi~n~naayati, anujaanaami, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m adhikara.na.m ubbaahikaaya vuupasametu.m. ``dasaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo -- siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti, ^a^V0.0207^ea^ dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0)} vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa ^a^T1.0354^ea^ di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; ubhayaani kho panassa paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso ^a^P2.0096^ea^; vinaye kho pana .thito {cheko (ka0)} hoti asa.mhiiro; pa.tibalo hoti ubho atthapaccatthike assaasetu.m sa~n~naapetu.m nijjhaapetu.m pekkhetu.m pasaadetu.m; adhikara.nasamuppaadavuupasamanakusalo hoti; adhikara.na.m jaanaati; adhikara.nasamudaya.m jaanaati; adhikara.nanirodha.m jaanaati; adhikara.nanirodhagaaminipa.tipada.m jaanaati. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imehi dasaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m ubbaahikaaya sammannitu.m. eva~nca ^a^M0.0224^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo, yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. amhaaka.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane anantaani ceva bhassaani jaayanti, na cekassa bhaasitassa attho vi~n~naayati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama~nca itthannaama~nca bhikkhu.m sammanneyya ubbaahikaaya ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. amhaaka.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane anantaani ceva bhassaani jaayanti, na cekassa bhaasitassa attho vi~n~naayati. sa"ngho itthannaama~nca itthannaama~nca bhikkhu.m sammannati ubbaahikaaya ima.m adhikara.na.m ^a^T1.0355^ea^ vuupasametu.m. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa ca itthannaamassa ca bhikkhuno sammuti ubbaahikaaya ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo ca itthannaamo ca bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]``te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m ubbaahikaaya vuupasametu.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m vuupasanta.m. kena vuupasanta.m? sammukhaavinayena. ki~nca tattha sammukhaavinayasmi.m? dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa...pe0... eva.m vuupasanta.m ce, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m kaarako ukko.teti, ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ ``tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi tasmi.m adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane tatraassa bhikkhu dhammakathiko, tassa neva sutta.m aagata.m hoti, no suttavibha"ngo, so attha.m asallakkhento ^a^V0.0208^ea^ bya~njanacchaayaaya attha.m pa.tibaahati, byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena te bhikkhuu ~naapetabbaa --

[03]``su.nantu me aayasmantaa. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu dhammakathiko. imassa neva sutta.m aagata.m hoti, no suttavibha"ngo. so attha.m asallakkhento bya~njanacchaayaaya attha.m pa.tibaahati. yadaayasmantaana.m pattakalla.m ^a^M0.0225^ea^, itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m ^a^P2.0097^ea^ vu.t.thaapetvaa avasesaa ima.m ^a^T1.0356^ea^ adhikara.na.m vuupasameyyaamaati.

[03]``te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhu.m vu.t.thaapetvaa sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m vuupasanta.m. kena vuupasanta.m? sammukhaavinayena. ki~nca tattha sammukhaavinayasmi.m? dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa...pe0... eva.m vuupasanta.m ce, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m kaarako ukko.teti, ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m.

[03]``tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi tasmi.m adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane tatraassa bhikkhu dhammakathiko, tassa sutta~nhi kho aagata.m hoti, no suttavibha"ngo, so attha.m asallakkhento bya~njanacchaayaaya attha.m pa.tibaahati, byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena te bhikkhuu ~naapetabbaa --

[03]``su.nantu me aayasmantaa. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu dhammakathiko. imassa sutta~nhi kho aagata.m hoti, no suttavibha"ngo. so attha.m asallakkhento bya~njanacchaayaaya attha.m pa.tibaahati. yadaayasmantaana.m pattakalla.m, itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m vu.t.thaapetvaa avasesaa ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasameyyaamaati.

[03]``te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhu.m vu.t.thaapetvaa sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m vuupasanta.m. kena vuupasanta.m? sammukhaavinayena. ki~nca tattha sammukhaavinayasmi.m? dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa...pe0... eva.m vuupasanta.m ce, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m kaarako ukko.teti, ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ ``te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu na sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m ubbaahikaaya ^a^T1.0357^ea^ vuupasametu.m, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi ta.m adhikara.na.m sa"nghassa niyyaadetabba.m -- `na maya.m {na ca maya.m (ka0)}, bhante, sakkoma ^a^V0.0209^ea^ ima.m adhikara.na.m ubbaahikaaya vuupasametu.m, sa"nghova ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametuu'ti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m adhikara.na.m yebhuyyasikaaya vuupasametu.m. pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu salaakaggaahaapako sammannitabbo -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na ^a^M0.0226^ea^ dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, gahitaagahita~nca jaaneyya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo, yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m salaakaggaahaapaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m salaakaggaahaapaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno salaakaggaahaapakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu salaakaggaahaapako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]``tena salaakaggaahaapakena bhikkhunaa salaakaa gaahetabbaa. yathaa bahutaraa bhikkhuu dhammavaadino vadanti tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametabba.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m vuupasanta.m. kena vuupasanta.m? sammukhaavinayena ca, yebhuyyasikaaya ca. ki~nca tattha sammukhaavinayasmi.m? sa"nghasammukhataa, dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa. kaa ca tattha sa"nghasammukhataa? yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti -- aya.m tattha sa"nghasammukhataa. kaa ca tattha dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa? yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusaasanena ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasammati -- aya.m tattha dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa ^a^T1.0358^ea^. kaa ca tattha puggalasammukhataa? yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikaa sammukhiibhuutaa honti -- aya.m tattha puggalasammukhataa. kaa ca tattha yebhuyyasikaaya? yaa yebhuyyasikaakammassa kiriyaa kara.na.m upagamana.m ajjhupagamana.m adhivaasanaa appa.tikkosanaa -- aya.m tattha yebhuyyasikaaya. eva.m vuupasanta.m ce, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m kaarako ukko.teti, ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m; chandadaayako khiiyati, khiiyanaka.m paacittiya''nti.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P2.0098^ea^ ^a^M0.0227^ea^ ^a^V0.0210^ea^ kho pana samayena saavatthiyaa eva.m jaata.m eva.m samuppanna.m adhikara.na.m hoti. atha kho te bhikkhuu -- asantu.t.thaa saavatthiyaa sa"nghassa adhikara.navuupasamanena -- assosu.m kho amukasmi.m kira aavaase sambahulaa theraa viharanti bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa pa.n.ditaa viyattaa medhaavino lajjino kukkuccakaa sikkhaakaamaa. te ce theraa ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasameyyu.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena, evamida.m adhikara.na.m suvuupasanta.m assaati. atha kho te bhikkhuu ta.m aavaasa.m gantvaa te there etadavocu.m -- ``ida.m, bhante, adhikara.na.m eva.m jaata.m, eva.m samuppanna.m. saadhu, bhante, theraa ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamentu dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena, yathayida.m adhikara.na.m suvuupasanta.m assaa''ti. atha kho te theraa -- yathaa saavatthiyaa sa"nghena adhikara.na.m vuupasamita.m tathaa suvuupasantanti {yathaa suvuupasanta.m (sii0 syaa0)} -- tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamesu.m ^a^T1.0359^ea^.

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu -- asantu.t.thaa saavatthiyaa sa"nghassa adhikara.navuupasamanena, asantu.t.thaa sambahulaana.m theraana.m adhikara.navuupasamanena -- assosu.m kho amukasmi.m kira aavaase tayo theraa viharanti...pe0... dve theraa viharanti...pe0... eko thero viharati bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. so ce thero ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasameyya dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena, evamida.m adhikara.na.m suvuupasanta.m assaati. atha kho te bhikkhuu ta.m aavaasa.m gantvaa ta.m thera.m etadavocu.m -- ``ida.m, bhante, adhikara.na.m eva.m jaata.m, eva.m samuppanna.m. saadhu, bhante, thero ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena, yathayida.m adhikara.na.m suvuupasanta.m assaa''ti. atha kho so thero -- yathaa saavatthiyaa sa"nghena adhikara.na.m vuupasamita.m, yathaa sambahulehi therehi adhikara.na.m vuupasamita.m, yathaa tiihi therehi adhikara.na.m vuupasamita.m, yathaa dviihi therehi adhikara.na.m vuupasamita.m, tathaa suvuupasantanti -- tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamesi.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0228^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu asantu.t.thaa saavatthiyaa sa"nghassa adhikara.navuupasamanena, asantu.t.thaa sambahulaana.m theraana.m adhikara.navuupasamanena, asantu.t.thaa ti.n.na.m theraana.m adhikara.navuupasamanena, asantu.t.thaa dvinna.m theraana.m adhikara.navuupasamanena, asantu.t.thaa ekassa therassa adhikara.navuupasamanena, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ^a^T1.0360^ea^ ``nihatameta.m, bhikkhave, adhikara.na.m santa.m vuupasanta.m suvuupasanta.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m sa~n~nattiyaa tayo salaakaggaahe -- guu.lhaka.m, saka.n.najappaka.m, viva.taka.m.

[03]``katha~nca ^a^V0.0211^ea^, bhikkhave, guu.lhako salaakaggaaho hoti? tena salaakaggaahaapakena bhikkhunaa ^a^P2.0099^ea^ salaakaayo va.n.naava.n.naayo katvaa ekameko bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aya.m eva.mvaadissa salaakaa, aya.m eva.mvaadissa salaakaa. ya.m icchasi ta.m ga.nhaahii'ti. gahite vattabbo -- `maa ca kassaci dassehii'ti. sace jaanaati -- adhammavaadii bahutaraati, duggahoti, paccukka.d.dhitabba.m. sace jaanaati -- dhammavaadii bahutaraati, suggahoti, saavetabba.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, guu.lhako salaakaggaaho hoti.

[03]``katha~nca, bhikkhave, saka.n.najappako salaakaggaaho hoti? tena salaakaggaahaapakena bhikkhunaa ekamekassa bhikkhuno upaka.n.nake aarocetabba.m -- `aya.m eva.mvaadissa salaakaa, aya.m eva.mvaadissa salaakaa. ya.m icchasi ta.m ga.nhaahii'ti. gahite vattabbo -- `maa ca kassaci aarocehii'ti. sace jaanaati -- adhammavaadii bahutaraati, duggahoti, paccukka.d.dhitabba.m. sace jaanaati -- dhammavaadii bahutaraati, suggahoti, saavetabba.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, saka.n.najappako salaakaggaaho hoti.

[03]``katha~nca, bhikkhave, viva.tako salaakaggaaho hoti? sace jaanaati -- dhammavaadii bahutaraati, vissa.t.theneva viva.tena gaahetabbo ^a^T1.0361^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, viva.tako salaakaggaaho hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo salaakaggaahaa''ti.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ {pari0 292-293, 307 aadayo} ``anuvaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^M0.0229^ea^ katihi samathehi sammati? anuvaadaadhikara.na.m catuuhi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca, sativinayena ca, amuu.lhavinayena ca, tassapaapiyasikaaya ca. siyaa anuvaadaadhikara.na.m dve samathe anaagamma -- amuu.lhavinaya~nca, tassapaapiyasika~nca; dviihi samathehi sammeyya -- sammukhaavinayena ca, sativinayena caati? siyaatissa vacaniiya.m. yathaa katha.m viya? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msenti. tassa kho, bhikkhave {tassa kho ta.m bhikkhave (syaa0 ka0)}, bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayo daatabbo. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbo --

[03]``tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga karitvaa...pe0... evamassa vacaniiyo -- `ma.m, bhante, bhikkhuu amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msenti. soha.m, bhante ^a^V0.0212^ea^, sativepullappatto sa"ngha.m sativinaya.m yaacaamii'ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbo. tatiyampi yaacitabbo. byattena.m bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. bhikkhuu itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msenti. so sativepullappatto sa"ngha.m sativinaya.m yaacati ^a^P2.0100^ea^. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa ^a^T1.0362^ea^ sativinaya.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu jaraadubbalo nahaayamaano na sakkoti attano kaaya.m uggha.msetu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^T2.0005^ea^ aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ukkaasika''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu pi.t.thiparikamma.m kaatu.m kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, puthupaa.nika''nti.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu vallika.m dhaarenti...pe0... paama"nga.m dhaarenti...pe0... ka.n.thasuttaka.m dhaarenti...pe0... ka.tisuttaka.m dhaarenti...pe0... ova.t.tika.m dhaarenti...pe0... kaayura.m dhaarenti...pe0... hatthaabhara.na.m dhaarenti...pe0... a"ngulimuddika.m dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu vallika.m dhaarenti...pe0... paama"nga.m dhaarenti, ka.n.thasuttaka.m dhaarenti, ka.tisuttaka.m dhaarenti, ova.t.tika.m dhaarenti, kaayura.m dhaarenti, hatthaabhara.na.m dhaarenti, a"ngulimuddika.m dhaarentii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, vallikaa dhaaretabbaa...pe0... na paama"ngo dhaaretabbo... na ka.n.thasuttaka.m dhaaretabba.m... na ^a^V0.0224^ea^ ka.tisuttaka.m dhaaretabba.m... na ova.t.tika.m dhaaretabba.m... na kaayura.m dhaaretabba.m... na hatthaabhara.na.m dhaaretabba.m... na a"ngulimuddikaa ^a^T2.0006^ea^ dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa ^a^P2.0107^ea^ bhikkhuu diighe kese dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, diighaa kesaa ^a^M0.0242^ea^ dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dumaasika.m vaa duva"ngula.m vaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kocchena kese osa.n.thenti {osa.nhenti (sii0 syaa0)} ...pe0... pha.nakena kese osa.n.thenti, hatthapha.nakena kese osa.n.thenti, sitthatelakena kese osa.n.thenti, udakatelakena kese osa.n.thenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, kocchena kesaa osa.n.thetabbaa...pe0... na sitthatelakena kesaa osa.n.thetabbaa... na udakatelakena kesaa osa.n.thetabbaa. yo osa.n.theyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu aadaasepi udakapattepi mukhanimitta.m olokenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, aadaase vaa udakapatte vaa mukhanimitta.m oloketabba.m. yo olokeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0007^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno mukhe va.no hoti. so bhikkhuu pucchi -- ``kiidiso me, aavuso, va.no''ti? bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``ediso te, aavuso va.no''ti. so na saddahati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aabaadhappaccayaa aadaase vaa udakapatte vaa mukhanimitta.m oloketu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu mukha.m aalimpanti...pe0... mukha.m ummaddenti, mukha.m cu.n.nenti, manosilikaaya mukha.m la~nchenti, a"ngaraaga.m karonti, mukharaaga.m karonti, a"ngaraagamukharaaga.m karonti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, mukha.m aalimpitabba.m...pe0... na mukha.m ummadditabba.m, na mukha.m cu.n.netabba.m, na manosilikaaya mukha.m la~nchetabba.m, na a"ngaraago kaatabbo, na mukharaago kaatabbo ^a^V0.0225^ea^, na a"ngaraagamukharaago kaatabbo. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[03]tena ^a^M0.0243^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno cakkhurogaabaadho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aabaadhappaccayaa mukha.m aalimpitu''nti.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0008^ea^ kho pana samayena raajagahe giraggasamajjo {samajjaa (abhidhaanaganthesu)} hoti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu giraggasamajja.m dassanaaya agama.msu. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa naccampi giitampi vaaditampi dassanaaya ^a^P2.0108^ea^ gacchissanti, seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, nacca.m vaa giita.m vaa vaadita.m vaa dassanaaya gantabba.m. yo gaccheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m gaayanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``yatheva {yathaa ca (ka0)} maya.m gaayaama, evamevime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m gaayantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m gaayissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m gaayantassa. attanaapi tasmi.m sare saarajjati, parepi tasmi.m sare saarajjanti, gahapatikaapi ujjhaayanti, sarakuttimpi nikaamayamaanassa ^a^T2.0009^ea^ samaadhissa bha"ngo hoti, pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m gaayantassa. na, bhikkhave, aayatakena giitassarena dhammo gaayitabbo. yo gaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu sarabha~n~ne kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sarabha~n~na''nti.

[03]``tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu baahiralomi.m {baahiyalomi.m (ka0)} u.n.ni.m dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti ^a^V0.0226^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti ^a^M0.0244^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, baahiyalomi u.n.ni dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa aaraame ambaa phalino honti. ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena anu~n~naata.m hoti -- ``yathaasukha.m ayyaa amba.m paribhu~njantuu''ti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu taru.na~n~neva amba.m paataapetvaa paribhu~nji.msu. ra~n~no ca maagadhassa ^a^P2.0109^ea^ seniyassa bimbisaarassa ambena attho hoti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro manusse aa.naapesi -- ``gacchatha, bha.ne, aaraama.m gantvaa amba.m aaharathaa''ti ^a^T2.0010^ea^. ``eva.m devaa''ti kho te manussaa ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa pa.tissutvaa aaraama.m gantvaa aaraamapaala.m etadavocu.m -- ``devassa, bha.ne, ambena attho, amba.m dethaa''ti. ``natthaayyaa amba.m. taru.na~n~neva amba.m paataapetvaa bhikkhuu paribhu~nji.msuu''ti. atha kho te manussaa ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``suparibhutta.m, bha.ne, ayyehi amba.m, api ca bhagavataa mattaa va.n.nitaa''ti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa na matta.m jaanitvaa ra~n~no amba.m paribhu~njissantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, amba.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa puugassa sa"nghabhatta.m hoti. suupe ambapesikaayo pakkhittaa honti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa nappa.tigga.nhanti. ``pa.tigga.nhatha, bhikkhave, paribhu~njatha. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ambapesika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa puugassa sa"nghabhatta.m hoti. te na pariyaapu.ni.msu ambapesika.m kaatu.m, bhattagge sakaleheva ambehi denti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa nappa.tigga.nhanti. ``pa.tigga.nhatha ^a^T2.0011^ea^, bhikkhave, paribhu~njatha. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi sama.nakappehi phala.m paribhu~njitu.m -- aggiparicita.m ^a^M0.0245^ea^, satthaparicita.m, nakhaparicita.m, abiija.m, nibbattabiija~n~neva {nibba.t.tabiija.m (sii0 syaa0)} pa~ncama.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imehi pa~ncahi sama.nakappehi phala.m paribhu~njitu''nti.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0227^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu ahinaa da.t.tho kaala"nkato hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na hi nuuna so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena phari. sace hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena phareyya, na hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ahinaa da.t.tho kaala"nkareyya. katamaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani? viruupakkha.m ahiraajakula.m, eraapatha.m ahiraajakula.m, chabyaaputta.m ahiraajakula.m, ka.nhaagotama.m ahiraajakula.m ^a^P2.0110^ea^. na hi nuuna so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena phari. sace hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena phareyya, na hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ahinaa da.t.tho kaala"nkareyya. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena pharitu.m, attaguttiyaa attarakkhaaya attaparitta.m kaatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, kaatabba.m --
[21] {jaa0 1.2.105-106; a0 ni0 4.67 ida.m vatthu aagata.m} ``viruupakkhehi me metta.m, metta.m eraapathehi me.
[22] chabyaaputtehi me metta.m, metta.m ka.nhaagotamakehi ca..
[21] ``apaadakehi ^a^T2.0012^ea^ me metta.m, metta.m dvipaadakehi me.
[22] catuppadehi me metta.m, metta.m bahuppadehi me..
[21] ``maa ma.m apaadako hi.msi, maa ma.m hi.msi dvipaadako.
[22] maa ma.m catuppado hi.msi, maa ma.m hi.msi bahuppado..
[21] ``sabbe sattaa sabbe paa.naa, sabbe bhuutaa ca kevalaa.
[22] sabbe bhadraani passantu, maa ki~nci paapamaagamaa..
[21] ``appamaa.no buddho, appamaa.no dhammo,
[22] appamaa.no sa"ngho, pamaa.navantaani sariisapaani {siri.msapaani (sii0 syaa0)}..
[21] ``ahi vicchikaa satapadii, u.n.nanaabhi sarabuu muusikaa.
[22] kataa me rakkhaa kata.m me paritta.m, pa.tikkamantu bhuutaani..
[22] ``soha.m ^a^V0.0228^ea^ namo bhagavato, namo sattanna.m sammaasambuddhaana''nti..

[03]tena ^a^M0.0246^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu anabhiratiyaa pii.lito attano a"ngajaata.m chindi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``a~n~namhi so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso chetabbamhi, a~n~na.m chindi. na, bhikkhave, attano a"ngajaata.m chetabba.m. yo chindeyya, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena raajagahakassa se.t.thissa mahagghassa candanassa {candanasaarassa (sii0 syaa0)} candanaga.n.thi uppannaa hoti. atha kho raajagahakassa se.t.thissa ^a^T2.0013^ea^ etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m imaaya candanaga.n.thiyaa patta.m lekhaapeyya.m. lekha~nca me paribhoga.m bhavissati, patta~nca daana.m dassaamii''ti. atha kho raajagahako se.t.thi taaya candanaga.n.thiyaa patta.m lekhaapetvaa sikkaaya u.d.ditvaa {vaahitvaa (sii0)} ve.lagge aalaggetvaa ve.luparamparaaya bandhitvaa {vaahitvaa (syaa0)} evamaaha -- ``yo sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa arahaa ceva iddhimaa ca dinna.myeva patta.m oharatuu''ti. atha kho puura.no ^a^P2.0111^ea^ kassapo yena raajagahako se.t.thi tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa raajagahaka.m se.t.thi.m etadavoca -- ``aha~nhi, gahapati, arahaa ceva iddhimaa ca, dehi me patta''nti. ``sace, bhante, aayasmaa arahaa ceva iddhimaa ca dinna.myeva patta.m oharatuu''ti. atha kho makkhali gosaalo... ajito kesakambalo... pakudho kaccaayano... sa~ncayo bela.t.thaputto {sa~njayo bella.t.thiputto (sii0)} ... niga.n.tho naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0)} yena raajagahako se.t.thi tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa raajagahaka.m se.t.thi.m etadavoca -- ``aha~nhi, gahapati, arahaa ceva iddhimaa ca, dehi me patta''nti. ``sace, bhante, aayasmaa arahaa ceva iddhimaa ca, dinna.myeva patta.m oharatuu''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano aayasmaa ^a^T2.0014^ea^ ca pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya pavisi.msu. atha kho aayasmaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa kho mahaamoggallaano arahaa ceva iddhimaa ca. gacchaavuso, moggallaana, eta.m patta.m ohara. tuyheso patto''ti. ``aayasmaa kho bhaaradvaajo arahaa ceva iddhimaa ca. gacchaavuso, bhaaradvaaja, eta.m patta.m ohara. tuyheso patto''ti. atha kho aayasmaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa ta.m patta.m gahetvaa tikkhattu.m raajagaha.m anupariyaayi.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0247^ea^ kho pana samayena raajagahako se.t.thi saputtadaaro sake nivesane .thito hoti pa~njaliko ^a^V0.0229^ea^ namassamaano -- idheva, bhante, ayyo bhaaradvaajo amhaaka.m nivesane pati.t.thaatuuti. atha kho aayasmaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo raajagahakassa se.t.thissa nivesane pati.t.thaasi. atha ^a^T2.0015^ea^ kho raajagahako se.t.thi aayasmato pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajassa hatthato patta.m gahetvaa mahagghassa khaadaniiyassa puuretvaa aayasmato pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajassa adaasi. atha kho aayasmaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo ta.m patta.m gahetvaa aaraama.m agamaasi. assosu.m kho manussaa -- ayyena kira pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena raajagahakassa se.t.thissa patto ohaaritoti. te ca manussaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa aayasmanta.m pi.n.dolabhaaradvaaja.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi.msu.

[03]assesi kho bhagavaa uccaasadda.m mahaasadda.m; sutvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho so, aananda, uccaasaddo mahaasaddo''ti? ``aayasmataa, bhante, pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena raajagahakassa se.t.thissa patto ohaarito. assosu.m kho, bhante, manussaa -- ayyena kira pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena raajagahakassa se.t.thissa patto ohaaritoti. te ca, bhante, manussaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa aayasmanta.m pi.n.dolabhaaradvaaja.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhaa. so eso, bhante, bhagavaa uccaasaddo mahaasaddo''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m ^a^P2.0112^ea^ pi.n.dolabhaaradvaaja.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tayaa, bhaaradvaaja, raajagahakassa se.t.thissa patto ohaarito''ti? ``sacca.m ^a^T2.0016^ea^ bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, bhaaradvaaja, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, bhaaradvaaja, chavassa daarupattassa kaara.naa gihiina.m uttarimanussadhamma.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassessasi! seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja, maatugaamo chavassa maasakaruupassa kaara.naa kopina.m dasseti, evameva kho tayaa, bhaaradvaaja, chavassa daarupattassa kaara.naa gihiina.m uttarimanussadhamma.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassita.m. neta.m, bhaaradvaaja, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, gihiina.m uttarimanussadhamma.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassetabba.m. yo dasseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. bhindatheta.m, bhikkhave, daarupatta.m sakalika.m sakalika.m katvaa ^a^M0.0248^ea^, bhikkhuuna.m a~njanupapisana.m detha. na ca, bhikkhave, daarupatto dhaaretabbo. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaavace patte dhaarenti sova.n.namaya.m ruupiyamaya.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, sova.n.namayo patto dhaaretabbo...pe0... na ruupiyamayo ^a^V0.0230^ea^ patto dhaaretabbo... na ma.nimayo patto dhaaretabbo... na ve.luriyamayo patto dhaaretabbo... na phalikamayo patto dhaaretabbo... na ka.msamayo patto dhaaretabbo... na ^a^T2.0017^ea^ kaacamayo patto dhaaretabbo... na tipumayo patto dhaaretabbo... na siisamayo patto dhaaretabbo... na tambalohamayo patto dhaaretabbo. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve patte -- ayopatta.m, mattikaapatta''nti.
[03] 253^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena pattamuula.m gha.msiyati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pattama.n.dala''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaavacaani pattama.n.dalaani dhaarenti sova.n.namaya.m ruupiyamaya.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, uccaavacaani pattama.n.dalaani dhaaretabbaani. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve pattama.n.dalaani -- tipumaya.m, siisamaya''nti. bahalaani ma.n.dalaani na acchupiyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, likhitu''nti. valii {calii (ka0)} honti ^a^P2.0113^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, makaradantaka.m chinditu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu citraani pattama.n.dalaani dhaarenti ruupakaaki.n.naani bhittikammakataani. taani rathikaayapi dassentaa aahi.n.danti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^T2.0018^ea^ aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, citraani pattama.n.dalaani dhaaretabbaani ruupakaaki.n.naani bhittikammakataani. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pakatima.n.dala''nti.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0249^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu sodaka.m patta.m pa.tisaamenti. patto dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, sodako patto pa.tisaametabbo. yo pa.tisaameyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, otaapetvaa patta.m pa.tisaametu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu sodaka.m {saudaka.m (ka0)} patta.m otaapenti. patto duggandho hoti. bhagavato ^a^V0.0231^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, sodako patto otaapetabbo. yo otaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vodaka.m katvaa otaapetvaa patta.m pa.tisaametu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu u.nhe patta.m nidahanti. pattassa va.n.no dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, u.nhe patto nidahitabbo. yo nidaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetvaa patta.m pa.tisaametu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa pattaa ajjhokaase anaadhaaraa nikkhittaa honti. vaatama.n.dalikaaya aava.t.tetvaa pattaa bhijji.msu ^a^T2.0019^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pattaadhaaraka''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu mi.d.dhante patta.m nikkhipanti. paripatitvaa {pariva.t.titvaa (syaa0)} patto bhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, mi.d.dhante patto nikkhipitabbo. yo nikkhipeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu paribha.n.dante patta.m nikkhipanti. paripatitvaa patto bhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, paribha.n.dante patto nikkhipitabbo. yo nikkhipeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu chamaaya patta.m nikkujjanti. o.t.tho gha.msiyati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ti.nasanthaaraka''nti. ti.nasanthaarako upacikaahi khajjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, co.laka''nti. co.laka.m upacikaahi khajjati. bhagavato ^a^P2.0114^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pattamaa.laka''nti. pattamaa.lako paripatitvaa patto bhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^M0.0250^ea^ aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pattaku.n.dolika''nti. pattaku.n.dolikaaya patto gha.msiyati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pattathavika''nti ^a^T2.0020^ea^. a.msabaddhako na hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.msabaddhaka.m bandhanasuttaka''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0232^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bhittikhilepi naagadantakepi patta.m laggenti. paripatitvaa patto bhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, patto laggetabbo. yo laggeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ma~nce patta.m nikkhipanti, satisammosaa nisiidantaa ottharitvaa patta.m bhindenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ma~nce patto nikkhipitabbo. yo nikkhipeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu pii.the patta.m nikkhipanti, satisammosaa nisiidantaa ottharitvaa patta.m bhindenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, pii.the patto nikkhipitabbo. yo nikkhipeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu a"nke patta.m nikkhipanti, satisammosaa u.t.thahanti. paripatitvaa patto bhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, a"nke patto nikkhipitabbo. yo nikkhipeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu chatte patta.m nikkhipanti. vaatama.n.dalikaaya chatta.m ukkhipiyati paripatitvaa patto bhijjati. bhagavato ^a^T2.0021^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, chatte patto nikkhipitabbo. yo nikkhipeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu pattahatthaa kavaa.ta.m pa.naamenti. kavaa.to aava.t.titvaa patto bhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, pattahatthena kavaa.ta.m pa.naametabba.m {kavaa.to pa.naametabbo (ka0)}. yo pa.naameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0251^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu tumbaka.taahe pi.n.daaya caranti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi titthiyaati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, tumbaka.taahe pi.n.daaya caritabba.m. yo careyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu gha.tika.taahe ^a^P2.0115^ea^ {gha.tika.taahena (syaa0)} pi.n.daaya caranti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti ^a^V0.0233^ea^ vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi titthiyaati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, gha.tika.taahe pi.n.daaya caritabba.m. yo careyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu sabbapa.msukuuliko hoti. so chavasiisassa patta.m dhaareti. a~n~nataraa itthii passitvaa ^a^T2.0022^ea^ bhiitaa vissaramakaasi -- ``abhu.m me pisaaco vataaya''nti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa chavasiisassa patta.m dhaaressanti, seyyathaapi pisaacillikaa''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, chavasiisassa patto dhaaretabbo. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na ca, bhikkhave, sabbapa.msukuulikena bhavitabba.m. yo bhaveyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu calakaanipi a.t.thikaanipi ucchi.t.thodakampi pattena niiharanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``yasmi.m yevime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa bhu~njanti sova nesa.m pa.tiggaho''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na bhikkhave, calakaani vaa a.t.thikaani vaa ucchi.t.thodaka.m vaa pattena niiharitabba.m. yo niihareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa.tiggaha''nti.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu hatthena vipphaa.letvaa ciivara.m sibbenti. ciivara.m vilomika.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, satthaka.m namataka''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa da.n.dasatthaka.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, da.n.dasatthaka''nti ^a^T2.0023^ea^.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0252^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaavace satthakada.n.de dhaarenti sova.n.namaya.m ruupiyamaya.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, uccaavacaa satthakada.n.daa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.thimaya.m dantamaya.m visaa.namaya.m na.lamaya.m ve.lumaya.m ka.t.thamaya.m jatumaya.m phalamaya.m lohamaya.m sa"nkhanaabhimaya''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu kukku.tapattenapi ve.lupesikaayapi ciivara.m sibbenti. ciivara.m ^a^V0.0234^ea^ dussibbita.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, suuci''nti. suuciyo ka.n.nakitaayo honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0116^ea^, suucinaa.lika''nti. suucinaa.likaayapi ka.n.nakitaayo honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ki.n.nena puuretu''nti. ki.n.nepi ka.n.nakitaayo honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sattuyaa puuretu''nti. sattuyaapi ka.n.nakitaayo honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saritaka''nti. saritakepi ka.n.nakitaayo honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, madhusitthakena saaretu''nti. saritaka.m paribhijjati. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saritakasipaa.tika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu tattha tattha khila.m nikkha.nitvaa sambandhitvaa ^a^T2.0024^ea^ ciivara.m sibbenti. ciivara.m vika.n.na.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kathina.m kathinarajju.m {ka.thina.m ka.thinarajju.m (sii0 syaa0)} tattha tattha obandhitvaa ciivara.m sibbetu''nti. visame kathina.m pattharanti. kathina.m paribhijjati...pe0... ``na, bhikkhave, visame kathina.m pattharitabba.m. yo patthareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]chamaaya kathina.m pattharanti. kathina.m pa.msukita.m hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ti.nasanthaaraka''nti. kathinassa anto jiirati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, anuvaata.m paribha.n.da.m aaropetu''nti. kathina.m nappahoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, da.n.dakathina.m bidalaka.m salaaka.m vinandhanarajju.m vinandhanasutta.m vinandhitvaa ciivara.m sibbetu''nti. suttantarikaayo visamaa honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami ^a^M0.0253^ea^, bhikkhave, ka.limbhaka''nti. suttaa va"nkaa honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, moghasuttaka''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu adhotehi paadehi kathina.m akkamanti. kathina.m dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, adhotehi paadehi kathina.m akkamitabba.m. yo akkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu allehi paadehi kathina.m akkamanti. kathina.m dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na ^a^T2.0025^ea^, bhikkhave, allehi paadehi kathina.m akkamitabba.m. yo akkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0235^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu saupaahanaa kathina.m akkamanti. kathina.m dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, saupaahanena kathina.m akkamitabba.m. yo akkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ciivara.m sibbantaa a"nguliyaa pa.tigga.nhanti. a"nguliyo dukkhaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa.tiggaha''nti.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaavace pa.tiggahe dhaarenti sova.n.namaya.m ruupiyamaya.m. manussaa ^a^P2.0117^ea^ ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, uccaavacaa pa.tiggahaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.thimaya.m...pe0... sa"nkhanaabhimaya''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena suuciyopi satthakaapi pa.tiggahaapi nassanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aavesanavitthaka''nti. aavesanavitthake samaakulaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa.tiggahathavika''nti. a.msabaddhako na hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.msabaddhaka.m bandhanasuttaka''nti.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0026^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu abbhokaase ciivara.m sibbantaa siitenapi u.nhenapi kilamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kathinasaala.m kathinama.n.dapa''nti. kathinasaalaa niicavatthukaa ^a^M0.0254^ea^ hoti, udakena otthariyyati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti. kathinasaalaaya ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa {ogumbetvaa (sii0 syaa0)} ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika.m ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajjuka''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0236^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ciivara.m sibbetvaa tattheva kathina.m ujjhitvaa pakkamanti, unduurehipi upacikaahipi khajjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kathina.m sa"ngharitu''nti. kathina.m paribhijjati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gogha.msikaaya kathina.m sa"ngharitu''nti. kathina.m vinive.thiyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bandhanarajju''nti ^a^T2.0027^ea^.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ku.t.tepi thambhepi kathina.m ussaapetvaa pakkamanti. paripatitvaa kathina.m bhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhittikhile vaa naagadante vaa laggetu''nti.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena vesaalii tena caarika.m pakkaami. tena kho pana samayena ^a^P2.0118^ea^ bhikkhuu suucikampi satthakampi bhesajjampi pattena aadaaya gacchanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhesajjatthavika''nti. a.msabaddhako na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.msabaddhaka.m bandhanasuttaka''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu upaahanaayo kaayabandhanena bandhitvaa gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. a~n~nataro upaasako ta.m bhikkhu.m abhivaadento upaahanaayo siisena gha.t.teti. so bhikkhu ma"nku ahosi. atha kho so bhikkhu aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upaahanatthavika''nti. a.msabaddhako na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.msabaddhaka.m bandhanasuttaka''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0255^ea^ kho pana samayena antaraamagge udaka.m akappiya.m hoti. parissaavana.m na hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami ^a^T2.0028^ea^, bhikkhave, parissaavana''nti. co.laka.m nappahoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ka.tacchuparissaavana''nti. co.laka.m nappahoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dhammakara.na''nti {dhammakara.na.m (sii0 syaa0), dhamakara.na.m (ka0)}.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. eko bhikkhu anaacaara.m aacarati. dutiyo bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``maa, aavuso, evaruupa.m akaasi. neta.m kappatii''ti. so tasmi.m upanandhi. atha kho so bhikkhu pipaasaaya ^a^V0.0237^ea^ pii.lito upanaddha.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``dehi me, aavuso, parissaavana.m, paaniiya.m pivissaamii''ti. upanaddho bhikkhu na adaasi. so bhikkhu pipaasaaya pii.lito kaalamakaasi. atha kho so bhikkhu aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso, parissaavana.m yaaciyamaano na adaasii''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu parissaavana.m yaaciyamaano na dassatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, parissaavana.m yaaciyamaano na adaasii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m ^a^T2.0029^ea^ akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, parissaavana.m yaaciyamaano na dassasi. neta.m, moghapurisa ^a^P2.0119^ea^, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na bhikkhave, addhaanamaggappa.tipannena bhikkhunaa parissaavana.m yaaciyamaanena na daatabba.m. yo na dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na ca, bhikkhave, aparissaavanakena addhaano pa.tipajjitabbo. yo pa.tipajjeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. sace na hoti parissaavana.m vaa dhammakara.no vaa, sa"nghaa.tika.n.nopi adhi.t.thaatabbo -- iminaa parissaavetvaa pivissaamii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m ^a^M0.0256^ea^. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu navakamma.m karonti. parissaavana.m na sammati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, da.n.daparissaavana''nti. da.n.daparissaavana.m na sammati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ottharaka''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu makasehi ubbaa.lhaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, makasaku.tika''nti.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena vesaaliya.m pa.niitaana.m bhattaana.m bhattapa.tipaa.ti a.t.thitaa hoti. bhikkhuu pa.niitaani bhojanaani bhu~njitvaa abhisannakaayaa ^a^T2.0030^ea^ honti bahvaabaadhaa {bavhaabaadhaa (sii0)}. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco vesaali.m agamaasi kenacideva kara.niiyena. addasaa kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhikkhuu abhisannakaaye bahvaabaadhe. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jiivako komaarabhacco ^a^V0.0238^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etarahi, bhante, bhikkhuu abhisannakaayaa bahvaabaadhaa. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m ca"nkama~nca jantaaghara~nca anujaanaatu. eva.m bhikkhuu appaabaadhaa bhavissantii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ca"nkama~nca jantaaghara~ncaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ^a^P2.0120^ea^ visame ca"nkame ca"nkamanti. paadaa dukkhaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sama.m kaatu''nti. ca"nkamo niicavatthuko hoti. udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo ^a^T2.0031^ea^ paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti.
[03]tena ^a^M0.0257^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ca"nkame ca"nkamantaa paripatanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ca"nkamanavedika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ajjhokaase ca"nkamantaa siitenapi u.nhenapi kilamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ca"nkamanasaala''nti. ca"nkamanasaalaaya.m ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika.m ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti. jantaaghara.m niicavatthuka.m hoti, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti ^a^T2.0032^ea^. jantaagharassa kavaa.ta.m na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kavaa.ta.m pi.t.thasa"nghaa.ta.m {pii.thasa.mghaa.ta.m (ka0)} udukkhalika.m uttarapaasaka.m agga.lava.t.tika.m kapisiisaka.m suucika.m gha.tika.m taa.lacchidda.m aavi~nchanachidda.m aavi~nchanarajju''nti ^a^V0.0239^ea^. jantaagharassa ku.t.tapaado jiirati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ma.n.dalika.m kaatu''nti. jantaagharassa dhuumanetta.m na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dhuumanetta''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu khuddake jantaaghare majjhe aggi.t.thaana.m karonti. upacaaro na hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, khuddake jantaaghare ekamanta.m aggi.t.thaana.m kaatu.m, mahallake majjhe''ti. jantaaghare aggi mukha.m .dahati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, mukhamattika''nti. hatthe mattika.m tementi...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, mattikaado.nika''nti. mattikaa duggandhaa hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vaasetu''nti. jantaaghare aggi kaaya.m .dahati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udaka.m atiharitu''nti. paatiyaapi pattenapi udaka.m atiharanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udaka.t.thaana.m, udakasaraavaka''nti. jantaaghara.m ti.nacchadana.m na sedeti {ti.nacchaadanena chaadeti (ka0)} ...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu''nti. jantaaghara.m ^a^M0.0258^ea^ cikkhalla.m hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, santharitu.m tayo santhare -- i.t.thakaasanthara.m, silaasanthara.m ^a^T2.0033^ea^, daarusanthara''nti. cikkhalla.myeva hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dhovitu''nti. udaka.m santi.t.thati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakaniddhamana''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu jantaaghare chamaaya ^a^P2.0121^ea^ nisiidanti, gattaani ka.n.duuvanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, jantaagharapii.tha''nti. tena kho pana samayena jantaaghara.m aparikkhitta.m hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parikkhipitu.m tayo paakaare -- i.t.thakaapaakaara.m, silaapaakaara.m, daarupaakaara''nti. ko.t.thako na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ko.t.thaka''nti. ko.t.thako niicavatthuko hoti, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti. ko.t.thakassa kavaa.ta.m na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kavaa.ta.m pi.t.thasa"nghaa.ta.m udukkhalika.m uttarapaasaka.m agga.lava.t.ti.m kapisiisaka.m suucika.m gha.tika.m taa.lacchidda.m aavi~nchanachidda.m aavi~nchanarajju''nti. ko.t.thake ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m ^a^T2.0034^ea^ ^a^V0.0240^ea^ kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tikanti. parive.na.m cikkhalla.m hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, marumba.m upakiritu''nti. na pariyaapu.nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, padarasila.m nikkhipitu''nti. udaka.m santi.t.thati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakaniddhamana''nti.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu naggaa nagga.m abhivaadenti...pe0... naggaa nagga.m abhivaadaapenti, naggaa naggassa parikamma.m karonti, naggaa naggassa parikamma.m kaaraapenti, naggaa naggassa denti, naggaa pa.tigga.nhanti, naggaa khaadanti, naggaa bhu~njanti, naggaa saayanti, naggaa pivanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, naggena {ida.m pada.m katthaci natthi} naggo abhivaadetabbo...pe0... na naggena abhivaadetabba.m... na naggena {ida.m pada.m katthaci natthi} naggo abhivaadaapetabbo... na naggena abhivaadaapetabba.m... na naggena naggassa parikamma.m ^a^M0.0259^ea^ kaatabba.m... na naggena naggassa parikamma.m kaaraapetabba.m... na naggena naggassa daatabba.m... na naggena pa.tiggahetabba.m... na naggena khaaditabba.m... na naggena bhu~njitabba.m... na ^a^T2.0035^ea^ naggena saayitabba.m... na naggena paatabba.m. yo piveyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu jantaaghare chamaaya ciivara.m nikkhipanti. ciivara.m pa.msukita.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti. deve vassante ciivara.m ovassati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0122^ea^, jantaagharasaala''nti. jantaagharasaalaa niicavatthukaa hoti, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m...pe0... aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti. jantaagharasaalaaya ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m...pe0... ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu jantaagharepi udakepi parikamma.m kaatu.m kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tisso pa.ticchaadiyo -- jantaagharapa.ticchaadi.m, udakapa.ticchaadi.m, vatthapa.ticchaadi''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena jantaaghare udaka.m na hoti. bhagavato ^a^T2.0036^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami ^a^V0.0241^ea^, bhikkhave, udapaana''nti. udapaanassa kuula.m lujjati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. udapaano niicavatthuko hoti, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti.
