[03] 262^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu vallikaayapi kaayabandhanenapi udaka.m vaahenti {vaahanti (ka0)}. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakavaahanarajju''nti. hatthaa dukkhaa honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tula.m karaka.taka.m cakkava.t.taka''nti. bhaajanaa bahuu bhijjanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo vaarake -- lohavaaraka.m, daaruvaaraka.m, cammakkha.n.da''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0260^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ajjhokaase udaka.m vaahentaa siitenapi u.nhenapi kilamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udapaanasaala''nti. udapaanasaalaaya ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika.m ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti. udapaano apaaruto hoti, ti.nacu.n.nehipi ^a^T2.0037^ea^ pa.msukehipi okiriyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, apidhaana''nti. udakabhaajana.m na sa.mvijjati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakado.ni.m udakaka.taaha''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu aaraame taha.m taha.m nahaayanti. aaraamo cikkhallo hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, candanika''nti. candanikaa paaka.taa hoti. bhikkhuu hiriyanti nahaayitu.m...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parikkhipitu.m tayo paakaare -- i.t.thakaapaakaara.m, silaapaakaara.m, daarupaakaara''nti. candanikaa cikkhallaa hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, santharitu.m tayo santhare -- i.t.thakaasanthara.m, silaasanthara.m, daarusanthara''nti. udaka.m santi.t.thati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakaniddhamana''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m gattaani siitigataani honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakapu~nchani.m co.lakenapi paccuddharitu''nti.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0242^ea^ kho pana samayena ^a^P2.0123^ea^ a~n~nataro upaasako sa"nghassa atthaaya pokkhara.ni.m kaaretukaamo hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pokkhara.ni''nti. pokkhara.niyaa kuula.m ^a^T2.0038^ea^ lujjati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti. pokkhara.niyaa udaka.m puraa.na.m hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakamaatika.m udakaniddhamana''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0261^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu sa"nghassa atthaaya nillekha.m jantaaghara.m kattukaamo hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, nillekha.m jantaaghara''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu caatumaasa.m nisiidanena vippavasanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``na, bhikkhave, caatumaasa.m nisiidanena vippavasitabba.m. yo vippavaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pupphaabhiki.n.nesu sayanesu sayanti. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, pupphaabhiki.n.nesu sayanesu sayitabba.m. yo sayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti ^a^T2.0039^ea^.

[03]tena kho pana samayena manussaa gandhampi maalampi aadaaya aaraama.m aagacchanti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na pa.tigga.nhanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gandha.m gahetvaa kavaa.te pa~nca"ngulika.m daatu.m, puppha.m gahetvaa vihaare ekamanta.m nikkhipitu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa namataka.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, namataka''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``namataka.m adhi.t.thaatabba.m nu kho udaahu vikappetabba''nti...pe0... ``na, bhikkhave, namataka.m adhi.t.thaatabba.m, na vikappetabba''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0243^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu aasittakuupadhaane bhu~njanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``na, bhikkhave, aasittakuupadhaane bhu~njitabba.m. yo bhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti ^a^P2.0124^ea^.
[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. so bhu~njamaano na sakkoti hatthena patta.m sandhaaretu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ma.lorika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ekabhaajanepi bhu~njanti...pe0... ^a^T2.0040^ea^ ekathaalakepi pivanti, ekama~ncepi tuva.t.tenti, ekatthara.naapi tuva.t.tenti, ekapaavura.naapi tuva.t.tenti, ekatthara.napaavura.naapi tuva.t.tenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti ^a^M0.0262^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ekabhaajane bhu~njitabba.m...pe0... na ekathaalake paatabba.m... na ekama~nce tuva.t.titabba.m... na ekatthara.naa {na ekatthara.ne} tuva.t.titabba.m... na ekapaavura.naa {na ekapaavura.ne} tuva.t.titabba.m... na ekatthara.napaavura.naa {na ekatthara.napaavura.ne (syaa0)} tuva.t.titabba.m. yo tuva.t.teyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 265^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena va.d.dho licchavii mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sahaayo hoti. atha kho va.d.dho licchavii yena mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``vandaami ayyaa''ti. eva.m vutte mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu naalapi.msu. dutiyampi kho va.d.dho licchavii mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``vandaami ayyaa''ti. dutiyampi kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu naalapi.msu. tatiyampi kho va.d.dho licchavii mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``vandaami ayyaa''ti. tatiyampi kho mettiyabhuumajakaa ^a^T2.0041^ea^ bhikkhuu naalapi.msu. ``kyaaha.m ayyaana.m aparajjhaami, kissa ma.m ayyaa naalapantii''ti? ``tathaa hi pana tva.m, aavuso va.d.dha, amhe dabbena mallaputtena vihe.thiyamaane ajjhupekkhasii''ti. ``kyaaha.m ayyaa karomii''ti? ``sace kho tva.m, aavuso va.d.dha, iccheyyaasi, ajjeva bhagavaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m naasaapeyyaa''ti. ``kyaaha.m ayyaa karomi, ki.m mayaa sakkaa kaatu''nti? ``ehi tva.m, aavuso va.d.dha, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m eva.m vadehi -- `ida.m, bhante, nacchanna.m nappatiruupa.m. yaaya.m, bhante, disaa abhayaa aniitikaa anupaddavaa saaya.m disaa sabhayaa saiitikaa saupaddavaa; yato nivaata.m tato savaata.m ^a^V0.0244^ea^; udaka.m ma~n~ne aaditta.m; ayyena me dabbena mallaputtena pajaapati duusitaa'''ti. ``eva.m ayyaa''ti kho va.d.dho licchavii mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho va.d.dho licchavii ^a^P2.0125^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m, bhante, nacchanna.m nappatiruupa.m. yaaya.m, bhante, disaa abhayaa aniitikaa anupaddavaa saaya.m disaa sabhayaa saiitikaa saupaddavaa; yato nivaata.m tato savaata.m; udaka.m ma~n~ne aaditta.m; ayyena me dabbena mallaputtena pajaapati duusitaa''ti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0263^ea^ kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sarasi ^a^T2.0042^ea^ tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa yathaaya.m va.d.dho aahaa''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa...pe0... tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m etadavoca -- ``sarasi tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa yathaaya.m va.d.dho aahaa''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. ``na kho, dabba, dabbaa eva.m nibbe.thenti. sace tayaa kata.m, katanti vadehi; sace akata.m, akatanti vadehii''ti. ``yato aha.m, bhante, jaato naabhijaanaami supinantenapi methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitaa, pageva jaagaro''ti. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho va.d.dhassa licchavissa patta.m nikkujjatu, asambhoga.m sa"nghena karotu.

[03]``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatassa upaasakassa patto nikkujjitabbo -- bhikkhuuna.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m anatthaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m avaasaaya {anaavaasaaya (syaa0)} parisakkati, bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati, bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi bhedeti, buddhassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imehi a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagatassa upaasakassa patta.m nikkujjitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, nikkujjitabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa ^a^T2.0043^ea^ pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. va.d.dho licchavii aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.mseti. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho va.d.dhassa licchavissa patta.m nikkujjeyya, asambhoga.m sa"nghena kareyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. va.d.dho licchavii aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.mseti. sa"ngho va.d.dhassa licchavissa patta.m nikkujjati, asambhoga.m sa"nghena karoti ^a^V0.0245^ea^. yassaayasmato khamati va.d.dhassa licchavissa pattassa nikkujjanaa, asambhoga.m sa"nghena kara.na.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``nikkujjito sa"nghena va.d.dhassa licchavissa patto, asambhogo sa"nghena. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0264^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena va.d.dhassa licchavissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa va.d.dha.m licchavi.m etadavoca -- ``sa"nghena te, aavuso va.d.dha, patto nikkujjito. asambhogosi sa"nghenaa''ti. atha ^a^P2.0126^ea^ kho va.d.dho licchavii -- sa"nghena kira me patto nikkujjito, asambhogomhi kira sa"nghenaati -- tattheva mucchito papato. atha kho va.d.dhassa licchavissa ^a^T2.0044^ea^ mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa va.d.dha.m licchavi.m etadavocu.m -- ``ala.m, aavuso va.d.dha, maa soci, maa paridevi. maya.m bhagavanta.m pasaadessaama bhikkhusa"ngha~ncaa''ti.

[03]atha kho va.d.dho licchavii saputtadaaro samittaamacco sa~naatisaalohito allavattho allakeso yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m ayya.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msesi.m. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha tva.m, aavuso va.d.dha, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa anuddha.msesi. yato ca kho tva.m, aavuso va.d.dha, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vu.d.dhihesaa, aavuso va.d.dha, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti, aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho va.d.dhassa licchavissa patta.m ukkujjatu, sambhoga.m sa"nghena karotu.

[03]``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatassa upaasakassa patto ukkujjitabbo -- na bhikkhuuna.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, na bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T2.0045^ea^ anatthaaya parisakkati, na bhikkhuuna.m avaasaaya parisakkati, na bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati, na bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi bhedeti, na buddhassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, na dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, na sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati. anujaanaami ^a^V0.0246^ea^, bhikkhave, imehi a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagatassa upaasakassa patta.m ukkujjitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ukkujjitabbo. tena, bhikkhave, va.d.dhena licchavinaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `sa"nghena me, bhante, patto ^a^M0.0265^ea^ nikkujjito, asambhogomhi sa"nghena. soha.m, bhante, sammaa vattaami, loma.m paatemi, netthaara.m vattaami, sa"ngha.m pattukkujjana.m yaacaamii'ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbo. tatiyampi yaacitabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ^a^P2.0127^ea^ ~naapetabbo --

[03] 267^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"nghena va.d.dhassa licchavissa patto nikkujjito, asambhogo sa"nghena. so sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, sa"ngha.m pattukkujjana.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho va.d.dhassa licchavissa patta.m ukkujjeyya, sambhoga.m sa"nghena kareyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"nghena va.d.dhassa licchavissa patto nikkujjito, asambhogo sa"nghena. so sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati ^a^T2.0046^ea^, sa"ngha.m pattukkujjana.m yaacati. sa"ngho va.d.dhassa licchavissa patta.m ukkujjati, sambhoga.m sa"nghena karoti. yassaayasmato khamati va.d.dhassa licchavissa pattassa ukkujjanaa, sambhoga.m sa"nghena kara.na.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``ukkujjito sa"nghena va.d.dhassa licchavissa patto, sambhogo sa"nghena. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena bhaggaa tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena bhaggaa tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire {su.msumaaragire (sii0 syaa0), sa.msumaaragire (ka0)} bhesaka.laavane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena bodhissa raajakumaarassa kokanado {kokanudo (ka0)} naama paasaado acirakaarito hoti, anajjhaavuttho sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa kenaci vaa manussabhuutena. atha kho bodhi raajakumaaro sa~njikaaputta.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, samma sa~ncikaaputta, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vanda; appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- `bodhi, bhante, raajakumaaro bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m ^a^M0.0266^ea^ lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m ^a^V0.0247^ea^ pucchatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `adhivaasetu kira, bhante ^a^T2.0047^ea^, bhagavaa bodhissa raajakumaarassa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa'''ti. ``eva.m bho''ti kho sa~ncikaaputto maa.navo bodhissa raajakumaarassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho sa~ncikaaputto maa.navo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bodhi kho raajakumaaro bhoto gotamassa paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati. eva~nca vadeti -- `adhivaasetu kira bhava.m gotamo bodhissa raajakumaarassa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa'''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho sa~ncikaaputto maa.navo bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena bodhi raajakumaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P2.0128^ea^ bodhi.m raajakumaara.m etadavoca -- ``avocumha kho maya.m bhoto vacanena ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m -- `bodhi kho raajakumaaro bhoto gotamassa paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati. eva~nca vadeti -- adhivaasetu kira bhava.m gotamo bodhissa raajakumaarassa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa'ti. adhivuttha~nca pana sama.nena gotamenaa''ti.

[03]atha kho bodhi raajakumaaro tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m ^a^T2.0048^ea^ khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa, kokanada~nca paasaada.m odaatehi dussehi santharaapetvaa yaava pacchimasopaanaka.levaraa, sa~ncikaaputta.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, samma sa~ncikaaputta, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocehi -- `kaalo, bhante ni.t.thita.m bhatta'''nti. ``eva.m bho''ti kho sa~ncikaaputto maa.navo bodhissa raajakumaarassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena bodhissa raajakumaarassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena bodhi raajakumaaro bahidvaarako.t.thake .thito hoti, bhagavanta.m aagamayamaano. addasaa kho bodhi raajakumaaro bhagavanta.m duuratova ^a^M0.0267^ea^ aagacchanta.m. disvaana tato paccuggantvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa purekkhatvaa yena kokanado paasaado tenupasa"nkami. atha kho bhagavaa pacchimasopaanaka.levara.m nissaaya a.t.thaasi. atha kho bodhi raajakumaaro bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``akkamatu, bhante, bhagavaa dussaani, akkamatu sugato dussaani, ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte ^a^V0.0248^ea^ bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho bodhi raajakumaaro bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``akkamatu, bhante, bhagavaa dussaani, akkamatu ^a^T2.0049^ea^ sugato dussaani, ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m apalokesi. atha kho aayasmaa aanando bodhi.m raajakumaara.m etadavoca -- ``sa.mharantu, raajakumaara, dussaani. na bhagavaa celapa.tika.m {celapattika.m (sii0)} akkamissati pacchima.m janata.m tathaagato anukampatii''ti.

[03]atha kho bodhi raajakumaaro dussaani sa.mharaapetvaa uparikokanade paasaade aasana.m pa~n~napesi. atha kho bhagavaa kokanada.m paasaada.m abhiruhitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho bodhi raajakumaaro buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa, bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m, ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho bodhi.m raajakumaara.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa ^a^P2.0129^ea^ samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, celapa.tikaa akkamitabbaa. yo akkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii apagatagabbhaa bhikkhuu nimantetvaa dussa.m pa~n~napetvaa etadavoca -- ``akkamatha, bhante ^a^T2.0050^ea^, dussa''nti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na akkamanti. ``akkamatha, bhante, dussa.m ma"ngalatthaayaa''ti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na akkami.msu. atha kho saa itthii ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyaa ma"ngalatthaaya yaaciyamaanaa celappa.tika.m na akkamissantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tassaa itthiyaa ujjhaayantiyaa khiyyantiyaa vipaacentiyaa. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^M0.0268^ea^ aarocesu.m. ``gihii, bhikkhave, ma"ngalikaa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gihiina.m ma"ngalatthaaya yaaciyamaanena celappa.tika.m akkamitu''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu dhotapaadaka.m akkamitu.m kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dhotapaadaka.m akkamitu''nti.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0249^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhaggesu yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa gha.taka~nca kataka~nca sammajjani~nca aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tigga.nhaatu me, bhante, bhagavaa gha.taka~nca kataka~nca sammajjani~nca, ya.m ^a^T2.0051^ea^ mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa gha.taka~nca sammajjani~nca. na bhagavaa kataka.m pa.tiggahesi. atha kho bhagavaa visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03]atha kho ^a^P2.0130^ea^ bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gha.taka~nca sammajjani~nca. na, bhikkhave, kataka.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tisso paadagha.msaniyo -- sakkhara.m, kathala.m, samuddaphe.naka''nti.

[03]atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa vidhuupana~nca taalava.n.ta~nca {taalava.n.da~nca (ka0)} aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tigga.nhaatu me, bhante, bhagavaa vidhuupana~nca taalava.n.ta~nca, ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa vidhuupana~nca taalava.n.ta~nca.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0269^ea^ kho bhagavaa visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi...pe0... padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m ^a^T2.0052^ea^ katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vidhuupana~nca taalava.n.ta~ncaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa makasabiijanii uppannaa hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, makasabiijani''nti. caamaribiijanii uppannaa hoti. bhagavato ^a^V0.0250^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, caamaribiijanii dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tisso biijaniyo -- vaakamaya.m, usiiramaya.m, morapi~nchamaya''nti.
[03] 270^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa chatta.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, chatta''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu chattappaggahitaa {chatta.m paggahetvaa (ka0)} aahi.n.danti. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro upaasako sambahulehi aajiivakasaavakehi saddhi.m uyyaana.m agamaasi. addasaasu.m kho te aajiivakasaavakaa chabbaggiye bhikkhuu duuratova chattappaggahite aagacchante. disvaana ta.m upaasaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``ete kho, ayyaa {ayyo (ka0)}, tumhaaka.m bhadantaa chattappaggahitaa aagacchanti, seyyathaapi ga.nakamahaamattaa''ti. ``naayyaa ete bhikkhuu, paribbaajakaa''ti. `bhikkhuu na bhikkhuu'ti abbhuta.m aka.msu. atha kho so upaasako upagate sa~njaanitvaa ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa chattappaggahitaa ^a^T2.0053^ea^ ^a^P2.0131^ea^ aahi.n.dissantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tassa upaasakassa ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa vipaacentassa. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, chatta.m dhaaretabba.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. tassa bhikkhuno vinaa chatta.m na phaasu hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa chatta.m dhaaretu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0270^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu -- gilaanasseva bhagavataa chatta.m anu~n~naata.m no agilaanassaati -- aaraame aaraamuupacaare chatta.m dhaaretu.m kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, agilaanenapi aaraame aaraamuupacaare chatta.m dhaaretu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu sikkaaya patta.m u.t.titvaa da.n.de aalaggitvaa vikaale a~n~natarena gaamadvaarena atikkamati. manussaa -- `esayyo coro gacchati, asissa vijjotalatii'ti anupatitvaa ^a^T2.0054^ea^ gahetvaa sa~njaanitvaa mu~nci.msu. atha kho so bhikkhu aaraama.m gantvaa ^a^V0.0251^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso, da.n.dasikka.m dhaaresii''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu da.n.dasikka.m dhaaressasii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, da.n.dasikkaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti, na sakkoti vinaa da.n.dena aahi.n.ditu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasammuti.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbaa. tena gilaanena bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m, bhante, gilaano; na sakkomi vinaa da.n.dena aahi.n.ditu.m. soha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m da.n.dasammuti.m yaacaamii'ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbaa. tatiyampi yaacitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ^a^P2.0132^ea^ ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu gilaano, na sakkoti ^a^T2.0055^ea^ vinaa da.n.dena aahi.n.ditu.m. so sa"ngha.m da.n.dasammuti.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasammuti.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu gilaano, na sakkoti vinaa da.n.dena aahi.n.ditu.m. so sa"ngha.m da.n.dasammuti.m yaacati. sa"ngho ^a^M0.0271^ea^ itthannaamassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasammuti.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasammutiyaa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinnaa sa"nghena itthannaamassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasammuti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti, na sakkoti vinaa sikkaaya patta.m pariharitu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa bhikkhuno sikkaasammuti.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbaa. tena gilaanena bhikkhunaa ^a^V0.0252^ea^ sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m, bhante, gilaano; na sakkomi vinaa sikkaaya patta.m pariharitu.m. soha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m sikkaasammuti.m yaacaamii'ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbaa. tatiyampi yaacitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu ^a^T2.0056^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu gilaano, na sakkoti vinaa sikkaaya patta.m pariharitu.m. so sa"ngha.m sikkaasammuti.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno sikkaasammuti.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu gilaano, na sakkoti vinaa sikkaaya patta.m pariharitu.m. so sa"ngha.m sikkaasammuti.m yaacati. sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno sikkaasammuti.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno sikkaasammutiyaa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinnaa sa"nghena itthannaamassa bhikkhuno sikkaasammuti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti, na sakkoti vinaa da.n.dena aahi.n.ditu.m, na sakkoti vinaa sikkaaya patta.m pariharitu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasikkaasammuti.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbaa ^a^M0.0272^ea^. tena gilaanena bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m, bhante, gilaano; na sakkomi vinaa da.n.dena aahi.n.ditu.m; na sakkomi vinaa sikkaaya patta.m pariharitu.m. soha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m da.n.dasikkaasammuti.m ^a^T2.0057^ea^ yaacaamii'ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbaa. tatiyampi yaacitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu gilaano, na sakkoti vinaa da.n.dena aahi.n.ditu.m, na sakkoti vinaa sikkaaya patta.m pariharitu.m. so sa"ngha.m da.n.dasikkaasammuti.m ^a^V0.0253^ea^ yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasikkaasammuti.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu gilaano na sakkoti vinaa da.n.dena aahi.n.ditu.m, na sakkoti vinaa sikkaaya patta.m pariharitu.m. so sa"ngha.m da.n.dasikkaasammuti.m yaacati. sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasikkaasammuti.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasikkaasammutiyaa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinnaa sa"nghena itthannaamassa bhikkhuno da.n.dasikkaasammuti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu romanthako {roma.t.thako (ka0)} hoti. so romanthitvaa romanthitvaa ajjhoharati. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``vikaalaaya.m {katha.m hi naama vikaalaaya.m(ka0)} bhikkhu bhojana.m bhu~njatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``eso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu acira.mgoyoniyaa ^a^T2.0058^ea^ cuto. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, romanthakassa romanthana.m. na ca, bhikkhave, bahimukhadvaara.m niiharitvaa ajjhoharitabba.m. yo ajjhohareyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0273^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa puugassa sa"nghabhatta.m hoti. bhattagge bahusitthaani pakiriyi.msu {vippakiriiyi.msu (sii0), parikiri.msu (syaa0)}. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa odane diyyamaane na sakkacca.m pa.tiggahessanti, ekameka.m sittha.m kammasatena ni.t.thaayatii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu ^a^P2.0133^ea^ tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ya.m diyyamaana.m patati, ta.m saama.m gahetvaa paribhu~njitu.m. pariccatta.m ta.m, bhikkhave, daayakehii''ti.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu diighehi nakhehi pi.n.daaya carati. a~n~nataraa itthii passitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``ehi, bhante, methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevaa''ti. ``ala.m, bhagini, neta.m kappatii''ti. ``sace kho tva.m, bhante, nappa.tisevissasi, idaanaaha.m attano nakhehi gattaani vilikhitvaa kuppa.m karissaami -- aya.m ma.m bhikkhu vippakarotii''ti. ``pajaanaahi ^a^V0.0254^ea^ tva.m, bhaginii''ti. atha kho saa itthii ^a^T2.0059^ea^ attano nakhehi gattaani vilikhitvaa kuppa.m akaasi -- aya.m ma.m bhikkhu vippakarotiiti. manussaa upadhaavitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m aggahesu.m. addasaasu.m kho te manussaa tassaa itthiyaa nakhe chavimpi lohitampi. disvaana -- imissaayeva itthiyaa ida.m kamma.m, akaarako bhikkhuuti -- ta.m bhikkhu.m mu~nci.msu. atha kho so bhikkhu aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso, diighe nakhe dhaaresii''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu diighe nakhe dhaaressasii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, diighaa nakhaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu nakhenapi nakha.m chindanti, mukhenapi nakha.m chindanti, ku.t.tepi gha.msanti. a"nguliyo dukkhaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, nakhacchedana''nti. salohita.m nakha.m chindanti. a"nguliyo dukkhaa honti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ma.msappamaa.nena nakha.m chinditu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0274^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu viisatima.t.tha.m {viisatima.t.ta.m (sii0)} kaaraapenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na ^a^T2.0060^ea^, bhikkhave, viisatima.t.tha.m kaaraapetabba.m. yo kaaraapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, malamatta.m apaka.d.dhitu''nti.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m kesaa diighaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``ussahanti pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu a~n~nama~n~na.m kese oropetu''nti? ``ussahanti bhagavaa''ti ^a^P2.0134^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa...pe0... bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, khura.m khurasila.m khurasipaa.tika.m namataka.m sabba.m khurabha.n.da''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu massu.m kappaapenti...pe0... massu.m va.d.dhaapenti... golomika.m kaaraapenti... caturassaka.m kaaraapenti... parimukha.m kaaraapenti... a.d.dhaduka.m {a.d.dhuraka.m (sii0), a.d.dharuka.m (syaa0)} kaaraapenti... daa.thika.m .thapenti... sambaadhe loma.m sa.mharaapenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave ^a^V0.0255^ea^, massu kappaapetabba.m...pe0... na massu va.d.dhaapetabba.m... na golomika.m kaaraapetabba.m... na caturassaka.m kaaraapetabba.m... na parimukha.m kaaraapetabba.m... na a.d.dhaduka.m kaaraapetabba.m... na daa.thikaa .thapetabbaa... na sambaadhe loma.m sa.mharaapetabba.m. yo sa.mharaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno sambaadhe va.no hoti. bhesajja.m na santi.t.thati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^T2.0061^ea^. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aabaadhappaccayaa sambaadhe loma.m sa.mharaapetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kattarikaaya kese chedaapenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, kattarikaaya kesaa chedaapetabbaa. yo chedaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0275^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno siise va.no hoti, na sakkoti khurena kese oropetu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aabaadhappaccayaa kattarikaaya kese chedaapetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu diighaani naasikaalomaani dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi pisaacillikaati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, diigha.m naasikaaloma.m dhaaretabba.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu sakkharikaayapi madhusitthakenapi naasikaaloma.m gaahaapenti. naasikaa dukkhaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa.n.daasa''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu palita.m gaahaapenti ^a^T2.0062^ea^. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, palita.m gaahaapetabba.m. yo gaahaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0256^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno ka.n.naguuthakehi ka.n.naa thakitaa honti ^a^P2.0135^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ka.n.namalahara.ni''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaavacaa ka.n.namalahara.niyo dhaarenti sova.n.namaya.m ruupiyamaya.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, uccaavacaa ka.n.namalahara.niyo dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.thimaya.m dantamaya.m visaa.namaya.m na.lamaya.m ve.lumaya.m ka.t.thamaya.m jatumaya.m phalamaya.m lohamaya.m sa"nkhanaabhimaya''nti.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bahu.m lohabha.n.da.m ka.msabha.n.da.m sannicaya.m karonti. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa bahu.m lohabha.n.da.m ka.msabha.n.da.m sannicaya.m karissanti ^a^T2.0063^ea^, seyyathaapi ^a^M0.0276^ea^ ka.msapattharikaa''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bahu.m lohabha.n.da.m ka.msabha.n.da.m sannicayo kaatabbo. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu a~njanimpi a~njanisalaakampi ka.n.namalahara.nimpi bandhanamattampi kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a~njani.m a~njanisalaaka.m ka.n.namalahara.ni.m bandhanamatta''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sa"nghaa.tipallatthikaaya nisiidanti. sa"nghaa.tiyaa pattaa lujjanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, sa"nghaa.tipallatthikaaya nisiiditabba.m. yo nisiideyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. tassa vinaa aayogena {aayogaa (sii0 syaa0)} na phaasu hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aayoga''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho aayogo kaatabbo''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tantaka.m vema.m kava.ta.m {vemaka.m va.t.ta.m (sii0), vemaka.m va.ta.m (syaa0)} salaaka.m sabba.m tantabha.n.daka''nti.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu akaayabandhano gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tassa rathikaaya antaravaasako pabhassittha. manussaa ukku.t.thimaka.msu ^a^T2.0064^ea^. so bhikkhu ma"nku ^a^V0.0257^ea^ ahosi ^a^P2.0136^ea^. atha kho so bhikkhu aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, akaayabandhanena gaamo pavisitabbo. yo paviseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kaayabandhana''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaavacaani kaayabandhanaani dhaarenti -- kalaabuka.m, de.d.dubhaka.m, muraja.m, maddavii.na.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, uccaavacaani kaayabandhanaani dhaaretabbaani -- kalaabuka.m, de.d.dubhaka.m, muraja.m, maddavii.na.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve kaayabandhanaani -- pa.t.tika.m, suukarantaka''nti. kaayabandhanassa dasaa ^a^M0.0277^ea^ jiiranti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, muraja.m maddavii.na''nti. kaayabandhanassa anto jiirati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sobha.na.m gu.naka''nti. kaayabandhanassa pavananto jiirati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vidha''nti {viithanti (sii0 syaa0)}.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaavace vidhe dhaarenti sova.n.namaya.m ruupiyamaya.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti ^a^T2.0065^ea^ vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, uccaavacaa vidhaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.thimaya.m...pe0... sa"nkhanaabhimaya.m suttamaya''nti.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa aanando lahukaa sa"nghaa.tiyo paarupitvaa gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. vaatama.n.dalikaaya sa"nghaa.tiyo ukkhipiyi.msu. atha kho aayasmaa aanando aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ga.n.thika.m paasaka''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaavacaa ga.n.thikaayo dhaarenti sova.n.namaya.m ruupiyamaya.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, uccaavacaa ga.n.thikaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.thimaya.m dantamaya.m visaa.namaya.m na.lamaya.m ve.lumaya.m ka.t.thamaya.m jatumaya.m phalamaya.m lohamaya.m sa"nkhanaabhimaya.m suttamaya''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ga.n.thikampi paasakampi ciivare ^a^T2.0066^ea^ appenti. ciivara.m jiirati ^a^V0.0258^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ga.n.thikaphalaka.m paasakaphalaka''nti. ga.n.thikaphalakampi ^a^P2.0137^ea^ paasakaphalakampi ante appenti. ko.t.to {ko.no (sii0 syaa0)} vivariyati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ga.n.thikaphalaka.m ante appetu.m; paasakaphalaka.m satta"ngula.m vaa a.t.tha"ngula.m vaa ogaahetvaa appetu''nti.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu gihinivattha.m nivaasenti -- hatthiso.n.daka.m, macchavaa.laka.m, catuka.n.naka.m, taalava.n.taka.m, satavalika.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti ^a^M0.0278^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, gihinivattha.m nivaasetabba.m -- hatthiso.n.daka.m, macchavaa.laka.m, catuka.n.naka.m, taalava.n.taka.m, satavalika.m. yo nivaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu gihipaaruta.m paarupanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, gihipaaruta.m paarupitabba.m. yo paarupeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sa.mvelliya.m nivaasenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi ^a^T2.0067^ea^ ra~n~no mu.n.dava.t.tiiti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, sa.mvelliya.m nivaasetabba.m. yo nivaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ubhatokaaja.m haranti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi ra~n~no mu.n.dava.t.tiiti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ubhatokaaja.m haritabba.m. yo hareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ekatokaaja.m antaraakaaja.m siisabhaara.m khandhabhaara.m ka.tibhaara.m olambaka''nti.
[03] 282^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu dantaka.t.tha.m na khaadanti. mukha.m duggandha.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]``pa~ncime ^a^V0.0259^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa dantaka.t.thassa akhaadane. acakkhussa.m, mukha.m duggandha.m hoti, rasahara.niyo na visujjhanti, pitta.m semha.m bhatta.m pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchaadeti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa dantaka.t.thassa akhaadane.

[03]``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa dantaka.t.thassa khaadane. cakkhussa.m, mukha.m na duggandha.m hoti, rasahara.niyo visujjhanti, pitta.m semha.m bhatta.m na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chaadeti ^a^P2.0138^ea^ -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa dantaka.t.thassa khaadane. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dantaka.t.tha''nti.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0068^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu diighaani dantaka.t.thaani khaadanti, teheva saama.nera.m aako.tenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na ^a^M0.0279^ea^, bhikkhave, diigha.m dantaka.t.tha.m khaaditabba.m. yo khaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngulaparama.m dantaka.t.tha.m, na ca tena saama.nero aako.tetabbo. yo aako.teyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno atima.taahaka.m dantaka.t.tha.m khaadantassa ka.n.the vilagga.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, atima.taahaka.m dantaka.t.tha.m khaaditabba.m. yo khaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, catura"ngulapacchima.m {catura"ngula.m pacchima.m (ka0)} dantaka.t.tha''nti.

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu daaya.m aalimpenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi dava.daahakaati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, daayo aalimpitabbo. yo aalimpeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena vihaaraa ti.nagahanaa honti, dava.daahe .dayhamaane vihaaraa .dayhanti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayanti pa.taggi.m ^a^T2.0069^ea^ daatu.m, paritta.m kaatu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dava.daahe .dayhamaane pa.taggi.m daatu.m, paritta.m kaatu''nti.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu rukkha.m abhiruhanti, rukkhaa rukkha.m sa"nkamanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi makka.taati. bhagavato ^a^V0.0260^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, rukkho abhiruhitabbo. yo abhiruheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno kosalesu janapade saavatthi.m gacchantassa antaraamagge hatthii pariyu.t.thaati. atha kho so bhikkhu rukkhamuula.m upadhaavitvaa kukkuccaayanto rukkha.m na abhiruhi. so hatthii a~n~nena agamaasi. atha kho so bhikkhu saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sati kara.niiye porisa.m rukkha.m abhiruhitu.m aapadaasu yaavadattha''nti.

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P2.0139^ea^ ^a^M0.0280^ea^ kho pana samayena yame.lakeku.taa naama {yame.lutekulaa naama (sii0), me.t.thakoku.t.thaa naama (syaa0)} bhikkhuu dve bhaatikaa honti braahma.najaatikaa kalyaa.navaacaa kalyaa.navaakkara.naa. te yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho ^a^T2.0070^ea^ te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``etarahi, bhante, bhikkhuu naanaanaamaa naanaagottaa naanaajaccaa naanaakulaa pabbajitaa. te sakaaya niruttiyaa buddhavacana.m duusenti. handa maya.m, bhante, buddhavacana.m chandaso aaropemaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, eva.m vakkhatha -- `handa maya.m, bhante, buddhavacana.m chandaso aaropemaa'ti. neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, buddhavacana.m chandaso aaropetabba.m. yo aaropeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sakaaya niruttiyaa buddhavacana.m pariyaapu.nitu''nti.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu lokaayata.m pariyaapu.nanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``api nu kho, bhikkhave, lokaayate saaradassaavii imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viru.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjeyyaa''ti? ``noheta.m bhante''. ``imasmi.m vaa pana dhammavinaye saaradassaavii lokaayata.m pariyaapu.neyyaa''ti? ``noheta.m bhante''. ``na, bhikkhave, lokaayata.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m. yo pariyaapu.neyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0071^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu lokaayata.m vaacenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti ^a^V0.0261^ea^ vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, lokaayata.m vaacetabba.m. yo vaaceyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu tiracchaanavijja.m pariyaapu.nanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti ^a^M0.0281^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, tiracchaanavijjaa pariyaapu.nitabbaa. yo pariyaapu.neyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu tiracchaanavijja.m vaacenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, tiracchaanavijjaa vaacetabbaa. yo vaaceyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana ^a^P2.0140^ea^ samayena bhagavaa mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desento khipi. bhikkhuu -- `jiivatu, bhante, bhagavaa; jiivatu sugato'ti -- uccaasadda.m mahaasadda.m aka.msu. tena saddena dhammakathaa antaraa ahosi. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``api nu kho, bhikkhave, khipite `jiivaa'ti vutto {vutte (ka0)} tappaccayaa jiiveyya vaa ^a^T2.0072^ea^ mareyya vaa''ti? ``noheta.m bhante''. ``na, bhikkhave, khipite `jiivaa'ti vattabbo. yo vadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena manussaa bhikkhuuna.m khipite `jiivatha bhante'ti vadanti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naalapanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa `jiivatha bhante'ti vuccamaanaa naalapissantii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``gihii, bhikkhave, ma"ngalikaa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gihiina.m `jiivatha bhante'ti vuccamaanena `cira.m jiivaa'ti vattu''nti.

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desento nisinno hoti. a~n~natarena bhikkhunaa lasu.na.m khaayita.m hoti. so -- maa bhikkhuu byaabaadhi.msuuti -- ekamanta.m nisiidi. addasaa kho bhagavaa ta.m bhikkhu.m ekamanta.m nisinna.m. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ekamanta.m nisinno''ti ^a^V0.0262^ea^? ``etena, bhante, bhikkhunaa lasu.na.m khaayita.m. so -- maa bhikkhuu byaabaadhi.msuuti -- ekamanta.m nisinno''ti. ``api nu kho, bhikkhave {bhikkhave bhikkhunaa (syaa0)}, ta.m khaaditabba.m, ya.m khaaditvaa evaruupaaya dhammakathaaya paribaahiyo assaa''ti? ``noheta.m bhante''. ``na, bhikkhave, lasu.na.m khaaditabba.m. yo khaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0073^ea^ ^a^M0.0282^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmato saariputtassa udaravaataabaadho hoti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``pubbe te, aavuso saariputta, udaravaataabaadho kena phaasu hotii''ti? ``lasu.nena me, aavuso''ti {atha kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca ``pubbe kho me aavuso moggallaana udaravaataabaadho lasu.nena phaasu hotii''ti (ka0)}. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aabaadhappaccayaa lasu.na.m khaaditu''nti.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu aaraame taha.m taha.m passaava.m karonti. aaraamo dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ekamanta.m passaava.m kaatu''nti ^a^P2.0141^ea^. aaraamo duggandho hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, passaavakumbhi''nti. dukkha.m nisinnaa passaava.m karonti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, passaavapaaduka''nti. passaavapaadukaa paaka.taa honti. bhikkhuu hiriyanti passaava.m kaatu.m...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parikkhipitu.m tayo paakaare -- i.t.thakaapaakaara.m, silaapaakaara.m, daarupaakaara''nti. passaavakumbhii apaarutaa duggandhaa hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, apidhaana''nti.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu aaraame taha.m taha.m vacca.m karonti. aaraamo dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami ^a^T2.0074^ea^, bhikkhave, ekamanta.m vacca.m kaatu''nti. aaraamo duggandho hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vaccakuupa''nti. vaccakuupassa kuula.m lujjati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. vaccakuupo niicavatthuko hoti, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti. ante nisinnaa vacca.m karontaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, santharitvaa majjhe chidda.m katvaa vacca.m kaatu''nti ^a^V0.0263^ea^. dukkha.m nisinnaa vacca.m karonti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vaccapaaduka''nti. bahiddhaa passaava.m ^a^M0.0283^ea^ karonti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, passaavado.nika''nti. avalekhanaka.t.tha.m na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, avalekhanaka.t.tha''nti. avalekhanapi.tharo na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, avalekhanapi.thara''nti. vaccakuupo apaaruto duggandho hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, apidhaana''nti. ajjhokaase vacca.m karontaa siitenapi u.nhenapi kilamanti...pe0... ^a^T2.0075^ea^ ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vaccaku.ti''nti. vaccaku.tiyaa kavaa.ta.m na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kavaa.ta.m pi.t.thasa"nghaa.ta.m udukkhalika.m uttarapaasaka.m agga.lava.t.ti.m kapisiisaka.m suucika.m gha.tika.m taa.lacchidda.m aavi~nchanacchidda.m aavi~nchanarajju''nti. vaccaku.tiyaa ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika.m ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu jaraadubbalo vacca.m katvaa vu.t.thahanto ^a^P2.0142^ea^ paripatati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, olambaka''nti. vaccaku.ti aparikkhittaa hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parikkhipitu.m tayo paakaare -- i.t.thakaapaakaara.m, silaapaakaara.m, daarupaakaara''nti. ko.t.thako na hoti...pe0... (``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ko.t.thaka''nti. ko.t.thakassa kavaa.ta.m na ^a^T2.0076^ea^ hoti) {(anujaanaami bhikkhave ko.t.thakanti. ko.t.thako niicavatthuko hoti...pe0... anujaanaami bhikkhave uccavatthuka.m kaatunti. cayo paripatati...pe0... anujaanaami bhikkhave cinitu.m tayo caye i.t.thakaacaya.m silaacaya.m daarucayanti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... anujaanaami bhikkhave tayo sopaane i.t.thakaasopaana.m silaasopaana.m daarusopaananti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... anujaanaami bhikkhave aalambanabaahanti. ko.t.thakassa kavaa.ta.m na hoti.) [03] 294^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0085^ea^ ^a^P2.0146^ea^ ^a^M0.0290^ea^ ^a^V0.0271^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m senaasana.m apa~n~natta.m hoti. te ca bhikkhuu taha.m taha.m viharanti -- ara~n~ne, rukkhamuule, pabbate, kandaraaya.m, giriguhaaya.m, susaane, vanapatthe, ajjhokaase, palaalapu~nje. te kaalasseva tato tato upanikkhamanti -- ara~n~naa rukkhamuulaa pabbataa kandaraa giriguhaa susaanaa vanapatthaa ajjhokaasaa palaalapu~njaa, paasaadikena abhikkantena pa.tikkantena, aalokitena vilokitena, sami~njitena pasaaritena, okkhittacakkhuu, iriyaapathasampannaa. tena kho pana samayena raajagahako se.t.thii {se.t.thi (ka0)} kaalasseva uyyaana.m agamaasi. addasaa kho raajagahako se.t.thii te bhikkhuu kaalasseva tato tato upanikkhamante -- ara~n~naa rukkhamuulaa pabbataa kandaraa giriguhaa susaanaa vanapatthaa ajjhokaasaa palaalapu~njaa, paasaadikena abhikkantena pa.tikkantena, aalokitena vilokitena, sami~njitena pasaaritena, okkhittacakkhuu, iriyaapathasampanne. disvaanassa citta.m pasiidi. atha kho raajagahako se.t.thii yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``sacaaha.m, bhante, vihaare kaaraapeyya.m, vaseyyaatha me vihaaresuu''ti? ``na kho, gahapati, bhagavataa vihaaraa ^a^T2.0086^ea^ anu~n~naataa''ti. ``tena hi, bhante, bhagavanta.m pa.tipucchitvaa mama aaroceyyaathaa''ti. ``eva.m gahapatii''ti kho te bhikkhuu raajagahakassa se.t.thissa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``raajagahako, bhante, se.t.thii vihaare kaaraapetukaamo. katha.m nu kho, bhante, amhehi {bhante (sii0 ka0)} pa.tipajjitabba''nti? atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane ^a^V0.0272^ea^ etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~nca le.naani {pa~nca senaasanaani (syaa0)} -- vihaara.m, a.d.dhayoga.m, paasaada.m, hammiya.m, guha''nti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0291^ea^ kho te ^a^P2.0147^ea^ bhikkhuu yena raajagahako se.t.thii tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa raajagahaka.m se.t.thi.m etadavocu.m -- ``anu~n~naataa kho, gahapati, bhagavataa vihaaraa; yassadaani kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajagahako se.t.thii ekaaheneva sa.t.thivihaare pati.t.thaapesi. atha kho raajagahako se.t.thii te sa.t.thivihaare pariyosaapetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajagahako se.t.thii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha ^a^T2.0087^ea^ kho raajagahako se.t.thii bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03]atha kho raajagahako se.t.thii tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena raajagahakassa se.t.thissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho raajagahako se.t.thii buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa, bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m, ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajagahako se.t.thii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ete me, bhante, sa.t.thivihaaraa pu~n~natthikena saggatthikena kaaraapitaa. kathaaha.m, bhante, tesu vihaaresu pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``tena hi tva.m, gahapati, te sa.t.thivihaare aagataanaagatassa caatuddisassa sa"nghassa pati.t.thaapehii''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho raajagahako se.t.thii bhagavato pa.tissutvaa te sa.t.thivihaare aagataanaagatassa caatuddisassa sa"nghassa pati.t.thaapesi.
