[21] ``siita.m u.nha.m pa.tihanti {pa.tihanati (ka0)}, tato vaa.lamigaani ca.
[22] sariisape ca makase, sisire caapi vu.t.thiyo..
[21] ``tato ^a^T2.0088^ea^ ^a^M0.0292^ea^ ^a^V0.0273^ea^ vaataatapo ghore, sa~njaato {vaataatape ghore, sa~njaate (ka0 saddaniiti)} pa.tiha~n~nati.
[22] le.nattha~nca sukhattha~nca, jhaayitu~nca vipassitu.m..
[21] ``vihaaradaana.m sa"nghassa, agga.m buddhena {buddhehi (syaa0)} va.n.nita.m.
[22] tasmaa hi pa.n.dito, poso sampassa.m atthamattano..
[21] ``vihaare kaaraye ramme, vaasayettha bahussute.
[21] tesa.m ^a^P2.0148^ea^ anna~nca paana~nca, vatthasenaasanaani ca.
[22] dadeyya ujubhuutesu, vippasannena cetasaa..
[21] ``te tassa dhamma.m desenti, sabbadukkhaapanuudana.m.
[22] ya.m so dhamma.m idha~n~naaya, parinibbaati anaasavo''ti..
[03]atha kho bhagavaa raajagahaka.m se.t.thi.m imaahi gaathaahi anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ assosu.m kho manussaa -- ``bhagavataa kira vihaaraa anu~n~naataa''ti sakkacca.m {te sakkacca.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} vihaare kaaraapenti. te vihaaraa akavaa.takaa honti; ahiipi vicchikaapi satapadiyopi pavisanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kavaa.ta''nti. bhittichidda.m karitvaa valliyaapi rajjuyaapi kavaa.ta.m bandhanti. unduurehipi upacikaahipi khajjanti. khayitabandhanaani kavaa.taani patanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pi.t.thasa"nghaa.ta.m udukkhalika.m uttarapaasaka''nti ^a^T2.0089^ea^. kavaa.taa na phusiiyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aavi~nchanacchidda.m aavi~nchanarajju''nti. kavaa.taa na thakiyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, agga.lava.t.ti.m kapisiisaka.m suucika.m gha.tika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu na sakkonti kavaa.ta.m apaapuritu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, taa.lacchidda.m. tii.ni taa.laani -- lohataa.la.m, ka.t.thataa.la.m, visaa.nataa.la''nti. yehi {yepi (sii0 syaa0)} te ugghaa.tetvaa pavisanti {visaa.nataa.la.m, yehi te ugghaa.tetvaa pavisantiiti (ka0)}, vihaaraa aguttaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yantaka.m suucika''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0293^ea^ ^a^V0.0274^ea^ kho pana samayena vihaaraa ti.nacchadanaa honti; siitakaale siitaa, u.nhakaale u.nhaa. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena vihaaraa avaatapaanakaa honti acakkhussaa duggandhaa. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tii.ni vaatapaanaani -- vedikaavaatapaana.m, jaalavaatapaana.m, salaakavaatapaana''nti. vaatapaanantarikaaya kaa.lakaapi vagguliyopi pavisanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vaatapaanacakkalika''nti. cakkalikantarikaayapi kaa.lakaapi vagguliyopi pavisanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vaatapaanakavaa.taka.m vaatapaanabhisika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu chamaaya.m sayanti. gattaanipi ^a^T2.0090^ea^ ciivaraanipi pa.msukitaani honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ti.nasanthaaraka''nti. ti.nasanthaarako unduurehipi ^a^P2.0149^ea^ upacikaahipi khajjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, mi.d.dhi''nti {mii.dhanti (sii0), mi.dhinti (syaa0)}. mi.d.dhiyaa gattaani dukkhaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bidalama~ncaka''nti.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa sosaaniko masaarako ma~nco uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, masaaraka.m ma~nca''nti. masaaraka.m pii.tha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, masaaraka.m pii.tha''nti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa sosaaniko bundikaabaddho ma~nco uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bundikaabaddha.m ma~nca''nti. bundikaabaddha.m pii.tha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bundikaabaddha.m pii.tha''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa sosaaniko ku.liirapaadako ma~nco uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0294^ea^, ku.liirapaadaka.m ^a^V0.0275^ea^ ma~nca''nti. ku.liirapaadaka.m pii.tha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0091^ea^, ku.liirapaadaka.m pii.tha''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa sosaaniko aahaccapaadako ma~nco uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m oraacesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca''nti. aahaccapaadaka.m pii.tha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aahaccapaadaka.m pii.tha''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa aasandiko uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aasandika''nti. uccako aasandiko uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccakampi aasandika''nti. satta"ngo uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, satta"nga''nti. uccako satta"ngo uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccakampi satta"nga''nti. bhaddapii.tha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhaddapii.tha''nti. pii.thikaa uppannaa hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pii.thika''nti. e.lakapaadaka.m pii.tha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, e.lakapaadaka.m pii.tha''nti. aamalakava.t.tika.m {aamalakava.n.tika.m (syaa0)} pii.tha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aamalakava.t.tika.m pii.tha''nti. phalaka.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, phalaka''nti. koccha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, koccha''nti. palaalapii.tha.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^T2.0092^ea^. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, palaalapii.tha''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ucce ma~nce sayanti. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ucce ma~nce sayitabba.m. yo sayeyya, aapatti ^a^P2.0150^ea^ dukka.tassaa''ti.
[03]tena ^a^M0.0295^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu niice ma~nce sayanto ahinaa da.t.tho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ma~ncapa.tipaadaka''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0276^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ucce ma~ncapa.tipaadake dhaarenti, saha ma~ncapa.tipaadakehi pavedhenti. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, uccaa ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngulaparama.m ma~ncapa.tipaadaka''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa sutta.m uppanna.m hoti ^a^T2.0093^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sutta.m ma~nca.m ve.thetu''nti {vetunti (sii0)}. a"ngaani bahusutta.m pariyaadiyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a"nge vijjhitvaa a.t.thapadaka.m ve.thetu''nti. co.laka.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cimilika.m kaatu''nti. tuulikaa uppannaa hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vija.tetvaa bibbohana.m {bimbohana.m (sii0 syaa0 bimba + ohana.m)} kaatu.m. tii.ni tuulaani -- rukkhatuula.m, lataatuula.m, po.takituula''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu addhakaayikaani {a.d.dhakaayikaani (ka0)} bibbohanaani dhaarenti. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, a.d.dhakaayikaani bibbohanaani dhaaretabbaani. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, siisappamaa.na.m bibbohana.m kaatu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena raajagahe giraggasamajjo hoti. manussaa mahaamattaana.m atthaaya bhisiyo pa.tiyaadenti -- u.n.nabhisi.m, co.labhisi.m, vaakabhisi.m, ti.nabhisi.m, pa.n.nabhisi.m. te viitivatte samajje chavi.m uppaa.tetvaa haranti. addasaasu.m kho bhikkhuu samajja.t.thaane bahu.m u.n.nampi co.lakampi vaakampi ti.nampi pa.n.nampi cha.t.tita.m. disvaana ^a^T2.0094^ea^ bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^M0.0296^ea^. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~nca bhisiyo -- u.n.nabhisi.m, co.labhisi.m, vaakabhisi.m, ti.nabhisi.m, pa.n.nabhisi''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa senaasanaparikkhaarika.m dussa.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhisi.m onandhitu''nti {onaddhitu.m (syaa0)}.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0277^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ma~ncabhisi.m pii.the santharanti, pii.thabhisi.m ma~nce santharanti. bhisiyo paribhijjanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, onaddhama~nca.m {onaddhama~nca.m (ka0) evamuparipi} onaddhapii.tha''nti. ulloka.m akaritvaa ^a^P2.0151^ea^ santharanti, he.t.thato nipatanti {nipa.tanti (ka0), nippha.tanti (sii0), nippaa.tenti (syaa0)} ...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ulloka.m karitvaa santharitvaa bhisi.m onandhitu''nti. chavi.m uppaa.tetvaa haranti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, phositu''nti. harantiyeva...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhattikamma''nti. harantiyeva...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, hatthabhattikamma''nti. harantiyeva...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, hatthabhatti''nti.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena titthiyaana.m seyyaayo setava.n.naa honti, kaa.lava.n.nakataa bhuumi, gerukaparikammakataa bhitti. bahuu manussaa seyyaapekkhakaa gacchanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vihaare setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma''nti ^a^T2.0095^ea^.

[03]tena kho pana samayena pharusaaya bhittiyaa setava.n.no na nipatati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, thusapi.n.da.m datvaa paa.nikaaya pa.tibaahetvaa setava.n.na.m nipaatetu''nti. setava.n.no anibandhaniiyo hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa.nhamattika.m datvaa paa.nikaaya pa.tibaahetvaa setava.n.na.m nipaatetu''nti. setava.n.no anibandhaniiyo hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ikkaasa.m pi.t.thamadda''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena pharusaaya bhittiyaa gerukaa na nipatati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, thusapi.n.da.m datvaa paa.nikaaya pa.tibaahetvaa geruka.m nipaatetu''nti. gerukaa anibandhaniiyaa hoti ^a^M0.0297^ea^ ...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ku.n.dakamattika.m datvaa paa.nikaaya pa.tibaahetvaa geruka.m nipaatetu''nti. gerukaa anibandhaniiyaa hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saasapaku.t.ta.m sitthatelaka''nti. accussanna.m hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, co.lakena paccuddharitu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena pharusaaya bhuumiyaa kaa.lava.n.no na nipatati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, thusapi.n.da.m datvaa paa.nikaaya pa.tibaahetvaa kaa.lava.n.na.m nipaatetu''nti. kaa.lava.n.no anibandhaniiyo hoti...pe0... ^a^T2.0096^ea^ ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ga.n.dumattika.m ^a^V0.0278^ea^ datvaa paa.nikaaya pa.tibaahetvaa kaa.lava.n.na.m nipaatetu''nti. kaa.lava.n.no anibandhaniiyo hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ikkaasa.m kasaava''nti.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu vihaare pa.tibhaanacitta.m kaaraapenti -- itthiruupaka.m purisaruupaka.m. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihii ^a^P2.0152^ea^ kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, pa.tibhaanacitta.m kaaraapetabba.m -- itthiruupaka.m purisaruupaka.m. yo kaaraapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika''nti.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena vihaaraa niicavatthukaa honti, udakena otthariyyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena vihaaraa aa.lakamandaa honti ^a^T2.0097^ea^. bhikkhuu hiriyanti nipajjitu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tirokara.ni''nti. tirokara.ni.m ukkhipitvaa olokenti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0298^ea^, a.d.dhaku.t.taka''nti. a.d.dhaku.t.takaa uparito olokenti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo gabbhe -- sivikaagabbha.m, naa.likaagabbha.m, hammiyagabbha''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu khuddake vihaare majjhe gabbha.m karonti. upacaaro na hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, khuddake vihaare ekamanta.m gabbha.m kaatu.m, mahallake majjhe''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena vihaarassa ku.t.tapaado jiirati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami ^a^V0.0279^ea^, bhikkhave, kula"nkapaadaka''nti {ku.lu"nkapaadakanti (sii0)}. vihaarassa ku.t.to ovassati...pe0...``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parittaa.naki.tika.m uddasudha''nti {uddhaasudhanti (syaa0)}.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno ti.nacchadanaa ahi khandhe patati. so bhiito vissaramakaasi. bhikkhuu upadhaavitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tva.m, aavuso, vissaramakaasii''ti? atha kho so bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vitaana''nti.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0098^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ma~ncapaadepi pii.thapaadepi thavikaayo laggenti. unduurehipi upacikaahipi khajjanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhittikhila.m naagadantaka''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ma~ncepi pii.thepi ciivara.m nikkhipanti. ciivara.m paribhijjiti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vihaare ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti ^a^P2.0153^ea^.

[03]tena kho pana samayena vihaaraa anaa.lindakaa honti appa.tissara.naa. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aa.linda.m paghana.m paku.t.ta.m {paku.d.da.m (sii0)} osaaraka''nti. aa.lindaa paaka.taa honti. bhikkhuu hiriyanti nipajjitu.m...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa.msara.naki.tika.m ugghaa.tanaki.tika''nti.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ajjhokaase bhattavissagga.m karontaa siitenapi u.nhenapi kilamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upa.t.thaanasaala''nti. upa.t.thaanasaalaa niicavatthukaa hoti ^a^M0.0299^ea^, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ^a^T2.0099^ea^ ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti. upa.t.thaanasaalaaya ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ^a^V0.0280^ea^ ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika.m ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ajjhokaase chamaaya ciivara.m pattharanti. ciivara.m pa.msukita.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ajjhokaase ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti. paaniiya.m otappati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paaniiyasaala.m paaniiyama.n.dapa''nti. paaniiyasaalaa niicavatthukaa hoti, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti. paaniiyasaalaaya ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika.m ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti. paaniiyabhaajana.m na sa.mvijjati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paaniiyasa"nkha.m paaniiyasaraavaka''nti.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0100^ea^ kho pana samayena vihaaraa aparikkhittaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parikkhipitu.m tayo paakaare -- i.t.thakaapaakaara.m, silaapaakaara.m, daarupaakaara''nti. ko.t.thako na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ko.t.thaka''nti. ko.t.thako niicavatthuko hoti, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. ko.t.thakassa kavaa.ta.m na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kavaa.ta.m pi.t.thasa"nghaa.ta.m udukkhalika.m uttarapaasaka.m agga.lava.t.ti.m kapisiisaka.m suucika.m gha.tika.m taa.lacchidda.m ^a^M0.0300^ea^ aavi~nchanacchidda.m aavi~nchanarajju''nti. ko.t.thake ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena parive.na.m cikkhalla.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, marumba.m upakiritu''nti. na pariyaapu.nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0154^ea^ ^a^V0.0281^ea^, padarasila.m nikkhipitu''nti. udaka.m santi.t.thati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakaniddhamana''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu parive.ne taha.m taha.m aggi.t.thaana.m karonti. parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ekamanta.m aggisaala.m kaatu''nti ^a^T2.0101^ea^. aggisaalaa niicavatthukaa hoti, udakena otthariyyati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uccavatthuka.m kaatu''nti. cayo paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cinitu.m tayo caye -- i.t.thakaacaya.m, silaacaya.m, daarucaya''nti. aarohantaa viha~n~nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tayo sopaane -- i.t.thakaasopaana.m, silaasopaana.m, daarusopaana''nti. aarohantaa paripatanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aalambanabaaha''nti. aggisaalaaya kavaa.ta.m na hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kavaa.ta.m pi.t.thasa"nghaa.ta.m udukkhalika.m uttarapaasaka.m agga.lava.t.ti.m kapisiisaka.m suucika.m gha.tika.m taa.lacchidda.m aavi~nchanacchidda.m aavi~nchanarajju''nti. aggisaalaaya ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika.m ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajju''nti.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aaraamo aparikkhitto hoti. ajakaapi pasukaapi uparope vihe.thenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parikkhipitu.m tayo vaa.te -- ve.luvaa.ta.m, ka.n.dakavaa.ta.m {va.te ve.luva.ta.m ka.n.dakava.ta.m (syaa0)}, parikha''nti. ko.t.thako na hoti. tatheva ajakaapi pasukaapi uparope vihe.thenti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ko.t.thaka.m apesi.m yamakakavaa.ta.m tora.na.m paligha''nti. ko.t.thake ti.nacu.n.na.m paripatati...pe0... ``anujaanaami ^a^M0.0301^ea^, bhikkhave, ogumphetvaa ullittaavalitta.m kaatu.m -- setava.n.na.m kaa.lava.n.na.m gerukaparikamma.m maalaakamma.m ^a^T2.0102^ea^ lataakamma.m makaradantaka.m pa~ncapa.tika''nti. aaraamo cikkhallo hoti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, marumba.m upakiritu''nti. na pariyaapu.nanti...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, padarasila.m nikkhipitu''nti. udaka.m santi.t.thati...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udakaniddhamana''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sa"nghassa atthaaya sudhaamattikaalepana.m paasaada.m kaaretukaamo hoti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho bhagavataa ^a^V0.0282^ea^ chadana.m anu~n~naata.m, ki.m ananu~n~naata''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~nca chadanaani -- i.t.thakaachadana.m, silaachadana.m, sudhaachadana.m, ti.nacchadana.m, pa.n.nacchadana''nti.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena anaathapi.n.diko gahapati raajagahakassa se.t.thissa bhaginipatiko hoti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati raajagaha.m agamaasi kenacideva kara.niiyena. tena kho pana samayena raajagahakena se.t.thinaa svaatanaaya buddhappamukho sa"ngho nimantito hoti. atha kho raajagahako se.t.thii daase ca kammakaare {kammakare (sii0 syaa0)} ca aa.naapesi -- ``tena hi, bha.ne, kaalasseva u.t.thaaya yaaguyo pacatha, bhattaani pacatha, suupaani sampaadetha, uttaribha"ngaani sampaadethaa''ti. atha kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa etadahosi -- ``pubbe khvaaya.m ^a^T2.0103^ea^ gahapati mayi aagate sabbakiccaani nikkhipitvaa mama~n~neva saddhi.m pa.tisammodati. sodaanaaya.m vikkhittaruupo daase ca kammakaare ca aa.naapesi -- `tena hi, bha.ne, kaalasseva u.t.thaaya yaaguyo pacatha, bhattaani pacatha, suupaani sampaadetha, uttaribha"ngaani ^a^P2.0155^ea^ sampaadethaa'ti. ki.m nu kho imassa gahapatissa aavaaho vaa bhavissati, vivaaho vaa bhavissati, mahaaya~n~no vaa paccupa.t.thito ^a^M0.0302^ea^, raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m balakaayenaa''ti?

[03]atha kho raajagahako se.t.thii daase ca kammakaare ca aa.naapetvaa yena anaathapi.n.diko gahapati tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa anaathapi.n.dikena gahapatinaa saddhi.m pa.tisammoditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho raajagahaka.m se.t.thi.m anaathapi.n.diko gahapati etadavoca -- ``pubbe kho tva.m, gahapati, mayi aagate sabbakiccaani nikkhipitvaa mama~n~neva saddhi.m pa.tisammodasi. sodaani tva.m vikkhittaruupo daase ca kammakaare ca aa.naapesi -- `tena hi, bha.ne, kaalasseva u.t.thaaya yaaguyo pacatha, bhattaani pacatha, suupaani sampaadetha, uttaribha"ngaani sampaadethaa'ti. ki.m nu kho te, gahapati, aavaaho vaa bhavissati, vivaaho vaa bhavissati, mahaaya~n~no vaa paccupa.t.thito, raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m ^a^V0.0283^ea^ balakaayenaa''ti? ``na me, gahapati, aavaaho ^a^T2.0104^ea^ vaa bhavissati, naapi vivaaho vaa bhavissati, naapi raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m balakaayena; api ca me mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito; svaatanaaya buddhappamukho sa"ngho nimantito''ti. ``buddhoti tva.m, gahapati, vadesii''ti? ``buddho tyaaha.m, gahapati, vadaamii''ti. ``buddhoti tva.m, gahapati, vadesii''ti? ``buddho tyaaha.m, gahapati, vadaamii''ti. ``buddhoti tva.m, gahapati, vadesii''ti? ``buddho tyaaha.m, gahapati, vadaamii''ti. ``ghosopi kho eso, gahapati, dullabho lokasmi.m yadida.m -- buddho buddhoti. sakkaa nu kho, gahapati, ima.m kaala.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti? ``akaalo kho, gahapati, ima.m kaala.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m. svedaani tva.m kaalena ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissasi arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati -- svedaanaaha.m kaalena ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaami arahanta.m sammaasambuddhanti -- buddhagataaya satiyaa nipajjitvaa rattiyaa suda.m tikkhattu.m vu.t.thaasi pabhaata.m ma~n~namaano.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ {sa.m0 ni0 1.242} atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena sivakadvaara.m {siivadvaara.m (sii0), siitavanadvaara.m (syaa0)} tenupasa"nkami. amanussaa dvaara.m vivari.msu. atha kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa ^a^M0.0303^ea^ nagaramhaa nikkhantassa aaloko antaradhaayi, andhakaaro ^a^T2.0105^ea^ paaturahosi, bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso ^a^P2.0156^ea^ udapaadi; tatova puna nivattitukaamo ahosi. atha kho sivako {siivako (sii0 syaa0)} yakkho antarahito saddamanussaavesi --
[21] ``sata.m hatthii sata.m assaa, sata.m assatariirathaa.
[21] sata.m ka~n~naasahassaani, aamukkama.niku.n.dalaa.
[22] ekassa padaviitihaarassa, kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m {so.lasinti (sii0 ka0)}..
[21] ``abhikkama gahapati abhikkama gahapati.
[22] abhikkanta.m te seyyo no pa.tikkanta''nti..

[03]atha kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa andhakaaro antaradhaayi, aaloko paaturahosi. ya.m ahosi bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso so pa.tippassambhi. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho...pe0... anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa aaloko antaradhaayi, andhakaaro paaturahosi, bhaya.m chambhitatta.m ^a^V0.0284^ea^ lomaha.mso udapaadi, tatova puna nivattitukaamo ahosi. tatiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussaavesi --
[21] ``sata.m hatthii sata.m assaa, sata.m assatariirathaa.
[21] sata.m ka~n~naasahassaani, aamukkama.niku.n.dalaa.
[22] ekassa padaviitihaarassa, kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m..
[21] ``abhikkama gahapati abhikkama gahapati,
[22] abhikkanta.m te seyyo no pa.tikkanta''nti..

[03]tatiyampi kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa andhakaaro antaradhaayi ^a^T2.0106^ea^, aaloko paaturahosi, ya.m ahosi bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso, so pa.tippassambhi. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena siitavana.m tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ajjhokaase ca"nkamati. addasaa kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana ca"nkamaa orohitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m ^a^M0.0304^ea^ etadavoca -- ``ehi sudattaa''ti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati -- naamena ma.m bhagavaa aalapatiiti -- ha.t.tho udaggo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kacci, bhante, bhagavaa sukha.m sayitthaa''ti?
[21] {sa.m0 ni0 1.242} ``sabbadaa ve sukha.m seti, braahma.no parinibbuto.
[22] yo na limpati kaamesu, siitibhuuto niruupadhi..
[21] ``sabbaa aasattiyo chetvaa, vineyya hadaye dara.m.
[22] upasanto sukha.m seti, santi.m pappuyya cetasaa''ti {cetasoti (sii0 syaa0)}..

[03]atha kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa anupubbi.m katha.m {aanupubbikatha.m (sii0)} kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m, kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa ^a^T2.0107^ea^ bhagavaa a~n~naasi anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi ^a^V0.0285^ea^ -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m ^a^P2.0157^ea^ apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m bhante, abhikkanta.m bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m. adhivaasetu ca me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03]atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. assosi ^a^T2.0108^ea^ kho ^a^M0.0305^ea^ raajagahako se.t.thii -- ``anaathapi.n.dikena kira gahapatinaa svaatanaaya buddhappamukho sa"ngho nimantito''ti.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ atha kho raajagahako se.t.thii anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``tayaa kira, gahapati, svaatanaaya buddhappamukho sa"ngho nimantito. tva~ncaasi aagantuko. demi te, gahapati, veyyaayika.m yena tva.m buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa bhatta.m kareyyaasii''ti. ``ala.m, gahapati atthi me veyyaayika.m yenaaha.m buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa bhatta.m karissaamii''ti.

[03]assosi kho raajagahako negamo -- ``anaathapi.n.dikena kira gahapatinaa svaatanaaya buddhappamukho sa"ngho nimantito''ti. atha kho raajagahako negamo anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``tayaa kira, gahapati, svaatanaaya buddhappamukho sa"ngho nimantito. tva~ncaasi aagantuko. demi te, gahapati, veyyaayika.m yena tva.m buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa bhatta.m kareyyaasii''ti. ``ala.m ayya; atthi me veyyaayika.m yenaaha.m buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa bhatta.m karissaamii''ti.

[03]assosi kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro -- ``anaathapi.n.dikena kira gahapatinaa svaatanaaya buddhappamukho sa"ngho nimantito''ti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro anaathapi.n.dika.m ^a^V0.0286^ea^ gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``tayaa kira, gahapati, svaatanaaya buddhappamukho sa"ngho nimantito. tva~ncaasi aagantuko. demi te, gahapati, veyyaayika.m yena tva.m buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa bhatta.m kareyyaasii''ti. ``ala.m ^a^T2.0109^ea^ deva; atthi me veyyaayika.m yenaaha.m buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa bhatta.m karissaamii''ti.

[03]atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati tassaa rattiyaa accayena raajagahakassa se.t.thissa nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa ^a^P2.0158^ea^ bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena raajagahakassa se.t.thissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa, bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m, ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^M0.0306^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa saavatthiya.m vassaavaasa.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. ``su~n~naagaare kho, gahapati, tathaagataa abhiramantii''ti. ``a~n~naata.m bhagavaa, a~n~naata.m sugataa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 307^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bahumitto hoti bahusahaayo aadeyyavaaco. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati raajagahe ta.m kara.niiya.m tiiretvaa yena saavatthi tena pakkaami. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati antaraamagge manusse aa.naapesi -- ``aaraame ^a^T2.0110^ea^, ayyaa, karotha, vihaare pati.t.thaapetha, daanaani pa.t.thapetha. buddho loke uppanno. so ca mayaa bhagavaa nimantito iminaa maggena aagacchissatii''ti. atha kho te manussaa anaathapi.n.dikena gahapatinaa uyyojitaa aaraame aka.msu, vihaare pati.t.thaapesu.m, daanaani pa.t.thapesu.m.

[03]atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati saavatthi.m gantvaa samantaa saavatthi.m anuvilokesi -- ``kattha nu kho bhagavaa vihareyya? ya.m assa gaamato neva atiduure na accaasanne, gamanaagamanasampanna.m, atthikaana.m atthikaana.m manussaana.m abhikkamaniiya.m, divaa appaaki.n.na.m, ratti.m appasadda.m, appanigghosa.m, vijanavaata.m, manussaraahasseyyaka.m, pa.tisallaanasaaruppa''nti.

[03]addasaa ^a^V0.0287^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati jetassa kumaarassa {raajakumaarassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} uyyaana.m -- gaamato neva atiduure na accaasanne, gamanaagamanasampanna.m, atthikaana.m atthikaana.m manussaana.m abhikkamaniiya.m, divaa appaaki.n.na.m, ratti.m appasadda.m, appanigghosa.m, vijanavaata.m, manussaraahasseyyaka.m, pa.tisallaanasaaruppa.m. disvaana yena jeto kumaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa jeta.m kumaara.m etadavoca -- ``dehi me, ayyaputta, uyyaana.m aaraama.m kaatu''nti {ketu.m (vajiirabuddhi.tiikaaya.m)}. ``adeyyo, gahapati, aaraamo api ko.tisantharenaa''ti. ``gahito, ayyaputta, aaraamo''ti. ``na, gahapati, gahito aaraamo''ti. gahito na gahitoti vohaarike mahaamatte pucchi.msu. mahaamattaa evamaaha.msu ^a^M0.0307^ea^ -- ``yato tayaa ^a^P2.0159^ea^, ayyaputta, aggho kato, gahito aaraamo''ti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko ^a^T2.0111^ea^ gahapati saka.tehi hira~n~na.m nibbaahaapetvaa jetavana.m ko.tisanthara.m santharaapesi. saki.m niiha.ta.m hira~n~na.m thokassa okaasassa ko.t.thakasaamantaa nappahoti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati manusse aa.naapesi -- ``gacchatha, bha.ne, hira~n~na.m aaharatha; ima.m okaasa.m santharissaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho jetassa kumaarassa etadahosi -- ``na kho ida.m oraka.m bhavissati, yathaaya.m gahapati taava bahu.m hira~n~na.m pariccajatii''ti. anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, gahapati; maa ta.m okaasa.m santharaapesi. dehi me eta.m okaasa.m. mameta.m daana.m bhavissatii''ti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati -- aya.m kho jeto kumaaro abhi~n~naato ~naatamanusso; mahatthiko kho pana evaruupaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m imasmi.m dhammavinaye pasaadoti -- ta.m okaasa.m jetassa kumaarassa paadaasi {adaasi (syaa0)}. atha kho jeto kumaaro tasmi.m okaase ko.t.thaka.m maapesi.

[03]atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati jetavane vihaare kaaraapesi, parive.naani kaaraapesi, ko.t.thake kaaraapesi, upa.t.thaanasaalaayo kaaraapesi, aggisaalaayo kaaraapesi, kappiyaku.tiyo kaaraapesi, vaccaku.tiyo kaaraapesi, ca"nkame kaaraapesi, ca"nkamanasaalaayo kaaraapesi, udapaane kaaraapesi, udapaanasaalaayo kaaraapesi, jantaaghare kaaraapesi, jantaagharasaalaayo kaaraapesi, pokkhara.niyo kaaraapesi, ma.n.dape ^a^T2.0112^ea^ kaaraapesi.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena vesaalii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena manussaa sakkacca.m navakamma.m ^a^V0.0288^ea^ karonti. yepi bhikkhuu navakamma.m adhi.t.thenti tepi sakkacca.m upa.t.thenti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena ^a^M0.0308^ea^. atha kho a~n~natarassa daliddassa tunnavaayassa etadahosi -- ``na kho ida.m oraka.m bhavissati, yathayime manussaa sakkacca.m navakamma.m karonti; ya.mnuunaahampi navakamma.m kareyya''nti. atha kho so daliddo tunnavaayo saama.m cikkhalla.m madditvaa i.t.thakaayo cinitvaa ku.t.ta.m u.t.thaapesi. tena akusalakena citaa va"nkaa bhitti paripati. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho so daliddo tunnavaayo saama.m cikkhalla.m madditvaa i.t.thakaayo cinitvaa ku.t.ta.m u.t.thaapesi. tena akusalakena citaa va"nkaa bhitti paripati. atha kho so daliddo tunnavaayo ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``ye imesa.m sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m ^a^P2.0160^ea^ denti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m, te ime ovadanti anusaasanti, tesa~nca navakamma.m adhi.t.thenti. aha.m ^a^T2.0113^ea^ panamhi daliddo. na ma.m koci ovadati vaa anusaasati vaa navakamma.m vaa adhi.t.thetii''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tassa daliddassa tunnavaayassa ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa vipaacentassa. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, navakamma.m daatu.m. navakammiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ussukka.m aapajjissati -- `kinti nu kho vihaaro khippa.m pariyosaana.m gaccheyyaa'ti; kha.n.da.m phulla.m pa.tisa"nkharissati. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabba.m. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo, yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03] 309^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa gahapatino vihaara.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno navakamma.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaamassa gahapatino vihaara.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno navakamma.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa gahapatino vihaara.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno navakammassa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinno sa"nghena itthannaamassa gahapatino vihaaro itthannaamassa bhikkhuno navakamma.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0309^ea^ kho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami ^a^V0.0289^ea^. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T2.0114^ea^ antevaasikaa bhikkhuu buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa purato purato gantvaa vihaare parigga.nhanti, seyyaayo parigga.nhanti -- ida.m amhaaka.m upajjhaayaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m aacariyaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa saariputto buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gantvaa vihaaresu pariggahitesu, seyyaasu pariggahitaasu, seyya.m alabhamaano a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi. atha kho bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ukkaasi. aayasmaapi saariputto ukkaasi. ``ko etthaa''ti? ``aha.m, bhagavaa, saariputto''ti. ``kissa tva.m, saariputta.m, idha nisinno''ti? atha kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaana.m ^a^P2.0161^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m antevaasikaa bhikkhuu buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa purato purato gantvaa vihaare parigga.nhanti, seyyaayo parigga.nhanti -- ida.m amhaaka.m upajjhaayaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m aacariyaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m bhavissatii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa purato purato gantvaa vihaare pariggahessanti, seyyaayo pariggahessanti -- ida.m amhaaka.m upajjhaayaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m aacariyaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m bhavissatiiti! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m ^a^T2.0115^ea^ vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ko, bhikkhave, arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti?

[03]ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, khattiyakulaa pabbajito so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, braahma.nakulaa pabbajito so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, gahapatikulaa pabbajito so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce ^a^M0.0310^ea^ bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, suttantiko so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, vinayadharo so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m ^a^V0.0290^ea^ aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, dhammakathiko so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhii so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, dutiyassa jhaanassa laabhii so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, tatiyassa jhaanassa laabhii so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, catutthassa jhaanassa laabhii so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, sotaapanno so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, sakadaagaamii...pe0... yo, bhagavaa, anaagaamii...pe0... yo, bhagavaa ^a^T2.0116^ea^, arahaa so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, tevijjo so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti. ekacce bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``yo, bhagavaa, cha.labhi~n~no so arahati aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da''nti.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, himavantapadese {himavantapasse (sii0 syaa0)} mahaanigrodho ahosi. ta.m tayo sahaayaa upanissaaya vihari.msu -- tittiro ca, makka.to ca, hatthinaago ca. te a~n~nama~n~na.m agaaravaa appatissaa asabhaagavuttikaa viharanti. atha kho, bhikkhave, tesa.m sahaayaana.m etadahosi -- `aho nuuna maya.m jaaneyyaama ya.m amhaaka.m jaatiyaa mahantatara.m ta.m maya.m sakkareyyaama garu.m kareyyaama maaneyyaama puujeyyaama, tassa ca maya.m ovaade ti.t.theyyaamaa'ti.

[03]``atha kho, bhikkhave, tittiro ca makka.to ca hatthinaaga.m pucchi.msu -- `tva.m, samma, ki.m poraa.na.m sarasii'ti? `yadaaha.m, sammaa, poto homi, ima.m nigrodha.m antaraa ^a^M0.0311^ea^ satthiina.m {antaraasatthika.m (sii0)} karitvaa atikkamaami, agga"nkuraka.m me udara.m chupati. imaaha.m, sammaa, poraa.na.m saraamii'ti.

[03]``atha kho, bhikkhave, tittiro ca hatthinaago ca makka.ta.m pucchi.msu -- `tva.m, samma, ki.m poraa.na.m sarasii'ti? `yadaaha.m, sammaa, chaapo homi, chamaaya.m nisiiditvaa imassa nigrodhassa agga"nkuraka.m khaadaami. imaaha.m, sammaa, poraa.na.m saraamii'ti.

[03]``atha ^a^T2.0117^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, makka.to ca hatthinaago ca tittira.m pucchi.msu -- `tva.m, samma, ki.m poraa.na.m sarasii'ti? `amukasmi.m, sammaa, okaase mahaanigrodho ahosi. tato aha.m phala.m bhakkhitvaa imasmi.m okaase vacca.m akaasi.m; tassaaya.m nigrodho jaato. tadaaha.m, sammaa, jaatiyaa mahantataro'ti ^a^P2.0162^ea^.

[03]``atha ^a^V0.0291^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, makka.to ca hatthinaago ca tittira.m etadavocu.m -- `tva.m, samma, amhaaka.m jaatiyaa mahantataro. ta.m maya.m sakkarissaama garu.m karissaama maanessaama puujessaama, tuyha~nca maya.m ovaade pati.t.thissaamaa'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, tittiro makka.ta~nca hatthinaaga~nca pa~ncasu siilesu samaadapesi, attanaa ca pa~ncasu siilesu samaadaaya vattati. te a~n~nama~n~na.m sagaaravaa sappatissaa sabhaagavuttikaa viharitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajji.msu. eva.m kho ta.m, bhikkhave, tittiriya.m naama brahmacariya.m ahosi.
[21] {jaa0 1.1.37} ``ye vu.d.dhamapacaayanti, naraa dhammassa kovidaa.
[22] di.t.the dhamme ca paasa.msaa, samparaaye ca suggatii''ti..

[03]``te hi naama, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagataa paa.naa a~n~nama~n~na.m sagaaravaa sappatissaa sabhaagavuttikaa viharissanti. idha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, sobhetha ya.m tumhe eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa a~n~nama~n~na.m agaaravaa appatissaa asabhaagavuttikaa vihareyyaatha? neta.m, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0118^ea^, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yathaavu.d.dha.m abhivaadana.m, paccu.t.thaana.m, a~njalikamma.m, saamiicikamma.m, aggaasana.m, aggodaka.m, aggapi.n.da.m. na ca, bhikkhave, sa"nghika.m yathaavu.d.dha.m pa.tibaahitabba.m. yo pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ``dasayime ^a^M0.0312^ea^, bhikkhave, avandiyaa -- pure upasampannena pacchaa upasampanno avandiyo, anupasampanno avandiyo, naanaasa.mvaasako vu.d.dhataro adhammavaadii avandiyo, maatugaamo avandiyo, pa.n.dako avandiyo, paarivaasiko avandiyo, muulaayapa.tikassanaaraho avandiyo, maanattaaraho avandiyo, maanattacaariko avandiyo, abbhaanaaraho avandiyo. ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa avandiyaa.

[03]``tayome, bhikkhave, vandiyaa -- pacchaa upasampannena pure upasampanno vandiyo, naanaasa.mvaasako vu.d.dhataro dhammavaadii vandiyo, sadevake bhikkhave loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho vandiyo. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo vandiyaa''ti.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0292^ea^ kho pana samayena manussaa sa"ngha.m uddissa ma.n.dape pa.tiyaadenti, santhare pa.tiyaadenti, okaase pa.tiyaadenti. chabbaggiyaana.m ^a^P2.0163^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m antevaasikaa bhikkhuu -- `sa"nghika~n~neva bhagavataa yathaavu.d.dha.m anu~n~naata.m ^a^T2.0119^ea^, no uddissakata'nti buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa purato purato gantvaa ma.n.dapepi parigga.nhanti, santharepi parigga.nhanti, okaasepi parigga.nhanti -- ida.m amhaaka.m upajjhaayaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m aacariyaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m bhavissatiiti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gantvaa ma.n.dapesu pariggahitesu, santharesu pariggahitesu, okaasesu pariggahitesu, okaasa.m alabhamaano a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi. atha kho bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ukkaasi. aayasmaapi saariputto ukkaasi. ``ko etthaa''ti? ``aha.m, bhagavaa, saariputto''ti. ``kissa tva.m, saariputta, idha nisinno''ti? atha kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m antevaasikaa bhikkhuu -- `sa"nghika~n~neva bhagavataa yathaavu.d.dha.m anu~n~naata.m, no uddissakata'nti buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa purato purato gantvaa ^a^M0.0313^ea^ ma.n.dape parigga.nhanti, santhare parigga.nhanti, okaase parigga.nhanti -- ida.m amhaaka.m upajjhaayaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m aacariyaana.m bhavissati, ida.m amhaaka.m bhavissatii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, uddissakatampi yathaavu.d.dha.m pa.tibaahetabba.m. yo ^a^T2.0120^ea^ pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena manussaa bhattagge antaraghare uccaasayanamahaasayanaani pa~n~napenti, seyyathida.m -- aasandi.m, palla"nka.m, gonaka.m, cittaka.m, pa.tika.m, pa.talika.m, tuulika.m, vikatika.m, uddalomi.m, ekantalomi.m, ka.t.tissa.m, koseyya.m {koseyya.m kambala.m (sii0 syaa0)}, kuttaka.m, hatthatthara.m, assatthara.m, rathatthara.m, ajinapave.ni.m, kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.na.m, sauttaracchada.m, ubhatolohitakuupadhaana.m. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naabhinisiidanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, .thapetvaa tii.ni -- aasandi.m, palla"nka.m, tuulika.m -- gihivikata.m {gihivika.ta.m (sii0 ka0), avasesa.m gihivika.ta.m (syaa0)} abhinisiiditu.m, natveva abhinipajjitu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena manussaa bhattagge antaraghare tuulonaddha.m ma~ncampi pii.thampi pa~n~napenti ^a^V0.0293^ea^. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naabhinisiidanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gihivikata.m abhinisiiditu.m, natveva abhinipajjitu''nti.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati ^a^P2.0164^ea^ jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavanta.m ^a^T2.0121^ea^ etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m ^a^M0.0314^ea^ abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa, bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m, ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kathaaha.m, bhante, jetavane pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``tena hi tva.m, gahapati, jetavana.m aagataanaagatassa caatuddisassa sa"nghassa pati.t.thapehii''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavato pa.tissutvaa jetavana.m aagataanaagatassa caatuddisassa sa"nghassa pati.t.thaapesi.
[03]atha kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m imaahi gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] ``siita.m u.nha.m pa.tihanti, tato vaa.lamigaani ca.
[22] sariisape ^a^T2.0122^ea^ ca makase, sisire caapi vu.t.thiyo..
[21] ``tato vaataatapo ghoro, sa~njaato pa.tiha~n~nati.
[22] le.nattha~nca sukhattha~nca, jhaayitu~nca vipassitu.m..
[21] ``vihaaradaana.m ^a^V0.0294^ea^ sa"nghassa, agga.m buddhena va.n.nita.m.
[22] tasmaa hi pa.n.dito poso, sampassa.m atthamattano..
[21] ``vihaare kaaraye ramme, vaasayettha bahussute.
[21] tesa.m anna~nca paana~nca, vatthasenaasanaani ca.
[22] dadeyya ujubhuutesu, vippasannena cetasaa..
[21] ``te tassa dhamma.m desenti, sabbadukkhaapanuudana.m.
[22] ya.m so dhamma.m idha~n~naaya, parinibbaati anaasavo''ti..
[03]atha ^a^P2.0165^ea^ kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m imaahi gaathaahi anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0315^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa aajiivakasaavakassa mahaamattassa sa"nghabhatta.m hoti. aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto pacchaa aagantvaa vippakatabhojana.m aanantarika.m bhikkhu.m vu.t.thaapesi. bhattagga.m kolaahala.m ahosi. atha kho so mahaamatto ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa pacchaa aagantvaa vippakatabhojana.m aanantarika.m bhikkhu.m vu.t.thaapessanti! bhattagga.m kolaahala.m ahosi. nanu naama labbhaa a~n~natraapi nisinnena yaavadattha.m ^a^T2.0123^ea^ bhu~njitu''nti? assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tassa mahaamattassa ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa vipaacentassa. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto pacchaa aagantvaa vippakatabhojana.m aanantarika.m bhikkhu.m vu.t.thaapessati! bhattagga.m kolaahala.m ahosii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``sacca.m kira tva.m, upananda, pacchaa aagantvaa vippakatabhojana.m aanantarika.m bhikkhu.m vu.t.thaapesi, bhattagga.m kolaahala.m ahosii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, pacchaa aagantvaa vippakatabhojana.m aanantarika.m bhikkhu.m vu.t.thaapessasi? bhattagga.m kolaahala.m ahosi. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, vippakatabhojano {bhojano aanantariko (syaa0)} bhikkhu vu.t.thaapetabbo. yo vu.t.thaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. sace vu.t.thaapeti, pavaarito ca hoti, `gaccha udaka.m aaharaa'ti vattabbo. eva~nceta.m ^a^V0.0295^ea^ labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, saadhuka.m sitthaani gilitvaa vu.d.dhatarassa bhikkhuno aasana.m daatabba.m. na tvevaaha.m, bhikkhave, kenaci pariyaayena vu.d.dhatarassa bhikkhuno aasana.m pa.tibaahitabbanti vadaami. yo pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati''.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0124^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu gilaane bhikkhuu vu.t.thaapenti. gilaanaa eva.m vadenti -- ``na maya.m, aavuso, sakkoma vu.t.thaatu.m, gilaanaamhaa''ti. ``maya.m aayasmante vu.t.thaapessaamaa''ti pariggahetvaa vu.t.thaapetvaa .thitake mu~ncanti. gilaanaa mucchitaa papatanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^M0.0316^ea^. ``na, bhikkhave, gilaano vu.t.thaapetabbo. yo vu.t.thaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ^a^P2.0166^ea^ `gilaanaa mayamhaa avu.t.thaapaniiyaa'ti varaseyyaayo palibuddhenti {palibundhanti (ka0)}. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa patiruupa.m seyya.m daatu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu lesakappena senaasana.m pa.tibaahanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, lesakappena senaasana.m pa.tibaahitabba.m. yo pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] {paaci0 122} tena kho pana samayena sattarasavaggiyaa bhikkhuu a~n~natara.m paccantima.m mahaavihaara.m pa.tisa"nkharonti -- `idha maya.m vassa.m vasissaamaa'ti. addasa.msu {addasaasu.m (ka0)} kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sattarasavaggiye bhikkhuu vihaara.m {a~n~natara.m vihaara.m (ka0)} pa.tisa"nkharonte. disvaana evamaaha.msu -- ``ime, aavuso, sattarasavaggiyaa bhikkhuu vihaara.m pa.tisa"nkharonti. handa ne vu.t.thaapessaamaa''ti. ekacce ^a^T2.0125^ea^ evamaaha.msu -- ``aagamethaavuso, yaava pa.tisa"nkharonti, pa.tisa"nkhate vu.t.thaapessaamaa''ti. atha kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sattarasavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``u.t.thethaavuso, amhaaka.m vihaaro paapu.naatii''ti. ``nanu, aavuso, pa.tikacceva aacikkhitabba.m? maya~nca~n~na.m pa.tisa"nkhareyyaamaa''ti. ``nanu, aavuso, sa"nghiko vihaaro''ti? ``aamaavuso, sa"nghiko vihaaro''ti. ``u.t.thethaavuso, amhaaka.m vihaaro paapu.naatii''ti. ``mahallako, aavuso, vihaaro; tumhepi vasatha, mayampi vasissaamaa''ti. ``u.t.thethaavuso, amhaaka.m vihaaro paapu.naatii''ti kupitaa anattamanaa giivaaya.m gahetvaa nikka.d.dhanti. te nikka.d.dhiyamaanaa rodanti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``kissa tumhe, aavuso, rodathaa''ti? ``ime, aavuso, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kupitaa ^a^V0.0296^ea^ anattamanaa amhe sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dhantii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kupitaa anattamanaa bhikkhuu sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dhissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, tumhe bhikkhave, kupitaa anattamanaa sa"nghikaa vihaaraa bhikkhuu nikka.d.dhathaa''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, kupitena ^a^T2.0126^ea^ ^a^M0.0317^ea^ anattamanena bhikkhu sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dhitabbo. yo nikka.d.dheyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, senaasana.m gaahetu''nti.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- `kena nu kho senaasana.m gaahetabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^P2.0167^ea^...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m senaasanaggaahaapaka.m sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, gahitaagahita~nca jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo --
[03]``pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo, yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m senaasanaggaahaapaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m senaasanaggaahaapaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno senaasanaggaahaapakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu senaasanaggaahaapako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti ^a^T2.0127^ea^.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ atha kho senaasanaggaahaapakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho senaasana.m gaahetabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m bhikkhuu ga.netu.m ^a^V0.0297^ea^, bhikkhuu ga.netvaa seyyaa ga.netu.m, seyyaa ga.netvaa seyyaggena gaahetu''nti. seyyaggena gaahentaa seyyaa ussaarayi.msu...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vihaaraggena gaahetu''nti. vihaaraggena gaahentaa vihaaraa ussaarayi.msu...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parive.naggena gaahetu''nti. parive.naggena gaahentaa parive.naa ussaarayi.msu...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, anubhaagampi daatu.m. gahite anubhaage a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati, na akaamaa daatabbo''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0318^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu nissiime .thitassa senaasana.m gaahenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, nissiime .thitassa senaasana.m gaahetabba.m. yo gaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu senaasana.m gahetvaa sabbakaala.m pa.tibaahanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, senaasana.m gahetvaa sabbakaala.m pa.tibaahetabba.m. yo pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vassaana.m temaasa.m ^a^T2.0128^ea^ pa.tibaahitu.m, utukaala.m pana na pa.tibaahitu''nti.

[03]atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kati nu kho senaasanaggaahaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``tayo me, bhikkhave, senaasanaggaahaa -- purimako, pacchimako, antaraamuttako. aparajjugataaya aasaa.lhiyaa purimako gaahetabbo. maasagataaya aasaa.lhiyaa pacchimako gaahetabbo. aparajjugataaya pavaara.naaya aayati.m vassaavaasatthaaya antaraamuttako gaahetabbo. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo senaasanaggaahaa''ti.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P2.0168^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto saavatthiya.m senaasana.m gahetvaa a~n~natara.m gaamakaavaasa.m agamaasi. tatthapi senaasana.m aggahesi. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m, aavuso, aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto bha.n.danakaarako kalahakaarako vivaadakaarako bhassakaarako sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarako. sacaaya.m idha vassa.m vasissati, sabbeva maya.m na phaasu bhavissaama. handa na.m pucchaamaa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m ^a^V0.0298^ea^ upananda.m sakyaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``nanu tayaa, aavuso upananda, saavatthiya.m senaasana.m gahita''nti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso upananda, eko dve pa.tibaahasii''ti? ``idhadaanaaha.m aavuso, mu~ncaami; tattha ga.nhaamii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti ^a^T2.0129^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto ^a^M0.0319^ea^ eko dve pa.tibaahessatii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, upananda, eko dve pa.tibaahasii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, eko dve pa.tibaahissasi? tattha tayaa, moghapurisa, gahita.m idha mutta.m, idha tayaa gahita.m tatra mutta.m. eva.m kho tva.m, moghapurisa, ubhayattha paribaahiro. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, ekena dve pa.tibaahetabbaa. yo pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ {paaci0 438} tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m anekapariyaayena vinayakatha.m katheti, vinayassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, vinayapariyattiyaa va.n.na.m bhaasati, aadissa aadissa aayasmato upaalissa va.n.na.m bhaasati. bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavaa kho anekapariyaayena vinayakatha.m katheti, vinayassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, vinayapariyattiyaa va.n.na.m bhaasati, aadissa aadissa aayasmato upaalissa va.n.na.m bhaasati. handa maya.m, aavuso, aayasmato upaalissa santike vinaya.m pariyaapu.naamaa''ti. tedha {te ca (syaa0 ka0)} bahuu bhikkhuu theraa ca navaa ca majjhimaa ca aayasmato upaalissa ^a^T2.0130^ea^ santike vinaya.m pariyaapu.nanti. aayasmaa upaali .thitakova uddisati theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m gaaravena. theraapi bhikkhuu .thitakaava uddisaapenti dhammagaaravena. tattha theraa ceva bhikkhuu kilamanti, aayasmaa ca upaali kilamati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, navakena bhikkhunaa ^a^P2.0169^ea^ uddisantena samake vaa aasane nisiiditu.m, uccatare vaa dhammagaaravena; therena bhikkhunaa uddisaapentena samake vaa aasane nisiiditu.m, niicatare vaa dhammagaaravenaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bahuu bhikkhuu aayasmato upaalissa santike .thitakaa uddesa.m pa.timaanentaa kilamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, samaanaasanikehi saha nisiiditu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kittaavataa nu kho samaanaasaniko hotii''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tivassantarena saha nisiiditu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0320^ea^ ^a^V0.0299^ea^ kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu samaanaasanikaa ma~nce {ekama~nce (syaa0)} nisiiditvaa ma~nca.m bhindi.msu, pii.the {ekapii.the (syaa0)} nisiiditvaa pii.tha.m bhindi.msu. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tivaggassa ^a^T2.0131^ea^ ma~nca.m, tivaggassa pii.tha''nti. tivaggopi ma~nce nisiiditvaa ma~nca.m bhindi, pii.the nisiiditvaa pii.tha.m bhindi...pe0... ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, duvaggassa ma~nca.m, duvaggassa pii.tha''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu asamaanaasanikehi saha diighaasane nisiiditu.m kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, .thapetvaa pa.n.daka.m, maatugaama.m, ubhatobya~njanaka.m, asamaanaasanikehi saha diighaasane nisiiditu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kittaka.m pacchima.m nu kho diighaasana.m hotii''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ya.m ti.n.na.m pahoti, ettaka.m pacchima.m diighaasana''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena visaakhaa migaaramaataa sa"nghassa atthaaya saa.linda.m paasaada.m kaaraapetukaamaa hoti hatthinakhaka.m. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho bhagavataa paasaadaparibhogo anu~n~naato ki.m ananu~n~naato''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sabba.m paasaadaparibhoga''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa ayyikaa kaala"nkataa hoti. tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya sa"nghassa bahu.m akappiyabha.n.da.m uppanna.m hoti, seyyathida.m -- aasandi, palla"nko, gonako ^a^T2.0132^ea^, cittako, pa.tikaa, pa.talikaa, tuulikaa, vikatikaa, uddalomii, ekantalomii, ka.t.tissa.m, koseyya.m, kuttaka.m, hatthatthara.m, assatthara.m, rathatthara.m, ajinappave.ni, kadalimigappavarapaccatthara.na.m, sauttaracchada.m, ubhatolohitakuupadhaana.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aasandiyaa paade chinditvaa ^a^P2.0170^ea^ paribhu~njitu.m, palla"nkassa vaa.le bhinditvaa paribhu~njitu.m, tuulika.m vija.tetvaa bibbohana.m kaatu.m, avasesa.m bhuumatthara.na.m {summatthara.na.m (sii0 syaa0)} kaatu''nti.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0321^ea^ kho pana samayena saavatthiyaa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m gaamakaavaase aavaasikaa bhikkhuu upaddutaa honti aagantukagamikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m senaasana.m pa~n~napentaa. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho maya.m, aavuso, upaddutaa aagantukagamikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m senaasana.m pa~n~napentaa. handa maya.m, aavuso, sabba.m sa"nghika.m senaasana.m ekassa dema. tassa ^a^V0.0300^ea^ santaka.m paribhu~njissaamaa''ti. te sabba.m sa"nghika.m senaasana.m ekassa ada.msu. aagantukaa bhikkhuu te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso, senaasana.m pa~n~naapethaa''ti. ``natthaavuso, sa"nghika.m senaasana.m; sabba.m amhehi ekassa dinna''nti. ``ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso, sa"nghika.m senaasana.m vissajjethaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu sa"nghika.m senaasana.m vissajjessantii''ti {vissajjissantiiti (ka0)}! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^T2.0133^ea^ aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sa"nghika.m senaasana.m vissajjentii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa sa"nghika.m senaasana.m vissajjessanti? neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03]``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, avissajjiyaani, na vissajjetabbaani {na vissajjitabbaani (ka0)}, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vissajjitaanipi avissajjitaani honti. yo vissajjeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa. katamaani pa~nca? aaraamo, aaraamavatthu -- ida.m pa.thama.m avissajjiya.m, na vissajjetabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vissajjitampi avissajjita.m hoti. yo vissajjeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa.
[03]``vihaaro, vihaaravatthu -- ida.m dutiya.m avissajjiya.m, na vissajjetabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggallena vaa. vissajjitampi avissajjita.m hoti. yo vissajjeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa.

[03]``ma~nco, pii.tha.m, bhisi, bibbohana.m -- ida.m tatiya.m avissajjiya.m, na vissajjetabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vissajjitampi avissajjita.m hoti. yo vissajjeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa.

[03]``lohakumbhii ^a^M0.0322^ea^, lohabhaa.naka.m, lohavaarako, lohaka.taaha.m, vaasi, parasu {pharasu (sii0 syaa0 ka0)}, ku.thaarii {kudhaarii (ka0)}, kudaalo, nikhaadana.m -- ida.m catuttha.m avissajjiya.m, na vissajjetabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vissajjitampi avissajjita.m hoti. yo vissajjeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa.

[03]``valli, ve.lu, mu~nja.m, pabbaja.m ^a^T2.0134^ea^ {babbaja.m (sii0)}, ti.na.m, mattikaa, daarubha.n.da.m, mattikaabha.n.da.m -- ida.m pa~ncama.m ^a^V0.0301^ea^ avissajjiya.m, na vissajjetabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vissajjitampi avissajjita.m hoti. yo vissajjeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca avissajjiyaani, na vissajjetabbaani, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vissajjitaanipi avissajjitaani honti. yo vissajjeyya, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa ^a^P2.0171^ea^ yena kii.taagiri tena caarika.m pakkaami mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi saariputtamoggallaanehi ca. assosu.m kho assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu -- ``bhagavaa kira kii.taagiri.m aagacchati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi saariputtamoggallaanehi ca''. ``handa maya.m, aavuso, sabba.m sa"nghika.m senaasana.m bhaajema. paapicchaa saariputtamoggallaanaa, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa; na maya.m tesa.m senaasana.m pa~n~napessaamaa''ti, te sabba.m sa"nghika.m senaasana.m bhaajesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena kii.taagiri tadavasari. atha kho bhagavaa sambahule bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``gacchatha tumhe, bhikkhave; assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadetha -- `bhagavaa, aavuso, aagacchati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi saariputtamoggallaanehi ca. bhagavato ca, aavuso, senaasana.m pa~n~napetha, bhikkhusa"nghassa ca, saariputtamoggallaanaana~ncaa'''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``bhagavaa, aavuso, aagacchati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi saariputtamoggallaanehi ca ^a^T2.0135^ea^. bhagavato ca, aavuso, senaasana.m ^a^M0.0323^ea^ pa~n~napetha, bhikkhusa"nghassa ca, saariputtamoggallaanaana~ncaa''ti. ``natthaavuso, sa"nghika.m senaasana.m. sabba.m amhehi bhaajita.m. svaagata.m, aavuso, bhagavato. yasmi.m vihaare bhagavaa icchissati tasmi.m vihaare vasissati. paapicchaa saariputtamoggallaanaa, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa. na maya.m tesa.m senaasana.m pa~n~napessaamaa''ti. ``ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso, sa"nghika.m senaasana.m bhaajitthaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu sa"nghika.m senaasana.m bhaajessantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama ^a^V0.0302^ea^ te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa sa"nghika.m senaasana.m bhaajessanti? neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03]``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, avebha"ngiyaani {avebha"ngikaani (ka0)}, na vibhajitabbaani, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena ^a^T2.0136^ea^ vaa. vibhattaanipi avibhattaani honti. yo vibhajeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa. katamaani pa~nca? aaraamo, aaraamavatthu -- ida.m pa.thama.m avebha"ngiya.m, na vibhajitabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vibhattampi avibhatta.m hoti. yo vibhajeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa.
[03]``vihaaro, vihaaravatthu -- ida.m dutiya.m avebha"ngiya.m, na vibhajitabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vibhattampi avibhatta.m hoti. yo vibhajeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa.

[03]``ma~nco, pii.tha.m, bhisi, bibbohana.m -- ida.m tatiya.m avebha"ngiya.m, na vibhajitabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vibhattampi avibhatta.m hoti. yo vibhajeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa.

[03]``lohakumbhii, lohabhaa.naka.m, lohavaarako, lohaka.taaha.m, vaasii, parasu, ku.thaarii, kudaalo, nikhaadana.m -- ida.m catuttha.m avebha"ngiya.m, na vibhajitabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vibhattampi avibhatta.m hoti. yo vibhajeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa.

[03]``vallii, ve.lu, mu~nja.m, pabbaja.m, ti.na.m, mattikaa, daarubha.n.da.m, mattikaabha.n.da.m -- ida.m pa~ncama.m avebha"ngiya.m, na vibhajitabba.m, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vibhattampi ^a^M0.0324^ea^ avibhatta.m hoti. yo vibhajeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca avebha"ngiyaani, na vibhajitabbaani, sa"nghena vaa ga.nena vaa puggalena vaa. vibhattaanipi avibhattaani honti. yo vibhajeyya, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0137^ea^ ^a^P2.0172^ea^ kho bhagavaa kii.taagirismi.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena aa.lavii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena aa.lavii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye. tena kho pana samayena aa.lavakaa {aa.lavikaa (syaa0 ka0)} bhikkhuu evaruupaani navakammaani ^a^V0.0303^ea^ denti -- pi.n.danikkhepanamattenapi navakamma.m denti; ku.t.talepanamattenapi navakamma.m denti; dvaara.t.thapanamattenapi navakamma.m denti; agga.lava.t.tikara.namattenapi navakamma.m denti; aalokasandhikara.namattenapi navakamma.m denti; setava.n.nakara.namattenapi navakamma.m denti; kaa.lava.n.nakara.namattenapi navakamma.m denti; gerukaparikammakara.namattenapi navakamma.m denti; chaadanamattenapi navakamma.m denti; bandhanamattenapi navakamma.m denti; bha.n.dikaa.t.thapanamattenapi navakamma.m denti; kha.n.daphullapa.tisa"nkhara.namattenapi navakamma.m denti; paribha.n.dakara.namattenapi navakamma.m denti; viisativassikampi navakamma.m denti; ti.msavassikampi navakamma.m denti; yaavajiivikampi navakamma.m denti; dhuumakaalikampi pariyosita.m vihaara.m navakamma.m denti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aa.lavakaa bhikkhuu evaruupaani navakammaani dassanti -- pi.n.danikkhepanamattenapi navakamma.m dassanti; ku.t.talepanamattenapi... dvaara.t.thapanamattenapi ^a^T2.0138^ea^... agga.lava.t.tikara.namattenapi... aalokasandhikara.namattenapi... setava.n.nakara.namattenapi... kaa.lava.n.nakara.namattenapi... gerukaparikammakara.namattenapi... chaadenamattenapi... bandhanamattenapi... bha.n.dikaa.lapanamattenapi... kha.n.daphullapa.tisa"nkhara.namattenapi... paribha.n.dakara.namattenapi... visativassikampi... ti.msavassikampi... yaavajiivikampi... dhuumakaalikampi pariyosita.m vihaara.m navakamma.m dassantii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, pi.n.danikkhepanamattena navakamma.m daatabba.m; na ku.t.talepanamattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na ^a^M0.0325^ea^ dvaara.t.thapanamattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na agga.lava.t.tikara.namattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na aalokasandhikara.namattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na setava.n.nakara.namattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na kaa.lava.n.nakara.namattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na gerukaparikammakara.namattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na chaadenamattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na bandhanamattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na bha.n.dikaa.lapanamattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na kha.n.daphullapa.tisa"nkhara.namattena navakamma.m daatabba.m. na paribha.n.dakara.namattena ^a^T2.0139^ea^ navakamma.m daatabba.m. na visativassika.m navakamma.m daatabba.m. na ti.msavassika.m navakamma.m daatabba.m. na yaavajiivika.m navakamma.m daatabba.m. na dhuumakaalikampi pariyosita.m vihaara.m navakamma.m daatabba.m. yo dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, akata.m vaa vippakata.m vaa navakamma.m daatu.m, khuddake vihaare kamma.m oloketvaa chappa~ncavassika.m navakamma.m daatu.m, a.d.dhayoge kamma.m oloketvaa satta.t.thavassika.m navakamma.m daatu.m, mahallake vihaare paasaade vaa kamma.m oloketvaa dasadvaadasavassika.m navakamma.m daatu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0304^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu sabbe vihaare navakamma.m denti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, sabbe vihaare navakamma.m daatabba.m. yo dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ekassa dve denti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ekassa dve daatabbaa. yo dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu navakamma.m gahetvaa a~n~na.m vaasenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, navakamma.m ^a^P2.0173^ea^ gahetvaa a~n~no vaasetabbo. yo vaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu navakamma.m gahetvaa sa"nghika.m ^a^T2.0140^ea^ pa.tibaahenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, navakamma.m gahetvaa sa"nghika.m pa.tibaahitabba.m. yo pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, eka.m varaseyya.m gahetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu nissiime .thitassa navakamma.m denti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, nissiime .thitassa navakamma.m daatabba.m. yo dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0326^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu navakamma.m gahetvaa sabbakaala.m pa.tibaahanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, navakamma.m gahetvaa sabbakaala.m pa.tibaahitabba.m. yo pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vassaana.m temaasa.m pa.tibaahitu.m, utukaala.m pana na pa.tibaahitu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu navakamma.m gahetvaa pakkamantipi, vibbhamantipi, kaalampi karonti; saama.neraapi pa.tijaananti; sikkha.m paccakkhaatakaapi pa.tijaananti; antimavatthu.m ajjhaapannakaapi pa.tijaananti; ummattakaapi pa.tijaananti; khittacittaapi pa.tijaananti; vedanaa.t.taapi pa.tijaananti; aapattiyaa adassane ukkhittakaapi pa.tijaananti; aapattiyaa appa.tikamme ukkhittakaapi pa.tijaananti; paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa appa.tinissagge ukkhittakaapi pa.tijaananti; pa.n.dakaapi pa.tijaananti; theyyasa.mvaasakaapi pa.tijaananti; titthiyapakkantakaapi ^a^V0.0305^ea^

[03] pa.tijaananti; tiracchaanagataapi pa.tijaananti; maatughaatakaapi pa.tijaananti; pitughaatakaapi pa.tijaananti ^a^T2.0141^ea^; arahantaghaatakaapi pa.tijaananti; bhikkhuniduusakaapi pa.tijaananti; sa"nghabhedakaapi pa.tijaananti; lohituppaadakaapi pa.tijaananti; ubhatobya~njanakaapi pa.tijaananti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.
[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakamma.m gahetvaa pakkamati -- maa sa"nghassa haayiiti a~n~nassa daatabba.m.

[03]``idha ^a^M0.0327^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakamma.m gahetvaa vippakate pakkamati -- maa sa"nghassa haayiiti a~n~nassa daatabba.m.
[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakamma.m gahetvaa vippakate vibbhamati...pe0... ubhatobya~njanako pa.tijaanaati -- maa sa"nghassa haayiiti ^a^T2.0142^ea^ a~n~nassa daatabba.m.
