[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakamma.m gahetvaa pariyosite vibbhamati...pe0... kaala"nkaroti, saama.nero pa.tijaanaati, sikkha.m paccakkhaatako pa.tijaanaati, antimavatthu.m ajjhaapannako pa.tijaanaati -- sa"ngho saamii.

[03]``idha ^a^V0.0306^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakamma.m gahetvaa pariyosite ummattako pa.tijaanaati, khittacitto pa.tijaanaati, vedanaa.t.to pa.tijaanaati, aapattiyaa adassane ukkhittako pa.tijaanaati, aapattiyaa appa.tikamme ukkhittako pa.tijaanaati, paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa appa.tinissagge ^a^P2.0174^ea^ ukkhittako pa.tijaanaati -- tasseveta.m.

[03]``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakamma.m gahetvaa pariyosite pa.n.dako pa.tijaanaati, theyyasa.mvaasako pa.tijaanaati, titthiyapakkantako pa.tijaanaati, tiracchaanagato pa.tijaanaati, maatughaatako pa.tijaanaati, pitughaatako pa.tijaanaati, arahantaghaatako pa.tijaanaati, bhikkhuniiduusako pa.tijaanaati, sa"nghabhedako pa.tijaanaati, lohituppaadako pa.tijaanaati, ubhatobya~njanako pa.tijaanaati -- sa"ngho saamii''ti.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ {paaraa0 157} tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu a~n~natarassa upaasakassa vihaaraparibhoga.m senaasana.m a~n~natra paribhu~njanti. atha kho so upaasako ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa a~n~natra ^a^T2.0143^ea^ paribhoga.m a~n~natra paribhu~njissantii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, a~n~natra paribhogo a~n~natra paribhu~njitabbo. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] {paaraa0 157} tena ^a^M0.0328^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu uposathaggampi sannisajjampi haritu.m kukkuccaayantaa chamaaya nisiidanti. gattaanipi ciivaraanipi pa.msukitaani honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, taavakaalika.m haritu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa mahaavihaaro undriyati. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa senaasana.m naatiharanti {naabhiharanti (ka0)}. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, guttatthaaya haritu''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa senaasanaparikkhaariko mahaggho kambalo uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, phaatikammatthaaya parivattetu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0307^ea^ kho pana samayena sa"nghassa senaasanaparikkhaarika.m mahaggha.m dussa.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, phaatikammatthaaya parivattetu''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa acchacamma.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paadapu~nchani.m kaatu''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa cakkalika.m uppanna.m hoti ^a^T2.0144^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paadapu~nchani.m kaatu''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa co.laka.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paadapu~nchani.m kaatu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu adhotehi paadehi senaasana.m akkamanti. senaasana.m dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, adhotehi paadehi senaasana.m akkamitabba.m. yo akkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu allehi paadehi senaasana.m akkamanti. senaasana.m dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^P2.0175^ea^. ``na, bhikkhave, allehi paadehi senaasana.m akkamitabba.m. yo akkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0329^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu saupaahanaa senaasana.m akkamanti. senaasana.m dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, saupaahanena senaasana.m akkamitabba.m. yo akkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu parikammakataaya bhuumiyaa ni.t.thubhanti. va.n.no dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na ^a^T2.0145^ea^, bhikkhave, parikammakataaya bhuumiyaa ni.t.thubhitabba.m. yo ni.t.thubheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, khe.lamallaka''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena ma~ncapaadaapi pii.thapaadaapi parikammakata.m bhuumi.m vilikhanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, co.lakena palive.thetu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0308^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu parikammakata.m bhitti.m apassenti. va.n.no dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, parikammakataa bhitti apassetabbaa. yo apasseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, apassenaphalaka''nti. apassenaphalaka.m he.t.thato bhuumi.m vilikhati, uparito bhitti~nca. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, he.t.thato ca uparito ca co.lakena palive.thetu''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu dhotapaadakaa nipajjitu.m kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paccattharitvaa nipajjitu''nti.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aa.laviya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena raajagaha.m tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena ^a^T2.0146^ea^ kho pana samayena raajagaha.m dubbhikkha.m hoti. manussaa na sakkonti sa"nghabhatta.m kaatu.m; icchanti uddesabhatta.m nimantana.m salaakabhatta.m pakkhika.m uposathika.m paa.tipadika.m kaatu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghabhatta.m uddesabhatta.m nimantana.m salaakabhatta.m pakkhika.m uposathika.m paa.tipadika''nti.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0330^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu attano varabhattaani gahetvaa laamakaani bhattaani bhikkhuuna.m denti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m bhattuddesaka.m ^a^P2.0176^ea^ sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, uddi.t.thaanuddi.t.tha~nca jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo, yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m bhattuddesaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m bhattuddesaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato ^a^V0.0309^ea^ khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno bhattuddesakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu bhattuddesako. khamati ^a^T2.0147^ea^ sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]atha kho bhattuddesakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho bhatta.m uddisitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, salaakaaya vaa pa.t.tikaaya vaa {pa.tikaaya vaa (syaa0)} upanibandhitvaa opu~njitvaa bhatta.m uddisitu''nti.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa senaasanapa~n~naapako na hoti...pe0... bha.n.daagaariko na hoti...pe0... ciivarappa.tiggaahako na hoti...pe0... ciivarabhaajako na hoti...pe0... yaagubhaajako na hoti...pe0... phalabhaajako na hoti...pe0... khajjakabhaajako na hoti. khajjaka.m abhaajiyamaana.m nassati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m khajjakabhaajaka.m sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya ^a^M0.0331^ea^, bhaajitaabhaajita~nca jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo, yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m khajjakabhaajaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m khajjakabhaajaka.m sammannati ^a^T2.0148^ea^. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno khajjakabhaajakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu khajjakabhaajako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0310^ea^ kho pana samayena sa"nghassa bha.n.daagaare appamattako parikkhaaro uppanno {ussanno (syaa0)} hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m ^a^P2.0177^ea^ bhikkhu.m appamattakavissajjaka.m sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, vissajjitaavissajjita~nca jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo, yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m appamattakavissajjaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m appamattakavissajjaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno appamattakavissajjakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu appamattakavissajjako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii ^a^T2.0149^ea^, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0332^ea^ appamattakavissajjakena bhikkhunaa ekaa {ekekaa (sii0)} suuci daatabbaa, satthaka.m daatabba.m, upaahanaa daatabbaa, kaayabandhana.m daatabba.m, a.msabandhako daatabbo, parissaavana.m daatabba.m, dhammakara.no daatabbo, kusi daatabbaa, a.d.dhakusi daatabbaa, ma.n.dala.m daatabba.m, a.d.dhama.n.dala.m daatabba.m, anuvaato daatabbo, paribha.n.da.m daatabba.m. sace hoti sa"nghassa sappi vaa tela.m vaa madhu vaa phaa.nita.m vaa, saki.m pa.tisaayitu.m daatabba.m. sace punapi attho hoti, punapi daatabba.m.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa saa.tiyaggaahaapako na hoti...pe0... pattaggaahaapako na hoti...pe0... aaraamikapesako na hoti...pe0... saama.nerapesako na hoti. saama.neraa apesiyamaanaa kamma.m na karonti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m saama.nerapesaka.m sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, pesitaapesita~nca ^a^V0.0311^ea^ jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo, yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ^a^T2.0150^ea^ itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m saama.nerapesaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m saama.nerapesaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno saama.nerapesakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu saama.nerapesako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0155^ea^ ^a^P2.0180^ea^ ^a^M0.0336^ea^ ^a^V0.0316^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa anupiyaaya.m viharati, anupiya.m naama mallaana.m nigamo. tena kho pana samayena abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa sakyakumaaraa bhagavanta.m pabbajita.m anupabbajanti. tena kho pana samayena mahaanaamo ca sakko anuruddho ca sakko dvebhaatikaa honti. anuruddho sakko sukhumaalo hoti. tassa tayo paasaadaa honti -- eko hemantiko, eko gimhiko, eko vassiko. so vassike paasaade cattaaro maase {vassike paasaade vassike cattaaro maase (sii0)} nippurisehi tuuriyehi paricaarayamaano {paricaariyamaano (ka0)} na he.t.thaapaasaada.m orohati. atha kho mahaanaamassa sakkassa etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa sakyakumaaraa bhagavanta.m pabbajita.m anupabbajanti. amhaaka~nca pana kulaa natthi koci agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. ya.mnuunaaha.m vaa pabbajeyya.m, anuruddho vaa''ti. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena anuruddho sakko tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa anuruddha.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``etarahi, taata anuruddha, abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa sakyakumaaraa bhagavanta.m pabbajita.m anupabbajanti. amhaaka~nca pana kulaa natthi koci agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. tena ^a^T2.0156^ea^ hi tva.m vaa pabbaja, aha.m vaa pabbajissaamii''ti. ``aha.m kho sukhumaalo, naaha.m sakkomi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. tva.m pabbajaahii''ti. ``ehi kho te, taata anuruddha, gharaavaasattha.m anusaasissaami. pa.thama.m khetta.m kasaapetabba.m. kasaapetvaa vapaapetabba.m. vapaapetvaa udaka.m abhinetabba.m. udaka.m abhinetvaa udaka.m ninnetabba.m. udaka.m ninnetvaa niddhaapetabba.m. niddhaapetvaa {ni.d.dahetabba.m, ni.d.dahetvaa (sii0)} lavaapetabba.m. lavaapetvaa ubbaahaapetabba.m. ubbaahaapetvaa pu~nja.m kaaraapetabba.m. pu~nja.m kaaraapetvaa maddaapetabba.m. maddaapetvaa palaalaani uddharaapetabbaani. palaalaani uddharaapetvaa ^a^P2.0181^ea^ bhusikaa uddharaapetabbaa. bhusika.m uddharaapetvaa opunaapetabba.m {ophunaapetabba.m (syaa0 ka0), ophu.naapetabba.m (yojanaa)}. opunaapetvaa atiharaapetabba.m. atiharaapetvaa ^a^M0.0337^ea^ ^a^V0.0317^ea^ aayatimpi vassa.m evameva kaatabba.m, aayatimpi vassa.m evameva kaatabba''nti. ``na kammaa khiiyanti? na kammaana.m anto pa~n~naayati? kadaa kammaa khiiyissanti? kadaa kammaana.m anto pa~n~naayissati? kadaa maya.m appossukkaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaaressaamaa''ti? ``na hi, taata anuruddha, kammaa khiiyanti. na kammaana.m anto pa~n~naayati. akhii.neva kamme pitaro ca pitaamahaa ca ^a^T2.0157^ea^ kaala"nkataa''ti. ``tena hi tva~n~neva gharaavaasatthena upajaanaahi. aha.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamii''ti.

[03]atha kho anuruddho sakko yena maataa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa maatara.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, amma, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. anujaanaahi ma.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte anuruddhassa sakkassa maataa anuruddha.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``tumhe kho me, taata anuruddha, dve puttaa piyaa manaapaa appa.tikuulaa. mara.nenapi vo akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaami. ki.m panaaha.m tumhe jiivante anujaanissaami agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti? dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho anuruddho sakko maatara.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, amma, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. anujaanaahi ma.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti {imassa anantara.m kesuci potthakesu evampi paa.tho dissati --- ``eva.m vutte anuruddhassa sakkassa maataa evamaaha `sace taata anuruddha bhaddiyo sakyaraajaa sakyaana.m rajja.m kaareti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, eva.m tvampi pabbajaahii'''ti}. tena kho pana samayena bhaddiyo sakyaraajaa sakyaana.m rajja.m kaareti. so ca anuruddhassa sakkassa sahaayo hoti. atha kho anuruddhassa sakkassa maataa -- `aya.m kho bhaddiyo sakyaraajaa sakyaana.m rajja.m kaareti; anuruddhassa sakkassa sahaayo; so na ussahati agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu'nti -- anuruddha.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``sace, taata anuruddha, bhaddiyo sakyaraajaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, eva.m tvampi pabbajaahii''ti. atha kho anuruddho sakko yena ^a^T2.0158^ea^ bhaddiyo sakyaraajaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhaddiya.m sakyaraajaana.m etadavoca -- ``mama kho, samma, pabbajjaa tava pa.tibaddhaa''ti. ``sace te, samma, pabbajjaa mama pa.tibaddhaa vaa appa.tibaddhaa vaa saa hotu, aha.m tayaa; yathaa sukha.m pabbajaahii''ti. ``ehi, samma, ubho agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamaa''ti. ``naaha.m, samma, sakkomi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitunti ^a^P2.0182^ea^. ya.m te sakkaa a~n~na.m mayaa ^a^M0.0338^ea^ kaatu.m, kyaaha.m {tyaaha.m (sii0 syaa0)} karissaami. tva.m pabbajaahii''ti. ``maataa kho ma.m, samma, evamaaha -- `sace, taata anuruddha, bhaddiyo sakyaraajaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, eva.m tvampi pabbajaahii'''ti. ``bhaasitaa kho pana te, samma, esaa vaacaa. sace te, samma, pabbajjaa mama pa.tibaddhaa vaa, appa.tibaddhaa vaa saa hotu, aha.m tayaa; yathaa sukha.m pabbajaahii''ti. ``ehi, samma, ubho agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0318^ea^ kho pana samayena manussaa saccavaadino honti, saccapa.ti~n~naa. atha kho bhaddiyo sakyaraajaa anuruddha.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``aagamehi, samma, sattavassaani. sattanna.m vassaana.m accayena ubho agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamaa''ti. ``aticira.m, samma, sattavassaani. naaha.m sakkomi sattavassaani aagametu''nti. ``aagamehi, samma, chavassaani...pe0... pa~ncavassaani... cattaari vassaani... tii.ni vassaani... dve vassaani... eka.m vassa.m. ekassa vassassa ^a^T2.0159^ea^ accayena ubho agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamaa''ti. ``aticira.m, samma, ekavassa.m. naaha.m sakkomi eka.m vassa.m aagametu''nti. ``aagamehi, samma, sattamaase. sattanna.m maasaana.m accayena ubhopi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamaa''ti. ``aticira.m, samma, sattamaasaa. naaha.m sakkomi sattamaase aagametu''nti. ``aagamehi, samma, cha maase...pe0... pa~nca maase... cattaaro maase... tayo maase... dve maase... eka.m maasa.m... a.d.dhamaasa.m. a.d.dhamaasassa accayena ubhopi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamaa''ti. ``aticira.m, samma, a.d.dhamaaso. naaha.m sakkomi a.d.dhamaasa.m aagametu''nti. ``aagamehi, samma, sattaaha.m yaavaaha.m putte ca bhaataro ca rajja.m niyyaademii''ti. ``na cira.m, samma, sattaaho, aagamessaamii''ti.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhaddiyo ca sakyaraajaa anuruddho ca aanando ca bhagu ca kimilo ca devadatto ca, upaalikappakena sattamaa, yathaa pure catura"nginiyaa senaaya uyyaanabhuumi.m niyyanti, evameva catura"nginiyaa senaaya niyyi.msu. te duura.m gantvaa sena.m nivattaapetvaa paravisaya.m okkamitvaa aabhara.na.m omu~ncitvaa uttaraasa"ngena bha.n.dika.m bandhitvaa upaali.m kappaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``handa, bha.ne upaali, nivattassu; ala.m te ettaka.m jiivikaayaa''ti. atha kho upaalissa kappakassa nivattantassa etadahosi -- ``ca.n.daa ^a^T2.0160^ea^ kho saakiyaa; iminaa kumaaraa nippaatitaati ghaataapeyyumpi ma.m. ime ^a^M0.0339^ea^ hi naama sakyakumaaraa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissanti. kima"nga {kima"nga (sii0)} panaaha''nti. bha.n.dika.m mu~ncitvaa ta.m bha.n.da.m rukkhe aalaggetvaa `yo passati, dinna.myeva haratuu'ti ^a^P2.0183^ea^ vatvaa yena te sakyakumaaraa tenupasa"nkami. addasaasu.m kho te sakyakumaaraa upaali.m kappaka.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana upaali.m kappaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa, bha.ne upaali, nivattesii''ti? ``idha me, ayyaputtaa, nivattantassa etadahosi -- `ca.n.daa kho saakiyaa; iminaa kumaaraa nippaatitaati ghaataapeyyumpi ma.m. ime hi naama sakyakumaaraa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissanti. kima"nga panaaha'nti. so kho aha.m, ayyaputtaa, bha.n.dika.m mu~ncitvaa ta.m bha.n.da.m rukkhe aalaggetvaa `yo passati, dinna~n~neva haratuu'ti vatvaa tatomhi pa.tinivatto''ti. ``su.t.thu, bha.ne upaali, akaasi yampi na nivatto {ya.m nivatto (sii0), ya.m pana nivatto (syaa0)}. ca.n.daa kho saakiyaa; iminaa kumaaraa nippaatitaati ghaataapeyyumpi ta''nti.

[03]atha ^a^V0.0319^ea^ kho sakyakumaaraa upaali.m kappaka.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te sakyakumaaraa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``maya.m, bhante, saakiyaa naama maanassino. aya.m ^a^T2.0161^ea^, bhante, upaali kappako amhaaka.m diigharatta.m paricaarako. ima.m bhagavaa pa.thama.m pabbaajetu. imassa maya.m abhivaadanapaccu.t.thaanaa~njalikammasaamiicikamma.m karissaama. eva.m amhaaka.m saakiyaana.m saakiyamaano nimmaanaayissatii''ti {nimmaadayissatiiti (sii0), nimmaaniyissatiiti (syaa0)}.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa upaali.m kappaka.m pa.thama.m pabbaajesi, pacchaa te sakyakumaare. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddiyo teneva antaravassena tisso vijjaa sacchaakaasi. aayasmaa anuruddho dibbacakkhu.m uppaadesi. aayasmaa aanando sotaapattiphala.m sacchaakaasi. devadatto pothujjanika.m iddhi.m abhinipphaadesi.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa bhaddiyo ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha''nti. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^M0.0340^ea^ nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, bhaddiyo ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'nti. nissa.msaya.m kho, bhante, aayasmaa bhaddiyo anabhiratova brahmacariya.m carati. ta.myeva vaa purima.m rajjasukha.m samanussaranto ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi ^a^T2.0162^ea^ -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'''nti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena bhaddiya.m bhikkhu.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso bhaddiya, aamantetii'''ti ^a^P2.0184^ea^. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa bhaddiyo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m bhaddiya.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso bhaddiya, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa bhaddiyo tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m bhaddiya.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhaddiya, ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'''nti? ``eva.m bhante''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, bhaddiya, atthavasa.m sampassamaano ara~n~nagatopi ^a^V0.0320^ea^ rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- `aho sukha.m aho sukha'''nti? ``pubbe me, bhante, ra~n~no satopi antopi antepure rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa hoti, bahipi antepure rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa hoti, antopi nagare rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa hoti, bahipi nagare rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa hoti, antopi janapade rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa hoti, bahipi janapade rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa hoti. so kho aha.m, bhante, eva.m ^a^T2.0163^ea^ rakkhitopi gopitopi santo bhiito ubbiggo ussa"nkii utrasto viharaami. etarahi kho pana aha.m eko, bhante, ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhiito anubbiggo anussa"nkii anutrasto appossukko pannalomo paradattavutto migabhuutena cetasaa viharaamiiti. ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanemi -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'''nti. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] {udaa0 20} ``yassantarato ^a^M0.0341^ea^ na santi kopaa, iti bhavaabhavata~nca viitivatto.
[22] ta.m vigatabhaya.m sukhi.m asoka.m, devaa naanubhavanti dassanaayaa''ti..

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa anupiyaaya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena kosambii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena kosambii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho devadattassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``ka.m nu kho aha.m pasaadeyya.m, yasmi.m me ^a^T2.0164^ea^ pasanne bahulaabhasakkaaro uppajjeyyaa''ti? atha kho devadattassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho ajaatasattu kumaaro taru.no ceva ^a^P2.0185^ea^ aayati.m bhaddo ca. ya.mnuunaaha.m ajaatasattu.m kumaara.m pasaadeyya.m. tasmi.m me pasanne bahulaabhasakkaaro uppajjissatii''ti.

[03]atha kho devadatto senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena raajagaha.m tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena raajagaha.m tadavasari. atha kho devadatto sakava.n.na.m pa.tisa.mharitvaa kumaarakava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa ahimekhalikaaya ajaatasattussa kumaarassa uccha"nge {ucca"nke (syaa0)} paaturahosi. atha kho ajaatasattu kumaaro bhiito ahosi, ubbiggo ussa"nkii utrasto. atha kho devadatto ajaatasattu.m kumaara.m etadavoca -- ``bhaayasi ma.m tva.m kumaaraa''ti? ``aama, bhaayaami. kosi tva''nti? ``aha.m devadatto''ti. ``sace kho tva.m, bhante, ayyo devadatto, i"ngha ^a^V0.0321^ea^ sakeneva va.n.nena paatubhavassuu''ti. atha kho devadatto kumaarakava.n.na.m pa.tisa.mharitvaa sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradharo ajaatasattussa kumaarassa purato a.t.thaasi. atha kho ajaatasattu kumaaro devadattassa iminaa iddhipaa.tihaariyena abhippasanno pa~ncahi rathasatehi saaya.m paata.m upa.t.thaana.m gacchati, pa~nca ca thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaaro abhihariiyati. atha kho devadattassa laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuutassa pariyaadinnacittassa evaruupa.m icchaagata.m ^a^M0.0342^ea^ uppajji -- ``aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii''ti ^a^T2.0165^ea^. saha cittuppaadaava devadatto tassaa iddhiyaa parihaayi.

[03] {a0 ni0 5.100} tena kho pana samayena kakudho naama ko.liyaputto, aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa upa.t.thaako, adhunaa kaala"nkato a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno. tassa evaruupo attabhaavappa.tilaabho hoti -- seyyathaapi naama dve vaa tii.ni vaa maagadhakaani {maagadhikaani (syaa0)} gaamakkhettaani. so tena attabhaavappa.tilaabhena neva attaana.m na para.m byaabaadheti. atha kho kakudho devaputto yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho kakudho devaputto aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``devadattassa, bhante, laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuutassa pariyaadinnacittassa {pariyaadi.n.nacittassa (ka0)} evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- `aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'ti. saha cittuppaadaava bhante, devadatto tassaa iddhiyaa parihiino''ti. idamavoca kakudho devaputto. ida.m vatvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tattheva antaradhaayi.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^P2.0186^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^T2.0166^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kakudho naama, bhante, ko.liyaputto mama upa.t.thaako adhunaa kaala"nkato a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno. tassa evaruupo attabhaavappa.tilaabho -- seyyathaapi naama dve vaa tii.ni vaa maagadhakaani gaamakkhettaani. so tena attabhaavappa.tilaabhena neva attaana.m na para.m byaabaadheti. atha kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `devadattassa, bhante, laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuutassa pariyaadinnacittassa evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamiiti. saha cittuppaadaava bhante, devadatto tassaa iddhiyaa parihiino'ti. idamavoca, bhante, kakudho devaputto. ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tattheva antaradhaayii''ti.

[03]``ki.m ^a^M0.0343^ea^ ^a^V0.0322^ea^ pana te, moggallaana, kakudho devaputto cetasaa ceto paricca vidito? ya.m ki~nci kakudho devaputto bhaasati sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti, no a~n~nathaa''ti? ``cetasaa ceto paricca vidito ca me, bhante, kakudho devaputto. ya.m ki~nci kakudho devaputto bhaasati sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti, no a~n~nathaa''ti. ``rakkhasseta.m, moggallaana, vaaca.m. rakkhasseta.m, moggallaana, vaaca.m. idaani so moghapuriso attanaava attaana.m paatukarissati.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.100} ``pa~ncime ^a^T2.0167^ea^, moggallaana, satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? ``idha, moggallaana, ekacco satthaa aparisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama? sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena -- ya.m tumo karissati, tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa siilato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi siilato rakkha.m paccaasiisati {paccaasi.msati (sii0 syaa0)}.

[03]``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddhaajiivo samaano `parisuddhaajiivomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddho me aajiivo pariyodaato asa.mkili.t.tho'ti ca. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhaajiivo samaano `parisuddhaajiivomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddho me aajiivo pariyodaato asa.mkili.t.tho'ti ^a^P2.0187^ea^ ca. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama? sammannati ^a^T2.0168^ea^ kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena -- ya.m tumo ^a^M0.0344^ea^ karissati, tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa aajiivato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi aajiivato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.

[03]``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddhadhammadesano samaano `parisuddhadhammadesanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddhaa me dhammadesanaa pariyodaataa asa.mkili.t.thaa'ti ca ^a^V0.0323^ea^. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhadhammadesano samaano `parisuddhadhammadesanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddhaa me dhammadesanaa pariyodaataa asa.mkili.t.thaa'ti ca. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama? sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena -- ya.m tumo karissati, tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa dhammadesanato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi dhammadesanato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.

[03]``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano `parisuddhaveyyaakara.nomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me veyyaakara.na.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano ^a^T2.0169^ea^ `parisuddhaveyyaakara.nomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me veyyaakara.na.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama? sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena -- ya.m tumo karissati, tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa veyyaakara.nato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi veyyaakara.nato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.

[03]``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti ^a^M0.0345^ea^ pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama? sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena -- ya.m tumo karissati, tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa ~naa.nadassanato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi ~naa.nadassanato rakkha.m paccaasiisatiiti. ime kho, moggallaana, pa~nca ^a^T2.0170^ea^ satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03]``aha.m kho pana, moggallaana, parisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami ^a^V0.0324^ea^ `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. na ca ma.m saavakaa siilato rakkhanti; na caaha.m saavakehi siilato rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. parisuddhaajiivo samaano...pe0... parisuddhadhammadesano samaano...pe0... parisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano...pe0... parisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. na ca ma.m saavakaa ~naa.nadassanato rakkhanti; na caaha.m saavakehi ~naa.nadassanato rakkha.m paccaasiisaamii''ti.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa kosambiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena raajagaha.m tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``devadattassa, bhante, ajaatasattu kumaaro pa~ncahi rathasatehi saaya.m paata.m upa.t.thaana.m gacchati; pa~nca ca thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaaro abhihariiyatii''ti. ``maa, bhikkhave, devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pihayittha. yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0171^ea^, devadattassa ajaatasattu kumaaro pa~ncahi rathasatehi saaya.m paata.m upa.t.thaana.m gamissati ^a^P2.0188^ea^, pa~nca ca thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaaro abhihariiyissati, haaniyeva, bhikkhave, devadattassa paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no vu.d.dhi.

[03]``seyyathaapi ^a^M0.0346^ea^, bhikkhave, ca.n.dassa kukkurassa naasaaya pitta.m bhindeyyu.m, eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, kukkuro bhiyyosomattaaya ca.n.dataro assa, evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaavakiiva~nca devadattassa ajaatasattu kumaaro pa~ncahi rathasatehi saaya.m paata.m upa.t.thaana.m gamissati, pa~nca ca thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaaro abhihariiyissati, haaniyeva, bhikkhave, devadattassa paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no vu.d.dhi.
[03] {sa.m0 ni0 2.184; a0 ni0 4.68} ``attavadhaaya, bhikkhave, devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03]``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kadalii attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti, evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03]``seyyathaapi ^a^V0.0325^ea^, bhikkhave, ve.lu attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti, evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03]``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, na.lo attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti, evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi ^a^T2.0172^ea^.

[03]``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, assatarii attavadhaaya gabbha.m ga.nhaati, paraabhavaaya gabbha.m ga.nhaati, evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadii''ti.
[21] {sa.m0 ni0 1.183, 1.2.184, netti0 90} ``phala.m ve kadali.m hanti, phala.m ve.lu.m phala.m na.la.m.
[22] sakkaaro kaapurisa.m hanti, gabbho assatari.m yathaa''ti..
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0347^ea^ kho pana samayena bhagavaa mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desento nisinno hoti saraajikaaya parisaaya. atha kho devadatto u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ji.n.no daani, bhante, bhagavaa vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto. appossukko daani, bhante, bhagavaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m anuyutto viharatu, mama.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m nissajjatu. aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii''ti. ``ala.m, devadatta, maa te rucci bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharitu''nti. dutiyampi kho devadatto...pe0... tatiyampi kho devadatto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ji.n.no daani, bhante, bhagavaa vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto. appossukko daani, bhante, bhagavaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m anuyutto viharatu, mama.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m nissajjatu. aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii''ti. ``saariputtamoggallaanaanampi ^a^T2.0173^ea^ kho aha.m, devadatta, bhikkhusa"ngha.m na nissajjeyya.m ^a^V0.0326^ea^, ki.m pana tuyha.m chavassa khe.laasakassaa''ti! atha kho devadatto -- saraajikaaya ^a^P2.0189^ea^ ma.m bhagavaa parisaaya khe.laasakavaadena apasaadeti, saariputtamoggallaaneva ukka.msatiiti -- kupito anattamano bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. aya~ncarahi devadattassa bhagavati pa.thamo aaghaato ahosi.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho devadattassa raajagahe pakaasaniiya.m kamma.m karotu -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, kaatabba.m. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m sa"ngho devadattassa raajagahe pakaasaniiya.m kamma.m kareyya -- ``pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena ^a^M0.0348^ea^ vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho devadattassa raajagahe ^a^T2.0174^ea^ pakaasaniiya.m kamma.m karoti -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti. yassaayasmato khamati devadattassa raajagahe pakaasaniiya.m kammassa kara.na.m -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati, ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti -- so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``kata.m sa"nghena devadattassa raajagahe pakaasaniiya.m kamma.m -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi tva.m, saariputta, devadatta.m ^a^V0.0327^ea^ raajagahe pakaasehii''ti. ``pubbe mayaa, bhante, devadattassa raajagahe va.n.no bhaasito -- `mahiddhiko godhiputto, mahaanubhaavo godhiputto'ti. kathaaha.m, bhante, devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasemii''ti? ``nanu tayaa, saariputta, bhuutoyeva devadattassa raajagahe va.n.no bhaasito -- `mahiddhiko godhiputto, mahaanubhaavo godhiputto''' ti? ``eva.m ^a^T2.0175^ea^ bhante''ti. ``evameva kho tva.m, saariputta, bhuuta.myeva devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasehii''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato paccassosi.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho saariputta.m sammannatu devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasetu.m -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m saariputto ^a^M0.0349^ea^ yaacitabbo. yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m sammanneyya ^a^P2.0190^ea^ devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasetu.m -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m sammannati devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasetu.m -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati, ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti. yassaayasmato khamati, aayasmato saariputtassa sammuti ^a^T2.0176^ea^ devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasetu.m -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati, ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti -- so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``sammato sa"nghena aayasmaa saariputto devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasetu.m -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo'ti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]sammato ^a^V0.0328^ea^ ca aayasmaa saariputto sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m raajagaha.m pavisitvaa devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasesi -- ``pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo''ti. tattha ye te manussaa assaddhaa appasannaa dubbuddhino, te evamaaha.msu -- ``usuuyakaa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa devadattassa laabhasakkaara.m usuuyantii''ti. ye pana te manussaa saddhaa pasannaa pa.n.ditaa byattaa buddhimanto, te evamaaha.msu -- ``na kho ida.m oraka.m bhavissati yathaa bhagavaa devadatta.m raajagahe pakaasaapetii''ti.

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0177^ea^ ^a^M0.0350^ea^ kho devadatto yena ajaatasattu kumaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ajaatasattu.m kumaara.m etadavoca -- ``pubbe kho, kumaara, manussaa diighaayukaa, etarahi appaayukaa. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m tva.m kumaarova samaano kaala.m kareyyaasi. tena hi tva.m, kumaara, pitara.m hantvaa raajaa hohi. aha.m bhagavanta.m hantvaa buddho bhavissaamii''ti.

[03]atha kho ajaatasattu kumaaro -- ayyo kho devadatto mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo, jaaneyyaasi ayyo devadattoti -- uuruyaa potthanika.m bandhitvaa divaa divassa {divaa divasassa (ka0)} bhiito ubbiggo ussa"nkii utrasto sahasaa antepura.m paavisi. addasaasu.m kho antepure upacaarakaa mahaamattaa ajaatasattu.m kumaara.m divaa divassa bhiita.m ubbigga.m ussa"nki.m utrasta.m sahasaa antepura.m pavisanta.m; disvaana aggahesu.m. te vicinantaa uuruyaa potthanika.m baddha.m {bandha.m (ka0)} disvaana ajaatasattu.m kumaara.m etadavocu.m -- ``ki.m tva.m, kumaara, kattukaamosii''ti? ``pitaramhi hantukaamo''ti. ``kenaasi ussaahito''ti? ``ayyena devadattenaa''ti. ekacce mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- ``kumaaro ca hantabbo, devadatto ca, sabbe ca bhikkhuu hantabbaa''ti. ekacce mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- ``na bhikkhuu hantabbaa. na bhikkhuu ki~nci aparajjhanti. kumaaro ca hantabbo, devadatto caa''ti. ekacce mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- ``na kumaaro ca hantabbo, na devadatto. na bhikkhuu ^a^T2.0178^ea^ hantabbaa. ra~n~no aarocetabba.m. yathaa raajaa vakkhati tathaa karissaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho te mahaamattaa ajaatasattu.m kumaara.m aadaaya yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^P2.0191^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0329^ea^. ``katha.m, bha.ne, mahaamattehi mati kataa''ti? ``ekacce, deva, mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- `kumaaro ca hantabbo, devadatto ca, sabbe ca bhikkhuu hantabbaa'ti. ekacce mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- `na bhikkhuu hantabbaa. na bhikkhuu ki~nci aparajjhanti. kumaaro ca hantabbo, devadatto caa'ti. ekacce mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- `na kumaaro ca hantabbo, na devadatto. na bhikkhuu hantabbaa. ra~n~no ^a^M0.0351^ea^ aarocetabba.m. yathaa raajaa vakkhati tathaa karissaamaa'''ti. ``ki.m, bha.ne, karissati buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa? nanu bhagavataa pa.tikacceva devadatto raajagahe pakaasaapito -- `pubbe devadattassa a~n~naa pakati ahosi, idaani a~n~naa pakati. ya.m devadatto kareyya kaayena vaacaaya, na tena buddho vaa dhammo vaa sa"ngho vaa da.t.thabbo, devadattova tena da.t.thabbo''ti? tattha ye te mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- `kumaaro ca hantabbo devadatto ca; sabbe ca bhikkhuu hantabbaa'ti; te a.t.thaane akaasi. ye te mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- `na bhikkhuu hantabbaa; na bhikkhuu ki~nci aparajjhanti; kumaaro ca hantabbo devadatto caa'ti; te niice .thaane .thapesi. ye ^a^T2.0179^ea^ te mahaamattaa eva.m mati.m aka.msu -- `na kumaaro ca hantabbo, na devadatto; na bhikkhuu hantabbaa; ra~n~no aarocetabba.m; yathaa raajaa vakkhati tathaa karissaamaa'ti; te ucce .thaane .thapesi. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro ajaatasattu.m kumaara.m etadavoca -- ``kissa ma.m tva.m, kumaara, hantukaamosii''ti? ``rajjenaamhi, deva, atthiko''ti. ``sace kho tva.m, kumaara, rajjena atthiko, eta.m te rajja''nti ajaatasattussa kumaarassa rajja.m niyyaadesi.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ atha kho devadatto yena ajaatasattu kumaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ajaatasattu.m kumaara.m etadavoca -- ``purise, mahaaraaja, aa.naapehi, ye sama.na.m gotama.m jiivitaa voropessantii''ti. atha kho ajaatasattu kumaaro manusse aa.naapesi -- ``yathaa, bha.ne, ayyo devadatto aaha tathaa kareyyaathaa''ti. atha kho devadatto eka.m purisa.m aa.naapesi -- ``gacchaavuso, amukasmi.m okaase sama.no gotamo viharati. ta.m jiivitaa voropetvaa iminaa maggena aagacchaa''ti. tasmi.m magge dve purise .thapesi -- ``yo iminaa maggena eko puriso aagacchati, ta.m jiivitaa voropetvaa iminaa maggena aagacchathaa''ti. tasmi.m magge cattaaro purise .thapesi -- ``ye iminaa maggena ^a^T2.0180^ea^ dve purisaa aagacchanti, te jiivitaa voropetvaa iminaa maggena aagacchathaa''ti. tasmi.m magge a.t.tha purise .thapesi -- ``ye iminaa maggena cattaaro purisaa aagacchanti, te jiivitaa ^a^P2.0192^ea^ voropetvaa iminaa maggena ^a^M0.0352^ea^ aagacchathaa''ti. tasmi.m magge so.lasa ^a^V0.0330^ea^ purise .thapesi -- ``ye iminaa maggena a.t.tha purisaa aagacchanti, te jiivitaa voropetvaa aagacchathaa''ti.

[03]atha kho so eko puriso asicamma.m gahetvaa dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato aviduure bhiito ubbiggo ussa"nkii utrasto patthaddhena kaayena a.t.thaasi. addasaa kho bhagavaa ta.m purisa.m bhiita.m ubbigga.m ussa"nki.m utrasta.m patthaddhena kaayena .thita.m. disvaana ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- ``ehaavuso, maa bhaayii''ti. atha kho so puriso asicamma.m ekamanta.m karitvaa dhanukalaapa.m nikkhipitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m du.t.thacitto vadhakacitto idhuupasa"nkanto. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha tva.m, aavuso, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m du.t.thacitto vadhakacitto idhuupasa"nkanto. yato ca kho tva.m, aavuso ^a^T2.0181^ea^, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vu.d.dhi hesaa, aavuso, ariyassa vinaye -- yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti, aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa tassa purisassa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m, kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa ta.m bhagavaa a~n~naasi kallacitta.m, muducitta.m, viniivara.nacitta.m, udaggacitta.m, pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tiggaheyya, evameva tassa purisassa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti. atha kho so puriso di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante. seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa ^a^M0.0353^ea^ vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m ^a^P2.0193^ea^ gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m ^a^T2.0182^ea^ gata''nti. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m purisa.m etadavoca ^a^V0.0331^ea^ -- ``maa kho tva.m, aavuso, iminaa maggena gaccha, iminaa maggena gacchaahii''ti a~n~nena maggena uyyojesi.

[03]atha kho te dve purisaa -- ki.m nu kho so eko puriso cirena aagacchatiiti -- pa.tipatha.m gacchantaa addasa.msu bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. tesa.m bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi...pe0... aparappaccayaa satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... upaasake no bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gate''ti. atha kho bhagavaa te purise etadavoca -- ``maa kho tumhe, aavuso, iminaa maggena gacchittha, iminaa maggena gacchathaa''ti a~n~nena maggena uyyojesi.

[03]atha kho te cattaaro purisaa...pe0... atha kho te a.t.tha purisaa...pe0... atha kho te so.lasa purisaa -- ki.m nu kho te a.t.tha purisaa cirena aagacchantiiti -- pa.tipatha.m gacchantaa addasaasu.m bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. tesa.m bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m...pe0... aparappaccayaa satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ^a^T2.0183^ea^ upaasake no bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gate''ti. atha kho bhagavaa te purise etadavoca -- ``maa kho tumhe, aavuso, iminaa maggena gacchittha, iminaa maggena gacchathaa''ti a~n~nena maggena uyyojesi.

[03]atha kho so eko puriso yena devadatto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa devadatta.m etadavoca -- ``naaha.m, bhante, sakkomi ta.m bhagavanta.m jiivitaa voropetu.m; mahiddhiko so bhagavaa, mahaanubhaavo''ti. ``ala.m, aavuso; maa tva.m sama.na.m gotama.m jiivitaa voropesi. ahameva sama.na.m gotama.m jiivitaa voropessaamii''ti.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0354^ea^ kho pana samayena bhagavaa gijjhakuu.tassa pabbatassa chaayaaya.m ca"nkamati. atha kho devadatto gijjhakuu.ta.m pabbata.m aaruhitvaa mahati.m sila.m pavijjhi -- imaaya sama.na.m gotama.m jiivitaa voropessaamiiti. dve pabbatakuu.taa samaagantvaa ta.m sila.m sampa.ticchi.msu. tato papatikaa uppatitvaa bhagavato paade ruhira.m uppaadesi. atha kho bhagavaa uddha.m ulloketvaa devadatta.m ^a^V0.0332^ea^ etadavoca -- ``bahu.m tayaa, moghapurisa, apu~n~na.m pasuta.m, ya.m tva.m du.t.thacitto vadhakacitto tathaagatassa ruhira.m uppaadesii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ida.m, bhikkhave, devadattena pa.thama.m aanantariya.m kamma.m upacita.m, ya.m du.t.thacittena vadhakacittena tathaagatassa ruhira.m uppaadita''nti.

[03]assosu.m ^a^P2.0194^ea^ kho bhikkhuu -- ``devadattena kira bhagavato vadho payutto''ti. te ca bhikkhuu bhagavato vihaarassa parito parito ca"nkamanti uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa sajjhaaya.m ^a^T2.0184^ea^ karontaa, bhagavato rakkhaavara.naguttiyaa. assosi kho bhagavaa uccaasadda.m mahaasadda.m sajjhaayasadda.m. sutvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho so, aananda, uccaasaddo mahaasaddo sajjhaayasaddo''ti? ``assosu.m kho, bhante, bhikkhuu -- `devadattena kira bhagavato vadho payutto'ti. te ca {tedha (sii0)}, bhante, bhikkhuu bhagavato vihaarassa parito parito ca"nkamanti uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa sajjhaaya.m karontaa, bhagavato rakkhaavara.naguttiyaa. so eso, bhagavaa, uccaasaddo mahaasaddo sajjhaayasaddo''ti. ``tena haananda, mama vacanena te bhikkhuu aamantehi -- satthaa aayasmante aamantetii''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato aanandassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca --
[03]``a.t.thaanameta.m ^a^M0.0355^ea^, bhikkhave, anavakaaso, ya.m paruupakkamena tathaagata.m jiivitaa voropeyya. anupakkamena, bhikkhave, tathaagataa parinibbaayanti.

[03] {cuu.lava0 334; a0 ni0 5.100} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? ``idha, bhikkhave, ekacco satthaa aparisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati ^a^T2.0185^ea^ `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama? sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena -- ya.m tumo karissati, tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti ^a^V0.0333^ea^. evaruupa.m kho, bhikkhave, satthaara.m saavakaa siilato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi siilato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddhaaajiivo samaano...pe0... aparisuddhadhammadesano samaano...pe0... aparisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano...pe0... ^a^T2.0186^ea^ aparisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama? sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena -- ya.m tumo karissati, tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, bhikkhave, satthaara.m saavakaa ~naa.nadassanato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi ~naa.nadassanato rakkha.m paccaasiisati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. ``aha.m kho pana, bhikkhave, parisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti ca. na ca ma.m saavakaa siilato rakkhanti; na caaha.m saavakehi siilato rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. aha.m kho pana ^a^M0.0356^ea^ bhikkhave parisuddhaajiivo samaano...pe0... ^a^T2.0187^ea^ parisuddhadhammadesano samaano...pe0... parisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano...pe0... parisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano ``parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii''ti pa.tijaanaami ``parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha''nti ca, na ca ma.m saavakaa ~naa.nadassanato rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi ~naa.nadassanato rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. ``a.t.thaanameta.m, bhikkhave, anavakaaso, ya.m paruupakkamena tathaagata.m jiivitaa voropeyya. anupakkamena, bhikkhave, tathaagataa parinibbaayanti. gacchatha tumhe, bhikkhave, yathaavihaara.m. arakkhiyaa, bhikkhave, tathaagataa''ti.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena raajagahe naa.laagiri naama hatthii ca.n.do hoti, manussaghaatako. atha kho devadatto raajagaha.m pavisitvaa hatthisaala.m gantvaa hatthibha.n.de etadavoca -- ``maya.m kho, bha.ne, raaja~naatakaa naama pa.tibalaa niica.t.thaaniya.m ucca.t.thaane .thapetu.m, bhattampi vetanampi va.d.dhaapetu.m. tena hi, bha.ne, yadaa sama.no gotamo ima.m raccha.m pa.tipanno hoti, tadaa ima.m naa.laagiri.m hatthi.m mu~ncetvaa ima.m raccha.m pa.tipaadethaa''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho te ^a^V0.0334^ea^ hatthibha.n.daa devadattassa paccassosu.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya sambahulehi ^a^P2.0195^ea^ bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m raccha.m pa.tipajji. addasaasu.m kho te hatthibha.n.daa bhagavanta.m ta.m raccha.m pa.tipanna.m. disvaana naa.laagiri.m hatthi.m mu~ncitvaa ta.m raccha.m pa.tipaadesu.m. addasaa kho naa.laagiri hatthii bhagavanta.m duuratova ^a^T2.0188^ea^ aagacchanta.m. disvaana so.n.da.m ussaapetvaa paha.t.thaka.n.navaalo yena bhagavaa tena abhidhaavi. addasaasu.m kho te bhikkhuu naa.laagiri.m hatthi.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``aya.m, bhante, naa.laagiri hatthii ca.n.do manussaghaatako ima.m raccha.m pa.tipanno. pa.tikkamatu, bhante, bhagavaa; pa.tikkamatu sugato''ti. ``aagacchatha, bhikkhave, maa bhaayittha. a.t.thaanameta.m, bhikkhave, anavakaaso, ya.m paruupakkamena tathaagata.m jiivitaa voropeyya. anupakkamena, bhikkhave, tathaagataa parinibbaayantii''ti. dutiyampi kho te bhikkhuu...pe0... tatiyampi kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``aya.m, bhante, naa.laagiri hatthii ca.n.do manussaghaatako ima.m raccha.m pa.tipanno. pa.tikkamatu, bhante, bhagavaa; pa.tikkamatu sugato''ti. ``aagacchatha, bhikkhave, maa bhaayittha. a.t.thaanameta.m ^a^M0.0357^ea^, bhikkhave, anavakaaso, ya.m paruupakkamena tathaagata.m jiivitaa voropeyya. anupakkamena, bhikkhave, tathaagataa parinibbaayantii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena manussaa paasaadesupi hammiyesupi chadanesupi aaru.lhaa acchanti. tattha ye te manussaa assaddhaa appasannaa dubbuddhino, te evamaaha.msu -- ``abhiruupo vata, bho {abhiruupo vata bho gotamo (syaa0 ka.m0)}, mahaasama.no naagena vihe.thiiyissatii''ti. ye pana te manussaa ^a^T2.0189^ea^ saddhaa pasannaa pa.n.ditaa byattaa buddhimanto, te evamaaha.msu -- ``nacirassa.m vata, bho, naago naagena sa"ngaamessatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa naa.laagiri.m hatthi.m mettena cittena phari. atha kho naa.laagiri hatthii bhagavato {bhagavataa (sii0)} mettena cittena phu.t.tho {phu.to (ka0)} so.n.da.m oropetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato purato a.t.thaasi. atha kho bhagavaa dakkhi.nena hatthena naa.laagirissa hatthissa kumbha.m paraamasanto naa.laagiri.m hatthi.m imaahi gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``maa ku~njara naagamaasado, dukkha~nhi ku~njara naagamaasado.
[22] na hi naagahatassa ku~njara sugati, hoti ito para.m yato..
[21] ``maa ca mado maa ca pamaado, na hi pamattaa sugati.m vajanti te.
[22] tva~n~neva tathaa karissasi, yena tva.m sugati.m gamissasii''ti..

[03]atha ^a^V0.0335^ea^ kho naa.laagiri hatthii so.n.daaya bhagavato paadapa.msuuni gahetvaa uparimuddhani aakiritvaa pa.tiku.tiyova {pa.tiku.tito pa.tisakki (sii0 syaa0)} osakki, yaava bhagavanta.m addakkhi. atha kho naa.laagiri hatthii hatthisaala.m gantvaa sake .thaane a.t.thaasi. tathaa danto ca pana naa.laagiri ^a^P2.0196^ea^ hatthii ahosi. tena ^a^T2.0190^ea^ kho pana samayena manussaa ima.m gaatha.m gaayanti --
[21] {ma0 ni0 2.352; theragaa0 878} ``da.n.deneke damayanti, a"nkusehi kasaahi ca.
[22] ada.n.dena asatthena, naago danto mahesinaa''ti..

[03]manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``yaava paapo aya.m devadatto, alakkhiko, yatra hi naama sama.nassa gotamassa eva.mmahiddhikassa eva.m mahaanubhaavassa vadhaaya parakkamissatii''ti. devadattassa laabhasakkaaro parihaayi. bhagavato ca laabhasakkaaro abhiva.d.dhi.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ {paaci0 209} tena ^a^M0.0358^ea^ kho pana samayena devadatto parihiinalaabhasakkaaro sapariso kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissanti! kassa sampanna.m na manaapa.m, kassa saadu.m na ruccatii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- katha~nhi naama devadatto sapariso kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissatii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, devadatta, sapariso kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njasii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m kulesu tikabhojana.m pa~n~napessaami tayo atthavase pa.ticca -- dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana niggahaaya ^a^T2.0191^ea^; pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya, maa paapicchaa pakkha.m nissaaya sa"ngha.m bhindeyyunti; kulaanuddayaaya {kulaanudayataaya (sii0 syaa0)} ca. ga.nabhojane yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.

[03]{paaraa0 409} atha kho devadatto yena kokaaliko ka.tamodakatissako {ka.tamorakatissako (sii0 syaa0)} kha.n.dadeviyaa putto samuddadatto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa kokaalika.m ka.tamodakatissaka.m kha.n.dadeviyaa putta.m samuddadatta.m etadavoca -- ``etha, maya.m, aavuso, sama.nassa gotamassa sa"nghabheda.m karissaama cakkabheda''nti. eva.m ^a^V0.0336^ea^ vutte kokaaliko devadatta.m etadavoca -- ``sama.no kho, aavuso, gotamo mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo. katha.m maya.m sama.nassa gotamassa sa"nghabheda.m karissaama cakkabheda''nti? ``etha, maya.m, aavuso, sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nca vatthuuni yaacissaama -- `bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa ^a^P2.0197^ea^ dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadii. imaani, bhante, pa~nca vatthuuni anekapariyaayena appicchataaya santu.t.thiyaa sallekhaaya dhutataaya paasaadikataaya apacayaaya viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattanti. saadhu, bhante, bhikkhuu yaavajiiva.m aara~n~nikaa assu; yo gaamanta.m ^a^M0.0359^ea^ osareyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m pi.n.dapaatikaa assu; yo nimantana.m saadiyeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m pa.msukuulikaa ^a^T2.0192^ea^ assu; yo gahapaticiivara.m saadiyeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m rukkhamuulikaa assu; yo channa.m upagaccheyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m macchama.msa.m na khaadeyyu.m; yo macchama.msa.m khaadeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyyaa'ti. imaani pa~nca vatthuuni sama.no gotamo naanujaanissati. te maya.m imehi pa~ncahi vatthuuhi jana.m sa~n~naapessaamaa''ti. ``sakkaa kho, aavuso, imehi pa~ncahi vatthuuhi sama.nassa gotamassa sa"nghabhedo kaatu.m cakkabhedo. luukhappasannaa hi, aavuso, manussaa''ti.

[03]atha kho devadatto sapariso yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho devadatto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadii. imaani, bhante, pa~nca vatthuuni anekapariyaayena appicchataaya santu.t.thiyaa sallekhaaya dhutataaya paasaadikataaya apacayaaya viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattanti. saadhu, bhante, bhikkhuu yaavajiiva.m aara~n~nikaa assu; yo gaamanta.m osareyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m pi.n.dapaatikaa assu; yo nimantana.m saadiyeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m pa.msukuulikaa assu; yo gahapaticiivara.m ^a^T2.0193^ea^ saadiyeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m rukkhamuulikaa assu; yo channa.m upagaccheyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m macchama.msa.m na khaadeyyu.m; yo macchama.msa.m khaadeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyyaa''ti. ``ala.m, devadatta. yo icchati, aara~n~niko hotu; yo icchati, gaamante viharatu. yo icchati, pi.n.dapaatiko hotu; yo icchati, nimantana.m saadiyatu. yo icchati, pa.msukuuliko hotu; yo icchati, gahapaticiivara.m saadiyatu. a.t.thamaase kho mayaa, devadatta, rukkhamuulasenaasana.m anu~n~naata.m; tiko.tiparisuddha.m macchama.msa.m -- adi.t.tha.m, assuta.m, aparisa"nkita''nti. atha kho devadatto -- na bhagavaa ^a^V0.0337^ea^ imaani pa~nca vatthuuni anujaanaatiiti -- ha.t.tho udaggo sapariso u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03]atha kho devadatto sapariso raajagaha.m pavisitvaa pa~ncahi vatthuuhi jana.m sa~n~naapesi -- ``maya.m, aavuso, sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nca vatthuuni ^a^M0.0360^ea^ yaacimhaa -- `bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa...pe0... viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadii. imaani, bhante, pa~nca vatthuuni anekapariyaayena appicchataaya...pe0... viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattanti. saadhu, bhante, bhikkhuu yaavajiiva.m aara~n~nikaa assu; yo gaamanta.m osareyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya...pe0... yaavajiiva.m macchama.msa.m na khaadeyyu.m; yo macchama.msa.m khaadeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyyaa'ti. imaani pa~nca vatthuuni sama.no gotamo naanujaanaati. te maya.m imehi pa~ncahi vatthuuhi ^a^T2.0194^ea^ samaadaaya vattaamaa''ti.

[03]tattha ye te manussaa assaddhaa appasannaa dubbuddhino, te evamaaha.msu -- ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dhutaa sallekhavuttino. sama.no pana gotamo baahulliko baahullaaya cetetii''ti. ye pana te manussaa saddhaa ^a^P2.0198^ea^ pasannaa pa.n.ditaa byattaa buddhimanto, te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama devadatto bhagavato sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamissati cakkabhedaayaa''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama devadatto sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamissati cakkabhedaayaa''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, devadatta, sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamasi cakkabhedaayaa''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. ``ala.m, devadatta. maa te rucci sa"nghabhedo. garuko kho, devadatta, sa"nghabhedo. yo kho, devadatta, samagga.m sa"ngha.m bhindati, kappa.t.thika.m {kappa.t.thitika.m (syaa0)} kibbisa.m pasavati, kappa.m nirayamhi paccati. yo ca kho, devadatta, bhinna.m sa"ngha.m samagga.m karoti, brahma.m pu~n~na.m pasavati, kappa.m saggamhi modati. ala.m, devadatta. maa te rucci sa"nghabhedo. garuko kho, devadatta, sa"nghabhedo''ti.

[03] {udaa0 48} atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa kho devadatto aayasmanta.m ^a^T2.0195^ea^ aananda.m raajagahe pi.n.daaya caranta.m. disvaana yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``ajjataggedaanaaha.m ^a^V0.0338^ea^, aavuso aananda, a~n~natreva bhagavataa, a~n~natreva bhikkhusa"nghaa, uposatha.m karissaami sa"nghakamma.m karissaamii''ti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0361^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. addasaa kho ma.m, bhante, devadatto raajagahe pi.n.daaya caranta.m. disvaana yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `ajjataggedaanaaha.m, aavuso aananda, a~n~natreva bhagavataa, a~n~natreva bhikkhusa"nghaa, uposatha.m karissaami sa"nghakamma.m karissaamii'ti. ajjatagge, bhante, devadatto sa"ngha.m bhindissatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] {udaa0 48} ``sukara.m saadhunaa saadhu.m, saadhu.m paapena dukkara.m.
[22] paapa.m paapena sukara.m, paapamariyehi dukkara''nti..
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P2.0199^ea^ kho devadatto tadahuposathe u.t.thaayaasanaa salaaka.m gaahesi -- ``maya.m, aavuso, sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nca vatthuuni yaacimhaa ^a^T2.0196^ea^ -- `bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa...pe0... viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadii. imaani, bhante, pa~nca vatthuuni anekapariyaayena appicchataaya...pe0... viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattanti. saadhu, bhante, bhikkhuu yaavajiiva.m aara~n~nikaa assu; yo gaamanta.m osareyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya...pe0... yaavajiiva.m macchama.msa.m na khaadeyyu.m; yo macchama.msa.m khaadeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyyaa'ti. imaani pa~nca vatthuuni sama.no gotamo naanujaanaati. te maya.m imehi pa~ncahi vatthuuhi samaadaaya vattaama. yassaayasmato imaani pa~nca vatthuuni khamanti, so salaaka.m ga.nhaatuu''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani navakaa ceva ^a^V0.0339^ea^ honti appakata~n~nuno ca. te -- `aya.m dhammo ^a^M0.0362^ea^, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti -- salaaka.m ga.nhi.msu. atha kho devadatto sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani aadaaya yena gayaasiisa.m tena pakkaami. atha kho saariputtamoggallaanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``devadatto, bhante, sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani aadaaya yena gayaasiisa.m tena pakkanto''ti. ``na hi naama tumhaaka.m, saariputtaa, tesu ^a^T2.0197^ea^ navakesu bhikkhuusu kaaru~n~nampi bhavissati? gacchatha tumhe, saariputtaa, puraa te bhikkhuu anayabyasana.m aapajjantii''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho saariputtamoggallaanaa bhagavato pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena gayaasiisa.m tenupasa"nkami.msu.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavato aviduure rodamaano .thito hoti. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, bhikkhu, rodasii''ti? ``yepi te, bhante, bhagavato aggasaavakaa saariputtamoggallaanaa tepi devadattassa santike gacchanti devadattassa dhamma.m rocentaa''ti. ``a.t.thaanameta.m, bhikkhu, anavakaaso, ya.m saariputtamoggallaanaa devadattassa dhamma.m roceyyu.m, api ca te gataa bhikkhuuna.m sa~n~nattiyaa''ti {bhikkhusa~n~nattiyaati (sii0 syaa0), bhikkhuu sa~n~nattiyaa (ka0)}.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena devadatto mahatiyaa parisaaya parivutto dhamma.m desento nisinno hoti. addasaa kho devadatto saariputtamoggallaane duuratova aagacchante. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha, bhikkhave, yaava svaakkhaato mayaa dhammo, yepi te sama.nassa gotamassa aggasaavakaa saariputtamoggallaanaa tepi mama santike aagacchanti. mama dhamma.m rocentaa''ti. eva.m vutte kokaaliko devadatta.m etadavoca -- ``maa, aavuso devadatta, saariputtamoggallaane vissasi ^a^T2.0198^ea^. paapicchaa saariputtamoggallaanaa ^a^P2.0200^ea^, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti. ``ala.m, aavuso. svaagata.m tesa.m yato me dhamma.m rocentii''ti.

[03]atha kho devadatto aayasmanta.m saariputta.m upa.d.dhaasanena nimantesi -- ``ehaavuso saariputta, idha nisiidaahii''ti. ``ala.m aavuso''ti kho aayasmaa ^a^M0.0363^ea^ saariputto a~n~natara.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho mahaamoggallaano a~n~natara.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. atha kho devadatto bahudeva ratti.m bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m ajjhesi -- ``vigatathinamiddho ^a^V0.0340^ea^ kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhusa"ngho. pa.tibhaatu ta.m, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhuuna.m dhammii kathaa, pi.t.thi me aagilaayati, tamaha.m aayamissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa saariputto devadattassa paccassosi. atha kho devadatto catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~naapetvaa dakkhi.nena passena seyya.m kappesi. tassa kilamantassa mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa muhuttakeneva niddaa okkami.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa saariputto aadesanaapaa.tihaariyaanusaasaniyaa bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya ovadi anusaasi. aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano iddhipaa.tihaariyaanusaasaniyaa bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya ovadi anusaasi. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m aayasmataa saariputtena aadesanaapaa.tihaariyaanusaasaniyaa aayasmataa ca mahaamoggallaanena iddhipaa.tihaariyaanusaasaniyaa ^a^T2.0199^ea^ ovadiyamaanaana.m anusaasiyamaanaana.m viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``gacchaama maya.m, aavuso, bhagavato santike. yo tassa bhagavato dhamma.m rocesi so aagacchatuu''ti. atha kho saariputtamoggallaanaa taani pa~ncabhikkhusataani aadaaya yena ve.luvana.m tenupasa"nkami.msu. atha kho kokaaliko devadatta.m u.t.thaapesi -- ``u.t.thehi, aavuso devadatta, niitaa te bhikkhuu saariputtamoggallaanehi. nanu tva.m, aavuso devadatta, mayaa vutto -- `maa, aavuso devadatta, saariputtamoggallaane vissaasi. paapicchaa saariputtamoggallaanaa, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa'''ti? atha kho devadattassa tattheva u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato ugga~nchi.

[03]atha kho saariputtamoggallaanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidisu.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto ^a^P2.0201^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, bhante ^a^M0.0364^ea^, bhedakaanuvattakaa bhikkhuu puna upasampajjeyyu''nti. ``ala.m, saariputta. maa te rucci bhedakaanuvattakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m puna upasampadaa. tena hi tva.m, saariputta, bhedakaanuvattake bhikkhuu thullaccaya.m desaapehi. katha.m pana te, saariputta, devadatto pa.tipajjii''ti? ``yatheva, bhante, bhagavaa bahudeva ratti.m bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa ma.m ajjhesati -- `vigatathinamiddho kho ^a^T2.0200^ea^, saariputta, bhikkhusa"ngho; pa.tibhaatu ta.m, saariputta, bhikkhuuna.m dhammii kathaa, pi.t.thi me aagilaayati, tamaha.m aayamissaamii'ti, evameva kho, bhante, devadatto pa.tipajjii''ti.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0341^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, ara~n~naayatane mahaasarasii. ta.m naagaa upanissaaya vihari.msu. te ta.m sarasi.m ogaahetvaa, so.n.daaya bhisamu.laala.m abbuhitvaa, suvikkhaalita.m vikkhaaletvaa, akaddama.m sa"nkhaaditvaa, ajjhoharanti. tesa.m ta.m va.n.naaya ceva hoti, balaaya ca. na ca tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchanti, mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. tesa.myeva kho pana, bhikkhave, mahaanaagaana.m anusikkhamaanaa taru.naa bhi"nkacchaapaa. te ta.m sarasi.m ogaahetvaa, so.n.daaya bhisamu.laala.m abbuhitvaa, na suvikkhaalita.m vikkhaaletvaa, sakaddama.m sa"nkhaaditvaa, ajjhoharanti. tesa.m ta.m neva va.n.naaya hoti, na balaaya. tatonidaana~nca mara.na.m vaa nigacchanti, mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, devadatto mamaanukrubba.m {mamaanukubba.m (sii0 syaa0)} kapa.no marissatiiti.
[21] ``mahaavaraahassa mahi.m vikrubbato {vikubbato (sii0 syaa0)}, bhisa.m ghasaanassa {ghasamaanassa (ka0)} nadiisu jaggato.
[22] bhi"nkova ^a^T2.0201^ea^ pa"nka.m abhibhakkhayitvaa, mamaanukrubba.m kapa.no marissatii''ti..

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 8.16} ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu duuteyya.m gantumarahati. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotaa ca hoti, saavetaa ca, uggahetaa ca, dhaaretaa ca, vi~n~naataa ca, vi~n~naapetaa ca, kusalo ca sahitaasahitassa, no ca kalahakaarako -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu duuteyya.m gantumarahati.

[03] {a0 ni0 8.16} ``a.t.thahi ^a^M0.0365^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato saariputto duuteyya.m gantumarahati. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, saariputto sotaa ca hoti, saavetaa ca, uggahetaa ca, dhaaretaa ca, vi~n~naataa ca, vi~n~naapetaa ca, kusalo ca sahitaasahitassa, no ca kalahakaarako -- imehi ^a^P2.0202^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato saariputto duuteyya.m gantumarahatiiti.
[21] {a0 ni0 8.16} ``yo ve na byathati {byaadhati (sii0 syaa0)} patvaa, parisa.m uggavaadini.m.
[22] na ca haapeti vacana.m, na ca chaadeti saasana.m..
