[06] sa"nghabhedakakkhandhaka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0213^ea^ ^a^P2.0207^ea^ ^a^M0.0373^ea^ ^a^V0.0349^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aagantukaa bhikkhuu saupaahanaapi aaraama.m pavisanti, chattapaggahitaapi aaraama.m pavisanti, ogu.n.thitaapi aaraama.m pavisanti, siisepi ciivara.m karitvaa aaraama.m pavisanti, paaniiyenapi paade dhovanti, vu.d.dhatarepi aavaasike bhikkhuu na abhivaadenti, napi senaasana.m pucchanti. a~n~nataropi aagantuko bhikkhu anajjhaavu.t.tha.m vihaara.m gha.tika.m ugghaa.tetvaa kavaa.ta.m pa.naametvaa sahasaa paavisi. tassa uparipi.t.thito {uparipi.t.thato (?)} ahi khandhe papati. so bhiito vissaramakaasi. bhikkhuu upadhaavitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tva.m, aavuso, vissaramakaasii''ti? atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aagantukaa bhikkhuu saupaahanaapi aaraama.m pavisissanti, chattapaggahitaapi aaraama.m pavisissanti, ogu.n.thitaapi aaraama.m pavisissanti, siisepi ciivara.m karitvaa aaraama.m pavisissanti, paaniiyenapi paade dhovissanti, vu.d.dhatarepi aavaasike bhikkhuu na abhivaadessanti, napi senaasana.m pucchissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m ^a^T2.0214^ea^ kira, bhikkhave, ``aagantukaa bhikkhuu saupaahanaapi aaraama.m pavisanti, chattapaggahitaapi aaraama.m pavisanti, ogu.n.thitaapi aaraama.m pavisanti, siisepi ciivara.m karitvaa aaraama.m pavisanti, paaniiyenipi paade dhovanti, vu.d.dhatarepi aavaasike bhikkhuu na abhivaadenti, napi senaasana.m pucchantiiti. sacca.m bhagavaati. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama bhikkhave aagantukaa bhikkhuu saupaahanaapi aaraama.m pavisissanti, chattapaggahitaapi aaraama.m pavisissanti, ogu.n.thitaapi aaraama.m pavisissanti, siisepi ciivara.m karitvaa aaraama.m pavisissanti, paaniiyenapi paade dhovissanti, vu.d.dhatarepi aavaasike ^a^V0.0350^ea^ bhikkhuu na abhivaadessanti, napi senaasana.m pucchissanti, neta.m bhikkhave appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ ``tena ^a^M0.0374^ea^ hi, bhikkhave, aagantukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba.m. aagantukena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `idaani aaraama.m pavisissaamii'ti upaahanaa omu~ncitvaa ^a^P2.0208^ea^ niica.m katvaa pappho.tetvaa gahetvaa chatta.m apanaametvaa siisa.m vivaritvaa siise ciivara.m {vivaritvaa ciivara.m (ka0)} khandhe katvaa saadhuka.m ataramaanena aaraamo pavisitabbo. aaraama.m pavisantena sallakkhetabba.m -- `kattha ^a^T2.0215^ea^ aavaasikaa bhikkhuu pa.tikkamantii'ti? yattha aavaasikaa bhikkhuu pa.tikkamanti -- upa.t.thaanasaalaaya vaa ma.n.dape vaa rukkhamuule vaa -- tattha gantvaa ekamanta.m patto nikkhipitabbo; ekamanta.m ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m; patiruupa.m aasana.m gahetvaa nisiiditabba.m; paaniiya.m pucchitabba.m, paribhojaniiya.m pucchitabba.m -- `katama.m paaniiya.m, katama.m paribhojaniiya'nti? sace paaniiyena attho hoti, paaniiya.m gahetvaa paatabba.m. sace paribhojaniiyena attho hoti, paribhojaniiya.m gahetvaa paadaa dhovitabbaa. paade dhovantena ekena hatthena udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m, ekena hatthena paadaa dhovitabbaa. teneva udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m {yena hatthena udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m (syaa0)} na teneva hatthena paadaa dhovitabbaa. upaahanapu~nchanaco.laka.m pucchitvaa upaahanaa pu~nchitabbaa. upaahanaa pu~nchantena pa.thama.m sukkhena co.lakena pu~nchitabbaa, pacchaa allena. upaahanaapu~nchanaco.laka.m dhovitvaa {pii.letvaa (syaa0)} ekamanta.m vissajjetabba.m.

[03]``sace aavaasiko bhikkhu vu.d.dho hoti, abhivaadetabbo. sace navako hoti, abhivaadaapetabbo. senaasana.m pucchitabba.m -- `katama.m me senaasana.m paapu.naatii'ti? ajjhaavu.t.tha.m vaa anajjhaavu.t.tha.m vaa pucchitabba.m, gocaro pucchitabbo, agocaro pucchitabbo, sekkhasammataani {sekhasammataani (ka0)} kulaani pucchitabbaani ^a^T2.0216^ea^, vacca.t.thaana.m pucchitabba.m, passaava.t.thaana.m pucchitabba.m, paaniiya.m pucchitabba.m, paribhojaniiya.m pucchitabba.m, kattarada.n.do pucchitabbo, sa"nghassa katikasa.n.thaana.m pucchitabba.m -- `ka.m kaala.m pavisitabba.m, ka.m kaala.m nikkhamitabba'nti? sace vihaaro anajjhaavu.t.tho hoti, kavaa.ta.m aako.tetvaa muhutta.m aagametvaa gha.tika.m ugghaa.tetvaa kavaa.ta.m pa.naametvaa bahi .thitena nilloketabbo.

[03]``sace ^a^M0.0375^ea^ vihaaro uklaapo hoti, ma~nce vaa ma~nco aaropito hoti, pii.the vaa pii.tha.m aaropita.m hoti, senaasana.m upari pu~njiikata.m {pu~njakita.m (ka0)} hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. {mahaava0 66-67 (thoka.m visadisa.m)} vihaara.m sodhentena ^a^V0.0351^ea^ pa.thama.m bhuumatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbaa; bhisibibbohana.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~nco niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m ^a^P2.0209^ea^ nikkhipitabbo; pii.tha.m niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; khe.lamallako niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; apassenaphalaka.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. sace vihaare santaanaka.m hoti, ullokaa pa.thama.m ohaaretabba.m, aalokasandhika.n.nabhaagaa pamajjitabbaa. sace gerukaparikammakataa bhitti ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace kaa.lava.n.nakataa bhuumi ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa ^a^T2.0217^ea^ pamajjitabbaa. sace akataa hoti bhuumi, udakena paripphositvaa sammajjitabbaa -- maa vihaaro rajena uha~n~niiti {uuha~n~niiti (sii0 syaa0)}. sa"nkaara.m vicinitvaa ekamanta.m cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``bhuumatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane {yathaapa~n~natta.m (sii0 syaa0), yathaabhaaga.m (ka0)} pa~n~napetabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane {yathaabhaaga.m (syaa0 ka0)} .thapetabbaa. ma~nco otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane {yathaabhaaga.m (syaa0 ka0)} pa~n~napetabbo. pii.tha.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane {yathaabhaaga.m (syaa0 ka0)} pa~n~napetabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaabhaaga.m pa~n~napetabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaabhaaga.m pa~n~napetabba.m. khe.lamallako otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaabhaaga.m .thapetabbo. apassenaphalaka.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaabhaaga.m .thapetabba.m. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ^a^M0.0376^ea^ ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa ^a^T2.0218^ea^ patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m.

[03]``sace puratthimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, puratthimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace pacchimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace uttaraa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, uttaraa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace dakkhi.naa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa ^a^V0.0352^ea^. sace siitakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, ratti.m thaketabbaa. sace u.nhakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa, ratti.m vivaritabbaa.

[03]``sace parive.na.m uklaapa.m ^a^P2.0210^ea^ hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace upa.t.thaanasaalaa uklaapaa hoti, upa.t.thaanasaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace aggisaalaa uklaapaa hoti, aggisaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paaniiya.m na hoti, paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace paribhojaniiya.m na hoti, paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, aagantukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m yathaa aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0219^ea^ kho pana samayena aavaasikaa bhikkhuu aagantuke bhikkhuu disvaa neva aasana.m pa~n~napenti, na paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipanti, na paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tigga.nhanti, na paaniiyena pucchanti {na paaniiyena pucchanti, na paribhojaniiyena pucchanti (syaa0 ka.m0)}, na vu.d.dhatarepi aagantuke bhikkhuu abhivaadenti, na senaasana.m pa~n~napenti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aavaasikaa bhikkhuu aagantuke bhikkhuu disvaa neva aasana.m pa~n~napessanti, na paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipissanti, na ^a^M0.0377^ea^ paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahissanti, na paaniiyena pucchissanti, vu.d.dhatarepi aagantuke bhikkhuu na abhivaadessanti, na senaasana.m pa~n~napessantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira.m, bhikkhave...pe0... sacca.m bhagavaati...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, aavaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa aavaasikehi bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba.m. aavaasikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa aagantuka.m bhikkhu.m vu.d.dhatara.m disvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m ^a^T2.0220^ea^, paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, paaniiyena pucchitabbo {paaniiyena pucchitabbo, paribhojaniiyena pucchitabbo (syaa0)}. sace ussahati, upaahanaa pu~nchitabbaa. upaahanaa pu~nchantena pa.thama.m sukkhena co.lakena pu~nchitabbaa, pacchaa allena. upaahanaapu~nchanaco.laka.m dhovitvaa {dhovitvaa pii.letvaa (syaa0)} ekamanta.m vissajjetabba.m.

[03]``aagantuko ^a^V0.0353^ea^ bhikkhu vu.d.dhataro abhivaadetabbo. senaasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m -- `eta.m te senaasana.m paapu.naatii'ti. ajjhaavu.t.tha.m vaa anajjhaavu.t.tha.m vaa aacikkhitabba.m. gocaro aacikkhitabbo. agocaro aacikkhitabbo. sekkhasammataani kulaani aacikkhitabbaani. vacca.t.thaana.m aacikkhitabba.m. passaava.t.thaana.m aacikkhitabba.m. paaniiya.m aacikkhitabba.m. paribhojaniiya.m aacikkhitabba.m. kattarada.n.do aacikkhitabbo. sa"nghassa katikasa.n.thaana.m aacikkhitabba.m -- `ima.m kaala.m pavisitabba.m, ima.m kaala.m nikkhamitabba'nti ^a^P2.0211^ea^.

[03]``sace navako hoti, nisinnakeneva aacikkhitabba.m -- `atra patta.m nikkhipaahi, atra ciivara.m nikkhipaahi, ida.m aasana.m nisiidaahii'ti. paaniiya.m aacikkhitabba.m. paribhojaniiya.m aacikkhitabba.m. upaahanaapu~nchanaco.laka.m aacikkhitabba.m. aagantuko bhikkhu navako abhivaadaapetabbo. senaasana.m aacikkhitabba.m -- `eta.m ^a^T2.0221^ea^ te senaasana.m paapu.naatii'ti. ajjhaavu.t.tha.m vaa anajjhaavu.t.tha.m vaa aacikkhitabba.m. gocaro aacikkhitabbo. agocaro aacikkhitabbo. sekkhasammataani kulaani aacikkhitabbaani. vacca.t.thaana.m aacikkhitabba.m. passaava.t.thaana.m aacikkhitabba.m. paaniiya.m aacikkhitabba.m. paribhojaniiya.m aacikkhitabba.m. kattarada.n.do aacikkhitabbo. sa"nghassa katikasa.n.thaana.m aacikkhitabba.m -- `ima.m kaala.m pavisitabba.m, ima.m kaala.m nikkhamitabba'nti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0378^ea^, aavaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m yathaa aavaasikehi bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena gamikaa bhikkhuu daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m appa.tisaametvaa dvaaravaatapaana.m vivaritvaa senaasana.m anaapucchaa pakkamanti. daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m nassati. senaasana.m agutta.m hoti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama gamikaa bhikkhuu daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m appa.tisaametvaa dvaaravaatapaana.m vivaritvaa senaasana.m anaapucchaa pakkamissanti! daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m nassati. senaasana.m agutta.m hotii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... sacca.m bhagavaati...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, gamikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa gamikehi ^a^T2.0222^ea^ bhikkhuuhi ^a^V0.0354^ea^ sammaa vattitabba.m. gamikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa dvaaravaatapaana.m thaketvaa senaasana.m aapucchaa pakkamitabba.m {aapucchitabba.m (syaa0)}. sace bhikkhu na hoti, saama.nero aapucchitabbo. sace saama.nero na hoti, aaraamiko aapucchitabbo. sace aaraamiko na hoti, upaasako aapucchitabbo. sace na hoti bhikkhu vaa saama.nero vaa aaraamiko vaa upaasako vaa, catuusu paasaa.nesu ma~nca.m pa~n~napetvaa ma~nce ma~nca.m aaropetvaa pii.the pii.tha.m aaropetvaa senaasana.m upari pu~nja.m karitvaa daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa dvaaravaatapaana.m thaketvaa pakkamitabba.m. sace vihaaro ovassati, sace ussahati, chaadetabbo, ussuka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- `kinti nu kho vihaaro chaadiyethaa'ti. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, yo deso anovassako hoti, tattha catuusu paasaa.nesu ma~nca.m pa~n~napetvaa ma~nce ma~nca.m aaropetvaa pii.the pii.tha.m aaropetvaa senaasana.m upari pu~nja.m karitvaa daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa dvaaravaatapaana.m thaketvaa pakkamitabba.m. sace sabbo vihaaro ovassati, sace ussahati, senaasana.m ^a^T2.0223^ea^ gaama.m atiharitabba.m, ussuka.m vaa kaatabba.m ^a^P2.0212^ea^ ^a^M0.0379^ea^ -- `kinti nu kho senaasana.m gaama.m atihariyethaa'ti. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, ajjhokaase catuusu paasaa.nesu ma~nca.m pa~n~napetvaa ma~nce ma~nca.m aaropetvaa pii.the pii.tha.m aaropetvaa senaasana.m upari pu~nja.m karitvaa daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa ti.nena vaa pa.n.nena vaa pa.ticchaadetvaa pakkamitabba.m -- appeva naama a"ngaanipi seseyyunti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, gamikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m yathaa gamikehi bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bhattagge na anumodanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa bhattagge na anumodissantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhattagge anumoditu''nti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho bhattagge anumoditabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunaa bhattagge anumoditu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0355^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa puugassa sa"nghabhatta.m hoti ^a^T2.0224^ea^. aayasmaa saariputto sa"nghatthero hoti. bhikkhuu -- `bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m therena bhikkhunaa bhattagge anumoditu'nti -- aayasmanta.m saariputta.m ekaka.m ohaaya pakkami.msu. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto te manusse pa.tisammoditvaa pacchaa ekako agamaasi. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m duuratova ekaka.m aagacchanta.m. disvaana aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``kacci, saariputta, bhatta.m iddha.m ahosii''ti? ``iddha.m kho, bhante, bhatta.m ahosi; apica ma.m bhikkhuu ekaka.m ohaaya pakkantaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhattagge catuuhi pa~ncahi theraanutherehi bhikkhuuhi aagametu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0380^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro thero bhattagge vaccito aagamesi. so vacca.m sandhaaretu.m asakkonto mucchito papati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sati kara.niiye aanantarika.m bhikkhu.m aapucchitvaa gantu''nti.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa ^a^P2.0213^ea^ bhattagga.m gacchanti, vokkammapi theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m purato purato gacchanti, therepi bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiidanti ^a^T2.0225^ea^, navepi bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahanti, sa"nghaa.timpi ottharitvaa antaraghare nisiidanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa bhattagga.m gacchissanti, vokkammapi theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m purato purato gacchissanti, therepi bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiidissanti, navepi bhikkhuu aasanenapi pa.tibaahissanti, sa"nghaa.timpi ottharitvaa antaraghare nisiidissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa bhattagga.m gacchanti, vokkammapi theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m purato purato gacchanti, therepi bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiidanti, navepi bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahanti, sa"nghaa.timpi ottharitvaa antaraghare nisiidantii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ ``tena ^a^V0.0356^ea^ hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m bhattaggavatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa bhikkhuuhi bhattagge sammaa vattitabba.m. sace aaraame kaalo aarocito hoti, tima.n.dala.m pa.ticchaadentena parima.n.dala.m nivaasetvaa kaayabandhana.m bandhitvaa sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo paarupitvaa ga.n.thika.m pa.timu~ncitvaa dhovitvaa patta.m gahetvaa saadhuka.m ataramaanena gaamo pavisitabbo.

[03]``na vokkamma theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m purato purato gantabba.m. suppa.ticchannena antaraghare ^a^T2.0226^ea^ gantabba.m. susa.mvutena antaraghare gantabba.m. okkhittacakkhunaa antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukkhittakaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. na ujjagghikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. appasaddena antaraghare gantabba.m. na kaayappacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m ^a^M0.0381^ea^. na baahuppacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na siisappacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na khambhakatena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ogu.n.thitena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukku.tikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m.

[03]``suppa.ticchannena antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. susa.mvutena antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. okkhittacakkhunaa antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. na ukkhittakaaya antaraghare nisiiditabba.m na ujjagghikaaya antaraghare nisiiditabba.m, appasaddena antaraghare nisiiditabba. na kaayappacaalaka.m antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. na baahuppacaalaka.m antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. na siisappacaalaka.m antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. na khambhakatena antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. na ogu.n.thitena antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. na pallatthikaaya antaraghare nisiiditabba.m. na there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiiditabba.m. na navaa bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahitabbaa. na sa"nghaa.ti.m ottharitvaa antaraghare nisiiditabba.m.

[03]``udake diyyamaane ubhohi hatthehi patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa udaka.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena patto dhovitabbo. sace udakappa.tiggaahako hoti, niica.m katvaa udakappa.tiggahe udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m -- maa udakappa.tiggaahako udakena osi~nci {osi~nciyyii (ka0)}, maa ^a^T2.0227^ea^ saamantaa bhikkhuu udakena osi~nci.msu {osi~nciyyi.msu (ka0)}, maa sa"nghaa.ti udakena osi~nciiti. sace udakappa.tiggaahako ^a^P2.0214^ea^ na hoti, niica.m katvaa chamaaya udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m -- maa saamantaa bhikkhuu udakena osi~nci.msu, maa sa"nghaa.ti udakena osi~nciiti.

[03]``odane diyyamaane ubhohi hatthehi patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa odano pa.tiggahetabbo, suupassa okaaso kaatabbo. sace hoti sappi vaa tela.m vaa uttaribha"nga.m vaa, therena vattabbo -- `sabbesa.m ^a^V0.0357^ea^ samaka.m sampaadehii'ti. sakkacca.m pi.n.dapaato pa.tiggahetabbo. pattasa~n~ninaa pi.n.dapaato pa.tiggahetabbo. samasuupako pi.n.dapaato pa.tiggahetabbo. samatittiko pi.n.dapaato pa.tiggahetabbo.

[03]``na taava therena bhu~njitabba.m yaava na sabbesa.m odano sampatto hoti. sakkacca.m pi.n.dapaato bhu~njitabbo. pattasa~n~ninaa pi.n.dapaato bhu~njitabbo. sapadaana.m pi.n.dapaato bhu~njitabbo. samasuupako pi.n.dapaato bhu~njitabbo ^a^M0.0382^ea^. na thuupakato omadditvaa pi.n.dipaato bhu~njitabbo. na suupa.m vaa bya~njana.m vaa odanena pa.ticchaadetabba.m bhiyyokamyata.m upaadaaya. na suupa.m vaa odana.m vaa agilaanena attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njitabba.m. na ujjhaanasa~n~ninaa paresa.m patto oloketabbo. naatimahanto kaba.lo kaatabbo. parima.n.dalo aalopo kaatabbo. na ^a^T2.0228^ea^ anaaha.te kaba.le mukhadvaara.m vivaritabba.m. na bhu~njamaanena sabbo hattho mukhe pakkhipitabbo. na sakaba.lena mukhena byaaharitabba.m. na pi.n.dukkhepaka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na kaba.laavacchedaka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na avaga.n.dakaaraka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na hatthaniddhunaka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na sitthaavakaaraka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na jivhaanicchaaraka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na capucapukaaraka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na surusurukaaraka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na hatthanillehaka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na pattanillehaka.m bhu~njitabba.m. na o.t.thanillehaka.m bhu~njitabba.m.

[03]``na saamisena hatthena paaniiyathaalako pa.tiggahetabbo. na taava therena udaka.m pa.tiggahetabba.m yaava na sabbeva bhuttaavino honti. udake diyyamaane ubhohi hatthehi patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa udaka.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena patto dhovitabbo. sace udakappa.tiggaahako hoti, niica.m katvaa udakappa.tiggahe udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m -- maa udakappa.tiggaahako udakena osi~nci, maa saamantaa bhikkhuu udakena osi~nci.msu, maa sa"nghaa.ti udakena osi~nciiti. sace udakappa.tiggaahako na hoti, niica.m katvaa chamaaya udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m -- maa saamantaa bhikkhuu udakena osi~nci.msu, maa sa"nghaa.ti udakena osi~nciiti. na sasitthaka.m pattadhovana.m antaraghare cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``nivattantena navakehi bhikkhuuhi pa.thamatara.m nivattitabba.m. pacchaa therehi ^a^P2.0215^ea^ suppa.ticchannena antaraghare gantabba.m. susa.mvutena antaraghare gantabba.m. okkhittacakkhunaa antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukkhittakaaya ^a^T2.0229^ea^ antaraghare gantabba.m. na ujjagghikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. appasaddena antaraghare gantabba.m. na kaayappacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na baahuppacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m ^a^V0.0358^ea^. na siisappacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na khambhakatena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ogu.n.thitena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukku.tikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m bhattaggavatta.m yathaa bhikkhuuhi bhattagge sammaa vattitabba''nti.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0383^ea^ kho pana samayena pi.n.dacaarikaa bhikkhuu dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya caranti, asallakkhetvaapi nivesana.m pavisanti, asallakkhetvaapi nikkhamanti, atisahasaapi pavisanti, atisahasaapi nikkhamanti, atiduurepi ti.t.thanti, accaasannepi ti.t.thanti, aticirampi ti.t.thanti, atilahumpi nivattanti. a~n~nataropi pi.n.dacaariko bhikkhu asallakkhetvaa nivesana.m paavisi. so ca dvaara.m ma~n~namaano a~n~natara.m ovaraka.m paavisi. tasmimpi ovarake itthii naggaa uttaanaa nipannaa hoti. addasaa kho so bhikkhu ta.m itthi.m nagga.m uttaana.m nipanna.m. disvaana -- ``nayida.m dvaara.m, ovaraka.m ida''nti ^a^T2.0230^ea^ tamhaa ovarakaa nikkhami. addasaa kho tassaa itthiyaa saamiko ta.m itthi.m nagga.m uttaana.m nipanna.m. disvaana -- ``iminaa me bhikkhunaa pajaapatii duusitaa''ti ta.m bhikkhu.m gahetvaa aako.tesi. atha kho saa itthii tena saddena pa.tibujjhitvaa ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, ayya, ima.m bhikkhu.m aako.tesii''ti? ``iminaasi tva.m bhikkhunaa duusitaa''ti? ``naaha.m, ayya, iminaa bhikkhunaa duusitaa; akaarako so bhikkhuu''ti ta.m bhikkhu.m mu~ncaapesi. atha kho so bhikkhu aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama pi.n.dacaarikaa bhikkhuu dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya carissanti, asallakkhetvaapi nivesana.m pavisissanti, asallakkhetvaapi nikkhamissanti, atisahasaapi pavisissanti, atisahasaapi nikkhamissanti, atiduurepi ti.t.thissanti, accaasannepi ti.t.thissanti, aticirampi ti.t.thissanti, atilahumpi nivattissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... sacca.m bhagavaati...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, pi.n.dacaarikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m pa~n~naapessaami yathaa pi.n.dacaarikehi ^a^V0.0359^ea^ bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba.m. pi.n.dacaarikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `idaani gaama.m pavisissaamii'ti tima.n.dala.m pa.ticchaadentena parima.n.dala.m nivaasetvaa kaayabandhana.m ^a^T2.0231^ea^ bandhitvaa sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo paarupitvaa ga.n.thika.m pa.timu~ncitvaa dhovitvaa patta.m gahetvaa saadhuka.m ataramaanena gaamo pavisitabbo.

[03]``suppa.ticchannena ^a^M0.0384^ea^ antaraghare gantabba.m ^a^P2.0216^ea^. susa.mvutena antaraghare gantabba.m. okkhittacakkhunaa antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukkhittakaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. na ujjagghikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. appasaddena antaraghare gantabba.m. na kaayappacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na baahuppacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na siisappacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na khambhakatena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ogu.n.thitena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukku.tikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m.

[03]``nivesana.m pavisantena sallakkhetabba.m -- `iminaa pavisissaami, iminaa nikkhamissaamii'ti. naatisahasaa pavisitabba.m. naatisahasaa nikkhamitabba.m. naatiduure .thaatabba.m. naaccaasanne .thaatabba.m. naaticira.m .thaatabba.m. naatilahu.m nivattitabba.m. .thitakena sallakkhetabba.m -- `bhikkha.m daatukaamaa vaa adaatukaamaa vaa'ti. sace kamma.m vaa nikkhipati, aasanaa vaa vu.t.thaati, ka.tacchu.m vaa paraamasati, bhaajana.m vaa paraamasati, .thapeti {.thaapeti (ka0)} vaa -- daatukaamassaati {daatukaamiyaati (syaa0), daatukaamaa viyaati (sii0)} .thaatabba.m. bhikkhaaya diyyamaanaaya vaamena hatthena sa"nghaa.ti.m uccaaretvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena patta.m pa.naametvaa ubhohi hatthehi patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa bhikkhaa pa.tiggahetabbaa. na ca bhikkhaadaayikaaya mukha.m ^a^T2.0232^ea^ ulloketabba.m {oloketabba.m (syaa0)}. sallakkhetabba.m -- `suupa.m daatukaamaa vaa adaatukaamaa vaa'ti. sace ka.tacchu.m vaa paraamasati, bhaajana.m vaa paraamasati, .thapeti vaa -- daatukaamassaati .thaatabba.m. bhikkhaaya dinnaaya sa"nghaa.tiyaa patta.m pa.ticchaadetvaa saadhuka.m ataramaanena nivattitabba.m.

[03]``suppa.ticchannena antaraghare gantabba.m. susa.mvutena antaraghare gantabba.m. okkhittacakkhunaa antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukkhittakaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. na ujjagghikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. appasaddena antaraghare gantabba.m. na kaayappacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na baahuppacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na siisappacaalaka.m antaraghare gantabba.m. na khambhakatena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ogu.n.thitena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukku.tikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. yo pa.thama.m gaamato pi.n.daaya pa.tikkamati, tena aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m ^a^V0.0360^ea^ paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m, avakkaarapaati dhovitvaa upa.t.thaapetabbaa, paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. yo pacchaa gaamato pi.n.daaya pa.tikkamati, sace hoti bhuttaavaseso, sace aaka"nkhati, bhu~njitabba.m ^a^M0.0385^ea^. no ce aaka"nkhati, appaharite vaa cha.d.detabba.m, appaa.nake vaa udake opilaapetabba.m. tena aasana.m uddharitabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m pa.tisaametabba.m, avakkaarapaati dhovitvaa pa.tisaametabbaa, paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m pa.tisaametabba.m ^a^T2.0233^ea^, bhattagga.m sammajjitabba.m. yo passati paaniiyagha.ta.m vaa paribhojaniiyagha.ta.m vaa vaccagha.ta.m vaa ritta.m tuccha.m tena upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sacassa hoti avisayha.m, hatthavikaarena dutiya.m aamantetvaa hatthavila"nghakena upa.t.thaapetabba.m, na ca tappaccayaa vaacaa bhinditabbaa. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, pi.n.dacaarikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m yathaa pi.n.dacaarikehi bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu ara~n~ne viharanti. te neva paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapenti, na paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapenti ^a^P2.0217^ea^, na aggi.m upa.t.thaapenti, na ara.nisahita.m upa.t.thaapenti, na nakkhattapadaani jaananti, na disaabhaaga.m jaananti. coraa tattha gantvaa te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``atthi, bhante, paaniiya''nti? ``natthaavuso''ti. ``atthi, bhante, paribhojaniiya''nti? ``natthaavuso''ti. ``atthi, bhante, aggii''ti? ``natthaavuso''ti. ``atthi, bhante, ara.nisahita''nti? ``natthaavuso''ti. ( ) {(atthi bhante nakkhattapadaaniiti, na jaanaama aavusoti, atthi bhante disaabhaaganti, na jaanaama aavusoti.) sii0 vimati.tiikaaya pana sameti} ``kenajja, bhante, yutta''nti? ``na kho maya.m, aavuso, jaanaamaa''ti. ``katamaaya.m, bhante, disaa''ti? ``na kho maya.m, aavuso, jaanaamaa''ti. atha kho te coraa -- `nevimesa.m paaniiya.m atthi, na paribhojaniiya.m atthi, na aggi atthi, na ara.nisahita.m atthi, na nakkhattapadaani jaananti, na disaabhaaga.m jaananti; coraa ime, nayime bhikkhuu'ti -- aako.tetvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha ^a^T2.0234^ea^ kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, aara~n~nikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa aara~n~nikehi bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba.m. aara~n~nikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa kaalasseva u.t.thaaya patta.m thavikaaya pakkhipitvaa a.mse aalaggetvaa ^a^M0.0386^ea^ ciivara.m khandhe karitvaa upaahanaa aarohitvaa daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa dvaaravaatapaana.m thaketvaa senaasanaa otaritabba.m ^a^V0.0361^ea^ -- idaani gaama.m pavisissaamiiti. upaahanaa omu~ncitvaa niica.m katvaa pappho.tetvaa thavikaaya pakkhipitvaa a.mse aalaggetvaa tima.n.dala.m pa.ticchaadentena parima.n.dala.m nivaasetvaa kaayabandhana.m bandhitvaa sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo paarupitvaa ga.n.thika.m pa.timu~ncitvaa dhovitvaa patta.m gahetvaa saadhuka.m ataramaanena gaamo pavisitabbo. suppa.ticchannena antaraghare gantabba.m...pe0... na khambhakatena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ogu.n.thitena antaraghare gantabba.m. na ukku.tikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m.

[03]``nivesana.m pavisantena sallakkhetabba.m -- `iminaa pavisissaami, iminaa nikkhamissaamii'ti. naatisahasaa pavisitabba.m. naatisahasaa nikkhamitabba.m. naatiduure .thaatabba.m. naaccaasanne .thaatabba.m. naaticira.m .thaatabba.m. naatilahu.m nivattitabba.m. .thitakena sallakkhetabba.m -- `bhikkha.m daatukaamaa vaa adaatukaamaa vaa'ti. sace kamma.m vaa nikkhipati, aasanaa vaa vu.t.thaati, ka.tacchu.m vaa paraamasati, bhaajana.m vaa paraamasati, .thapeti vaa -- daatukaamassaati .thaatabba.m. bhikkhaaya diyyamaanaaya vaamena hatthena ^a^T2.0235^ea^ sa"nghaa.ti.m uccaaretvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena patta.m pa.naametvaa ubhohi hatthehi patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa bhikkhaa pa.tiggahetabbaa. na ca bhikkhaadaayikaaya mukha.m ulloketabba.m. sallakkhetabba.m -- `suupa.m daatukaamaa vaa adaatukaamaa vaa'ti. sace ka.tacchu vaa paraamasati, bhaajana.m vaa paraamasati, .thapeti vaa -- daatukaamassaati .thaatabba.m. bhikkhaaya dinnaaya sa"nghaa.tiyaa patta.m pa.ticchaadetvaa saadhuka.m ataramaanena nivattitabba.m.

[03]``suppa.ticchannena antaraghare gantabba.m...pe0... na ukku.tikaaya antaraghare gantabba.m. gaamato nikkhamitvaa patta.m thavikaaya pakkhipitvaa a.mse aalaggetvaa ciivara.m sa"ngharitvaa siise karitvaa upaahanaa aarohitvaa gantabba.m.

[03]``aara~n~nikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m, paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m, aggi upa.t.thaapetabbo, ara.nisahita.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m, kattarada.n.do upa.t.thaapetabbo, nakkhattapadaani uggahetabbaani -- sakalaani vaa ekadesaani vaa, disaakusalena bhavitabba.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, aara~n~nikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vatta.m yathaa aara~n~nikehi bhikkhuuhi sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0387^ea^ ^a^V0.0362^ea^ kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu ajjhokaase ciivarakamma.m ^a^P2.0218^ea^ karonti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pa.tivaate a"nga.ne {pa"nga.ne (sii0 syaa0)} senaasana.m pappho.tesu.m. bhikkhuu rajena okiri.msu. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0236^ea^ te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pa.tivaate a"nga.ne senaasana.m pappho.tessanti! bhikkhuu rajena okiri.msuu''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pa.tivaate a"nga.ne senaasana.m pappho.tenti, bhikkhuu rajena okiri.msuu''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 370^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m senaasanavatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa bhikkhuuhi senaasane sammaa vattitabba.m. yasmi.m vihaare viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. {mahaava0 66, 67; cuu.lava0 357} vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhisibibbohana.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~nco niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; pii.tha.m niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbaa; khe.lamallako niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; apassenaphalaka.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhummatthara.na.m yathaapa~n~natta.m sallakkhetvaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. sace ^a^T2.0237^ea^ vihaare santaanaka.m hoti, ullokaa pa.thama.m ohaaretabba.m, aalokasandhika.n.nabhaagaa pamajjitabbaa. sace gerukaparikammakataa bhitti ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace kaa.lava.n.nakataa bhuumi ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace akataa hoti bhuumi, udakena paripphositvaa pariphositvaa sammajjitabbaa -- maa vihaaro rajena uha~n~niiti. sa"nkaara.m vicinitvaa ekamanta.m cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``na ^a^M0.0388^ea^ bhikkhusaamantaa senaasana.m pappho.tetabba.m. na vihaarasaamantaa senaasana.m pappho.tetabba.m. na paaniiyasaamantaa senaasana.m pappho.tetabba.m. na paribhojaniiyasaamantaa senaasana.m pappho.tetabba.m. na pa.tivaate a"nga.ne senaasana.m pappho.tetabba.m. adhovaate senaasana.m pappho.tetabba.m.

[03]``bhummatthara.na.m ^a^V0.0363^ea^ ekamanta.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa ekamanta.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa ^a^P2.0219^ea^ atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbaa. ma~nco ekamanta.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabbo. pii.tha.m ekamanta.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m ekamanta.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa ^a^T2.0238^ea^ atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m ekamanta.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. khe.lamallako ekamanta.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbo. apassenaphalaka.m ekamanta.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabba.m. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m.

[03]``sace puratthimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, puratthimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace pacchimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace uttaraa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti uttaraa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace dakkhi.naa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace siitakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, ratti.m thaketabbaa. sace u.nhakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa, ratti.m vivaritabbaa.

[03]``sace ^a^M0.0389^ea^ parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace upa.t.thaanasaalaa ^a^T2.0239^ea^ uklaapaa hoti, upa.t.thaanasaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace aggisaalaa uklaapaa hoti, aggisaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paaniiya.m na hoti, paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace paribhojaniiya.m na hoti, paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace vu.d.dhena saddhi.m ekavihaare viharati, na vu.d.dha.m anaapucchaa uddeso daatabbo, na paripucchaa daatabbaa, na sajjhaayo kaatabbo, na dhammo bhaasitabbo, na padiipo kaatabbo, na padiipo ^a^V0.0364^ea^ vijjhaapetabbo, na vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, na vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace ^a^P2.0220^ea^ vu.d.dhena saddhi.m ekaca"nkame ca"nkamati, yena vu.d.dho tena parivattitabba.m, na ca vu.d.dho sa"nghaa.tika.n.nena gha.t.tetabbo. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m senaasanavatta.m yathaa bhikkhuuhi senaasane sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jantaaghare therehi bhikkhuuhi nivaariyamaanaa anaadariya.m pa.ticca pahuuta.m ka.t.tha.m aaropetvaa aggi.m datvaa dvaara.m thaketvaa dvaare nisiidanti. bhikkhuu {theraa ca bhikkhuu (syaa0 ka.m0)} u.nhaabhitattaa dvaara.m alabhamaanaa mucchitaa papatanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi ^a^T2.0240^ea^ naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jantaaghare therehi bhikkhuuhi nivaariyamaanaa anaadariya.m pa.ticca pahuuta.m ka.t.tha.m aaropetvaa aggi.m datvaa dvaara.m thaketvaa dvaare nisiidissanti! bhikkhuu u.nhaabhitattaa dvaara.m alabhamaanaa mucchitaa papatantii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jantaaghare therehi bhikkhuuhi nivaariyamaanaa anaadariya.m pa.ticca pahuuta.m ka.t.tha.m aaropetvaa aggi.m datvaa dvaara.m thaketvaa dvaare nisiidanti; bhikkhuu u.nhaabhitattaa dvaara.m alabhamaanaa mucchitaa papatantii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na ^a^M0.0390^ea^, bhikkhave, jantaaghare therena bhikkhunaa nivaariyamaanena anaadariya.m pa.ticca pahuuta.m ka.t.tha.m aaropetvaa aggi daatabbo. yo dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na, bhikkhave, dvaara.m thaketvaa dvaare nisiiditabba.m. yo nisiideyya, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m jantaagharavatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa bhikkhuuhi jantaaghare sammaa vattitabba.m. yo pa.thama.m jantaaghara.m gacchati, sace chaarikaa ussannaa hoti, chaarikaa cha.d.detabbaa. sace jantaaghara.m uklaapa.m hoti, jantaaghara.m sammajjitabba.m. sace paribha.n.da.m uklaapa.m hoti, paribha.n.da.m sammajjitabba.m. sace parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo ^a^T2.0241^ea^. sace jantaagharasaalaa uklaapaa hoti, jantaagharasaalaa sammajjitabbaa.

[03]``cu.n.na.m sannetabba.m, mattikaa temetabbaa, udakado.nikaaya udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m. jantaaghara.m ^a^V0.0365^ea^ pavisantena mattikaaya mukha.m makkhetvaa purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. na there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiiditabba.m. na navaa bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahitabbaa. sace ussahati, jantaaghare theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m parikamma.m kaatabba.m. jantaagharaa nikkhamantena jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaagharaa nikkhamitabba.m. sace ussahati, udakepi theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m parikamma.m kaatabba.m. na theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m puratopi nahaayitabba.m, na ^a^P2.0221^ea^ uparitopi nahaayitabba.m. nahaatena uttarantena otarantaana.m maggo daatabbo. yo pacchaa jantaagharaa nikkhamati, sace jantaaghara.m cikkhalla.m hoti, dhovitabba.m. mattikaado.nika.m dhovitvaa jantaagharapii.tha.m pa.tisaametvaa aggi.m vijjhaapetvaa dvaara.m thaketvaa pakkamitabba.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m jantaagharavatta.m yathaa bhikkhuuhi jantaaghare sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu braahma.najaatiko vacca.m katvaa na icchati aacametu.m -- ko ima.m vasala.m duggandha.m ^a^T2.0242^ea^ aamasissatiiti ^a^M0.0391^ea^ {aacamissatiiti (ka0)}. tassa vaccamagge kimi sa.n.thaati. atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso, vacca.m katvaa na aacamesii''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu vacca.m katvaa na aacamessatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, vacca.m katvaa na aacamesii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, vacca.m katvaa sati udake naacametabba.m. yo naacameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu vaccaku.tiyaa yathaavu.d.dha.m vacca.m karonti. navakaa bhikkhuu pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa vaccitaa aagamenti. te vacca.m sandhaarentaa mucchitaa papatanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira bhikkhave...pe0... sacca.m bhagavaati...pe0... ``na, bhikkhave, vaccaku.tiyaa yathaavu.d.dha.m vacco kaatabbo. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aagatapa.tipaa.tiyaa vacca.m kaatu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu atisahasaapi vaccaku.ti.m pavisanti, ubbhajitvaapi ^a^V0.0366^ea^ {ubbhujjitvaapi (sii0), ubbhujitvaa (syaa0)} pavisanti, nitthunantaapi vacca.m karonti ^a^T2.0243^ea^, dantaka.t.tha.m khaadantaapi vacca.m karonti, bahiddhaapi vaccado.nikaaya vacca.m karonti, bahiddhaapi passaavado.nikaaya passaava.m karonti, passaavado.nikaayapi khe.la.m karonti, pharusenapi ka.t.thena avalekhanti, avalekhanaka.t.thampi vaccakuupamhi paatenti, atisahasaapi nikkhamanti, ubbhajitvaapi nikkhamanti, capucapukaarakampi aacamenti, aacamanasaraavakepi udaka.m sesenti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti ^a^P2.0222^ea^ -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu atisahasaapi vaccaku.ti.m pavisissanti, ubbhajitvaapi pavisissanti, nitthunantaapi vacca.m karissanti, dantaka.t.tha.m khaadantaapi vacca.m karissanti, bahiddhaapi vaccado.nikaaya vacca.m karissanti, bahiddhaapi passaavado.nikaaya passaava.m karissanti, passaavado.nikaayapi khe.la.m karissanti, pharusenapi ka.t.thena avalekhissanti, avalekhanaka.t.thampi vaccakuupamhi paatessanti, atisahasaapi nikkhamissanti, ubbhajitvaapi nikkhamissanti, capucapukaarakampi aacamessanti, aacamanasaraavakepi udaka.m sesessantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^M0.0392^ea^ aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... sacca.m bhagavaati...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 374^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m vaccaku.tivatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa bhikkhuuhi vaccaku.tiyaa sammaa vattitabba.m. yo ^a^T2.0244^ea^ vaccaku.ti.m gacchati tena bahi .thitena {bahi .thitena (sii0 ka0)} ukkaasitabba.m. anto nisinnenapi ukkaasitabba.m. ciivarava.mse vaa ciivararajjuyaa vaa ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa saadhuka.m ataramaanena vaccaku.tii pavisitabbaa. naatisahasaa pavisitabbaa. na ubbhajitvaa pavisitabbaa. vaccapaadukaaya .thitena ubbhajitabba.m. na nitthunantena vacco kaatabbo. na dantaka.t.tha.m khaadantena vacco kaatabbo. na bahiddhaa vaccado.nikaaya vacco kaatabbo. na bahiddhaa passaavado.nikaaya passaavo kaatabbo. na passaavado.nikaaya khe.lo kaatabbo. na pharusena ka.t.thena avalekhitabba.m. na avalekhanaka.t.tha.m vaccakuupamhi paatetabba.m. vaccapaadukaaya .thitena pa.ticchaadetabba.m. naatisahasaa nikkhamitabba.m. na ubbhajitvaa nikkhamitabba.m. aacamanapaadukaaya .thitena ubbhajitabba.m. na capucapukaaraka.m aacametabba.m. na aacamanasaraavake udaka.m sesetabba.m. aacamanapaadukaaya .thitena pa.ticchaadetabba.m.

[03]``sace vaccaku.ti uhataa {uuhataa (sii0 syaa0)} hoti, dhovitabbaa. sace avalekhanapidharo puuro hoti, avalekhanaka.t.tha.m cha.d.detabba.m. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paribha.n.da.m uklaapa.m hoti, paribha.n.da.m sammajjitabba.m. sace parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m ^a^V0.0367^ea^. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m ^a^T2.0245^ea^. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m vaccaku.tivatta.m yathaa bhikkhuuhi vaccaku.tiyaa sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena saddhivihaarikaa upajjhaayesu na sammaa vattanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama saddhivihaarikaa upajjhaayesu na sammaa vattissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikaa upajjhaayesu na sammaa vattantii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti vigarahi buddho ^a^M0.0393^ea^ bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikaa upajjhaayesu ^a^P2.0223^ea^ na sammaa vattissanti! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikaana.m upajjhaayesu vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa saddhivihaarikehi upajjhaayesu sammaa vattitabba.m. {mahaava0 66} saddhivihaarikena, bhikkhave, upajjhaayamhi sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa --

[03]``kaalasseva u.t.thaaya upaahanaa omu~ncitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dantaka.t.tha.m daatabba.m, mukhodaka.m daatabba.m, aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m. sace yaagu hoti, bhaajana.m dhovitvaa yaagu upanaametabbaa. yaagu.m piitassa udaka.m datvaa bhaajana.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa pa.tisaametabba.m. upajjhaayamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti ^a^T2.0246^ea^, so deso sammajjitabbo.

[03]``sace upajjhaayo gaama.m pavisitukaamo hoti, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, kaayabandhana.m daatabba.m, sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo daatabbaa, dhovitvaa patto sodako {saudako (ka0)} daatabbo. sace upajjhaayo pacchaasama.na.m aaka"nkhati, tima.n.dala.m pa.ticchaadentena parima.n.dala.m nivaasetvaa kaayabandhana.m bandhitvaa sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo paarupitvaa ga.n.thika.m pa.timu~ncitvaa dhovitvaa patta.m gahetvaa upajjhaayassa pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m. naatiduure gantabba.m, naaccaasanne gantabba.m ^a^V0.0368^ea^, pattapariyaapanna.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. na upajjhaayassa bha.namaanassa antarantaraa kathaa opaatetabbaa. upajjhaayo aapattisaamantaa bha.namaano nivaaretabbo.

[03]``nivattantena pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m, paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m daatabba.m, nivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. sace ciivara.m sinna.m hoti, muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabba.m, na ca u.nhe ciivara.m nidahitabba.m. ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m. ciivara.m sa"ngharantena catura"ngula.m ka.n.na.m ussaaretvaa ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m -- maa majjhe bha"ngo ahosiiti. obhoge kaayabandhana.m kaatabba.m.

[03]``sace ^a^M0.0394^ea^ pi.n.dapaato hoti, upajjhaayo ca bhu~njitukaamo hoti, udaka.m datvaa pi.n.dapaato ^a^T2.0247^ea^ upanaametabbo. upajjhaayo paaniiyena pucchitabbo. bhuttaavissa udaka.m datvaa patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa vodaka.m katvaa muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabbo. na ca u.nhe patto nidahitabbo. pattaciivara.m ^a^P2.0224^ea^ nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. upajjhaayamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m pa.tisaametabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
[03]``sace upajjhaayo nahaayitukaamo hoti, nahaana.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace siitena attho hoti, siita.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace u.nhena attho hoti, u.nha.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m.

[03]``sace upajjhaayo jantaaghara.m pavisitukaamo hoti, cu.n.na.m sannetabba.m, mattikaa temetabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya upajjhaayassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gantvaa jantaagharapii.tha.m datvaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m, cu.n.na.m daatabba.m, mattikaa daatabbaa. sace ussahati, jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. jantaaghara.m pavisantena mattikaaya mukha.m makkhetvaa purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa ^a^T2.0248^ea^ jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. na there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiiditabba.m. na navaa bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahitabbaa. jantaaghare upajjhaayassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. jantaagharaa ^a^V0.0369^ea^ nikkhamantena jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaagharaa nikkhamitabba.m.

[03]``udakepi upajjhaayassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. nahaatena pa.thamatara.m uttaritvaa attano gatta.m vodaka.m katvaa nivaasetvaa upajjhaayassa gattato udaka.m pamajjitabba.m, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, sa"nghaa.ti daatabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m. upajjhaayo paaniiyena pucchitabbo. sace uddisaapetukaamo hoti, uddisitabbo. sace paripucchitukaamo hoti, paripucchitabbo.

[03]``yasmi.m ^a^M0.0395^ea^ vihaare upajjhaayo viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhisibibbohana.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~nco niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena ^a^P2.0225^ea^, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; pii.tha.m niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbaa; khe.lamallako niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; apassenaphalaka.m ^a^T2.0249^ea^ niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhuumatthara.na.m yathaapa~n~natta.m sallakkhetvaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. sace vihaare santaanaka.m hoti, ullokaa pa.thama.m ohaaretabba.m, aalokasandhika.n.nabhaagaa pamajjitabbaa. sace gerukaparikammakataa bhitti ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace kaa.lava.n.nakataa bhuumi ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace akataa hoti bhuumi, udakena paripphositvaa pariphositvaa sammajjitabbaa -- maa vihaaro rajena uha~n~niiti. sa"nkaara.m vicinitvaa ekamanta.m cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``bhuumatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbaa. ma~nco otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabbo. pii.tha.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m ^a^V0.0370^ea^ otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. khe.lamallako otaapetvaa ^a^T2.0250^ea^ pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbo. apassenaphalaka.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabba.m. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto ^a^M0.0396^ea^ nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m.

[03]``sace puratthimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, puratthimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace pacchimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace uttaraa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, uttaraa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace dakkhi.naa ^a^P2.0226^ea^ sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace siitakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, ratti.m thaketabbaa. sace u.nhakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa, ratti.m vivaritabbaa.

[03]``sace parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace upa.t.thaanasaalaa uklaapaa hoti, upa.t.thaanasaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace aggisaalaa uklaapaa hoti, aggisaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paaniiya.m na hoti, paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace paribhojaniiya.m na hoti, paribhojaniiya.m ^a^T2.0251^ea^ upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace upajjhaayassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, saddhivihaarikena vuupakaasetabbo, vuupakaasaapetabbo, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace upajjhaayassa kukkucca.m uppanna.m hoti, saddhivihaarikena vinodetabba.m, vinodaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace upajjhaayassa di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti, saddhivihaarikena vivecetabba.m, vivecaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace upajjhaayo garudhamma.m ajjhaapanno hoti parivaasaaraho, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaayassa parivaasa.m dadeyyaati. sace upajjhaayo muulaayapa.tikassanaaraho hoti, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaaya.m muulaaya pa.tikasseyyaati. sace upajjhaayo maanattaaraho hoti, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaayassa maanatta.m dadeyyaati. sace ^a^V0.0371^ea^ upajjhaayo abbhaanaaraho hoti, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho ^a^M0.0397^ea^ sa"ngho upajjhaaya.m abbheyyaati. sace sa"ngho upajjhaayassa kamma.m kattukaamo hoti, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaayassa kamma.m na kareyya, lahukaaya vaa pari.naameyyaati. kata.m ^a^T2.0252^ea^ vaa panassa hoti sa"nghena kamma.m, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayo sammaa vatteyya, loma.m paateyya, netthaara.m vatteyya, sa"ngho ta.m kamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaati.

[03]``sace upajjhaayassa ciivara.m dhovitabba.m hoti ^a^P2.0227^ea^, saddhivihaarikena dhovitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayassa ciivara.m dhoviyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa ciivara.m kaatabba.m hoti, saddhivihaarikena kaatabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayassa ciivara.m kariyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa rajanaa pacitabbaa hoti, saddhivihaarikena pacitabbaa, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayassa rajana.m paciyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa ciivara.m rajitabba.m {rajetabba.m (syaa0)} hoti, saddhivihaarikena rajitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayassa ciivara.m rajiyethaati. ciivara.m rajantena {rajentena (syaa0)} saadhuka.m samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajitabba.m, na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabba.m.

[03]``na upajjhaaya.m anaapucchaa ekaccassa patto daatabbo, na ekaccassa patto pa.tiggahetabbo; na ekaccassa ciivara.m daatabba.m, na ekaccassa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m; na ekaccassa parikkhaaro daatabbo, na ekaccassa parikkhaaro pa.tiggahetabbo; na ekaccassa kesaa chedetabbaa {chettabbaa (sii0), cheditabbaa (ka0)}, na ekaccena kesaa ^a^T2.0253^ea^ chedaapetabbaa; na ekaccassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m, na ekaccena parikamma.m kaaraapetabba.m; na ekaccassa veyyaavacco {veyyaavacca.m (ka0)} kaatabbo, na ekaccena veyyaavacco kaaraapetabbo; na ekaccassa pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m, na ekacco pacchaasama.no aadaatabbo; na ekaccassa pi.n.dapaato niiharitabbo, na ekaccena pi.n.dapaato niiharaapetabbo; na upajjhaaya.m anaapucchaa gaamo pavisitabbo; na susaana.m gantabba.m; na disaa pakkamitabbaa. sace upajjhaayo gilaano hoti, yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo ^a^M0.0398^ea^, vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikaana.m upajjhaayesu vatta.m yathaa saddhivihaarikehi upajjhaayesu sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0372^ea^ kho pana samayena upajjhaayaa saddhivihaarikesu na sammaa vattanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama upajjhaayaa saddhivihaarikesu na sammaa vattissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, upajjhaayaa saddhivihaarikesu na sammaa vattantii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 378^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, upajjhaayaana.m saddhivihaarikesu vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa upajjhaayehi saddhivihaarikesu sammaa vattitabba.m. {mahaava0 67} upajjhaayena, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikamhi sammaa vattitabba.m ^a^P2.0228^ea^. tatraaya.m ^a^T2.0254^ea^ sammaavattanaa --

[03]``upajjhaayena, bhikkhave, saddhivihaariko sa"ngahetabbo anuggahetabbo uddesena paripucchaaya ovaadena anusaasaniyaa. sace upajjhaayassa patto hoti, saddhivihaarikassa patto na hoti, upajjhaayena saddhivihaarikassa patto daatabbo, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa patto uppajjiyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa ciivara.m hoti, saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m na hoti, upajjhaayena saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m daatabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m uppajjiyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa parikkhaaro hoti, saddhivihaarikassa parikkhaaro na hoti, upajjhaayena saddhivihaarikassa parikkhaaro daatabbo, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa parikkhaaro uppajjiyethaati.
