[03]``udakepi ^a^V0.0374^ea^ saddhivihaarikassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. nahaatena pa.thamatara.m uttaritvaa attano gatta.m vodaka.m katvaa nivaasetvaa saddhivihaarikassa gattato udaka.m pamajjitabba.m, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, sa"nghaa.ti daatabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m. saddhivihaariko paaniiyena pucchitabbo.

[03]``yasmi.m vihaare saddhivihaariko viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m niiharitvaa ^a^T2.0257^ea^ ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m...pe0... sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace saddhivihaarikassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, upajjhaayena vuupakaasetabbo, vuupakaasaapetabbo, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace saddhivihaarikassa kukkucca.m uppanna.m hoti, upajjhaayena vinodetabba.m, vinodaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace saddhivihaarikassa ^a^P2.0230^ea^ di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti, upajjhaayena vivecetabba.m, vivecaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace saddhivihaariko garudhamma.m ajjhaapanno hoti parivaasaaraho, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho saddhivihaarikassa parivaasa.m dadeyyaati. sace saddhivihaariko muulaayapa.tikassanaaraho hoti, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho saddhivihaarika.m muulaaya pa.tikasseyyaati. sace saddhivihaariko maanattaaraho hoti, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho ^a^M0.0401^ea^ saddhivihaarikassa maanatta.m dadeyyaati. sace saddhivihaariko abbhaanaaraho hoti, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho saddhivihaarika.m abbheyyaati. sace sa"ngho saddhivihaarikassa kamma.m kattukaamo hoti, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho saddhivihaarikassa kamma.m na kareyya, lahukaaya vaa pari.naameyyaati. kata.m vaa panassa ^a^T2.0258^ea^ hoti sa"nghena kamma.m, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa, ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaariko sammaa vatteyya loma.m paateyya, netthaara.m vatteyya, sa"ngho ta.m kamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaati.

[03]``sace saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m dhovitabba.m hoti, upajjhaayena aacikkhitabba.m -- eva.m dhoveyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m dhoviyethaati. sace ^a^V0.0375^ea^ saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m kaatabba.m hoti, upajjhaayena aacikkhitabba.m -- eva.m kareyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m kariyethaati. sace saddhivihaarikassa rajana.m pacitabba.m hoti, upajjhaayena aacikkhitabba.m -- eva.m paceyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa rajana.m paciyethaati. sace saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m rajitabba.m hoti, upajjhaayena aacikkhitabba.m -- eva.m rajeyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m rajiyethaati. ciivara.m rajantena saadhuka.m samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajitabba.m, na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabba.m. sace saddhivihaariko gilaano hoti, yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo, vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0231^ea^, upajjhaayaana.m saddhivihaarikesu vatta.m yathaa upajjhaayehi saddhivihaarikesu sammaa vattitabba''nti.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 379^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0259^ea^ kho pana samayena antevaasikaa aacariyesu na sammaa vattanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama antevaasikaa aacariyesu na sammaa vattissantii''ti! atha ^a^M0.0402^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, antevaasikaa aacariyesu na sammaa vattantii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 380^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, antevaasikaana.m aacariyesu vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa antevaasikehi aacariyesu sammaa vattitabba.m. {mahaava0 78} antevaasikena, bhikkhave, aacariyamhi sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa --

[03]``kaalasseva u.t.thaaya upaahanaa omu~ncitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dantaka.t.tha.m daatabba.m, mukhodaka.m daatabba.m, aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m. sace yaagu hoti, bhaajana.m dhovitvaa yaagu upanaametabbaa. yaagu.m piitassa udaka.m datvaa bhaajana.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena ^a^V0.0376^ea^ dhovitvaa pa.tisaametabba.m. aacariyamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.

[03]``sace aacariyo gaama.m pavisitukaamo hoti, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, kaayabandhana.m daatabba.m, sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo daatabbaa, dhovitvaa patto ^a^T2.0260^ea^ sodako daatabbo. sace aacariyo pacchaasama.na.m aaka"nkhati, tima.n.dala.m pa.ticchaadentena parima.n.dala.m nivaasetvaa kaayabandhana.m bandhitvaa sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo paarupitvaa ga.n.thika.m pa.timu~ncitvaa dhovitvaa patta.m gahetvaa aacariyassa pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m. naatiduure gantabba.m, naaccaasanne gantabba.m, pattapariyaapanna.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. na aacariyassa bha.namaanassa antarantaraa kathaa opaatetabbaa. aacariyo aapattisaamantaa bha.namaano nivaaretabbo.

[03]``nivattantena pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m, paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m daatabba.m, nivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. sace ciivara.m sinna.m hoti, muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabba.m, na ca u.nhe ciivara.m nidahitabba.m. ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m. ciivara.m sa"ngharantena catura"ngula.m ka.n.na.m ussaaretvaa ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m -- maa majjhe bha"ngo ahosiiti. obhoge kaayabandhana.m kaatabba.m.

[03]``sace pi.n.dapaato hoti, aacariyo ca bhu~njitukaamo hoti, udaka.m datvaa pi.n.dapaato upanaametabbo. aacariyo paaniiyena pucchitabbo ^a^M0.0403^ea^. bhuttaavissa udaka.m datvaa patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa vodaka.m katvaa muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabbo, na ca u.nhe patto nidahitabbo. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m ^a^T2.0261^ea^ vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. aacariyamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m pa.tisaametabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
[03]``sace aacariyo nahaayitukaamo hoti, nahaana.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace siitena attho hoti, siita.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace u.nhena attho hoti, u.nha.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m.

[03]``sace ^a^V0.0377^ea^ aacariyo jantaaghara.m pavisitukaamo hoti, cu.n.na.m sannetabba.m, mattikaa temetabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya aacariyassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gantvaa jantaagharapii.tha.m datvaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m, cu.n.na.m daatabba.m, mattikaa daatabbaa. sace ussahati, jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. jantaaghara.m pavisantena mattikaaya mukha.m makkhetvaa purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. na there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiiditabba.m. na navaa bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahitabbaa. jantaaghare aacariyassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. jantaagharaa nikkhamantena jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaagharaa nikkhamitabba.m.

[03]``udakepi aacariyassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. nahaatena pa.thamatara.m uttaritvaa attano ^a^T2.0262^ea^ gatta.m vodaka.m katvaa nivaasetvaa aacariyassa gattato udaka.m pamajjitabba.m, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, sa"nghaa.ti daatabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m. aacariyo paaniiyena pucchitabbo. sace uddisaapetukaamo hoti, uddisitabbo. sace paripucchitukaamo hoti, paripucchitabbo.

[03]``yasmi.m ^a^M0.0404^ea^ vihaare aacariyo viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhisibibbohana.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~nco niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; pii.tha.m niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbaa; khe.lamallako niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; apassenaphalaka.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhuumatthara.na.m yathaapa~n~natta.m sallakkhetvaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. sace vihaare santaanaka.m hoti, ullokaa pa.thama.m ohaaretabba.m, aalokasandhika.n.nabhaagaa pamajjitabbaa. sace gerukaparikammakataa bhitti ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace kaa.lava.n.nakataa ^a^T2.0263^ea^ bhuumi ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace akataa hoti bhuumi, udakena paripphositvaa pariphositvaa sammajjitabbaa -- maa vihaaro rajena uha~n~niiti. sa"nkaara.m vicinitvaa ekamanta.m cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``bhuumatthara.na.m ^a^V0.0378^ea^ otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbaa. ma~nco otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabbo. pii.tha.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. khe.lamallako otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbo. apassenaphalaka.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabba.m. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa ^a^M0.0405^ea^ patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m ^a^T2.0264^ea^ vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m.

[03]``sace puratthimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, puratthimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace pacchimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace uttaraa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, uttaraa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace dakkhi.naa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace siitakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, ratti.m thaketabbaa. sace u.nhakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa, ratti.m vivaritabbaa.

[03]``sace parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace upa.t.thaanasaalaa uklaapaa hoti, upa.t.thaanasaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace aggisaalaa uklaapaa hoti, aggisaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paaniiya.m na hoti, paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace paribhojaniiya.m na hoti, paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace aacariyassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, antevaasikena vuupakaasetabbaa, vuupakaasaapetabbaa, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace aacariyassa kukkucca.m uppanna.m hoti, antevaasikena vinodetabba.m, vinodaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace aacariyassa di.t.thigata.m ^a^V0.0379^ea^ uppanna.m hoti ^a^T2.0265^ea^, antevaasikena vivecetabba.m, vivecaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace aacariyo garudhamma.m ajjhaapanno hoti, parivaasaaraho, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariyassa parivaasa.m dadeyyaati. sace aacariyo muulaayapa.tikassanaaraho hoti, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariya.m muulaaya pa.tikasseyyaati. sace aacariyo maanattaaraho hoti, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariyassa maanatta.m dadeyyaati. sace aacariyo abbhaanaaraho hoti, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariya.m abbheyyaati. sace sa"ngho aacariyassa ^a^M0.0406^ea^ kamma.m kattukaamo hoti, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariyassa kamma.m na kareyya, lahukaaya vaa pari.naameyyaati. kata.m vaa panassa hoti sa"nghena kamma.m, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyo sammaa vatteyya, loma.m paateyya, netthaara.m vatteyya, sa"ngho ta.m kamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaati.

[03]``sace aacariyassa ciivara.m dhovitabba.m hoti, antevaasikena dhovitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyassa ciivara.m dhoviyethaati. sace aacariyassa ciivara.m kaatabba.m hoti, antevaasikena kaatabba.m, ussukka.m ^a^T2.0266^ea^ vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyassa ciivara.m kariyethaati. sace aacariyassa rajana.m pacitabba.m hoti, antevaasikena pacitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyassa rajana.m paciyethaati. sace aacariyassa ciivara.m rajitabba.m hoti, antevaasikena rajitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyassa ciivara.m rajiyethaati. ciivara.m rajantena saadhuka.m samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajitabba.m, na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabba.m.

[03]``na aacariya.m anaapucchaa ekaccassa patto daatabbo, na ekaccassa patto pa.tiggahetabbo; na ekaccassa ciivara.m daatabba.m, na ekaccassa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m; na ekaccassa parikkhaaro daatabbo, na ekaccassa parikkhaaro pa.tiggahetabbo; na ekaccassa kesaa cheditabbaa, na ekaccena kesaa chedaapetabbaa; na ekaccassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m, na ekaccena parikamma.m kaaraapetabba.m; na ekaccassa veyyaavacco kaatabbo, na ekaccena veyyaavacco kaaraapetabbo; na ekaccassa pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m, na ekacco pacchaasama.no aadaatabbo; na ekaccassa pi.n.dapaato niiharitabbo, na ekaccena pi.n.dapaato niiharaapetabbo; na ^a^V0.0380^ea^ aacariya.m anaapucchaa gaamo pavisitabbo; na susaana.m gantabba.m; na disaa pakkamitabbaa. sace aacariyo gilaano hoti, yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo ^a^M0.0407^ea^, vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, antevaasikaana.m aacariyesu vatta.m yathaa ^a^T2.0267^ea^ antevaasikehi aacariyesu sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aacariyaa antevaasikesu na sammaa vattanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aacariyaa antevaasikesu na sammaa vattissantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, aacariyaa antevaasikesu na sammaa vattantii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, bhikkhave, aacariyaana.m antevaasikesu vatta.m pa~n~napessaami yathaa aacariyehi antevaasikesu sammaa vattitabba.m. {mahaava0 79} aacariyena, bhikkhave, antevaasikamhi sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa --

[03]``aacariyena, bhikkhave, antevaasiko sa"ngahetabbo anuggahetabbo uddesena paripucchaaya ovaadena anusaasaniyaa. sace aacariyassa patto hoti, antevaasikassa patto na hoti, aacariyena antevaasikassa patto daatabbo, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa patto uppajjiyethaati. sace aacariyassa ciivara.m hoti, antevaasikassa ciivara.m na hoti, aacariyena antevaasikassa ciivara.m daatabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa ciivara.m uppajjiyethaati. sace aacariyassa parikkhaaro hoti, antevaasikassa ^a^T2.0268^ea^ parikkhaaro na hoti, aacariyena antevaasikassa parikkhaaro daatabbo, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa parikkhaaro uppajjiyethaati.

[03]``sace antevaasiko gilaano hoti, kaalasseva u.t.thaaya dantaka.t.tha.m daatabba.m, mukhodaka.m daatabba.m, aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m. sace yaagu hoti ^a^M0.0408^ea^, bhaajana.m dhovitvaa yaagu upanaametabbaa. yaagu.m piitassa udaka.m datvaa bhaajana.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa pa.tisaametabba.m ^a^V0.0381^ea^. antevaasikamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.

[03]``sace antevaasiko gaama.m pavisitukaamo hoti, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, kaayabandhana.m daatabba.m, sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo daatabbaa, dhovitvaa patto sodako daatabbo.

[03]``ettaavataa nivattissatiiti aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m, paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m daatabba.m, nivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. sace ciivara.m sinna.m hoti, muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabba.m, na ca u.nhe ciivara.m nidahitabba.m. ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m. ciivara.m sa"ngharantena catura"ngula.m ka.n.na.m ussaaretvaa ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m -- maa majjhe bha"ngo ahosiiti. obhoge kaayabandhana.m kaatabba.m.

[03]``sace pi.n.dapaato hoti, antevaasiko ca bhu~njitukaamo hoti, udaka.m datvaa pi.n.dapaato upanaametabbo. antevaasiko ^a^T2.0269^ea^ paaniiyena pucchitabbo. bhuttaavissa udaka.m datvaa patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa vodaka.m katvaa muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabbo, na ca u.nhe patto nidahitabbo. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena...pe0... ciivara.m nikkhipantena...pe0... paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. antevaasikamhi u.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m pa.tisaametabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
[03]``sace antevaasiko nahaayitukaamo hoti, nahaana.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace siitena attho hoti, siita.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace u.nhena attho hoti, u.nha.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m.

[03]``sace antevaasiko jantaaghara.m pavisitukaamo hoti, cu.n.na.m sannetabba.m, mattikaa temetabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya {aadaaya antevaasikassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito (ka0)} gantvaa jantaagharapii.tha.m datvaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m, cu.n.na.m daatabba.m, mattikaa daatabbaa. sace ussahati jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. jantaaghara.m pavisantena ^a^M0.0409^ea^ mattikaaya mukha.m makkhetvaa purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. na there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiiditabba.m. na navaa bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahitabbaa ^a^V0.0382^ea^. jantaaghare antevaasikassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. jantaagharaa nikkhamantena jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaagharaa nikkhamitabba.m.

[03]``udakepi antevaasikassa ^a^T2.0270^ea^ parikamma.m kaatabba.m. nahaatena pa.thamatara.m uttaritvaa attano gatta.m vodaka.m katvaa nivaasetvaa antevaasikassa gattato udaka.m pamajjitabba.m, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, sa"nghaa.ti daatabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m, antevaasiko paaniiyena pucchitabbo.

[03]``yasmi.m vihaare antevaasiko viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m...pe0... aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace antevaasikassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, aacariyena vuupakaasetabbo, vuupakaasaapetabbo, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace antevaasikassa kukkucca.m uppanna.m hoti, aacariyena vinodetabba.m, vinodaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace antevaasikassa di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti, aacariyena vivecetabba.m, vivecaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace antevaasiko garudhamma.m ajjhaapanno hoti, parivaasaaraho, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasikassa parivaasa.m dadeyyaati. sace antevaasiko muulaayapa.tikassanaaraho hoti, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasika.m muulaaya pa.tikasseyyaati. sace antevaasiko maanattaaraho hoti, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m ^a^T2.0271^ea^ -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasikassa maanatta.m dadeyyaati. sace antevaasiko abbhaanaaraho hoti, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasika.m abbheyyaati. sace sa"ngho antevaasikassa kamma.m kattukaamo hoti, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasikassa kamma.m na kareyya ^a^M0.0410^ea^, lahukaaya vaa pari.naameyyaati. kata.m vaa panassa hoti, sa"nghena kamma.m, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasiko sammaa vatteyya, loma.m paateyya, netthaara.m vatteyya, sa"ngho ta.m kamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaati.

[03]``sace ^a^V0.0383^ea^ antevaasikassa ciivara.m dhovitabba.m hoti, aacariyena aacikkhitabba.m -- eva.m dhoveyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa ciivara.m dhoviyethaati. sace antevaasikassa ciivara.m kaatabba.m hoti, aacariyena aacikkhitabba.m -- eva.m kareyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa ciivara.m kariyethaati. sace antevaasikassa rajana.m pacitabba.m hoti, aacariyena aacikkhitabba.m -- eva.m paceyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa rajana.m paciyethaati. sace antevaasikassa ciivara.m rajitabba.m hoti, aacariyena aacikkhitabba.m -- eva.m rajeyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m ^a^T2.0272^ea^ -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa ciivara.m rajiyethaati. ciivara.m rajantena saadhuka.m samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajitabba.m. na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabba.m. sace antevaasiko gilaano hoti, yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo, vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, aacariyaana.m antevaasikesu vatta.m yathaa aacariyehi antevaasikesu sammaa vattitabba''nti.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ {udaa0 45; a0 ni0 8.20} tena ^a^T2.0283^ea^ ^a^P2.0236^ea^ ^a^M0.0418^ea^ ^a^V0.0392^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatu paasaade. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto nisinno hoti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa nikkhante pa.thame yaame u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pa.thamo yaamo, ciranisinno bhikkhusa"ngho. uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti. eva.m vutte bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa nikkhante majjhime yaame u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto majjhimo yaamo, ciranisinno bhikkhusa"ngho. uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa nikkhante pacchime yaame uddhaste aru.ne nandimukhiyaa rattiyaa u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaa ^a^T2.0284^ea^, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pacchimo yaamo, uddhasta.m aru.na.m nandimukhi ratti, ciranisinno bhikkhusa"ngho. uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti. ``aparisuddhaa, aananda, parisaa''ti.

[03]atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa etadahosi -- ``ka.m nu kho bhagavaa puggala.m sandhaaya evamaaha -- `aparisuddhaa, aananda, parisaa'''ti? atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano sabbaavanta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m cetasaa ceto paricca manasaakaasi. addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m puggala.m dussiila.m paapadhamma.m asucisa"nkassarasamaacaara.m pa.ticchannakammanta.m assama.na.m sama.napa.ti~n~na.m abrahmacaari.m brahmacaaripa.ti~n~na.m antopuuti.m avassuta.m kasambujaata.m {kasambukajaata.m (ka0)} majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa nisinna.m. disvaana yena so puggalo ^a^M0.0419^ea^ tenupasa"nkami ^a^P2.0237^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m puggala.m etadavoca -- ``u.t.thehi, aavuso, di.t.thosi bhagavataa; natthi te bhikkhuuhi ^a^V0.0393^ea^ saddhi.m sa.mvaaso''ti. eva.m vutte so puggalo tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m puggala.m etadavoca -- ``u.t.thehi, aavuso, di.t.thosi bhagavataa; natthi te bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvaaso''ti. dutiyampi kho so puggalo tu.nhii ahosi. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m puggala.m etadavoca -- ``u.t.thehi, aavuso, di.t.thosi bhagavataa; natthi te bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvaaso''ti. tatiyampi kho so puggalo tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m puggala.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa ^a^T2.0285^ea^ bahidvaarako.t.thakaa nikkhaametvaa suucigha.tika.m datvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``nikkhaamito so, bhante, puggalo mayaa; suddhaa parisaa; uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti.
[03]``acchariya.m, moggallaana, abbhuta.m, moggallaana, yaava baahaagaha.naapi naama so moghapuriso aagamessatii''ti! atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --
[03] 384^b^.^eb^ {udaa0 45; a0 ni0 8.19} ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti. katame a.t.tha?

[03]``mahaasamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapo.no anupubbapabbhaaro na aayatakeneva papaato. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapo.no anupubbapabbhaaro na aayatakeneva papaato -- aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naativattati. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naativattati -- aya.m {ayampi (syaa0)}, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03]``puna ^a^M0.0420^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati ^a^T2.0286^ea^. ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m, ta.m khippa~n~neva tiira.m vaaheti, thala.m ussaareti. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati, ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m, ta.m khippa~n~neva tiira.m ^a^V0.0394^ea^ vaaheti, thala.m ussaareti -- aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa, yamunaa, aciravatii, sarabhuu, mahii, taa mahaasamudda.m pattaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, mahaasamuddo tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti. yampi, bhikkhave, yaakaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa, yamunaa, aciravatii, sarabhuu, mahii, taa mahaasamudda.m pattaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, mahaasamuddo tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti -- aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde catuttho ^a^P2.0238^ea^ acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yaa ca {yaakaaci (syaa0)} loke savantiyo mahaasamudda.m appenti, yaa ca antalikkhaa dhaaraa papatanti, na tena mahaasamuddassa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati. yampi, bhikkhave, yaa ca loke savantiyo mahaasamudda.m appenti, yaa ca ^a^T2.0287^ea^ antalikkhaa dhaaraa papatanti, na tena mahaasamuddassa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati -- aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde pa~ncamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo ekaraso lo.naraso. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo ekaraso lo.naraso -- aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde cha.t.tho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo bahuratano {bahuutaratano (ka0)} anekaratano. tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- muttaa, ma.ni, ve.luriyo, sa"nkho, silaa, pavaa.la.m, rajata.m, jaataruupa.m, lohitako, masaaragalla.m. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- muttaa, ma.ni, ve.luriyo, sa"nkho, silaa, pavaa.la.m, rajata.m, jaataruupa.m, lohitako ^a^M0.0421^ea^, masaaragalla.m -- aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso. tatrime bhuutaa -- timi, timi"ngalo, timitimi"ngalo {timirapi"ngalo (sii0), timitimi"ngalo mahaatimi"ngalo (syaa0 ka.m0)}, asuraa, naagaa, gandhabbaa. santi mahaasamudde yojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, dviyojanasatikaapi ^a^T2.0288^ea^ attabhaavaa, tiyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, catuyojanasatikaapi ^a^V0.0395^ea^ attabhaavaa, pa~ncayojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso, tatrime bhuutaa -- timi, timi"ngalo, timitimi"ngalo, asuraa, naagaa, gandhabbaa; santi mahaasamudde, yojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa...pe0... pa~ncayojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa -- aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde a.t.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti. ime kho, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde a.t.tha acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhirama''nti.
[03] 385^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye a.t.tha acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti. katame a.t.tha?

[03]``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapo.no anupubbapabbhaaro na aayatakeneva papaato; evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa na aayatakeneva a~n~naapa.tivedho. yampi, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa na aayatakeneva a~n~naapa.tivedho -- aya.m, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03]``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naativattati ^a^T2.0289^ea^; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ya.m mayaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, ta.m mama saavakaa jiivitahetupi naatikkamanti. yampi, bhikkhave, mayaa mama saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m ^a^M0.0422^ea^ pa~n~natta.m, ta.m ^a^P2.0239^ea^ mama saavakaa jiivitahetupi naatikkamanti -- aya.m, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03]``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati, ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m ta.m khippameva tiira.m vaaheti, thala.m ussaareti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo so puggalo dussiilo paapadhammo asucisa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato, na tena sa"ngho sa.mvasati, khippameva na.m sannipatitvaa ukkhipati, ki~ncaapi kho so hoti majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa ^a^V0.0396^ea^ nisinno. atha kho so aarakaava sa"nghamhaa, sa"ngho ca tena. yampi, bhikkhave, yo so puggalo dussiilo paapadhammo asucisa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato, na tena sa"ngho sa.mvasati, khippameva na.m sannipuutitvaa ukkhipati, ki~ncaapi kho so hoti majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa nisinno, atha kho so aarakaava sa"nghamhaa, sa"ngho ca tena -- aya.m ^a^T2.0290^ea^, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03]``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa, yamunaa, aciravatii, sarabhuu, mahii, taa mahaasamudda.m pattaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, mahaasamuddo tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattaarome va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa. te tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitvaa {pabbajitaa (sii0)} jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti. yampi, bhikkhave, cattaarome va.n.naa khattiyaa braahma.naa vessaa suddaa, te tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitvaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti -- aya.m, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03]``seyyathaapi ^a^M0.0423^ea^, bhikkhave, yaa ca loke savantiyo mahaasamudda.m appenti, yaa ca antalikkhaa dhaaraa papatanti, na tena mahaasamuddassa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bahuu cepi bhikkhuu anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayanti, na tena nibbaanadhaatuyaa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati. yampi, bhikkhave, bahuu cepi bhikkhuu anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayanti ^a^T2.0291^ea^, na tena nibbaanadhaatuyaa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati -- aya.m, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye pa~ncamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03]``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo ekaraso lo.naraso, evameva kho, bhikkhave, aya.m dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso. yampi, bhikkhave, aya.m dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso -- aya.m, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye cha.t.tho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03]``seyyathaapi ^a^V0.0397^ea^, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- muttaa, ma.ni, ve.luriyo, sa"nkho, silaa, pavaa.la.m, rajata.m, jaataruupa.m, lohitako, masaaragalla.m; evameva ^a^P2.0240^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, aya.m dhammavinayo bahuratano anekaratano. tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, cattaaro iddhipaadaa, pa~ncindriyaani, pa~nca balaani, satta bojjha"ngaa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. yampi, bhikkhave, aya.m dhammavinayo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa...pe0... ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo -- aya.m, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03]``seyyathaapi ^a^T2.0292^ea^, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso, tatrime bhuutaa -- timi, timi"ngalo, timitimi"ngalo, asuraa, naagaa, gandhabbaa, santi mahaasamudde yojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, dviyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, tiyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, catuyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, pa~ncayojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aya.m dhammavinayo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso. tatrime bhuutaa -- sotaapanno, sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno; sakadaagaamii, sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya ^a^M0.0424^ea^ pa.tipanno; anaagaamii, anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno; arahaa, arahattaphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno. yampi, bhikkhave, aya.m dhammavinayo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso, tatrime bhuutaa -- sotaapanno, sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno...pe0... arahaa, arahataphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno -- aya.m, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye a.t.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti. ``ime kho, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye a.t.tha acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramantii''ti.
[03]atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] {udaa0 45} ``channamativassati {suchannamativassati (ka0)}, viva.ta.m naativassati.
[22] tasmaa channa.m vivaretha, eva.m ta.m naativassatii''ti..

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0398^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``nadaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, ito ^a^T2.0293^ea^ para.m uposatha.m karissaami, paatimokkha.m uddisissaami. tumhevadaani, bhikkhave, ito para.m uposatha.m kareyyaatha, paatimokkha.m uddiseyyaatha. a.t.thaanameta.m, bhikkhave, anavakaaso ya.m tathaagato aparisuddhaaya parisaaya uposatha.m kareyya, paatimokkha.m uddiseyya. na ca, bhikkhave {na ca bhikkhave bhikkhunaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, saapattikena paatimokkha.m sotabba.m. yo su.neyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yo saapattiko paatimokkha.m su.naati, tassa paatimokkha.m .thapetu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, .thapetabba.m. tadahuposathe caatuddase vaa pannarase vaa tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe ^a^P2.0241^ea^ udaaharitabba.m --
[03]`su.naatu me bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo puggalo saapattiko, tassa paatimokkha.m .thapemi, na tasmi.m sammukhiibhuute paatimokkha.m uddisitabba'nti .thapita.m hoti paatimokkha''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0425^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu `naamhe koci jaanaatii'ti saapattikaava paatimokkha.m su.nanti. theraa bhikkhuu paracittaviduno bhikkhuuna.m aarocenti -- ``itthannaamo ca itthannaamo ca, aavuso, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu `naamhe koci jaanaatii'ti saapattikaava paatimokkha.m su.nantii''ti. assosu.m kho chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu -- ``theraa kira bhikkhuu paracittaviduno amhe bhikkhuuna.m aarocenti -- itthannaamo ca itthannaamo ca, aavuso, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu `naamhe koci ^a^T2.0294^ea^ jaanaatii'ti saapattikaava paatimokkha.m su.nantii''ti.

[03]te -- puramhaaka.m pesalaa bhikkhuu paatimokkha.m .thapentiiti -- pa.tikacceva suddhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anaapattikaana.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne paatimokkha.m .thapenti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu suddhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anaapattikaana.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne paatimokkha.m .thapessantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu suddhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anaapattikaana.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne paatimokkha.m .thapentii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, suddhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anaapattikaana.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne paatimokkha.m .thapetabba.m. yo .thapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa''.

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ ``eka.m ^a^V0.0399^ea^, bhikkhave, adhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m, eka.m dhammika.m; paatimokkha.t.thapana.m {eka.m dhammika.m (sii0 syaa0)}, dve adhammikaani; paatimokkha.t.thapanaani, dve dhammikaani; tii.ni adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani, tii.ni dhammikaani, cattaari adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani, cattaari dhammikaani; pa~nca adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani, pa~nca dhammikaani; cha adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani, cha dhammikaani; satta adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani, satta dhammikaani; a.t.tha adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani, a.t.tha dhammikaani; nava adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani ^a^T2.0295^ea^, nava dhammikaani; dasa adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani, dasa dhammikaani.

[03]``katama.m ^a^M0.0426^ea^ eka.m adhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m? amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- ida.m eka.m adhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m. katama.m eka.m dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m? samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- ida.m eka.m dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m.

[03]``katamaani dve adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa ^a^P2.0242^ea^ paatimokkha.m .thapeti, amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani dve adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani dve dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, samuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani dve dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03]``katamaani tii.ni adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, amuulikaaya di.t.thivipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani tii.ni adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani tii.ni dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? samuulikaaya ^a^T2.0296^ea^ siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, samuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, samuulikaaya di.t.thivipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani tii.ni dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03]``katamaani cattaari adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, amuulikaaya di.t.thivipattiyaa ^a^V0.0400^ea^ paatimokkha.m .thapeti, amuulikaaya aajiivavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani cattaari adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani cattaari dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, samuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, samuulikaaya di.t.thivipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti, samuulikaaya aajiivavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani cattaari dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03]``katamaani pa~nca adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? amuulakena paaraajikena paatimokkha.m .thapeti, amuulakena sa"nghaadisesena...pe0... amuulakena paacittiyena... amuulakena paa.tidesaniiyena... amuulakena dukka.tena paatimokkha.m ^a^M0.0427^ea^ .thapeti -- imaani pa~nca adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani pa~nca dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? samuulakena paaraajikena paatimokkha.m .thapeti, samuulakena sa"nghaadisesena...pe0... ^a^T2.0297^ea^ paacittiyena... paa.tidesaniiyena... dukka.tena paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani pa~nca dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03]``katamaani cha adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya, amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti kataaya; amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya, amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti kataaya; amuulikaaya di.t.thivipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya, amuulikaaya di.t.thivipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti kataaya -- imaani cha adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani cha dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya, samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti kataaya; samuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa...pe0... di.t.thivipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya...pe0... kataaya -- imaani cha dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03]``katamaani satta adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? amuulakena paaraajikena paatimokkha.m .thapeti, amuulakena sa"nghaadisesena...pe0... ^a^T2.0298^ea^ thullaccayena paacittiyena paa.tidesaniiyena dukka.tena dubbhaasitena paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani satta adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani satta dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? samuulakena paaraajikena paatimokkha.m .thapeti, samuulakena ^a^V0.0401^ea^ sa"nghaadisesena...pe0... thullaccayena paacittiyena paa.tidesaniiyena dukka.tena dubbhaasitena paatimokkha.m .thapeti -- imaani satta dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03]``katamaani a.t.tha adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya, amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti kataaya; amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa ^a^P2.0243^ea^...pe0... di.t.thivipattiyaa...pe0... aajiivavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya...pe0... kataaya -- imaani a.t.tha adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani ^a^T2.0299^ea^ a.t.tha dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya, samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti ^a^M0.0428^ea^ kataaya; samuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa...pe0... di.t.thivipattiyaa...pe0... aajiivavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya...pe0... kataaya. imaani a.t.tha dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03]``katamaani nava adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya, amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti kataaya, amuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti kataakataaya; amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa...pe0... di.t.thivipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya...pe0... kataaya...pe0... kataakataaya imaani nava adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani nava dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya, samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m ^a^T2.0300^ea^ .thapeti kataaya, samuulikaaya siilavipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti kataakataaya; samuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa...pe0... di.t.thivipattiyaa paatimokkha.m .thapeti akataaya...pe0... kataaya -- kataakataaya...pe0... imaani nava dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03]``katamaani dasa adhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? na paaraajiko tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti, na paaraajikakathaa vippakataa hoti; na sikkha.m paccakkhaatako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti, na sikkha.m paccakkhaatakathaa vippakataa hoti; dhammika.m saamaggi.m upeti, na dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyati, na dhammikaaya saamaggiyaa paccaadaanakathaa vippakataa hoti; na siilavipattiyaa di.t.thasutaparisa"nkito hoti, na aacaaravipattiyaa di.t.thasutaparisa"nkito hoti, na di.t.thivipattiyaa di.t.thasutaparisa"nkito hoti -- imaani dasa adhammikaani ^a^V0.0402^ea^ paatimokkha.t.thapanaani. katamaani dasa dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani? paaraajiko tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti, paaraajikakathaa vippakataa hoti; sikkha.m paccakkhaatako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti, sikkha.m paccakkhaatakathaa vippakataa hoti; dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upeti, dhammika.m saamaggi.m ^a^T2.0301^ea^ paccaadiyati, dhammikaaya saamaggiyaa paccaadaanakathaa vippakataa hoti; siilavipattiyaa di.t.thasutaparisa"nkito hoti, aacaaravipattiyaa di.t.thasutaparisa"nkito hoti, di.t.thivipattiyaa di.t.thasutaparisa"nkito hoti -- imaani dasa dhammikaani paatimokkha.t.thapanaani.

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^M0.0429^ea^ paaraajiko tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, yehi aakaarehi yehi li"ngehi yehi nimittehi paaraajikassa dhammassa ajjhaapatti hoti, tehi aakaarehi tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehi bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapajjanta.m. na heva kho bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati paaraajika.m ^a^P2.0244^ea^ dhamma.m ajjhaapajjanta.m, api ca a~n~no bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `itthannaamo, aavuso, bhikkhu paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanno'ti. na heva kho bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapajjanta.m, naapi {naapi ca (ka0)} a~n~no bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `itthannaamo, aavuso, bhikkhu paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanno'ti, apica sova bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `aha.m, aavuso, paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanno'ti. aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tena di.t.thena tena sutena taaya parisa"nkaaya tadahuposathe caatuddase vaa pannarase vaa tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaahareyya --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo puggalo paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanno, tassa paatimokkha.m .thapemi, na tasmi.m sammukhiibhuute ^a^T2.0302^ea^ paatimokkha.m uddisitabbanti -- dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ ``bhikkhussa paatimokkhe .thapite parisaa vu.t.thaati, dasanna.m antaraayaana.m a~n~natarena {a~n~natarena antaraayena (syaa0 ka.m0)} -- raajantaraayena vaa, corantaraayena vaa, agyantaraayena vaa, udakantaraayena vaa, manussantaraayena vaa, amanussantaraayena vaa, vaa.lantaraayena vaa, sariisapantaraayena vaa, jiivitantaraayena ^a^V0.0403^ea^ vaa, brahmacariyantaraayena vaa. aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tasmi.m vaa aavaase, a~n~nasmi.m vaa aavaase, tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaahareyya --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa puggalassa paaraajikakathaa vippakataa, ta.m vatthu avinicchita.m. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ta.m vatthu.m vinicchineyyaati.
[03]``eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, tadahuposathe caatuddase vaa pannarase vaa tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaaharitabba.m --

[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0430^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa puggalassa paaraajikakathaa vippakataa, ta.m vatthu avinicchita.m. tassa paatimokkha.m .thapemi, na tasmi.m sammukhiibhuute paatimokkha.m uddisitabbanti -- dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaatako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yehi aakaarehi yehi li"ngehi yehi ^a^T2.0303^ea^ nimittehi sikkhaa paccakkhaataa hoti, tehi aakaarehi tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehi bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati sikkha.m paccakkhanta.m. na heva kho bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati sikkha.m paccakkhanta.m, apica a~n~no bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `itthannaamena, aavuso, bhikkhunaa sikkhaa paccakkhaataa'ti. na heva kho bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati sikkha.m paccakkhanta.m, naapi a~n~no ^a^P2.0245^ea^ bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `itthannaamena, aavuso, bhikkhunaa sikkhaa paccakkhaataa'ti, apica sova bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `mayaa, aavuso, sikkhaa paccakkhaataa'ti. aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tena di.t.thena tena sutena taaya parisa"nkaaya tadahuposathe caatuddase vaa pannarase vaa tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaahareyya --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamena puggalena sikkhaa paccakkhaataa, tassa paatimokkha.m .thapemi, na tasmi.m sammukhiibhuute paatimokkha.m uddisitabbanti -- dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ ``bhikkhussa paatimokkhe .thapite parisaa vu.t.thaati, dasanna.m antaraayaana.m a~n~natarena -- raajantaraayena vaa ^a^V0.0404^ea^ ...pe0... brahmacariyantaraayena vaa, aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tasmi.m vaa aavaase, a~n~nasmi.m vaa aavaase, tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaahareyya --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa puggalassa sikkha.m paccakkhaatakathaa {sikkhaapaccakkhaatakathaa (sii0)} vippakataa, ta.m vatthu avinicchita.m. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ta.m vatthu.m vinicchineyyaati.
[03]``eva~nceta.m ^a^T2.0304^ea^ labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, tadahuposathe caatuddase vaa pannarase vaa tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaaharitabba.m --

[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0431^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa puggalassa sikkha.m paccakkhaatakathaa vippakataa, ta.m vatthu avinicchita.m. tassa paatimokkha.m .thapemi, na tasmi.m sammukhiibhuute paatimokkha.m uddisitabbanti -- dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upeti? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yehi aakaarehi yehi li"ngehi yehi nimittehi dhammikaaya saamaggiyaanupagamana.m hoti, tehi aakaarehi tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehi bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upenta.m. na heva kho bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upenta.m, api ca a~n~no bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `itthannaamo, aavuso, bhikkhu dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upetii'ti. na heva kho bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upenta.m, naapi a~n~no bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `itthannaamo, aavuso, bhikkhu dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upetii'ti, api ca sova bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `aha.m, aavuso, dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upemii'ti. aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tena di.t.thena tena sutena taaya parisa"nkaaya tadahuposathe caatuddase vaa ^a^P2.0246^ea^ pannarase vaa tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaahareyya --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo puggalo dhammika.m saamaggi.m na upeti ^a^T2.0305^ea^, tassa paatimokkha.m .thapemi, na tasmi.m sammukhiibhuute paatimokkha.m uddisitabbanti -- dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yehi aakaarehi yehi li"ngehi yehi nimittehi dhammikaaya saamaggiyaa paccaadaana.m hoti, tehi aakaarehi ^a^V0.0405^ea^ tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehi bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyanta.m na heva kho bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyanta.m, api ca a~n~no bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `itthannaamo, aavuso, bhikkhu dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyatii'ti. na heva kho bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyanta.m, naapi a~n~no bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `itthannaamo, aavuso, bhikkhu dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyatii'ti, api ca sova bhikkhu bhikkhussa aaroceti -- `aha.m, aavuso, dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyaamii'ti ^a^M0.0432^ea^. aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tena di.t.thena tena sutena taaya parisa"nkaaya tadahuposathe caatuddase vaa pannarase vaa tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaahareyya --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo puggalo dhammika.m saamaggi.m paccaadiyati, tassa paatimokkha.m .thapemi, na tasmi.m sammukhiibhuute paatimokkha.m uddisitabbanti -- dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m.

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ ``bhikkhussa paatimokkhe .thapite parisaa vu.t.thaati, dasanna.m antaraayaana.m a~n~natarena -- raajantaraayena vaa...pe0... brahmacariyantaraayena ^a^T2.0306^ea^ vaa. aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tasmi.m vaa aavaase, a~n~nasmi.m vaa aavaase, tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaahareyya --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa puggalassa dhammikaaya saamaggiyaa paccaadaanakathaa vippakataa, ta.m vatthu avinicchita.m. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ta.m vatthu.m vinicchineyyaati.
[03]``eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, tadahuposathe caatuddase vaa pannarase vaa tasmi.m puggale sammukhiibhuute sa"nghamajjhe udaaharitabba.m --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamassa puggalassa dhammikaaya saamaggiyaa paccaadaanakathaa vippakataa, ta.m vatthu avinicchita.m. tassa paatimokkha.m .thapemi, na tasmi.m sammukhiibhuute paatimokkha.m uddisitabbanti -- dhammika.m paatimokkha.t.thapana.m.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa upaali yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa upaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``attaadaana.m aadaatukaamena, bhante, bhikkhunaa katama"ngasamannaagata.m {kata"ngasamannaagata.m (ka0)} attaadaana.m aadaatabba''nti?

[03] {pari0 440} ``attaadaana.m ^a^M0.0435^ea^ ^a^V0.0408^ea^ aadaatukaamena, upaali, bhikkhunaa pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m. attaadaana.m aadaatukaamena, upaali, bhikkhunaa eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo, kaalo nu kho ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m udaahu no'ti? sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `akaalo ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m, no kaalo'ti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03]``sace panupaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `kaalo ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m, no akaalo'ti, tenupaali, bhikkhunaa uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo, bhuuta.m nu kho ida.m attaadaana.m udaahu no'ti? sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `abhuuta.m ida.m attaadaana.m, no bhuuta'nti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03]``sace panupaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano ^a^T2.0310^ea^ eva.m jaanaati -- `bhuuta.m ida.m attaadaana.m, no abhuuta'nti, tenupaali, bhikkhunaa uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo, atthasa~nhita.m nu kho ida.m attaadaana.m udaahu no'ti? sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `anatthasa~nhita.m ida.m attaadaana.m, no atthasa~nhita'nti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03]``sace panupaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `atthasa~nhita.m ida.m attaadaana.m, no anatthasa~nhita'nti, tenupaali, bhikkhunaa uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ima.m kho aha.m attaadaana.m aadiyamaano labhissaami sandi.t.the sambhatte bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe udaahu no'ti? sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ima.m kho aha.m attaadaana.m aadiyamaano na labhissaami sandi.t.the sambhatte bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe'ti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03]``sace panupaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ima.m kho aha.m ^a^P2.0248^ea^ attaadaana.m aadiyamaano labhissaami sandi.t.the sambhatte bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe'ti, tenupaali, bhikkhunaa uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ima.m kho me attaadaana.m aadiyato bhavissati sa"nghassa tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado sa"nghabhedo sa"ngharaaji sa"nghavavatthaana.m sa"nghanaanaakara.na.m udaahu no'ti? sace upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ima.m kho me attaadaana.m ^a^V0.0409^ea^ aadiyato bhavissati sa"nghassa tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado sa"nghabhedo sa"ngharaaji sa"nghavavatthaana.m ^a^M0.0436^ea^ sa"nghanaanaakara.na'nti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m. sace panupaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ima.m kho me attaadaana.m aadiyato na bhavissati sa"nghassa tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho ^a^T2.0311^ea^ vivaado sa"nghabhedo sa"ngharaaji sa"nghavavatthaana.m sa"nghanaanaakara.na'nti, aadaatabba.m ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m. eva.m pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m kho, upaali, attaadaana.m aadinna.m, pacchaapi avippa.tisaarakara.m bhavissatii'ti.

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ {pari0 436 (a0 ni0 10.44 thoka.m visadisa.m)} ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena kati dhamme ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo''ti? ``codakena, upaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo.

[03]``codakena, upaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi kaayasamaacaarena samannaagato -- acchiddena appa.tima.msena? sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, upaali, bhikkhu parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhena kaayasamaacaarena samannaagato -- acchiddena appa.tima.msena, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa kaayika.m sikkhassuu'ti. itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03]``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi vaciisamaacaarena samannaagato -- acchiddena appa.tima.msena? sa.mvijjati nu ^a^T2.0312^ea^ kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, upaali, bhikkhu parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhena vaciisamaacaarena samannaagato -- acchiddena appa.tima.msena, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa vaacasika.m sikkhassuu'ti. itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03]``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `metta.m nu kho me citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m sabrahmacaariisu anaaghaata.m ^a^P2.0249^ea^, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, upaali, bhikkhuno mettacitta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu anaaghaata.m ^a^V0.0410^ea^, tassa ^a^M0.0437^ea^ bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa sabrahmacaariisu mettacitta.m upa.t.thaapehii'ti. itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03]``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `bahussuto nu khomhi, sutadharo, sutasanniccayo? ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa, saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaa me dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa? sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, upaali, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti, sutadharo, sutasanniccayo; ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa, saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m ^a^T2.0313^ea^ parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupassa dhammaa na bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa aagama.m pariyaapu.nassuu'ti. itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03]``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ubhayaani kho me paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti, suvibhattaani, suppavattiini, suvinicchitaani -- suttaso, anubya~njanaso? sa.mvi~njati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, upaali, bhikkhuno ubhayaani paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti, suvibhattaani, suppavattiini, suvinicchitaani -- suttaso, anubya~njanaso, `ida.m panaavuso, kattha vutta.m bhagavataa'ti, iti pu.t.tho na sampaayati {na sampaadayati (ka0)}, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa, vinaya.m pariyaapu.nassuu'ti. itissa bhavanti vattaaro. codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo''ti.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena kati dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''ti? ``codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo -- kaalena vakkhaami, no akaalena; bhuutena vakkhaami, no ^a^T2.0314^ea^ abhuutena; sa.nhena ^a^M0.0438^ea^ vakkhaami, no pharusena; atthasa.mhitena vakkhaami, no anatthasa.mhitena; mettacitto ^a^V0.0411^ea^ vakkhaami, no dosantaroti. codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''ti.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ ``adhammacodakassa, bhante, bhikkhuno katiihaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro ^a^P2.0250^ea^ upadahaatabbo''ti? ``adhammacodakassa, upaali, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- akaalenaayasmaa codesi, no kaalena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; abhuutenaayasmaa codesi, no bhuutena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; pharusenaayasmaa codesi, no sa.nhena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; anatthasa.mhitenaayasmaa codesi, no atthasa.mhitena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; dosantaro aayasmaa codesi, no mettacitto, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraayaati. adhammacodakassa, upaali, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa na a~n~nopi bhikkhu abhuutena codetabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti.

[03]``adhammacuditassa pana, bhante, bhikkhuno katihaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo''ti? ``adhammacuditassa, upaali, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- akaalenaayasmaa cudito, no kaalena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; abhuutenaayasmaa cudito, no bhuutena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; pharusenaayasmaa cudito ^a^T2.0315^ea^, no sa.nhena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; anatthasa.mhitenaayasmaa cudito, no atthasa.mhitena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; dosantarenaayasmaa cudito, no mettacittena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraayaati. adhammacuditassa, upaali, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo''ti.

[03]``dhammacodakassa, bhante, bhikkhuno katihaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo''ti? ``dhammacodakassa, upaali, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- kaalenaayasmaa codesi, no akaalena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; bhuutenaayasmaa codesi, no abhuutena ^a^M0.0439^ea^, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; sa.nhenaayasmaa codesi, no pharusena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; atthasa.mhitenaayasmaa codesi, no anatthasa.mhitena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; mettacitto aayasmaa codesi, no dosantaro, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraayaati. dhammacodakassa, upaali, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa a~n~nopi bhikkhu bhuutena codetabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti.

[03]``dhammacuditassa ^a^V0.0412^ea^ pana, bhante, bhikkhuno katihaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo''ti? ``dhammacuditassa, upaali, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- kaalenaayasmaa cudito, no akaalena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; bhuutenaayasmaa cudito, no abhuutena ^a^T2.0316^ea^, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; sa.nhenaayasmaa cudito, no pharusena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; atthasa.mhitenaayasmaa cudito, no anatthasa.mhitena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; mettacittenaayasmaa cudito, no dosantarena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraayaati. dhammacuditassa, upaali, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo''ti.

[03] {pari0 438} ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena kati dhamme ajjhatta.m manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo''ti? ``codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo -- kaaru~n~nataa, hitesitaa, anukampitaa, {anukampataa (ka0)} aapattivu.t.thaanataa, vinayapurekkhaarataati. codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m ^a^P2.0251^ea^ manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo''ti.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 8.51 ida.m vatthu aagata.m} tena ^a^T2.0320^ea^ ^a^P2.0253^ea^ ^a^M0.0442^ea^ ^a^V0.0415^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho mahaapajaapati {mahaapajaapatii (sii0 syaa0)} gotamii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho mahaapajaapati gotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, bhante, labheyya maatugaamo tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja''nti. ``ala.m, gotami, maa te rucci maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaa''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho mahapajaapati gotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, bhante, labheyya maatugaamo tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja''nti. ``ala.m, gotami, maa te rucci maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaa''ti. atha kho mahaapajaapati gotamii -- na bhagavaa anujaanaati maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjanti -- dukkhii dummanaa assumukhii rudamaanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa kapilavatthusmi.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena vesaalii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane ^a^T2.0321^ea^ kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho mahaapajaapati gotamii kese chedaapetvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa sambahulaahi saakiyaaniihi saddhi.m yena vesaalii tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena vesaalii mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkami. atha kho mahaapajaapati gotamii suunehi paadehi rajoki.n.nena gattena dukkhii dummanaa assumukhii rudamaanaa ^a^V0.0416^ea^ bahidvaarako.t.thake a.t.thaasi. addasaa kho aayasmaa ^a^P2.0254^ea^ aanando mahaapajaapati.m gotami.m suunehi paadehi rajoki.n.nena gattena dukkhi.m dummana.m assumukhi.m rudamaana.m bahidvaarako.t.thake .thita.m. disvaana mahaapajaapati.m gotami.m ^a^M0.0443^ea^ etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, gotami, suunehi paadehi rajoki.n.nena gattena dukkhii dummanaa assumukhii rudamaanaa bahidvaarako.t.thake .thitaa''ti? ``tathaa hi pana, bhante aananda, na bhagavaa anujaanaati maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja''nti. ``tena hi tva.m, gotami, muhutta.m idheva taava hohi, yaavaaha.m bhagavanta.m yaacaami maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja''nti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``esaa, bhante, mahaapajaapati gotamii suunehi paadehi rajoki.n.nena gattena dukkhii dummanaa assumukhii rudamaanaa bahidvaarako.t.thake .thitaa -- na bhagavaa ^a^T2.0322^ea^ anujaanaati maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjanti. saadhu, bhante, labheyya maatugaamo tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja''nti. ``ala.m, aananda, maa te rucci maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaa''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, bhante, labheyya maatugaamo tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja''nti. ``ala.m, aananda, maa te rucci maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaa''ti.
