[03]atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma.m kaatabba.m. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]atha kho mahaapajaapati gotamii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho mahaapajaapati gotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yaani taani, bhante, bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapadaani bhikkhuuhi saadhaara.naani, katha.m maya.m, bhante, tesu sikkhaapadesu pa.tipajjaamaa''ti? ``yaani taani, gotami, bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapadaani bhikkhuuhi saadhaara.naani, yathaa bhikkhuu sikkhanti tathaa tesu sikkhaapadesu sikkhathaa''ti. ``yaani pana taani, bhante, bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapadaani bhikkhuuhi asaadhaara.naani, katha.m maya.m, bhante, tesu sikkhaapadesu pa.tipajjaamaa''ti? ``yaani taani, gotami, bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapadaani bhikkhuuhi asaadhaara.naani, yathaapa~n~nattesu sikkhaapadesu sikkhathaa''ti.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 8.53} atha kho mahaapajaapati gotamii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho mahaapajaapati gotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m ^a^T2.0331^ea^ sutvaa ekaa vuupaka.t.thaa appamattaa aataapinii pahitattaa vihareyya''nti. ``ye kho tva.m, gotami, dhamme jaaneyyaasi -- ime dhammaa saraagaaya sa.mvattanti no viraagaaya, sa~n~nogaaya sa.mvattanti no visa~n~nogaaya, aacayaaya sa.mvattanti no apacayaaya, mahicchataaya sa.mvattanti no appicchataaya, asantu.t.thiyaa sa.mvattanti no santu.t.thiyaa, sa"nga.nikaaya sa.mvattanti no pavivekaaya, kosajjaaya sa.mvattanti no viiriyaarambhaaya, dubbharataaya ^a^P2.0259^ea^ sa.mvattanti no subharataaya; eka.msena, gotami, dhaareyyaasi -- neso dhammo, neso vinayo, neta.m satthusaasananti. ye ca kho tva.m, gotami, dhamme jaaneyyaasi -- ime dhammaa viraagaaya sa.mvattanti no saraagaaya, visa~n~nogaaya sa.mvattanti no sa~n~nogaaya, apacayaaya sa.mvattanti no aacayaaya, appicchataaya sa.mvattanti no ^a^M0.0450^ea^ mahicchataaya, santu.t.thiyaa sa.mvattanti no asantu.t.thiyaa, pavivekaaya sa.mvattanti no sa"nga.nikaaya, viiriyaarambhaaya ^a^V0.0423^ea^ sa.mvattanti no kosajjaaya, subharataaya sa.mvattanti no dubbharataaya; eka.msena, gotami, dhaareyyaasi -- eso dhammo, eso vinayo, eta.m satthusaasana''nti.

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniina.m paatimokkha.m na uddisiiyati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0332^ea^ ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniina.m paatimokkha.m uddisitu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho bhikkhuniina.m paatimokkha.m uddisitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m paatimokkha.m uddisitu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniina.m paatimokkha.m uddisanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``jaayaayo imaa imesa.m, jaariyo imaa imesa.m, idaani ime imaahi saddhi.m abhiramissantii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m. yo uddiseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniihi bhikkhuniina.m paatimokkha.m uddisitu''nti. bhikkhuniyo na jaananti -- ``eva.m paatimokkha.m uddisitabba''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m aacikkhitu.m -- `eva.m paatimokkha.m uddiseyyaathaa'''ti.

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo aapatti.m na pa.tikaronti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa aapatti na pa.tikaatabbaa. yaa na pa.tikareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti. bhikkhuniyo na jaananti -- ``eva.m aapatti pa.tikaatabbaa''ti ^a^T2.0333^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m aacikkhitu.m -- `eva.m aapatti.m pa.tikareyyaathaa'''ti. atha ^a^P2.0260^ea^ kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho bhikkhuniina.m aapatti pa.tiggahetabbaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m aapatti.m pa.tiggahetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo rathikaayapi byuuhepi si"nghaa.takepi bhikkhu.m passitvaa patta.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m ^a^M0.0451^ea^ nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa aapatti.m pa.tikaronti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``jaayaayo imaa imesa.m, jaariyo imaa imesa.m, ratti.m vimaanetvaa idaani khamaapentii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0424^ea^. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m aapatti pa.tiggahetabbaa. yo pa.tigga.nheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniihi bhikkhuniina.m aapatti.m pa.tiggahetu''nti. bhikkhuniyo na jaananti -- ``eva.m aapatti pa.tiggahetabbaa''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m aacikkhitu.m -- `eva.m aapatti.m pa.tigga.nheyyaathaa'''ti.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m na kariyati ^a^T2.0334^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m kaatu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m kaatabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m kaatu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena katakammaa bhikkhuniyo rathikaayapi byuuhepi si"nghaa.takepi bhikkhu.m passitvaa patta.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa khamaapenti `eva.m nuuna kaatabba'nti ma~n~namaanaa. manussaa tatheva ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``jaayaayo imaa imesa.m, jaariyo imaa imesa.m, ratti.m vimaanetvaa idaani khamaapentii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m kaatabba.m. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniihi bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m kaatu''nti. bhikkhuniyo na jaananti -- ``eva.m kamma.m kaatabba''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m aacikkhitu.m -- `eva.m kamma.m kareyyaathaa'''ti.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo sa"nghamajjhe bha.n.danajaataa ^a^P2.0261^ea^ kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti. na sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. bhagavato ^a^T2.0335^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0452^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bhikkhuniina.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamenti. tasmi.m kho pana adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane dissanti bhikkhuniyo kammappattaayopi aapattigaaminiyopi. bhikkhuniyo evamaaha.msu -- ``saadhu, bhante, ayyaava bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m karontu, ayyaava bhikkhuniina.m aapatti.m pa.tigga.nhantu; eva~nhi bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m adhikara.na.m ^a^V0.0425^ea^ vuupasametabba''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m aaropetvaa bhikkhuniina.m niyyaadetu.m -- bhikkhuniihi bhikkhuniina.m kamma.m kaatu.m, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m aapatti.m aaropetvaa bhikkhuniina.m niyyaadetu.m, bhikkhuniihi bhikkhuniina.m aapatti.m pa.tiggahetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena uppalava.n.naaya bhikkhuniyaa antevaasinii bhikkhunii satta vassaani bhagavanta.m anubandhaa hoti vinaya.m pariyaapu.nantii. tassaa mu.t.thassatiniyaa gahito gahito mussati. assosi kho saa bhikkhunii -- ``bhagavaa kira saavatthi.m gantukaamo''ti. atha kho tassaa bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``aha.m kho satta vassaani bhagavanta.m anubandhi.m vinaya.m pariyaapu.nantii. tassaa me mu.t.thassatiniyaa gahito gahito mussati. dukkara.m kho pana maatugaamena yaavajiiva.m satthaara.m ^a^T2.0336^ea^ anubandhitu.m. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? atha kho saa bhikkhunii bhikkhuniina.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m vinaya.m vaacetu''nti.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame ^a^P2.0262^ea^. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo kaddamodakena osi~ncanti -- appeva naama amhesu saarajjeyyunti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa ^a^M0.0453^ea^ bhikkhuniyo kaddamodakena osi~ncitabbaa. yo osi~nceyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tassa bhikkhuno da.n.dakamma.m kaatu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho da.n.dakamma.m kaatabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``avandiyo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhunisa"nghena kaatabbo''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kaaya.m vivaritvaa bhikkhuniina.m dassenti ^a^V0.0426^ea^ ...pe0... uuru.m vivaritvaa bhikkhuniina.m dassenti, a"ngajaata.m vivaritvaa bhikkhuniina.m dassenti, bhikkhuniyo obhaasenti, bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m sampayojenti -- appeva naama amhesu saarajjeyyunti. bhagavato ^a^T2.0337^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa kaayo vivaritvaa bhikkhuniina.m dassetabbo, na uuru vivaritvaa bhikkhuniina.m dassetabbo, na a"ngajaata.m vivaritvaa bhikkhuniina.m dassetabba.m, na bhikkhuniyo obhaasitabbaa, na bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m sampayojetabba.m. yo sampayojeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tassa bhikkhuno da.n.dakamma.m kaatu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho da.n.dakamma.m kaatabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``avandiyo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhunisa"nghena kaatabbo''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhu.m kaddamodakena osi~ncanti -- appeva naama amhesu saarajjeyyunti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhu kaddamodakena osi~ncitabbo. yaa osi~nceyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tassaa bhikkhuniyaa da.n.dakamma.m kaatu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho da.n.dakamma.m kaatabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami bhikkhave, aavara.na.m kaatu''nti. aavara.ne kate na aadiyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ovaada.m .thapetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo kaaya.m vivaritvaa bhikkhuuna.m dassenti, thana.m vivaritvaa bhikkhuuna.m dassenti, uuru.m vivaritvaa ^a^T2.0338^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m dassenti, a"ngajaata.m vivaritvaa bhikkhuuna.m dassenti, bhikkhuu obhaasenti, bhikkhuuhi ^a^P2.0263^ea^ saddhi.m sampayojenti -- appeva naama amhesu saarajjeyyunti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa kaayo vivaritvaa bhikkhuuna.m dassetabbo...pe0... na thano vivaritvaa ^a^M0.0454^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m dassetabbo, na uuru vivaritvaa bhikkhuuna.m dassetabbo, na a"ngajaata.m vivaritvaa bhikkhuuna.m dassetabba.m, na bhikkhuu obhaasitabbaa, na bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sampayojetabba.m. yaa sampayojeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tassaa bhikkhuniyaa da.n.dakamma.m kaatu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho da.n.dakamma.m kaatabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m kaatu''nti. aavara.ne kate na aadiyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ovaada.m .thapetu''nti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kappati nu kho ovaada.t.thapitaaya {ovaada.n.thapitaaya (syaa0), ovaada.m.thapitaaya (ka0)} bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m uposatha.m kaatu.m, na nu kho ^a^V0.0427^ea^ kappatii''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ovaada.t.thapitaaya bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m uposatho kaatabbo, yaava na ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasanta.m hotii''ti.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udaayii ovaada.m .thapetvaa caarika.m ^a^T2.0339^ea^ pakkaami. bhikkhuniyo ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyo udaayii ovaada.m .thapetvaa caarika.m pakkamissatii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ovaada.m .thapetvaa caarikaa pakkamitabbaa. yo pakkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena {tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu (syaa0 ka.m0)} baalaa abyattaa ovaada.m .thapenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, baalena abyattena ovaado .thapetabbo. yo .thapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu avatthusmi.m akaara.ne ovaada.m .thapenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, avatthusmi.m akaara.ne ovaado .thapetabbo. yo .thapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ovaada.m .thapetvaa vinicchaya.m na denti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ovaada.m .thapetvaa vinicchayo na daatabbo. yo na dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ {paaci0 1054} tena ^a^M0.0455^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ovaada.m na gacchanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa ovaado na ^a^T2.0340^ea^ gantabbo. yaa na gaccheyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaada.m gacchati. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti ^a^P2.0264^ea^ vipaacenti -- ``jaayaayo imaa imesa.m, jaariyo imaa imesa.m, idaani ime imaahi saddhi.m abhiramissantii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, sabbena bhikkhunisa"nghena ovaado gantabbo. gaccheyya ce, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, catuuhi pa~ncahi bhikkhuniihi ovaada.m gantu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena catasso pa~nca bhikkhuniyo ovaada.m gacchanti. manussaa tatheva ujjhaayanti ^a^V0.0428^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``jaayaayo imaa imesa.m, jaariyo imaa imesa.m, idaani ime imaahi saddhi.m abhiramissantii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, catuuhi pa~ncahi bhikkhuniihi ovaado gantabbo. gaccheyyu.m ce, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve tisso bhikkhuniyo {bhikkhuniihi (ka0)} ovaada.m gantu.m. eka.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `bhikkhunisa"ngho, ayya, bhikkhusa"nghassa paade vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati; labhatu kira, ayya, bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaaduupasa"nkamana'nti. tena bhikkhunaa paatimokkhuddesako upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `bhikkhuniisa"ngho, bhante, bhikkhusa"nghassa paade vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca ^a^T2.0341^ea^ yaacati; labhatu kira, bhante, bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaaduupasa"nkamana'nti. paatimokkhuddesakena vattabbo -- `atthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato'ti? sace hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, paatimokkhuddesakena vattabbo -- `itthannaamo bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, ta.m bhikkhunisa"ngho upasa"nkamatuu'ti. sace na hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, paatimokkhuddesakena vattabbo -- `ko aayasmaa ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu'nti? sace koci ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m, so ca hoti a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato, sammannitvaa vattabbo -- `itthannaamo bhikkhu ^a^M0.0456^ea^ bhikkhunovaadako sammato, ta.m bhikkhunisa"ngho upasa"nkamatuu'ti. sace na koci ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m, paatimokkhuddesakena vattabbo -- `natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, paasaadikena bhikkhunisa"ngho sampaadetuu''ti.
[03] 414^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ovaada.m na ga.nhanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ovaado na gahetabbo. yo na ga.nheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu baalo hoti. ta.m bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``ovaada.m, ayya, ga.nhaahii''ti ^a^P2.0265^ea^. ``aha~nhi, bhaginii, baalo; kathaaha.m ovaada.m ga.nhaamii''ti? ``ga.nhaahayya ^a^T2.0342^ea^, ovaada.m; eva~nhi bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m -- bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniina.m ovaado gahetabbo''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, .thapetvaa baala.m, avasesehi ovaada.m gahetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V0.0429^ea^ etadavocu.m -- ``ovaada.m, ayya ga.nhaahii''ti. ``aha~nhi, bhaginii, gilaano; kathaaha.m ovaada.m ga.nhaamii''ti? ``ga.nhaahayya, ovaada.m; eva~nhi bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m -- .thapetvaa baala.m, avasesehi ovaado gahetabbo''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, .thapetvaa baala.m, .thapetvaa gilaana.m, avasesehi ovaada.m gahetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gamiko hoti. ta.m bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``ovaada.m, ayya, ga.nhaahii''ti. ``aha~nhi, bhaginii, gamiko; kathaaha.m ovaada.m ga.nhaamii''ti? ``ga.nhaahayya, ovaada.m; eva~nhi bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m -- .thapetvaa baala.m, .thapetvaa gilaana.m, avasesehi ovaado gahetabbo''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, .thapetvaa baala.m, .thapetvaa gilaana.m, .thapetvaa gamika.m, avasesehi ovaada.m gahetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu ara~n~ne viharati. ta.m bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``ovaada.m, ayya, ga.nhaahii''ti. ``aha~nhi, bhaginii, ara~n~ne viharaami; kathaaha.m ovaada.m ^a^T2.0343^ea^ ga.nhaamii''ti? ``ga.nhaahayya ^a^M0.0457^ea^, ovaada.m; eva~nhi bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m -- .thapetvaa baala.m, .thapetvaa gilaana.m, .thapetvaa gamika.m, avasesehi ovaado gahetabbo''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa ovaada.m gahetu.m, sa"nketa~nca kaatu.m -- atra patiharissaamii''ti.
[03] 415^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ovaada.m gahetvaa na aarocenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ovaado na aarocetabbo. yo na aaroceyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ovaada.m gahetvaa na paccaaharanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, ovaado na paccaaharitabbo. yo na paccaahareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo sa"nketa.m na gacchanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa sa"nketa.m na gantabba.m. yaa na gaccheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P2.0266^ea^ ^a^V0.0430^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo diighaani kaayabandhanaani dhaarenti, teheva phaasukaa naamenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^T2.0344^ea^ aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa diigha.m kaayabandhana.m dhaaretabba.m. yaa dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa ekapariyaakata.m {ekapariyaayakata.m (syaa0)} kaayabandhana.m, na ca tena phaasukaa naametabbaa. yaa naameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo viliivena {vilivena (ka0)} pa.t.tena phaasukaa naamenti...pe0... cammapa.t.tena phaasukaa naamenti. dussapa.t.tena phaasukaa naamenti. dussave.niyaa phaasukaa naamenti. dussava.t.tiyaa phaasukaa naamenti. co.lapa.t.tena phaasukaa naamenti. co.lave.niyaa phaasukaa naamenti. co.lava.t.tiyaa phaasukaa naamenti. suttave.niyaa phaasukaa naamenti. suttava.t.tiyaa phaasukaa naamenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^M0.0458^ea^. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa viliivena pa.t.tena phaasukaa naametabbaa...pe0... na suttava.t.tiyaa phaasukaa naametabbaa. yaa naameyya aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo a.t.thillena jaghana.m gha.msaapenti...pe0... ^a^T2.0345^ea^ gohanukena jaghana.m ko.t.taapenti, hattha.m ko.t.taapenti, hatthakoccha.m ko.t.taapenti, paada.m ko.t.taapenti, paadakoccha.m ko.t.taapenti, uuru.m ko.t.taapenti, mukha.m ko.t.taapenti, dantama.msa.m ko.t.taapenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa a.t.thillena jaghana.m gha.msaapetabba.m...pe0... na dantama.msa.m ko.t.taapetabba.m. yaa ko.t.taapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo mukha.m aalimpanti...pe0... mukha.m ummaddenti, mukha.m cu.n.nenti, manosilikaaya mukha.m la~nchenti, a"ngaraaga.m karonti, mukharaaga.m karonti, a"ngaraagamukharaaga.m karonti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0267^ea^, bhikkhuniyaa mukha.m aalimpitabba.m...pe0... na mukha.m ummadditabba.m, na mukha.m cu.n.netabba.m, na manosilikaaya mukha.m la~nchitabba.m, na a"ngaraago kaatabbo, na mukharaago kaatabbo, na a"ngaraagamukharaago kaatabbo. yaa kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0346^ea^ ^a^V0.0431^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo ava"nga.m {apaa"nga.m (?)} karonti...pe0... visesaka.m karonti, olokanakena olokenti, saaloke ti.t.thanti; nacca.m {sanacca.m (sii0 syaa0), samajja.m (ka0)} kaaraapenti, vesi.m vu.t.thaapenti, paanaagaara.m .thapenti, suuna.m .thapenti, aapa.na.m pasaarenti, va.d.dhi.m payojenti, va.nijja.m payojenti, daasa.m upa.t.thaapenti, daasi.m upa.t.thaapenti, kammakaara.m upa.t.thaapenti, kammakaari.m upa.t.thaapenti, tiracchaanagata.m upa.t.thaapenti, hariitakapakkika.m {hariitakapa.n.nika.m (ka0)} paki.nanti, namataka.m dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa ava"nga.m kaatabba.m...pe0... na visesaka.m kaatabba.m, na olokanakena ^a^M0.0459^ea^ oloketabba.m, na saaloke .thaatabba.m, na nacca.m kaaraapetabba.m, na vesii vu.t.thaapetabbaa, na paanaagaara.m .thapetabba.m, na suunaa .thapetabbaa, na aapa.no pasaaretabbo, na va.d.dhi payojetabbaa, na va.nijjaa payojetabbaa, na daaso upa.t.thaapetabbo, na daasii upa.t.thaapetabbaa, na kammakaaro upa.t.thaapetabbo, na kammakaarii upa.t.thaapetabbaa, na tiracchaanagato upa.t.thaapetabbo, na hariitakapakkika.m paki.nitabba.m, na namataka.m dhaaretabba.m. yaa dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo sabbaniilakaani ciivaraani ^a^T2.0347^ea^ dhaarenti...pe0... sabbapiitakaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, sabbalohitakaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, sabbama~nji.t.thikaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, sabbaka.nhaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, sabbamahaara"ngarattaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, sabbamahaanaamarattaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, acchinnadasaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, diighadasaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, pupphadasaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, phaladasaani ciivaraani dhaarenti, ka~ncuka.m dhaarenti, tirii.taka.m dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa sabbaniilakaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani...pe0... na tirii.taka.m dhaaretabba.m. yaa dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii kaala.m karontii evamaaha -- ``mamaccayena mayha.m parikkhaaro sa"nghassa hotuu''ti. tattha bhikkhuu ca bhikkhuniyo ca vivadanti ^a^P2.0268^ea^ -- ``amhaaka.m hoti, amhaaka.m hotii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``bhikkhunii ce, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0348^ea^, kaala.m karontii eva.m vadeyya -- `mamaccayena mayha.m parikkhaaro sa"nghassa hotuu'ti, anissaro tattha bhikkhusa"ngho, bhikkhunisa"nghasseveta.m. sikkhamaanaa ce, bhikkhave...pe0... saama.nerii ce, bhikkhave, kaala.m karontii eva.m vadeyya -- `mamaccayena mayha.m parikkhaaro ^a^V0.0432^ea^ sa"nghassa hotuu'ti, anissaro tattha bhikkhusa"ngho, bhikkhunisa"nghasseveta.m. bhikkhu ce, bhikkhave, kaala.m karonto eva.m vadeyya -- `mamaccayena mayha.m parikkhaaro sa"nghassa hotuu'ti, anissaro tattha bhikkhunisa"ngho, bhikkhusa"nghasseveta.m. saama.nero ce, bhikkhave...pe0... upaasako ce, bhikkhave...pe0... upaasikaa ce, bhikkhave...pe0... a~n~no ce, bhikkhave, koci kaala.m karonto eva.m vadeyya -- `mamaccayena mayha.m parikkhaaro ^a^M0.0460^ea^ sa"nghassa hotuu'ti, anissaro tattha bhikkhunisa"ngho, bhikkhusa"nghasseveta''nti.

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii puraa.namallii bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa hoti. saa rathikaaya dubbalaka.m bhikkhu.m passitvaa a.msakuu.tena pahaara.m datvaa paatesi {pava.t.tesi (sii0)}. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama, bhikkhunii, bhikkhussa pahaara.m dassatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhussa pahaaro daatabbo. yaa dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa ^a^T2.0349^ea^ bhikkhu.m passitvaa duuratova okkamitvaa magga.m daatu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii pavutthapatikaa jaarena gabbhinii hoti. saa gabbha.m paatetvaa kuluupika.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``handayye, ima.m gabbha.m pattena niiharaa''ti. atha kho saa bhikkhunii ta.m gabbha.m patte pakkhipitvaa sa"nghaa.tiyaa pa.ticchaadetvaa agamaasi. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarena pi.n.dacaarikena bhikkhunaa samaadaana.m kata.m hoti -- `yaaha.m pa.thama.m bhikkha.m labhissaami, na ta.m adatvaa bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa paribhu~njissaamii'ti. atha kho so bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhuni.m passitvaa etadavoca -- ``handa, bhagini, bhikkha.m pa.tigga.nhaa''ti. ``ala.m ayyaa''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho so bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``handa, bhagini, bhikkha.m pa.tigga.nhaa''ti. ``ala.m ayyaa''ti. ``mayaa kho, bhagini, samaadaana.m kata.m -- `yaaha.m pa.thama.m bhikkha.m labhissaami, na ta.m adatvaa bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa paribhu~njissaamii'ti. handa ^a^P2.0269^ea^, bhagini, bhikkha.m pa.tigga.nhaa''ti. atha kho saa bhikkhunii tena bhikkhunaa nippii.liyamaanaa niiharitvaa patta.m dassesi -- ``passa, ayya, patte gabbha.m; maa ca kassaci aarocesii''ti. atha kho so bhikkhu ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi ^a^T2.0350^ea^ naama bhikkhunii pattena gabbha.m niiharissatii''ti! atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhunii pattena gabbha.m niiharissatii''ti! bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa pattena gabbho ^a^V0.0433^ea^ niiharitabbo. yaa ^a^M0.0461^ea^ niihareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhu.m passitvaa niiharitvaa patta.m dassetu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhu.m passitvaa parivattetvaa pattamuula.m dassenti. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhu.m passitvaa parivattetvaa pattamuula.m dassessantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhu.m passitvaa parivattetvaa pattamuula.m dassetabba.m. yaa dasseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhu.m passitvaa ukkujjitvaa patta.m dassetu.m. ya~nca patte aamisa.m hoti, tena ca bhikkhu nimantetabbo''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m rathikaaya purisabya~njana.m cha.d.dita.m hoti. ta.m bhikkhuniyo sakkacca.m upanijjhaayi.msu. manussaa ukku.t.thi.m aka.msu. taa bhikkhuniyo ma"nkuu ahesu.m. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo upassaya.m gantvaa bhikkhuniina.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. yaa taa bhikkhuniyo appicchaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0351^ea^ taa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuniyo purisabya~njana.m upanijjhaayissantii''ti! atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa purisabya~njana.m upanijjhaayitabba.m. yaa upanijjhaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 421^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena manussaa bhikkhuuna.m aamisa.m denti. bhikkhuu bhikkhuniina.m denti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa attano paribhogatthaaya ^a^P2.0270^ea^ dinna.m a~n~nesa.m dassanti! mayampi na jaanaama daana.m daatu''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, attano paribhogatthaaya dinna.m a~n~nesa.m daatabba.m. yo dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m aamisa.m ussanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghassa daatu''nti. baa.lhatara.m ussanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, puggalikampi daatu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0462^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m sannidhikata.m aamisa.m ussanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^V0.0434^ea^ aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m sannidhi.m bhikkhuniihi {bhikkhuniihi bhikkhuuhi (sii0)} pa.tiggaahaapetvaa {pa.tiggahaapetvaa (ka0)} paribhu~njitu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena manussaa bhikkhuniina.m aamisa.m denti. bhikkhuniyo ^a^T2.0352^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m denti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuniyo attano paribhogatthaaya dinna.m a~n~nesa.m dassanti! mayampi na jaanaama daana.m daatu''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa attano paribhogatthaaya dinna.m a~n~nesa.m daatabba.m. yaa dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniina.m aamisa.m ussanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghassa daatu''nti. baa.lhatara.m ussanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, puggalikampi daatu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniina.m sannidhikata.m aamisa.m ussanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniina.m sannidhi.m bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi {bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi (sii0)} pa.tiggaahaapetvaa paribhu~njitu''nti.

[03] 422^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m senaasana.m ussanna.m hoti, bhikkhuniina.m {bhikkhuniina.m senaasana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} na hoti. bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m santike duuta.m paahesu.m -- `saadhu, bhante, ayyaa amhaaka.m senaasana.m dentu taavakaalika'nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniina.m senaasana.m daatu.m taavakaalika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena utuniyo bhikkhuniyo onaddhama~nca.m onaddhapii.tha.m abhinisiidantipi abhinipajjantipi. senaasana.m lohitena makkhiyyati ^a^T2.0353^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa ^a^P2.0271^ea^ onaddhama~nca.m onaddhapii.tha.m abhinisiiditabba.m abhinipajjitabba.m. yaa abhinisiideyya vaa abhinipajjeyya vaa aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aavasathaciivara''nti. aavasathaciivara.m lohitena makkhiyyati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami ^a^M0.0463^ea^, bhikkhave, aa.nico.laka''nti. co.laka.m nipatati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, suttakena bandhitvaa uuruyaa bandhitu''nti ^a^V0.0435^ea^. sutta.m chijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa.mvelliya.m, ka.tisuttaka''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo sabbakaala.m ka.tisuttaka.m dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa sabbakaala.m ka.tisuttaka.m dhaaretabba.m. yaa dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, utuniyaa ka.tisuttaka''nti.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 423^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena upasampannaayo dissanti -- animittaapi, nimittamattaapi, alohitaapi, dhuvalohitaapi, dhuvaco.laapi, paggharantiipi, sikhari.niipi, itthipa.n.dakaapi, vepurisikaapi, sambhinnaapi, ubhatobya~njanaapi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upasampaadentiyaa catuviisati antaraayike dhamme pucchitu.m. eva~nca pana ^a^T2.0354^ea^, bhikkhave, pucchitabbaa -- `nasi animittaa, nasi nimittamattaa, nasi alohitaa, nasi dhuvalohitaa, nasi dhuvaco.laa, nasi paggharantii, nasi sikhara.nii {sikhari.nii (sii0 syaa0)}, nasi itthipa.n.dakaa, nasi vepurisikaa, nasi sambhinnaa, nasi ubhatobya~njanaa? santi te evaruupaa aabaadhaa -- ku.t.tha.m, ga.n.do, kilaaso, soso, apamaaro? manussaasi, itthiisi, bhujissaasi, a.na.naasi, nasi raajabha.tii? anu~n~naataasi maataapituuhi, saamikena? paripu.n.naviisativassaasi, paripu.n.na.m te pattaciivara.m, kinnaamaasi, kaanaamaa te pavattinii''ti?

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bhikkhuniina.m antaraayike dhamme pucchanti. upasampadaapekkhaayo vitthaayanti, ma"nkuu honti, na sakkonti vissajjetu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ekatoupasampannaaya bhikkhunisa"nghe visuddhaaya bhikkhusa"nghe upasampaadetu''nti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0464^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ananusi.t.thaa upasampadaapekkhaayo antaraayike dhamme pucchanti. upasampadaapekkhaayo ^a^P2.0272^ea^ vitthaayanti, ma"nkuu honti, na sakkonti vissajjetu.m. bhagavato ^a^V0.0436^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anusaasitvaa pacchaa antaraayike dhamme pucchitu''nti.

[03]tattheva sa"nghamajjhe anusaasanti. upasampadaapekkhaayo tatheva vitthaayanti, ma"nkuu honti ^a^T2.0355^ea^, na sakkonti vissajjetu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ekamanta.m anusaasitvaa sa"nghamajjhe antaraayike dhamme pucchitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, anusaasitabbaa.

[03] 424^b^.^eb^ ``pa.thama.m upajjha.m gaahaapetabbaa. upajjha.m gaahaapetvaa pattaciivara.m aacikkhitabba.m -- `aya.m te patto, aya.m sa"nghaa.ti, aya.m uttaraasa"ngo, aya.m antaravaasako, ida.m sa.mkaccika.m {sa"nkacchika.m (syaa0)}, aya.m udakasaa.tikaa; gaccha amumhi okaase ti.t.thaahii''ti.

[03]baalaa abyattaa anusaasanti. duranusi.t.thaa upasampadaapekkhaayo vitthaayanti, ma"nkuu honti, na sakkonti vissajjetu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, baalaaya abyattaaya anusaasitabbaa. yaa anusaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya anusaasitu''nti.

[03]asammataa anusaasanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, asammataaya anusaasitabbaa. yaa anusaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sammataaya anusaasitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa -- attanaa vaa attaana.m sammannitabba.m, paraaya vaa paraa sammannitabbaa.

[03]``katha~nca attanaava {attanaa vaa (ka0)} attaana.m sammannitabba.m? byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo -- `su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m itthannaamaa itthannaama.m anusaaseyya'nti. eva.m attanaava ^a^T2.0356^ea^ attaana.m sammannitabba.m.

[03]``katha~nca paraaya {paraaya vaa (ka0)} paraa sammannitabbaa? byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo -- `su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ^a^M0.0465^ea^ ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, itthannaamaa itthannaama.m anusaaseyyaa'ti. eva.m paraaya paraa sammannitabbaa.

[03]``taaya ^a^V0.0437^ea^ sammataaya bhikkhuniyaa upasampadaapekkha.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyaa -- `su.nasi itthannaame. aya.m te saccakaalo, bhuutakaalo. ya.m jaata.m ta.m sa"nghamajjhe pucchante santa.m atthiiti vattabba.m, asanta.m natthiiti vattabba.m. maa kho vitthaayi {vitthaasi (ka0)}, maa kho ma"nku ahosi. eva.m ta.m pucchissanti -- nasi animittaa, nasi nimittamattaa, nasi alohitaa, nasi dhuvalohitaa, nasi dhuvaco.laa, nasi paggharantii, nasi sikhari.nii, nasi itthipa.n.dakaa, nasi vepurisikaa, nasi sambhinnaa, nasi ubhatobya~njanaa? santi te evaruupaa aabaadhaa -- ku.t.tha.m, ga.n.do, kilaaso, soso, apamaaro? manussaasi, itthiisi, bhujissaasi, a.na.naasi, nasi raajabha.tii? anu~n~naataasi maataapituuhi, saamikena? paripu.n.naviisativassaasi, paripu.n.na.m te pattaciivara.m, kinnaamaasi, kaanaamaa te pavattinii'ti ^a^P2.0273^ea^?

[03]``ekato aagacchanti. na ekato aagantabba.m. anusaasikaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa sa"ngho ~naapetabbo -- `su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ^a^T2.0357^ea^ ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. anusi.t.thaa saa mayaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, itthannaamaa aagaccheyyaa'ti. `aagacchaahii'ti vattabbaa.

[03]``eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m kaaraapetvaa bhikkhuniina.m paade vandaapetvaa ukku.tika.m nisiidaapetvaa a~njali.m pagga.nhaapetvaa upasampada.m yaacaapetabbaa -- `sa"ngha.m, ayye, upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m, ayye, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaaya. dutiyampi, ayye, sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m, ayye, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaaya. tatiyampi, ayye, sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m, ayye, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaayaa'ti. byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m itthannaama.m antaraayike dhamme puccheyyanti.

[03]``su.nasi ^a^M0.0466^ea^ itthannaame. aya.m te saccakaalo, bhuutakaalo. ya.m jaata.m ta.m pucchaami santa.m atthiiti vattabba.m, asanta.m natthiiti vattabba.m. nasi animittaa...pe0... kinnaamaasi, kaanaamaa te pavattiniiti. byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 425^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. parisuddhaa antaraayikehi dhammehi, paripu.n.nassaa pattaciivara.m. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeyya ^a^T2.0358^ea^ itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa ^a^V0.0438^ea^. parisuddhaa antaraayikehi dhammehi, paripu.n.nassaa pattaciivara.m. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa. yassaa ayyaaya khamati itthannaamaaya upasampadaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa, saa tu.nhassa; yassaa nakkhamati, saa bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. parisuddhaa antaraayikehi dhammehi, paripu.n.nassaa pattaciivara.m. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa. yassaa ayyaaya khamati itthannaamaaya upasampadaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa, saa tu.nhassa; yassaa nakkhamati, saa bhaaseyya.
[03]``upasampannaa sa"nghena itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya pavattiniyaa. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamiiti.

[03]``taavadeva ta.m aadaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m kaaraapetvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vandaapetvaa ukku.tika.m nisiidaapetvaa ^a^T2.0359^ea^ a~njali.m pagga.nhaapetvaa upasampada.m yaacaapetabbaa -- `aha.m, ayyaa, itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa ^a^P2.0274^ea^. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa; sa"ngha.m, ayyaa, upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m, ayyaa, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaaya. aha.m, ayyaa, itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya ^a^M0.0467^ea^ upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. dutiyampi, ayyaa, sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m, ayyaa, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaaya. aha.m, ayyaa, itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. tatiyampi, ayyaa, sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m, ayyaa, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaayaa'ti. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu ^a^V0.0439^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeyya, itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamaaya ^a^T2.0360^ea^ pavattiniyaa. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamaaya upasampadaa itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamaaya upasampadaa itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``upasampannaa sa"nghena itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamiiti.

[03]``taavadeva chaayaa metabbaa, utuppamaa.na.m aacikkhitabba.m, divasabhaago aacikkhitabbo, sa"ngiiti aacikkhitabbaa, bhikkhuniyo vattabbaa -- imissaa tayo ca nissaye, a.t.tha ca akara.niiyaani aacikkheyyaathaa''ti.

[03] 426^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhattagge aasana.m sa.mkasaayantiyo kaala.m viitinaamesu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^M0.0468^ea^. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.thanna.m bhikkhuniina.m yathaavu.d.dha.m, avasesaana.m yathaagatika''nti.

[03]tena ^a^T2.0361^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo -- bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m a.t.thanna.m bhikkhuniina.m yathaavu.d.dha.m, avasesaana.m yathaagatikanti -- sabbattha a.t.theva bhikkhuniyo yathaavu.d.dha.m pa.tibaahanti, avasesaayo ^a^V0.0440^ea^ yathaagatika.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhattagge a.t.thanna.m bhikkhuniina.m yathaavu.d.dha.m, avasesaana.m yathaagatika.m; a~n~nattha sabbattha yathaavu.d.dha.m {a~n~nattha yathaavu.d.dha.m (syaa0)} na pa.tibaahitabba.m. yaa pa.tibaaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 427^b^.^eb^ {paaci0 1050 aadayo} tena ^a^P2.0275^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo na pavaarenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa na pavaaretabba.m. yaa na pavaareyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo attanaa pavaaretvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m na pavaarenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa attanaa pavaaretvaa bhikkhusa"ngho na pavaaretabbo. yaa na pavaareyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m ekato pavaarentiyo kolaahala.m aka.msu. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m ekato pavaaretabba.m. yaa pavaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo purebhatta.m pavaarentiyo kaala.m ^a^T2.0362^ea^ viitinaamesu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pacchaabhatta.m {bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaa pacchaabhatta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} pavaaretu''nti. pacchaabhatta.m pavaarentiyo vikaale {vikaala.m (ka0)} ahesu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ajjatanaa bhikkhunisa"ngha.m {ajjatanaa (sii0), ajjatanaaya (ka0)} pavaaretvaa aparajju bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisa"ngho pavaarento kolaahala.m akaasi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, eka.m bhikkhuni.m byatta.m pa.tibala.m sammannitu.m -- bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m ^a^M0.0469^ea^ pavaaretu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa. pa.thama.m bhikkhunii yaacitabbaa, yaacitvaa byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhuni.m sammanneyya bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu.m. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhuni.m sammannati bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu.m. yassaa ayyaaya khamati itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa sammuti bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya ^a^V0.0441^ea^ bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu.m, saa tu.nhassa; yassaa nakkhamati, saa bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammataa sa"nghena itthannaamaa bhikkhunii bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamiiti.

[03]``taaya ^a^T2.0363^ea^ sammataaya bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhunisa"ngha.m aadaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `bhikkhuniisa"ngho ^a^P2.0276^ea^, ayyaa, bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaareti -- di.t.thena vaa, sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa. vadatu {vadatu ma.m (ka0)}, ayyaa, bhikkhusa"ngho bhikkhunisa"ngha.m anukampa.m upaadaaya, passanto pa.tikarissati. dutiyampi, ayyaa...pe0... tatiyampi, ayyaa, bhikkhunisa"ngho bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaareti -- di.t.thena vaa, sutena vaa, parisa"nkaaya vaa. vadatu, ayyaa, bhikkhusa"ngho bhikkhunisa"ngha.m anukampa.m upaadaaya, passanto pa.tikarissatii''ti.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m uposatha.m .thapenti, pavaara.na.m .thapenti, savacaniiya.m karonti, anuvaada.m pa.t.thapenti, okaasa.m kaarenti, codenti, saarenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhussa uposatho .thapetabbo; .thapitopi a.t.thapito; .thapentiyaa aapatti dukka.tassa. na pavaara.naa .thapetabbaa; .thapitaapi a.t.thapitaa; .thapentiyaa aapatti dukka.tassa. na savacaniiya.m kaatabba.m; katampi akata.m; karontiyaa aapatti dukka.tassa. na anuvaado pa.t.thapetabbo; pa.t.thapitopi appa.t.thapito; pa.t.thapentiyaa aapatti dukka.tassa. na okaaso kaaretabbo ^a^M0.0470^ea^; kaaritopi akaarito; kaarentiyaa aapatti dukka.tassa. na codetabbo; coditopi acodito; codentiyaa aapatti dukka.tassa ^a^T2.0364^ea^. na saaretabbo; saaritopi asaarito; saarentiyaa aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bhikkhuniina.m uposatha.m .thapenti, pavaara.na.m .thapenti, savacaniiya.m karonti, anuvaada.m pa.t.thapenti, okaasa.m kaarenti, codenti, saarenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniyaa uposatha.m .thapetu.m; .thapitopi su.t.thapito; .thapentassa anaapatti. pavaara.na.m .thapetu.m; .thapitaapi su.t.thapitaa; .thapentassa anaapatti. savacaniiya.m kaatu.m; katampi sukata.m; karontassa anaapatti. anuvaada.m pa.t.thapetu.m; pa.t.thapitopi suppa.t.thapito; pa.t.thapentassa anaapatti. okaasa.m kaaretu.m; kaaritopi sukaarito; kaarentassa ^a^V0.0442^ea^ anaapatti. codetu.m; coditaapi sucoditaa; codentassa anaapatti. saaretu.m; saaritaapi susaaritaa; saarentassa anaapattii''ti.

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ {paaci0 1184} tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo yaanena yaayanti -- itthiyuttenapi purisantarena, purisayuttenapi itthantarena. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... ``seyyathaapi ga"ngaamahiyaayaa''ti {ga"ngaamahiyaati (sii0)}. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa yaanena yaayitabba.m. yaa yaayeyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii gilaanaa hoti, na sakkoti padasaa gantu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami ^a^T2.0365^ea^, bhikkhave, gilaanaaya yaana''nti. atha kho bhikkhuniina.m etadahosi -- ``itthiyutta.m nu kho, purisayutta.m nu kho''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, itthiyutta.m purisayutta.m hatthava.t.taka''nti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarissaa bhikkhuniyaa yaanugghaatena baa.lhatara.m aphaasu ahosi. bhagavato ^a^P2.0277^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sivika.m paa.ta"nki''nti.

[03] 430^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0471^ea^ kho pana samayena a.d.dhakaasii ga.nikaa bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa hoti. saa ca saavatthi.m gantukaamaa hoti -- `bhagavato santike upasampajjissaamii'ti. assosu.m kho dhuttaa -- `a.d.dhakaasii kira ga.nikaa saavatthi.m gantukaamaa'ti. te magge pariyu.t.thi.msu. assosi kho a.d.dhakaasii ga.nikaa -- `dhuttaa kira magge pariyu.t.thitaa'ti. bhagavato santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``aha~nhi upasampajjitukaamaa; katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, duutenapi upasampaadetu''nti.

[03]bhikkhuduutena upasampaadenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuduutena upasampaadetabbaa. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti. sikkhamaanaduutena ^a^T2.0366^ea^ upasampaadenti...pe0... saama.neraduutena upasampaadenti...pe0... saama.neriduutena upasampaadenti...pe0... baalaaya abyattaaya duutena upasampaadenti. ``na, bhikkhave, baalaaya abyattaaya duutena upasampaadetabbaa. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya duutena upasampaadetunti.

[03]``taaya ^a^V0.0443^ea^ duutaaya bhikkhuniyaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `itthannaamaa, ayyaa, itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. saa kenacideva antaraayena na aagacchati. itthannaamaa, ayyaa, sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati. ullumpatu ta.m, ayyaa, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaaya. itthannaamaa, ayyaa, itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. saa kenacideva antaraayena na aagacchati. dutiyampi, ayyaa, itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati. ullumpatu ta.m, ayyaa, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaaya. itthannaamaa, ayyaa, itthannaamaaya ayyaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. saa kenacideva antaraayena na aagacchati. tatiyampi, ayyaa, itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati. ullumpatu ta.m, ayyaa, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaayaa'ti ^a^T2.0367^ea^. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0472^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. saa kenacideva antaraayena na aagacchati. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeyya itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me ^a^P2.0278^ea^, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. saa kenacideva antaraayena na aagacchati. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamaaya upasampadaa itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami. su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya upasampadaapekkhaa. ekatoupasampannaa bhikkhunisa"nghe, visuddhaa. saa kenacideva antaraayena na aagacchati. itthannaamaa sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamaaya upasampadaa itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa, so tu.nhassa; yassa ^a^T2.0368^ea^ nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``upasampannaa ^a^V0.0444^ea^ sa"nghena itthannaamaa itthannaamaaya pavattiniyaa. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamiiti.

[03]``taavadeva chaayaa metabbaa, utuppamaa.na.m aacikkhitabba.m, divasabhaago aacikkhitabbo, sa"ngiiti aacikkhitabbaa, bhikkhuniyo vattabbaa -- tassaa tayo ca nissaye, a.t.tha ca akara.niiyaani aacikkheyyaathaa''ti.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ara~n~ne viharanti. dhuttaa duusenti. bhagavato etamattha.m, aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa ara~n~ne vatthabba.m. yaa vaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarena upaasakena bhikkhunisa"nghassa uddosito dinno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uddosita''nti. uddosito na sammati. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^M0.0473^ea^ aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upassaya''nti. upassayo na sammati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, navakamma''nti. navakamma.m na sammati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, puggalikampi kaatu''nti.

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii sannisinnagabbhaa bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa hoti. tassaa pabbajitaaya gabbho vu.t.thaati. atha kho tassaa bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho mayaa imasmi.m daarake pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^T2.0369^ea^. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, posetu.m, yaava so daarako vi~n~nuta.m paapu.naatii''ti.

[03]atha kho tassaa bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``mayaa ca na labbhaa ekikaaya vatthu.m, a~n~naaya ca bhikkhuniyaa na labbhaa daarakena saha vatthu.m, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, eka.m bhikkhuni.m sammannitvaa tassaa ^a^P2.0279^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa dutiya.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa. pa.thama.m bhikkhunii yaacitabbaa, yaacitvaa byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu ^a^V0.0445^ea^ me, ayye, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhuni.m sammanneyya itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa dutiya.m. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhuni.m sammannati itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa dutiya.m. yassaa ayyaaya khamati itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa sammuti itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa dutiyaaya, saa tu.nhassa; yassaa nakkhamati, saa bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammataa sa"nghena itthannaamaa bhikkhunii itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa dutiyaa. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]atha kho tassaa dutiyikaaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho mayaa imasmi.m daarake pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, .thapetvaa saagaara.m yathaa a~n~nasmi.m purise pa.tipajjanti {pa.tipajjati (syaa0)} eva.m tasmi.m ^a^T2.0370^ea^ daarake pa.tipajjitu''nti.

[03] 433^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0474^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii garudhamma.m ajjhaapannaa hoti maanattacaarinii. atha kho tassaa bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``mayaa ca na labbhaa ekikaaya vatthu.m, a~n~naaya ca bhikkhuniyaa na labbhaa saha mayaa vatthu.m, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, eka.m bhikkhuni.m sammannitvaa tassaa bhikkhuniyaa dutiya.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa. pa.thama.m bhikkhunii yaacitabbaa, yaacitvaa byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhuni.m sammanneyya itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa dutiya.m. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, ayye, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhuni.m sammannati itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa dutiya.m. yassaa ayyaaya khamati itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa sammuti itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa dutiyaaya, saa tu.nhassa; yassaa nakkhamati, saa bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammataa ^a^V0.0446^ea^ sa"nghena itthannaamaa bhikkhunii itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa dutiyaa. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii sikkha.m paccakkhaaya vibbhami. saa puna paccaagantvaa bhikkhuniyo upasampada.m yaaci ^a^T2.0371^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m; yadeva saa vibbhantaa tadeva saa abhikkhunii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii sakaavaasaa titthaayatana.m sa"nkami. saa puna paccaagantvaa bhikkhuniyo upasampada.m yaaci. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``yaa saa, bhikkhave, bhikkhunii sakaavaasaa titthaayatana.m sa"nkantaa, saa aagataa na upasampaadetabbaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo purisehi abhivaadana.m ^a^P2.0280^ea^, kesacchedana.m, nakhacchedana.m, va.nappa.tikamma.m, kukkuccaayantaa na saadiyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saaditu''nti {saadiyitu.m (ka0)}.

[03] 435^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0475^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo palla"nkena nisiidanti pa.nhiisamphassa.m saadiyantii {saadiyantaa (ka0)}. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa palla"nkena nisiiditabba.m. yaa nisiideyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii gilaanaa hoti. tassaa vinaa palla"nkena na phaasu hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa a.d.dhapalla"nka''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo vaccaku.tiyaa vacca.m karonti ^a^T2.0372^ea^. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo tattheva gabbha.m paatenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa vaccaku.tiyaa vacco kaatabbo. yaa kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, he.t.thaa viva.te uparipa.ticchanne vacca.m kaatu''nti.

[03] 436^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo cu.n.nena nahaayanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0447^ea^. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa cu.n.nena nahaayitabba.m. yaa nahaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kukkusa.m mattika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo vaasitakaaya mattikaaya nahaayanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa vaasitakaaya mattikaaya nahaayitabba.m. yaa nahaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pakatimattika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo jantaaghare nahaayantiyo kolaahala.m aka.msu. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa jantaaghare nahaayitabba.m. yaa nahaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo pa.tisote nahaayanti dhaaraasamphassa.m saadiyantii. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0373^ea^, bhikkhuniyaa ^a^M0.0476^ea^ pa.tisote nahaayitabba.m. yaa nahaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo atitthe nahaayanti. dhuttaa duusenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa atitthe nahaayitabba.m. yaa nahaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo purisatitthe nahaayanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihinii kaamabhoginiyoti. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^P2.0281^ea^ aarocesu.m. ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa purisatitthe nahaayitabba.m. yaa nahaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, mahilaatitthe nahaayitu''nti.
