[22] aaturassaava bhesajja.m, eva.m buddhena desita.m..
[21] eva.m viniitaa saddhamme, maatugaamaapi itaraa.
[22] yaayanti {taayanti (sii0 syaa0)} accuta.m .thaana.m, yattha gantvaa na socareti..
[06] bhikkhunikkhandhaka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 437^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0379^ea^ ^a^P2.0284^ea^ ^a^M0.0480^ea^ ^a^V0.0452^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ekamidaaha.m, aavuso, samaya.m paavaaya kusinaara.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi. atha khvaaha.m, aavuso, maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi.m.

[03] {dii0 ni0 2.231} ``tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro aajiivako kusinaaraaya mandaaravapuppha.m gahetvaa paava.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno hoti. addasa.m kho aha.m, aavuso, ta.m aajiivaka.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana ta.m aajiivaka.m etadavoca.m -- `apaavuso, amhaaka.m satthaara.m jaanaasii'ti? `aamaavuso, jaanaami. ajja sattaahaparinibbuto sama.no gotamo. tato me ida.m mandaaravapuppha.m gahita'nti. tatraavuso, ye te bhikkhuu aviitaraagaa appekacce baahaa paggayha kandanti, chinnapaata.m papatanti, aava.t.tanti, viva.t.tanti -- atikhippa.m bhagavaa parinibbuto, atikhippa.m sugato parinibbuto, atikhippa.m cakkhu.m loke antarahitanti. ye pana te bhikkhuu viitaraagaa te sataa sampajaanaa adhivaasenti -- aniccaa sa"nkhaaraa, ta.m kutettha labbhaati.

[03]``atha khvaaha.m, aavuso, te bhikkhuu etadavoca.m -- `ala.m, aavuso, maa socittha; maa paridevittha. nanveta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa pa.tikacceva akkhaata.m -- sabbeheva piyehi manaapehi ^a^T2.0380^ea^ naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo a~n~nathaabhaavo. ta.m kutettha aavuso labbhaa, ya.m ta.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m palokadhamma.m, ta.m vata maa palujjiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti.

[03]``tena kho panaavuso, samayena subhaddo naama vu.d.dhapabbajito tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti ^a^V0.0453^ea^. atha kho, aavuso, subhaddo vu.d.dhapabbajito te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- `ala.m, aavuso, maa socittha; maa paridevittha. sumuttaa maya.m tena mahaasama.nena ^a^P2.0285^ea^; upaddutaa ca maya.m homa -- ida.m vo kappati, ida.m vo na kappatiiti. idaani pana maya.m ya.m icchissaama ta.m karissaama, ya.m na icchissaama na ta.m karissaamaa'ti. handa ^a^M0.0481^ea^ maya.m, aavuso, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayaama. pure adhammo dippati {dibbati (ka0)}, dhammo pa.tibaahiyyati; pure avinayo dippati vinayo pa.tibaahiyyati; pure adhammavaadino balavanto honti, dhammavaadino dubbalaa honti; pure avinayavaadino balavanto honti, vinayavaadino dubbalaa hontii''ti.

[03]``tena hi, bhante, thero bhikkhuu uccinatuu''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo ekenuunapa~ncaarahantasataani uccini. bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavocu.m -- ``aya.m, bhante, aayasmaa aanando ki~ncaapi sekkho, abhabbo chandaa dosaa mohaa bhayaa agati.m gantu.m. bahu ca anena bhagavato santike dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto. tena hi, bhante, thero aayasmantampi aananda.m uccinatuu''ti ^a^T2.0381^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmantampi aananda.m uccini.

[03]atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kattha nu kho maya.m dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaamaa''ti? atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``raajagaha.m kho mahaagocara.m pahuutasenaasana.m, ya.mnuuna maya.m raajagahe vassa.m vasantaa dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaama. na a~n~ne bhikkhuu raajagahe vassa.m upagaccheyyu''nti.
[03]atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho imaani pa~nca bhikkhusataani sammanneyya -- raajagahe vassa.m vasantaani dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m, na a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi raajagahe vassa.m vasitabbanti. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. imaani pa~nca bhikkhusataani sammannati -- raajagahe vassa.m vasantaani dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m, na a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi raajagahe vassa.m vasitabbanti. yassaayasmato khamati imesa.m pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m sammuti -- raajagahe vassa.m vasantaana.m ^a^V0.0454^ea^ dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m, na a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi raajagahe vassa.m vasitabbanti -- so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``sammataani ^a^M0.0482^ea^ sa"nghena imaani pa~nca bhikkhusataani raajagahe vassa.m vasantaani dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m, na a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi raajagahe vassa.m vasitabbanti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m ^a^T2.0382^ea^ dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]atha ^a^P2.0286^ea^ kho theraa bhikkhuu raajagaha.m agama.msu dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m. atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa kho, aavuso, kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m va.n.nita.m. handa maya.m, aavuso, pa.thama.m maasa.m kha.n.daphulla.m pa.tisa"nkharoma; majjhima.m maasa.m sannipatitvaa dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayissaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho theraa bhikkhuu pa.thama.m maasa.m kha.n.daphulla.m pa.tisa"nkhari.msu. atha kho aayasmaa aanando -- sve sannipaato {sannipaatoti (ka0)} na kho meta.m patiruupa.m, yoha.m sekkho samaano sannipaata.m gaccheyyanti -- bahudeva ratti.m kaayagataaya satiyaa viitinaametvaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m `nipajjissaamii'ti kaaya.m aavajjesi. appatta~nca siisa.m bibbohana.m, bhuumito ca paadaa muttaa. etasmi.m antare anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci.
[03] 439^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando arahaa samaano sannipaata.m agamaasi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m upaali.m vinaya.m puccheyya''nti.
[03]aayasmaa upaali sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aayasmataa mahaakassapena vinaya.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m upaali.m etadavoca -- ``pa.thama.m, aavuso upaali ^a^T2.0383^ea^ ^a^V0.0455^ea^, paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta''nti? ``vesaaliya.m bhante''ti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti? ``sudinna.m kalandaputta.m aarabbhaa''ti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``methunadhamme''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m upaali.m pa.thamassa paaraajikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, pa~n~nattimpi pucchi, anupa~n~nattimpi pucchi, aapattimpi pucchi, anaapattimpi ^a^M0.0483^ea^ pucchi. ``dutiya.m panaavuso upaali, paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta''nti? ``raajagahe bhante''ti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti? ``dhaniya.m kumbhakaaraputta.m aarabbhaa''ti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``adinnaadaane''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m upaali.m dutiyassa paaraajikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, pa~n~nattimpi pucchi, anupa~n~nattimpi pucchi, aapattimpi pucchi, anaapattimpi pucchi. ``tatiya.m panaavuso upaali, paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta''nti? ``vesaaliya.m bhante''ti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti? ``sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbhaa''ti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``manussaviggahe''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m upaali.m ^a^P2.0287^ea^ tatiyassa paaraajikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, pa~n~nattimpi pucchi, anupa~n~nattimpi pucchi, aapattimpi pucchi, anaapattimpi pucchi. ``catuttha.m panaavuso upaali, paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta''nti? ``vesaaliya.m bhante''ti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti? ``vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu aarabbhaa''ti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``uttarimanussadhamme''ti. atha kho aayasmaa ^a^T2.0384^ea^ mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m upaali.m catutthassa paaraajikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, pa~n~nattimpi pucchi, anupa~n~nattimpi pucchi, aapattimpi pucchi, anaapattimpi pucchi. eteneva upaayena ubhatovibha"nge pucchi. pu.t.tho pu.t.tho aayasmaa upaali vissajjesi.
[03] 440^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aananda.m dhamma.m puccheyya''nti.
[03]aayasmaa aanando sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aayasmataa mahaakassapena dhamma.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.

[03]atha ^a^V0.0456^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``brahmajaala.m, aavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti? ``antaraa ca, bhante, raajagaha.m antaraa ca naa.landa.m raajaagaarake ambala.t.thikaayaa''ti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti? ``suppiya~nca paribbaajaka.m brahmadatta~nca maa.nava''nti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m brahmajaalassa nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi. ``saama~n~naphala.m panaavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti? ``raajagahe, bhante, jiivakambavane''ti. ``kena saddhi''nti? ``ajaatasattunaa vedehiputtena ^a^M0.0484^ea^ saddhi''nti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m saama~n~naphalassa nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi ^a^T2.0385^ea^ pucchi. eteneva upaayena pa~ncapi nikaaye pucchi. pu.t.tho pu.t.tho aayasmaa aanando vissajjesi.

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``bhagavaa ma.m, bhante, parinibbaanakaale evamaaha -- `aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, sa"ngho mamaccayena khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhaneyyaa'''ti. ``pucchi pana tva.m, aavuso aananda, bhagavanta.m -- `katamaani pana, bhante, khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaanii'''ti? ``na khoha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m pucchi.m -- `katamaani pana, bhante, khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaanii''ti. ekacce theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``cattaari paaraajikaani .thapetvaa, avasesaani khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaanii''ti. ekacce theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``cattaari paaraajikaani .thapetvaa ^a^P2.0288^ea^, terasa sa"nghaadisese .thapetvaa, avasesaani khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaanii''ti. ekacce theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``cattaari paaraajikaani .thapetvaa, terasa sa"nghaadisese .thapetvaa, dve aniyate .thapetvaa, avasesaani khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaanii''ti. ekacce theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``cattaari paaraajikaani .thapetvaa, terasa sa"nghaadisese .thapetvaa, dve aniyate .thapetvaa, ti.msa nissaggiye paacittiye .thapetvaa, avasesaani khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaanii''ti. ekacce theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``cattaari paaraajikaani .thapetvaa, terasa sa"nghaadisese .thapetvaa, dve aniyate .thapetvaa, ti.msa nissaggiye paacittiye .thapetvaa, dvenavuti paacittiye .thapetvaa, avasesaani khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaanii''ti. ekacce theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``cattaari paaraajikaani .thapetvaa, terasa sa"nghaadisese .thapetvaa, dve aniyate .thapetvaa, ti.msa nissaggiye paacittiye .thapetvaa, dvenavuti paacittiye .thapetvaa, cattaaro paa.tidesaniiye .thapetvaa, avasesaani khuddaanukhuddakaani ^a^T2.0386^ea^ sikkhaapadaanii''ti.
[03] 442^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0457^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --

[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. santamhaaka.m sikkhaapadaani gihigataani. gihinopi jaananti -- `ida.m vo sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m kappati, ida.m vo na kappatii'ti. sace maya.m khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhanissaama, bhavissanti ^a^M0.0485^ea^ vattaaro -- `dhuumakaalika.m sama.nena gotamena saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m. yaavimesa.m satthaa a.t.thaasi taavime sikkhaapadesu sikkhi.msu. yato imesa.m satthaa parinibbuto, na daanime sikkhaapadesu sikkhantii'ti. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho appa~n~natta.m nappa~n~napeyya, pa~n~natta.m na samucchindeyya, yathaapa~n~nattesu sikkhaapadesu samaadaaya vatteyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. santamhaaka.m sikkhaapadaani gihigataani. gihinopi jaananti -- `ida.m vo sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m kappati, ida.m vo na kappatii'ti. sace maya.m khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhanissaama, bhavissanti vattaaro -- `dhuumakaalika.m sama.nena gotamena saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m ^a^T2.0387^ea^. yaavimesa.m satthaa a.t.thaasi taavime sikkhaapadesu sikkhi.msu. yato imesa.m satthaa parinibbuto, na daanime sikkhaapadesu sikkhantii'ti. sa"ngho appa~n~natta.m nappa~n~napeti, pa~n~natta.m na samucchindati, yathaapa~n~nattesu sikkhaapadesu samaadaaya vattati. yassaayasmato khamati appa~n~nattassa appa~n~naapanaa, pa~n~nattassa asamucchedo, yathaapa~n~nattesu sikkhaapadesu samaadaaya vattanaa, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sa"ngho appa~n~natta.m nappa~n~napeti, pa~n~natta.m na samucchindati, yathaapa~n~nattesu sikkhaapadesu samaadaaya vattati. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 443^b^.^eb^ atha kho theraa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavocu.m -- ``ida.m te, aavuso aananda, dukka.ta.m, ya.m tva.m bhagavanta.m na pucchi -- `katamaani pana, bhante, khuddaanukhuddakaani ^a^P2.0289^ea^ sikkhaapadaanii'ti. desehi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. ``aha.m kho, bhante, assatiyaa bhagavanta.m na pucchi.m -- `katamaani pana, bhante, khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaanii'ti. naaha.m ta.m dukka.ta.m passaami, api caayasmantaana.m saddhaaya desemi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. ``idampi te, aavuso aananda, dukka.ta.m, ya.m tva.m bhagavato vassikasaa.tika.m akkamitvaa sibbesi. desehi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. ``aha.m kho, bhante, na agaaravena bhagavato vassikasaa.tika.m akkamitvaa sibbesi.m. naaha.m ta.m dukka.ta.m passaami, api caayasmantaana.m saddhaaya desemi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. ``idampi ^a^T2.0388^ea^ ^a^V0.0458^ea^ te, aavuso aananda, dukka.ta.m, ya.m tva.m maatugaamehi bhagavato ^a^M0.0486^ea^ sariira.m pa.thama.m vandaapesi, taasa.m rodantiina.m bhagavato sariira.m assukena makkhita.m. desehi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. aha.m kho, bhante -- maayimaasa.m {maayimaa (sii0 syaa0)} vikaale ahesunti -- maatugaamehi bhagavato sariira.m pa.thama.m vandaapesi.m. naaha.m ta.m dukka.ta.m passaami, api caayasmantaana.m saddhaaya desemi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. ``idampi te, aavuso aananda, dukka.ta.m, ya.m tva.m bhagavataa o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane, o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane, na bhagavanta.m yaaci -- `ti.t.thatu bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m, bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. desehi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. ``aha.m kho, bhante, maarena pariyu.t.thitacitto na bhagavanta.m yaaci.m -- `ti.t.thatu bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m, bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. naaha.m ta.m dukka.ta.m passaami, api caayasmantaana.m saddhaaya desemi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. ``idampi te, aavuso aananda, dukka.ta.m ya.m tva.m maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye pabbajja.m ussukka.m akaasi. desehi ta.m dukka.ta''nti. ``aha.m kho, bhante, aya.m mahaapajaapati gotamii bhagavato maatucchaa aapaadikaa posikaa khiirassa daayikaa bhagavanta.m janettiyaa kaala"nkataaya tha~n~na.m paayesiiti maatugaamassa tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye pabbajja.m ussukka.m akaasi.m. naaha.m ta.m dukka.ta.m passaami, api ^a^T2.0389^ea^ caayasmantaana.m saddhaaya desemi ta.m dukka.ta''nti.

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa puraa.no dakkhi.naagirismi.m caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi. atha kho aayasmaa puraa.no therehi bhikkhuuhi dhamme ca vinaye ca sa"ngiite dakkhi.naagirismi.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena raajagaha.m yena ve.luvana.m ^a^P2.0290^ea^ kalandakanivaapo yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa therehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammoditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m puraa.na.m theraa bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``therehi, aavuso puraa.na, dhammo ca vinayo ca sa"ngiito. upehi ta.m sa"ngiiti''nti. ``susa"ngiitaavuso, therehi dhammo ca vinayo ca. apica yatheva mayaa bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m, tathevaaha.m dhaaressaamii''ti.

[03] 445^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0487^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``bhagavaa ma.m, bhante, parinibbaanakaale evamaaha -- `tena haananda, sa"ngho mamaccayena channassa bhikkhuno brahmada.n.da.m aa.naapetuu'''ti ^a^V0.0459^ea^. ``pucchi pana tva.m, aavuso aananda, bhagavanta.m -- `katamo pana, bhante, brahmada.n.do'''ti? ``pucchi.m khoha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m -- `katamo pana, bhante, brahmada.n.do'''ti? ``channo, aananda, bhikkhu ya.m iccheyya ta.m vadeyya. bhikkhuuhi channo bhikkhu neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, naanusaasitabbo''ti. ``tena haavuso aananda, tva.myeva channassa bhikkhuno ^a^T2.0390^ea^ brahmada.n.da.m aa.naapehii''ti. ``kathaaha.m, bhante, channassa bhikkhuno brahmada.n.da.m aa.naapemi, ca.n.do so bhikkhu pharuso''ti? `tena haavuso aananda, bahukehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m gacchaahii''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi naavaaya ujjavanikaaya kosambi.m ujjavi, naavaaya paccorohitvaa ra~n~no udenassa {utenassa (ka0)} uyyaanassa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena raajaa udeno uyyaane paricaaresi saddhi.m orodhena. assosi kho ra~n~no udenassa orodho -- ``amhaaka.m kira aacariyo ayyo aanando uyyaanassa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinno''ti. atha kho ra~n~no udenassa orodho raajaana.m udena.m etadavoca -- ``amhaaka.m kira, deva, aacariyo ayyo aanando uyyaanassa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinno. icchaama maya.m, deva, ayya.m aananda.m passitu''nti. ``tena hi tumhe sama.na.m aananda.m passathaa''ti.

[03]atha kho ra~n~no udenassa orodho yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ra~n~no udenassa orodha.m aayasmaa aanando dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi ^a^T2.0391^ea^ samuttejesi sampaha.msesi ^a^P2.0291^ea^. atha kho ra~n~no udenassa orodho aayasmataa aanandena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito aayasmato aanandassa pa~nca uttaraasa"ngasataani paadaasi. atha ^a^M0.0488^ea^ kho ra~n~no udenassa orodho aayasmato aanandassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena raajaa udeno tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho raajaa udeno orodha.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana orodha.m etadavoca -- ``api nu kho tumhe sama.na.m aananda.m passitthaa''ti? ``apassimhaa kho maya.m, deva, ayya.m aananda''nti. ``api nu tumhe sama.nassa aanandassa ki~nci adatthaa''ti? ``adamhaa kho maya.m, deva, ayyassa aanandassa pa~nca uttaraasa"ngasataanii''ti. raajaa udeno ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.no aanando taava bahu.m ciivara.m pa.tiggahessati! dussavaa.nijja.m vaa sama.no aanando karissati, paggaahikasaala.m vaa pasaaressatii''ti!

[03]atha ^a^V0.0460^ea^ kho raajaa udeno yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa udeno aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``aagamaa nu ^a^T2.0392^ea^ khvidha, bho aananda, amhaaka.m orodho''ti? ``aagamaasi kho te idha, mahaaraaja, orodho''ti. ``api pana bhoto aanandassa ki~nci adaasii''ti? ``adaasi kho me, mahaaraaja, pa~nca uttaraasa"ngasataanii''ti. ``ki.m pana bhava.m aanando taava bahu.m ciivara.m karissatii''ti? ``ye {ye pana (ka0)} te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu dubbalaciivaraa tehi saddhi.m sa.mvibhajissaamii''ti. ``yaani kho pana, bho aananda, poraa.nakaani dubbalaciivaraani taani katha.m karissathaa''ti? ``taani, mahaaraaja, uttaratthara.na.m karissaamaa''ti. ``yaani pana, bho aananda, poraa.nakaani uttaratthara.naani taani katha.m karissathaa''ti? ``taani, mahaaraaja, bhisicchaviyo karissaamaa''ti. ``yaa pana, bho aananda, poraa.nakaa bhisicchaviyo taa katha.m karissathaa''ti? ``taa, mahaaraaja, bhuumatthara.na.m karissaamaa''ti. ``yaani pana, bho aananda, poraa.nakaani bhuumatthara.naani taani katha.m karissathaa''ti? ``taani, mahaaraaja, paadapu~nchaniyo karissaamaa''ti. ``yaa pana, bho aananda, poraa.nakaa paadapu~nchaniyo taa katha.m karissathaa''ti?. ``taa, mahaaraaja, rajohara.na.m karissaamaa''ti. ``yaani pana, bho ^a^M0.0489^ea^ aananda, poraa.nakaani rajohara.naani taani katha.m karissathaa''ti? ``taani, mahaaraaja, ko.t.tetvaa cikkhallena madditvaa paribha.n.da.m limpissaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho raajaa udeno -- sabbevime ^a^P2.0292^ea^ sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa yoniso upanenti, na kulava.m gamentiiti ^a^T2.0393^ea^ -- aayasmato aanandassa a~n~naanipi pa~nca dussasataani paadaasi. aya~ncarahi aayasmato aanandassa pa.thama.m ciivarabhikkhaa uppajji ciivarasahassa.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena ghositaaraamo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho aayasmaa channo yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m channa.m aayasmaa aanando etadavoca -- ``sa"nghena te, aavuso channa, brahmada.n.do aa.naapito''ti.

[03]``katamo pana, bhante aananda, brahmada.n.do aa.naapito''ti? ``tva.m, aavuso channa, bhikkhuu ya.m iccheyyaasi ta.m vadeyyaasi. bhikkhuuhi tva.m neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, naanusaasitabbo''ti. ``nanvaaha.m, bhante aananda, hato ettaavataa, yatoha.m bhikkhuuhi neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, naanusaasitabbo''ti tattheva mucchito papato. atha kho aayasmaa channo ^a^V0.0461^ea^ brahmada.n.dena a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m ^a^T2.0394^ea^ brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa channo arahata.m ahosi. atha kho aayasmaa channo arahatta.m patto yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tippassambhehi daani me, bhante aananda, brahmada.n.da''nti. ``yadaggena tayaa, aavuso channa, arahatta.m sacchikata.m tadaggena te brahmada.n.do pa.tippassaddho''ti. imaaya kho pana vinayasa"ngiitiyaa pa~nca bhikkhusataani anuunaani anadhikaani ahesu.m. tasmaa aya.m vinayasa"ngiiti ``pa~ncasatikaa''ti vuccatiiti.
[06] pa~ncasatikakkhandhako ekaadasamo.

[03] 446^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0396^ea^ ^a^P2.0294^ea^ ^a^M0.0491^ea^ ^a^V0.0463^ea^ kho pana samayena vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu vesaaliya.m dasa vatthuuni diipenti -- kappati si"ngilo.nakappo, kappati dva"ngulakappo, kappati gaamantarakappo, kappati aavaasakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati aaci.n.nakappo, kappati amathitakappo, kappati ja.logi.m paatu.m, kappati adasaka.m nisiidana.m, kappati jaataruuparajatanti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vajjiisu caarika.m caramaano yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu tadahuposathe ka.msapaati.m {ka.msacaa.ti.m (syaa0)} udakena puuretvaa majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa .thapetvaa aagataagate vesaalike upaasake eva.m vadanti -- ``dethaavuso, sa"nghassa kahaapa.nampi a.d.dhampi paadampi maasakaruupampi. bhavissati sa"nghassa parikkhaarena kara.niiya''nti. eva.m vutte aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vesaalike upaasake etadavoca -- ``maavuso, adattha sa"nghassa kahaapa.nampi a.d.dhampi paadampi maasakaruupampi. na ^a^T2.0397^ea^ kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m; na saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m; na pa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m; nikkhittama.nisuva.n.naa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa apetajaataruuparajataa''ti. evampi kho vesaalikaa upaasakaa aayasmataa yasena kaaka.n.dakaputtena vuccamaanaa ada.msuyeva sa"nghassa kahaapa.nampi a.d.dhampi paadampi maasakaruupampi.

[03]atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu tassaa rattiyaa accayena ta.m hira~n~na.m bhikkhaggena {bhikkhuggena (syaa0)} ^a^V0.0464^ea^ pa.tiviisa.m {pa.tivi.msa.m (sii0), pa.tivisa.m (syaa0)} .thapetvaa bhaajesu.m. atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m yasa.m kaaka.n.dakaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``eso ^a^P2.0295^ea^ te, aavuso yasa, hira~n~nassa pa.tiviiso''ti. ``natthi, me aavuso, hira~n~nassa pa.tiviiso, naaha.m hira~n~na.m saadiyaamii''ti. atha ^a^M0.0492^ea^ kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu -- ``aya.m aavuso yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto upaasake saddhe pasanne akkosati, paribhaasati, appasaada.m karoti; handassa maya.m pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m karomaa''ti te. tassa pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m aka.msu. atha kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vesaalike vajjiputtake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``bhagavataa, aavuso, pa~n~natta.m -- `pa.tisaara.niiyakammakatassa bhikkhuno anuduuto daatabbo'ti. detha me, aavuso, anuduuta.m bhikkhu''nti.

[03]atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu eka.m bhikkhu.m sammannitvaa aayasmato yasassa kaaka.n.dakaputtassa anuduuta.m ada.msu. atha kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto ^a^T2.0398^ea^ anuduutena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vesaali.m pavisitvaa vesaalike upaasake etadavoca -- ``aha.m kiraayasmante upaasake saddhe pasanne akkosaami, paribhaasaami, appasaada.m karomi; yoha.m adhamma.m adhammoti vadaami, dhamma.m dhammoti vadaami, avinaya.m avinayoti vadaami, vinaya.m vinayoti vadaami.

[03] 447^b^.^eb^ ``ekamida.m, aavuso, samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho, aavuso, bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- {a0 ni0 4.50} `cattaarome, bhikkhave, candimasuuriyaana.m upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.thaa candimasuuriyaa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. katame cattaaro? abbha.m, bhikkhave, candimasuuriyaana.m upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa candimasuuriyaa na tapanti, na bhaasanti na virocanti. mahikaa, bhikkhave, candimasuuriyaana.m upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa candimasuuriyaa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti, dhuumarajo, bhikkhave, candimasuuriyaana.m upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa candimasuuriyaa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. raahu, bhikkhave, asurindo candimasuuriyaana.m upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa candimasuuriyaa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro candimasuuriyaana.m upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.thaa candimasuuriyaa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattaarome sama.nabraahma.naana.m ^a^T2.0399^ea^ upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.thaa eke sama.nabraahma.naa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. katame cattaaro? santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa ^a^V0.0465^ea^ sura.m pivanti, meraya.m pivanti, suraamerayapaanaa appa.tivirataa -- aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo sama.nabraahma.naana.m upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa eke sama.nabraahma.naa na ^a^M0.0493^ea^ tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. puna capara.m, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa methuna.m ^a^P2.0296^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanti, methunadhammaa appa.tivirataa -- aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo sama.nabraahma.naana.m upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa eke sama.nabraahma.naa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. puna capara.m, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa jaataruuparajata.m saadiyanti, jaataruuparajatappa.tiggaha.naa appa.tivirataa -- aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo sama.nabraahma.naana.m upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa eke sama.nabraahma.naa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. puna capara.m, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa micchaajiivena jiivita.m kappenti; micchaajiivaa appa.tivirataa -- aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho sama.nabraahma.naana.m upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa eke sama.nabraahma.naa na tapanti, na bhaasanti, na virocanti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro sama.nabraahma.naana.m upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.thaa eke sama.nabraahma.naa na tapanti, na bhaasanti ^a^T2.0400^ea^, na virocanti'. ``idamavocaavuso, bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``raagadosaparikli.t.thaa, eke sama.nabraahma.naa.
[22] avijjaanivu.taa {avijjaaniivutaa (syaa0)} posaa, piyaruupaabhinandino..
[21] ``sura.m pivanti meraya.m, pa.tisevanti methuna.m.
[22] rajata.m jaataruupa~nca, saadiyanti aviddasuu..
[21] ``micchaajiivena jiivanti, eke sama.nabraahma.naa.
[22] ete upakkilesaa vuttaa, buddhenaadiccabandhunaa..
[21] ``yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.thaa, eke sama.nabraahma.naa.
[22] na tapanti na bhaasanti, asuddhaa sarajaa magaa..
[21] ``andhakaarena onaddhaa, ta.nhaadaasaa sanettikaa.
[22] va.d.dhenti ka.tasi.m ghora.m, aadiyanti punabbhavanti..

[03]``eva.mvaadii ^a^M0.0494^ea^ ^a^V0.0466^ea^ kiraaha.m aayasmante upaasake saddhe pasanne akkosaami, paribhaasaami, appasaada.m karomi; yoha.m adhamma.m adhammoti vadaami, dhamma.m dhammoti vadaami, avinaya.m avinayoti vadaami, vinaya.m vinayoti vadaami.

[03] 448^b^.^eb^ {sa.m0 ni0 4.362 ida.m vatthu aagata.m} ``ekamida.m, aavuso, samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena raajantepure raajaparisaaya.m sannisinnaana.m ^a^T2.0401^ea^ sannipatitaana.m ayamantarakathaa udapaadi -- `kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m; saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m; pa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata'nti. tena kho panaavuso samayena, ma.nicuu.lako gaama.nii tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti. atha kho, aavuso, ma.nicuu.lako gaama.nii ta.m parisa.m etadavoca -- `maa ayyaa eva.m avacuttha. na kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m; na saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m; na pa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m; nikkhittama.nisuva.n.naa ^a^P2.0297^ea^ sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa apetajaataruuparajataa'ti. asakkhi kho, aavuso, ma.nicuu.lako gaama.nii ta.m parisa.m sa~n~naapetu.m.

[03]``atha kho, aavuso, ma.nicuu.lako gaama.nii ta.m parisa.m sa~n~naapetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho, aavuso, ma.nicuu.lako gaama.nii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- `idha, bhante, raajantepure raajaparisaaya.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantarakathaa udapaadi -- kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m; saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m; pa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajatanti. eva.m vutte aha.m bhante, ta.m parisa.m etadavoca.m -- maa ayyaa eva.m avacuttha. na kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m; na saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m ^a^T2.0402^ea^; na pa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m; nikkhittama.nisuva.n.naa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa apetajaataruuparajataati. asakkhi.m kho aha.m, bhante, ta.m parisa.m sa~n~naapetu.m. kaccaaha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato homi, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhaami, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaromi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii'ti? `taggha tva.m, gaama.ni, eva.m byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva me hosi; na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhasi ^a^M0.0495^ea^ {paaraa0 582}, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakarosi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchati. na hi, gaama.ni, kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m; na saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa ^a^V0.0467^ea^ jaataruuparajata.m; na pa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m; nikkhittama.nisuva.n.naa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa apetajaataruuparajataa. yassa kho, gaama.ni, jaataruuparajata.m kappati, pa~ncapi tassa kaamagu.naa kappanti. yassa pa~nca kaamagu.naa kappanti eka.mseneta.m, gaama.ni, dhaareyyaasi -- assama.nadhammo asakyaputtiyadhammoti. api caaha.m, gaama.ni, eva.m vadaami ti.na.m ti.natthikena pariyesitabba.m; daaru daarutthikena pariyesitabba.m; saka.ta.m saka.tatthikena pariyesitabba.m; puriso purisatthikena pariyesitabbo. na tvevaaha.m, gaama.ni, kenaci pariyaayena jaataruuparajata.m saaditabba.m pariyesitabbanti ^a^T2.0403^ea^ vadaamii'ti.

[03]``eva.mvaadii kiraaha.m aayasmante upaasake saddhe pasanne akkosaami, paribhaasaami, appasaada.m karomi; yoha.m adhamma.m adhammoti vadaami, dhamma.m dhammoti vadaami, avinaya.m avinayoti vadaami, vinaya.m vinayoti vadaami.

[03] 449^b^.^eb^ ``ekamida.m, aavuso, samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha jaataruuparajata.m pa.tikkhipi, sikkhaapada~nca pa~n~napesi. eva.mvaadii kiraaha.m aayasmante upaasake saddhe pasanne akkosaami, paribhaasaami, appasaada.m karomi; yoha.m adhamma.m ^a^P2.0298^ea^ adhammoti vadaami, dhamma.m dhammoti vadaami, avinaya.m avinayoti vadaami, vinaya.m vinayoti vadaamii''ti.

[03]eva.m vutte vesaalikaa upaasakaa aayasmanta.m yasa.m kaaka.n.dakaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``ekova bhante, ayyo yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto sama.no sakyaputtiyo. sabbevime assama.naa asakyaputtiyaa. vasatu, bhante, ayyo yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vesaaliya.m. maya.m ayyassa yasassa kaaka.n.dakaputtassa ussukka.m karissaama ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. atha kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vesaalike upaasake sa~n~naapetvaa anuduutena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m aaraama.m agamaasi.

[03]atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu anuduuta.m bhikkhu.m pucchi.msu -- ``khamaapitaavuso, yasena kaaka.n.dakaputtena vesaalikaa upaasakaa''ti ^a^T2.0404^ea^ ^a^M0.0496^ea^? ``upaasakehi paapika.m no, aavuso, kata.m. ekova yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto sama.no sakyaputtiyo kato. sabbeva maya.m assama.naa asakyaputtiyaa kataa''ti. atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu -- ``aya.m, aavuso, yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto amhehi asammato gihiina.m pakaasesi; handassa maya.m ukkhepaniiyakamma.m ^a^V0.0468^ea^ karomaa''ti. te tassa ukkhepaniiyakamma.m kattukaamaa sannipati.msu. atha kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa kosambiya.m paccu.t.thaasi.

[03] 450^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto paaveyyakaana~nca {paa.theyyakaana~nca (syaa0)} avantidakkhi.naapathakaana~nca bhikkhuuna.m santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``aagacchantu aayasmantaa; ima.m adhikara.na.m aadiyissaama. pure adhammo dippati, dhammo pa.tibaahiyyati; avinayo dippati, vinayo pa.tibaahiyyati; pure adhammavaadino balavanto honti, dhammavaadino dubbalaa honti; avinayavaadino balavanto honti, vinayavaadino dubbalaa hontii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa sambhuuto saa.navaasii ahoga"nge pabbate pa.tivasati. atha kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto yena ahoga"ngo pabbato, yenaayasmaa sambhuuto saa.navaasii tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m sambhuuta.m saa.navaasi.m ^a^T2.0405^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto aayasmanta.m sambhuuta.m saa.navaasi.m etadavoca -- ``ime, bhante, vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu vesaaliya.m dasa vatthuuni diipenti -- kappati si"ngilo.nakappo, kappati dva"ngulakappo, kappati gaamantarakappo, kappati aavaasakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati aaci.n.nakappo, kappati amathitakappo, kappati ja.logi.m paatu.m, kappati adasaka.m nisiidana.m, kappati jaataruuparajatanti. handa ^a^P2.0299^ea^ maya.m, bhante, ima.m adhikara.na.m aadiyissaama. pure adhammo dippati, dhammo pa.tibaahiyyati; avinayo dippati, vinayo pa.tibaahiyyati; pure adhammavaadino balavanto honti, dhammavaadino dubbalaa honti; avinayavaadino balavanto honti, vinayavaadino dubbalaa hontii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa sambhuuto saa.navaasii aayasmato yasassa kaaka.n.dakaputtassa paccassosi. atha ^a^M0.0497^ea^ kho sa.t.thimattaa paaveyyakaa bhikkhuu -- sabbe aara~n~nikaa, sabbe pi.n.dapaatikaa, sabbe pa.msukuulikaa, sabbe teciivarikaa, sabbeva arahanto -- ahoga"nge pabbate sannipati.msu. a.t.thaasiitimattaa avantidakkhi.naapathakaa bhikkhuu -- appekacce aara~n~nikaa, appekacce pi.n.dapaatikaa, appekacce pa.msukuulikaa, appekacce teciivarikaa, sabbeva arahanto -- ahoga"nge pabbate sannipati.msu. atha ^a^T2.0406^ea^ kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m mantayamaanaana.m etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho adhikara.na.m kakkha.la~nca, vaa.la~nca; ka.m nu kho maya.m pakkha.m labheyyaama, yena maya.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne balavantataraa assaamaa''ti.

[03] 451^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa revato soreyye pa.tivasati -- bahussuto aagataagamo ^a^V0.0469^ea^ dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa revato soreyye pa.tivasati -- bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. sace maya.m aayasmanta.m revata.m pakkha.m labhissaama, eva.m maya.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne balavantataraa assaamaa''ti. assosi kho aayasmaa revato -- dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya -- theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m mantayamaanaana.m. sutvaanassa etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho adhikara.na.m kakkha.la~nca vaa.la~nca. na kho meta.m patiruupa.m yoha.m evaruupe adhikara.ne osakkeyya.m. idaani ca pana te bhikkhuu aagacchissanti. soha.m tehi aaki.n.no na phaasu gamissaami. ya.mnuunaaha.m pa.tikacceva gaccheyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa revato soreyyaa sa"nkassa.m agamaasi.

[03]atha kho theraa bhikkhuu soreyya.m gantvaa pucchi.msu -- ``kaha.m aayasmaa revato''ti? te evamaaha.msu -- ``esaayasmaa revato sa"nkassa.m ^a^T2.0407^ea^ gato''ti. atha kho aayasmaa revato sa"nkassaa ka.n.nakujja.m {kannakujja.m (sii0)} agamaasi. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu sa"nkassa.m gantvaa pucchi.msu -- ``kaha.m aayasmaa revato''ti? te evamaaha.msu -- ``esaayasmaa revato ka.n.nakujja.m gato''ti. atha kho aayasmaa revato ka.n.nakujjaa udumbara.m ^a^M0.0498^ea^ agamaasi. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu ka.n.nakujja.m gantvaa pucchi.msu -- ``kaha.m aayasmaa revato''ti? te evamaaha.msu -- ``esaayasmaa revato udumbara.m gato''ti. atha ^a^P2.0300^ea^ kho aayasmaa revato udumbaraa agga.lapura.m agamaasi. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu udumbara.m gantvaa pucchi.msu -- ``kaha.m aayasmaa revato''ti? te evamaaha.msu -- ``esaayasmaa revato agga.lapura.m gato''ti. atha kho aayasmaa revato agga.lapuraa sahajaati.m {saha.mjaati.m (ka0)} agamaasi. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu agga.lapura.m gantvaa pucchi.msu -- ``kaha.m aayasmaa revato''ti? te evamaaha.msu -- ``esaayasmaa revato sahajaati.m gato''ti. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m revata.m sahajaatiya.m sambhaavesu.m.

[03] 452^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa sambhuuto saa.navaasii aayasmanta.m yasa.m kaaka.n.dakaputta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, aavuso, aayasmaa revato bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. sace maya.m aayasmanta.m revata.m pa~nha.m pucchissaama, pa.tibalo aayasmaa revato ekeneva pa~nhena sakalampi ratti.m viitinaametu.m. idaani ca panaayasmaa revato ^a^T2.0408^ea^ antevaasika.m {antevaasi.m (syaa0)} sarabhaa.naka.m bhikkhu.m ajjhesissati. so tva.m tassa bhikkhuno sarabha~n~napariyosaane aayasmanta.m revata.m upasa"nkamitvaa imaani ^a^V0.0470^ea^ dasa vatthuuni puccheyyaasii''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto aayasmato sambhuutassa saa.navaasissa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa revato antevaasika.m sarabhaa.naka.m bhikkhu.m ajjhesi. atha kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto tassa bhikkhuno sarabha~n~napariyosaane yenaayasmaa revato tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m revata.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto aayasmanta.m revata.m etadavoca -- ``kappati, bhante, si"ngilo.nakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, si"ngilo.nakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, si"nginaa lo.na.m pariharitu.m -- yattha alo.naka.m bhavissati tattha paribhu~njissaamii''ti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti. ``kappati, bhante, dva"ngulakappo''ti ^a^M0.0499^ea^? ``ko so, aavuso, dva"ngulakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, dva"ngulaaya chaayaaya viitivattaaya, vikaale bhojana.m bhu~njitu''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti. ``kappati, bhante, gaamantarakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, gaamantarakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante -- idaani gaamantara.m gamissaamiiti -- bhuttaavinaa pavaaritena anatiritta.m bhojana.m bhu~njitu''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti. ``kappati, bhante, aavaasakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, aavaasakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, sambahulaa aavaasaa samaanasiimaa naanuposatha.m kaatu''nti? ``naavuso ^a^T2.0409^ea^, kappatii''ti. ``kappati ^a^P2.0301^ea^, bhante, anumatikappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, anumatikappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, vaggena sa"nghena kamma.m kaatu.m -- aagate bhikkhuu anumaanessaamaa''ti {anujaanissaamaati, anujaanessaamaati, anumati.m aanessaamaati (ka0)}? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti. ``kappati, bhante, aaci.n.nakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, aaci.n.nakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, ida.m me upajjhaayena ajjhaaci.n.na.m, ida.m me aacariyena ajjhaaci.n.na.m, ta.m ajjhaacaritu''nti? ``aaci.n.nakappo kho, aavuso, ekacco kappati, ekacco na kappatii''ti. ``kappati, bhante, amathitakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, amathitakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, ya.m ta.m khiira.m khiirabhaava.m vijahita.m, asampatta.m dadhibhaava.m, ta.m bhuttaavinaa pavaaritena anatiritta.m paatu''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti? ``kappati, bhante, ja.logi.m paatu''nti? ``kaa saa, aavuso, ja.logii''ti? ``kappati, bhante, yaa saa suraa aasutaa, asampattaa majjabhaava.m, saa paatu''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti. ``kappati, bhante, adasaka.m nisiidana''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti. ``kappati, bhante, jaataruuparajata''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti. ``ime, bhante, vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu vesaaliya.m imaani dasa vatthuuni diipenti. handa maya.m, bhante, ima.m adhikara.na.m aadiyissaama. pure adhammo dippati, dhammo pa.tibaahiyyati; avinayo ^a^T2.0410^ea^ dippati, vinayo pa.tibaahiyyati; pure adhammavaadino balavanto honti, dhammavaadino dubbalaa ^a^V0.0471^ea^ honti; avinayavaadino balavanto honti, vinayavaadino dubbalaa hontii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa revato aayasmato yasassa kaaka.n.dakaputtassa paccassosi.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 453^b^.^eb^ assosu.m ^a^M0.0500^ea^ kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu -- ``yaso kira kaaka.n.dakaputto ida.m adhikara.na.m aadiyitukaamo pakkha.m pariyesati, labhati ca kira pakkha''nti. atha kho vesaalikaana.m vajjiputtakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho adhikara.na.m kakkha.la~nca vaa.la~nca. ka.m nu kho maya.m pakkha.m labheyyaama, yena maya.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne balavantataraa assaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho vesaalikaana.m vajjiputtakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa revato bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. sace maya.m aayasmanta.m revata.m pakkha.m labheyyaama, eva.m maya.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne balavantataraa assaamaa''ti.

[03]atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu pahuuta.m saama.naka.m parikkhaara.m pa.tiyaadesu.m -- pattampi, ciivarampi, nisiidanampi, suucigharampi, kaayabandhanampi, parissaavanampi, dhammakara.nampi. atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu ta.m saama.naka.m parikkhaara.m aadaaya naavaaya sahajaati.m ujjavi.msu; naavaaya paccorohitvaa ^a^P2.0302^ea^ a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule ^a^T2.0411^ea^ bhattavissagga.m karonti. atha kho aayasmato saa.lhassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``ke nu kho dhammavaadino -- paaciinakaa vaa bhikkhuu, paaveyyakaa vaa''ti? atha kho aayasmato saa.lhassa, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca cetasaa paccavekkhantassa, etadahosi -- ``adhammavaadino paaciinakaa bhikkhuu, dhammavaadino paaveyyakaa {paa.theyyakaa (syaa0)} bhikkhuu''ti.

[03]atha kho a~n~nataraa suddhaavaasakaayikaa devataa aayasmato saa.lhassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sammi~njeyya, evameva suddhaavaasesu devesu antarahitaa -- aayasmato saa.lhassa ^a^V0.0472^ea^ sammukhe paaturahosi. atha kho saa devataa aayasmanta.m saa.lha.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, bhante saa.lha, adhammavaadii paaciinakaa bhikkhuu, dhammavaadii paaveyyakaa bhikkhuu. tena hi, bhante saa.lha, yathaadhammo tathaa ti.t.thaahii''ti. ``pubbepi caaha.m, devate, etarahi ca yathaadhammo tathaa .thito ^a^M0.0501^ea^; api caaha.m na taava di.t.thi.m aavi karomi, appeva naama ma.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne sammanneyyaa''ti.

[03] 454^b^.^eb^ atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu ta.m saama.naka.m parikkhaara.m aadaaya yenaayasmaa revato tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m revata.m etadavocu.m -- ``pa.tigga.nhaatu, bhante, thero saama.naka.m ^a^T2.0412^ea^ parikkhaara.m -- pattampi, ciivarampi, nisiidanampi, suucigharampi, kaayabandhanampi, parissaavanampi, dhammakara.nampii''ti. ``ala.m, aavuso, paripu.n.na.m me pattaciivara''nti na icchi pa.tiggahetu.m.

[03]tena kho pana samayena uttaro naama bhikkhu viisativasso aayasmato revatassa upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa uttaro tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m uttara.m etadavocu.m -- ``pa.tigga.nhaatu aayasmaa uttaro saama.naka.m parikkhaara.m -- pattampi, ciivarampi, nisiidanampi, suucigharampi, kaayabandhanampi, parissaavanampi, dhammakara.nampii''ti. ``ala.m, aavuso, paripu.n.na.m me pattaciivara''nti na icchi pa.tiggahetu.m. ``manussaa kho, aavuso uttara, bhagavato saama.naka.m parikkhaara.m upanaamenti. sace bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaati, teneva te attamanaa honti. no ce bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaati, aayasmato {aayasmato ca (syaa0)} aanandassa upanaamenti -- pa.tigga.nhaatu, bhante, thero saama.naka.m parikkhaara.m. yathaa bhagavataa pa.tiggahito, evameva so bhavissatiiti. pa.tigga.nhaatu aayasmaa uttaro saama.naka.m ^a^P2.0303^ea^ parikkhaara.m. yathaa therena pa.tiggahito, evameva so bhavissatii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa uttaro vesaalikehi vajjiputtehi bhikkhuuhi nippii.liyamaano eka.m ciivara.m aggahesi. ``vadeyyaatha, aavuso, yena attho''ti. ``ettaka.m aayasmaa uttaro thera.m ^a^T2.0413^ea^ vadetu; ettaka~nca, bhante, thero sa"nghamajjhe vadetu -- `puratthimesu janapadesu buddhaa bhagavanto uppajjanti. dhammavaadii paaciinakaa bhikkhuu, adhammavaadii paaveyyakaa bhikkhuu'''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa uttaro vesaalikaana.m vajjiputtakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa revato tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m revata.m etadavoca -- ``ettaka.m, bhante, thero sa"nghamajjhe vadetu -- `puratthimesu janapadesu buddhaa bhagavanto uppajjanti ^a^M0.0502^ea^. dhammavaadii paaciinakaa bhikkhuu, adhammavaadii ^a^V0.0473^ea^ paaveyyakaa bhikkhuu'''ti. ``adhamme ma.m tva.m, bhikkhu, niyojesii''ti thero aayasmanta.m uttara.m pa.naamesi.

[03]atha kho vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m uttara.m etadavocu.m -- ``ki.m, aavuso uttara, thero aahaa''ti? ``paapika.m no, aavuso, kata.m. `adhamme ma.m tva.m, bhikkhu, niyojesii'''ti thero ma.m pa.naamesiiti. ``nanu tva.m, aavuso {aavuso uttara (syaa0 ka.m0)}, vu.d.dho viisativassosii''ti? ``aamaavuso, api ca maya.m garunissaya.m ga.nhaamaa''ti.
[03] 455^b^.^eb^ atha kho sa"ngho ta.m adhikara.na.m vinicchinitukaamo sannipati. atha kho aayasmaa revato sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --

[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. sace maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m idha vuupasamessaama, siyaapi muulaadaayakaa {muuladaayakaa (sii0)} bhikkhuu punakammaaya ukko.teyyu.m. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, yatthevima.m adhikara.na.m samuppanna.m, sa"ngho tatthevima.m adhikara.na.m ^a^T2.0414^ea^ vuupasameyyaa''ti.
[03]atha kho theraa bhikkhuu vesaali.m agama.msu -- ta.m adhikara.na.m vinicchinitukaamaa.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sabbakaamii naama pathabyaa sa"nghatthero viisavassasatiko upasampadaaya, aayasmato aanandassa saddhivihaariko, vesaaliya.m pa.tivasati. atha kho aayasmaa revato aayasmanta.m sambhuuta.m saa.navaasi.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m, aavuso, yasmi.m vihaare sabbakaamii thero viharati, ta.m vihaara.m upagacchaami. so tva.m kaalasseva aayasmanta.m sabbakaami.m upasa"nkamitvaa imaani dasa vatthuuni puccheyyaasii''ti.

[03]``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa sambhuuto saa.navaasii aayasmato revatassa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa revato, yasmi.m vihaare sabbakaamii thero viharati, ta.m vihaara.m upagacchi. gabbhe aayasmato sabbakaamissa senaasana.m pa~n~natta.m hoti, gabbhappamukhe aayasmato revatassa. atha kho aayasmaa revato -- aya.m thero ^a^P2.0304^ea^ mahallako na nipajjatiiti -- na seyya.m kappesi. aayasmaa sabbakaamii -- aya.m bhikkhu aagantuko kilanto na nipajjatiiti -- na seyya.m kappesi. atha kho aayasmaa ^a^M0.0503^ea^ sabbakaamii rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya aayasmanta.m revata.m etadavoca -- ``katamena tva.m bhuumi vihaarena etarahi bahula.m viharasii''ti? ``mettaavihaarena kho aha.m ^a^V0.0474^ea^, bhante, etarahi bahula.m viharaamii''ti. ``kullakavihaarena kira tva.m bhuumi etarahi bahula.m viharasi ^a^T2.0415^ea^. kullakavihaaro eso {heso (syaa0)} bhuumi yadida.m mettaa''ti. ``pubbepi me, bhante, gihibhuutassa aaci.n.naa mettaa. tenaaha.m etarahipi mettaavihaarena bahula.m viharaami, api ca kho mayaa cirappatta.m arahatta''nti. ``thero pana, bhante, katamena vihaarena etarahi bahula.m viharatii''ti? ``su~n~nataavihaarena kho aha.m bhuumi etarahi bahula.m viharaamii''ti. ``mahaapurisavihaarena kira, bhante, thero etarahi bahula.m viharati. mahaapurisavihaaro eso, bhante, yadida.m su~n~nataa''ti. ``pubbepi me bhuumi gihibhuutassa aaci.n.naa su~n~nataa. tenaaha.m etarahipi su~n~nataavihaarena bahula.m viharaami, api ca mayaa cirappatta.m arahatta''nti. aya~ncarahi theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m antaraakathaa vippakataa, athaayasmaa sambhuuto saa.navaasii tasmi.m anuppatto hoti. atha kho aayasmaa sambhuuto saa.navaasii yenaayasmaa sabbakaamii tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m sabbakaami.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa sambhuuto saa.navaasii aayasmanta.m sabbakaami.m etadavoca -- ``ime, bhante, vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu vesaaliya.m dasa vatthuuni diipenti -- kappati si"ngilo.nakappo, kappati dva"ngulakappo, kappati gaamantarakappo, kappati aavaasakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati aaci.n.nakappo, kappati amathitakappo, kappati ja.logi.m ^a^T2.0416^ea^, paatu.m kappati adasaka.m nisiidana.m, kappati jaataruuparajatanti. therena, bhante, upajjhaayassa muule bahudhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto. therassa bhante, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca paccavekkhantassa katha.m hoti? ke nu kho dhammavaadino -- paaciinakaa vaa bhikkhuu, paaveyyakaa vaa''ti? ``tayaapi kho, aavuso, upajjhaayassa muule bahu dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto. tuyha.m pana, aavuso, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca paccavekkhantassa katha.m hoti? ke nu kho dhammavaadino -- paaciinakaa vaa bhikkhuu, paaveyyakaa vaa''ti? ``mayha.m kho, bhante, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca paccavekkhantassa eva.m hoti -- adhammavaadii paaciinakaa bhikkhuu, dhammavaadii paaveyyakaa bhikkhuuti; api caaha.m na ^a^M0.0504^ea^ taava di.t.thi.m aavi karomi, appeva naama ma.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne sammanneyyaa''ti. ``mayhampi kho, aavuso, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca paccavekkhantassa eva.m hoti ^a^P2.0305^ea^ -- adhammavaadii paaciinakaa bhikkhuu, dhammavaadii paaveyyakaa bhikkhuuti; api caaha.m na taava di.t.thi.m aavi karomi, appeva naama ma.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne sammanneyyaa''ti.

[03] 456^b^.^eb^ atha kho sa"ngho ta.m adhikara.na.m vinicchinitukaamo sannipati. tasmi.m kho pana adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane anaggaani ceva bhassaani jaayanti, na cekassa bhaasitassa attho vi~n~naayati. atha kho aayasmaa revato sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --

[03]``su.naatu ^a^V0.0475^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. amhaaka.m ^a^T2.0417^ea^ imasmi.m adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane anaggaani ceva bhassaani jaayanti, na cekassa bhaasitassa attho vi~n~naayati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ima.m adhikara.na.m ubbaahikaaya vuupasameyyaa''ti. sa"ngho cattaaro paaciinake bhikkhuu, cattaaro paaveyyake bhikkhuu uccini. paaciinakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m -- aayasmanta~nca sabbakaami.m, aayasmanta~nca saa.lha.m, aayasmanta~nca khujjasobhita.m, aayasmanta~nca vaasabhagaamika.m; paaveyyakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m -- aayasmanta~nca revata.m, aayasmanta~nca sambhuuta.m saa.navaasi.m, aayasmanta~nca yasa.m kaaka.n.dakaputta.m, aayasmanta~nca sumananti. atha kho aayasmaa revato sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. amhaaka.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane anaggaani ceva bhassaani jaayanti, na cekassa bhaasitassa attho vi~n~naayati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho cattaaro paaciinake bhikkhuu, cattaaro paaveyyake bhikkhuu sammanneyya ubbaahikaaya ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. amhaaka.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne vinicchiyamaane anaggaani ceva bhassaani jaayanti, na cekassa bhaasitassa attho vi~n~naayati. sa"ngho cattaaro paaciinake bhikkhuu, cattaaro paaveyyake bhikkhuu sammannati ubbaahikaaya ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. yassaayasmato khamati catunna.m paaciinakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m, catunna.m paaveyyakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sammuti, ubbaahikaaya ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m ^a^T2.0418^ea^, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``sammataa ^a^M0.0505^ea^ sa"nghena cattaaro paaciinakaa bhikkhuu, cattaaro paaveyyakaa bhikkhuu, ubbaahikaaya ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena ajito naama bhikkhu dasavasso sa"nghassa paatimokkhuddesako hoti. atha kho sa"ngho aayasmantampi ajita.m sammannati -- theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m aasanapa~n~naapaka.m. atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kattha nu kho maya.m ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasameyyaamaa''ti? atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^P2.0306^ea^ etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho vaalikaaraamo rama.niiyo appasaddo appanigghoso. ya.mnuuna maya.m vaalikaaraame ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasameyyaamaa''ti.
[03] 457^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0476^ea^ kho theraa bhikkhuu vaalikaaraama.m agama.msu -- ta.m adhikara.na.m vinicchinitukaamaa. atha kho aayasmaa revato sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aayasmanta.m sabbakaami.m vinaya.m puccheyya''nti.
[03]aayasmaa sabbakaamii sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m revatena vinaya.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa revato aayasmanta.m sabbakaami.m etadavoca -- ``kappati, bhante, si"ngilo.nakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, si"ngilo.nakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, si"nginaa lo.na.m pariharitu.m -- yattha alo.naka.m bhavissati ^a^T2.0419^ea^ tattha paribhu~njissaamaa''ti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti. {paaci0 254 aadayo} ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti? ``saavatthiya.m, suttavibha"nge''ti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti? ``sannidhikaarakabhojane paacittiya''nti.
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m pa.thama.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m pa.thama.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati, bhante, dva"ngulakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, dva"ngulakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, dva"ngulaaya chaayaaya viitivattaaya vikaale bhojana.m bhu~njitu''nti ^a^M0.0506^ea^? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti {paaci0 245}. ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti? ``raajagahe, suttavibha"nge''ti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti? vikaalabhojane paacittiya''nti.
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m dutiya.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m dutiya.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati, bhante, gaamantarakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, gaamantarakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante -- idaani gaamantara.m gamissaamiiti -- bhuttaavinaa pavaaritena anatiritta.m bhojana.m ^a^V0.0477^ea^ bhu~njitu''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti {paaci0 234}. ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti? ``saavatthiya.m, suttavibha"nge''ti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti? ``anatirittabhojane paacittiya''nti.
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m tatiya.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m tatiya.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati ^a^T2.0420^ea^, bhante, aavaasakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, aavaasakappo''ti? ``kappati bhante, sambahulaa aavaasaa samaanasiimaa naanuposatha.m kaatu''nti. ``naavuso, kappatii''ti {mahaava0 141 aadayo}. ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti? ``raajagahe, uposathasa.myutte''ti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti? ``vinayaatisaare dukka.ta''nti.
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m catuttha.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m catuttha.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati, bhante, anumatikappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, anumatikappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, vaggena sa"nghena kamma.m kaatu.m -- aagate bhikkhuu anumaanessaamaa''ti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti ^a^P2.0307^ea^ {mahaava0 383 aadayo}. ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti? ``campeyyake, vinayavatthusmi''nti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti? ``vinayaatisaare dukka.ta''nti.
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m pa~ncama.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m pa~ncama.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati, bhante, aaci.n.nakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, aaci.n.nakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante -- ida.m me upajjhaayena ajjhaaci.n.na.m, ida.m me aacariyena ^a^M0.0507^ea^ ajjhaaci.n.na.m -- ta.m ajjhaacaritu''nti? ``aaci.n.nakappo kho, aavuso, ekacco kappati, ekacco na kappatii''ti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m cha.t.tha.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m ^a^T2.0421^ea^. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m cha.t.tha.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati ^a^V0.0478^ea^, bhante, amathitakappo''ti? ``ko so, aavuso, amathitakappo''ti? ``kappati, bhante, ya.m ta.m khiira.m khiirabhaava.m vijahita.m, asampatta.m dadhibhaava.m, ta.m bhuttaavinaa pavaaritena anatiritta.m paatu''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti {paaci0 234}. ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti? ``saavatthiya.m, suttavibha"nge''ti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti? ``anatirittabhojane paacittiya''nti.
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m sattama.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m sattama.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati, bhante, ja.logi.m paatu''nti? ``kaa saa, aavuso, ja.logii''ti? ``kappati, bhante, yaa saa suraa aasutaa asampattaa majjabhaava.m, saa paatu''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti {paaci0 326}. ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti? ``kosambiya.m, suttavibha"nge''ti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti. ``suraamerayapaane paacittiya''nti.
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m a.t.thama.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m a.t.thama.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati, bhante, adasaka.m nisiidana''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti {paaci0 531 aadayo}. ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti? ``saavatthiya.m, suttavibha"nge''ti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti? ``chedanake paacittiya''nti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m navama.m vatthu ^a^T2.0422^ea^ sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m navama.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami''.

[03]``kappati, bhante, jaataruuparajata''nti? ``naavuso, kappatii''ti {paaraa0 580 aadayo}. ``kattha pa.tikkhitta''nti. ``raajagahe, suttavibha"nge''ti. ``ki.m aapajjatii''ti? ``jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.ne paacittiya''nti.
[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0508^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m dasama.m vatthu sa"nghena vinicchita.m. itipida.m vatthu uddhamma.m, ubbinaya.m, apagatasatthusaasana.m. ida.m dasama.m salaaka.m nikkhipaami.
[03]``su.naatu ^a^V0.0479^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. imaani dasa vatthuuni sa"nghena vinicchitaani. itipimaani dasavatthuuni uddhammaani, ubbinayaani, apagatasatthusaasanaanii''ti.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ ``nihatameta.m, aavuso, adhikara.na.m, santa.m vuupasanta.m suvuupasanta.m. api ca ma.m tva.m, aavuso, sa"nghamajjhepi imaani dasa vatthuuni puccheyyaasi -- tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m sa~n~nattiyaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa revato aayasmanta.m sabbakaami.m sa"nghamajjhepi imaani dasa vatthuuni pucchi. pu.t.tho pu.t.tho aayasmaa sabbakaamii vissajjesi. imaaya kho pana vinayasa"ngiitiyaa satta bhikkhusataani anuunaani anadhikaani ahesu.m, tasmaaya.m vinayasa"ngiiti ``sattasatikaa''ti vuccatiiti.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.
[06] sattasatikakkhandhako dvaadasamo.
[06] imamhi ^a^P2.0308^ea^ khandhake vatthuu pa~ncaviisati.
[06] tassuddaana.m --
